Summary: HoJo Anaheim is my go-to place to stay on any of my trips to Disneyland! The location is wonderful just a quick 10 min walk to the gates, the rooms are always super clean, the beds are SO comfy, and ALL of the staff is the best!   Shoutout to reservation supervisor Kriss who always goes out of the way to book my room and reply to any questions that I might have!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Offering a Safe and amazing vacation spot!
Summary: Traveling during these times is a bit stressful, but it is an important part of our family adventure. We have stayed in more than a dozen locations in the last 2 years and NO ONE did as GREAT a job as HOJO Anaheim!!!! The cleaning between rooms, wipes in the room, pool and waterpark reservation system, mask policy and front desk policy  are all great ways to keep clean, distanced and safe!   The in room ALEXA where we can request service is the best.  It also plays music which my teens loved playing with!    The walk to the park is easy!!!  We come back and forth as needed in the day.  We love watching the fireworks from the grounds here or from our balcony.  We are a bit hesitant to eat indoors, but the number of choices for carry out from the nearby Gardenwalk or Downtown
Room tip: Remember to make your pool or waterpark reservation...1 per day each.  Prior to your arrival if...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this glowing review! We are delighted to hear that your family enjoyed our room amenities, proximity to Disneyland, and proximity to local restaurants. We are dedicated to keeping our staff and guests safe during these uncertain times, and it is great to know that you appreciated our safety policies so much. Our staff always strives to provide a 5-star experience for all of our guests, and it is wonderful to see we were successful! Thank you again for your kind feedback, and we hope you will stay with us again during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort area.

Summary: They upgraded us to a garden spot on then lowest floor which was super convenient and quiet. Clean and accommodating. Nice short walk to Disneyland. Waterpark was great too.can watch fireworks from the parking lot or garden area
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are thrilled to know that our team made your visit special with an upgrade upon arrival. We are so happy you found our location convenient, and that you loved the Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel!!! We're So Cal residents so this was our second time staying for Disney. You simply can't beat the price for what you get. Disney theme rooms that are fresh and new, customer service is always steller and personable on the phone and in person, the water park is so fun for the kids (with jacuzzi for parents) and can even be used the day you checkout or entire day waiting for checkin, free glitter tattoos and face painting on Saturday mornings, you can drive in and park your car there before check-in while at the park and the lobby even smells good:) Less than half the price of cheapest Disney Hotel PLUS you get a fridge, microwave and coffee. Its just enough for continental breakfast in the room and brining snacks/ lunch into the
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for taking the time to leave such a fabuous 5 star review! We are so happy we could welcome you back to Hojo. Thank you for sharing your favorite highlights of our hotel. We love hearing you look forward to the stellar customer service, Cast Away Cove water playground, fun face painting Saturdays, amenities and location to Disney! We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Lovely hotel with great amenities.  Very close to the parks( you can hear the fireworks at night from here but it wasnt a bother to us) Comfortable beds with clean restrooms and plenty of storage space. Will def stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this awesome review! We're so glad you enjoyed your stay and that you found our beds to be comfortable and the room clean. We're also glad that you were able to enjoy the fireworks from your room without it being a bother. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Very friendly staff and good location, but beds are not very comfortable. The rooms were clean and overall it was a nice place but the beds were very hard and not comfortable at all. Also no breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that you found our staff friendly and that you liked our location close to Disneyland. We apologize that you found the beds to be uncomfortable. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. While we do not have breakfast at our hotel, we hope that you were able to take advantage of our in-room microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker. We also have our partner restaurant Mimi's Cafe, right across the street from our hotel. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This is an excellent hotel to stay at if you‚Äôre going to the parks. It‚Äôs a super close to Disney, extremely clean and the staff are friendly! Shout out to Cathy who checked us in and Jennifer who helped with an email question.   Just be aware if you‚Äôre on the top floor in some buildings - there are skylights that don‚Äôt have curtains letting in light 24/7. However, if it is a problem they will do their best to move you to another room if it‚Äôs available.   This hotel is a great value, and I will recommend it to anyone who is going to Disney. I will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience with us and that our staff was able to help you out. We will make sure to pass along your kind words to Cathy and Jennifer. We appreciate your feedback about the skylight. We are happy that we were able to find a room that was perfect for you! We are always happy to accommodate our guests and move them to another room if it is available. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great location not a great hotel
Summary: Customer service was poor. The tap on the shower fell off. My room was nothing like the pictures. I had to go get extra blankets. The store attached to the hotel did not open on time and the lady that worked there was super rude.
Manager Response: We apologize for the poor customer service you experienced. We understand how frustrating it can be when the room does not match the pictures. We are sorry the tap on the shower fell off and that you had to go get extra blankets. We will make sure to look into why MidMod Market did not open on time and address the rudeness of the lady that worked there. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to provide you with a better experience.

Summary: We planned a family trip to Disneyland and had it all setup for 5 rooms. I booked through my travel club (third party) and all the rooms were booked correctly, except for the two adjoining rooms. Somehow it was booked as only one room with a queen bed and kids size bunkbeds. I reached out to the hotel to see if they could help, but they were unable to because I had booked it through a third-party. After going back-and-forth with my travel club and Howard Johnson, I was unable to get anything resolved. I had booked two rooms as a back up if I wasn‚Äôt able to get this issue resolved. I was working with Jennifer Rubalcava at the hotel, and she was amazing! Two days prior to our arrival date she was able to secure a phenomenal rate for the two rooms that were booked last minute. She
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so pleased to hear that Jennifer Rubalcava was able to help you and secure a great rate for your last-minute booking. It is our mission to ensure our guests have the best possible experience and we are glad that we could help make your family trip to Disneyland a success. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back to Howard Johnson Anaheim in the future.

Summary: I need to start by saying, the customer service at this location has stayed consistent for 5+ years. Every time we stay we have had a great experience with the staff.   For this stay we were in building 4, which is an older building with a room facing the water park. Although this building is older it was super clean. The room came with the standard mini-mini fridge. Microwave and kurieg. There was also a twin size fold away bed in a closet and a safe. I kind of wish there was a light in the closet but I always keep a flashlight in the car.   The my son LOVED  the water park. Even though it was freezing cold we still were at the park. They also have a hot tub and a heat kiddie pool.  I also noticed the staff cleaning the slides every morning. I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs a regular
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We're so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with our staff and that your son loved the water park. We strive to provide the best customer service possible and are so happy to hear that we've been able to do that for you for the past 5+ years. We're also glad to hear that you were able to store your breastmilk in our freezer at the front desk. We understand that our mini-fridges are on the smaller side, so we are happy that we were able to help. We will be sure to review your notes about the dated rooms and consider making some upgrades in the future. Thank you again for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We hope to have you back soon!

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at this hotel during the rare rain recently in socal. It was so nice to have a nice dry toasty room a few steps away from the park (literally a few mins walking distance) and I could do several outfit changes thorough out my stay! Will def be back to utilize their pools!! Def recommend their newly renovated retro rooms, especially if you have kids they have bunkbeds!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments. We are so happy we could host your family and that our hotel was a quick walk away from Disneyland where you could change during your rainy stay. We know how convenient it is to be able to change into dry clothes during fun, rainy Disney days. We hope to welcome you back to some California sunshine at the Cast Away Cove the next time you stay!

Summary: We had a wonderful 3 night stay! My family stayed in a double room (4 queen beds) which was perfect for the group. I had a separate room in the same building which was perfect! (Thank you Zach)!  All staff were friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean and comfortable! We felt safe there and enjoyed our time!  Our recent visit was during some cold and rainy days so we did not go into the pool.  We have stayed at the Wyndham- Howard Johnson‚Äôs before and haves enjoyed the pool and play areas. The hotel is near many restaurants and fast food places.  It is an easy walk to Disneyland/Disneys California Adventure!  We had a wonderful time!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us and that we were able to provide a comfortable and safe experience for you. We are so glad that you were able to take advantage of the convenience of our location being near many restaurants and fast food places and that you were able to take a quick walk to Disneyland/Disneys California Adventure! We are sorry to hear that you were not able to utilize our pool and play areas during your stay, but we hope that you can come back and enjoy them on your next visit. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My daughter, boyfriend, and I stayed at the Howard Johnson for 4 days and 3 nights. We appreciated the cleanliness of our room, the water park, and the close proximity to Disneyland and dining. This hotel is a good value in a great location and I plan on returning in the future.  Two cons are the fact that breakfast is not included and parking is $25/night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family had a great experience during your stay. It is wonderful that you enjoyed the cleanliness of your room, the Castaway Cove, and the close proximity to Disneyland and dining. We are glad that you found the hotel to be a good value and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future! We are always looking for ways to improve our services and we value your feedback. Thank you again for your review!

Summary: Stayed this past weekend for a family trip to Disneyland. Jennifer was so helpful in checking us in and pointing out all the areas we would need on Property! We spent more time in our room because of the rain and loved every minute of our stay!  Rooms were clean, staff is so helpful perfect for our family!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We are so glad you and your family had a great time at our hotel and that Jennifer was able to help you check in with ease and point out all the areas you would need to know about. We appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, even with the rain. We look forward to welcoming you back anytime!

Summary: I really like this hotel. Fun water park. Great location. Nice rooms. My one gripe about this visit is that I paid extra for a park view room, but there were trees right outside our balcony, so the view was quite obstructed (Room 1_605) This room should not be booked as having a "park view".  Also, props to Kris at the in-house reservation line. She really went above and beyond for me!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about our hotel! We really appreciate you staying with us and enjoying our water park. We are sorry to hear that your view was obstructed by trees. We will look into this and ensure it is corrected in the future. We are also delighted to hear that Kris from the in-house reservation line was so helpful. We will certainly let her know you appreciate her help. Thank you for choosing us for your stay and we hope you will come back and stay with us again soon!

Summary: Great location for the parks staff is awesome only complaint was hot water not very hot plenty of food options around rooms were good size. Pretty quiet through out wish parking was included since you stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are delighted that our location was convenient for your Disney trip and that you found our rooms spacious. We apologize for the water being too hot. We will be sure to share your comments with our Maintenance team so they can set the water to the correct temperature. We also apologize that parking is not included in your stay. We strive to provide the best experience for our guests and appreciate your feedback, as it will continue to help us improve. We hope you stay with us for your next Disney visit.

Summary: We had such a great experience at HoJo Anaheim with the kids!  I set up my reservation with Heather and Jennifer. Both were amazing. They cared about my experience and stay. Thank you Thank you ladies!   The room included a queen bed and bunk bed. It was spacious, and super duper clean! YES! YES! As a mom, and protector of my children, cleanliness is at the top of my list. So amazing job Hojo staff.  Next, I really appreciated the attention to detail. The bathroom had a step stool for the kids. The bunk bed was low profile, so i felt they were safe. This is specfic to my room, but i LOVED that I had to go through 2 doors to get to the balcony. Once again, kid safe.    We were running late to meet with family, so the walk to disneyland was only 5 minutes. Normally 8. haha
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are so glad to hear that you had such a great experience with Heather and Jennifer. We are thrilled to hear that the room was spacious, clean and that you felt your children were safe. We are also glad to hear that you were able to make it to Disneyland within five minutes. We hope you can come back to HoJo soon and experience the Castaway Cove!

Summary: Everyone we dealt with at this hotel was amazing. They obviously hire well. The location was perfect, as it's only two blocks walk to the entrance to Disneyland. They are updating their rooms and we knew we would be in one of the older rooms, but even though it had pink tile to the bathroom ceiling the grout was clean and the room was really spacious and quiet. We never heard any of the people in the adjoining rooms, even though we saw them in the hallways (one of the benefits of older construction). The only downfalls that prevented a 5 star was that there is no restaurant and there were large arched windows in our room that didn't have curtains so the sun woke us up at the crack of dawn every day. (not a big deal if you are going to Disneyland for "rope drop", but not great
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are thrilled to hear that everyone you interacted with was amazing and that you enjoyed the location. We apologize that your room wasn't updated, but we are glad that it was spacious and clean. We understand that the lack of a restaurant and the lack of curtains put a damper on the experience. We also understand your children's disappointment with the water playground; we will make sure to update our pictures to more accurately reflect the size. We hope you still had an enjoyable stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Outdated and small room, but clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: We had a good stay here.  It's about a 2-3 block walk to the Disneyland parksand Downtown Disney, has a great splash pad area for kids, and there are plenty of non-Disney places to eat nearby within walking distance.    We were a little disappointed that it's not super clear on their website that only the "deluxe" rooms are refurbished, and appears that only one main building has been refurbished.  We were in building 6, which is a small building so it was fairly quiet, except for the housekeeping closet and main door right outside our room.  The main hallway smelled a little funky, but the room itself was fine and clean, albeit VERY outdated and small.  We had 2 double beds, which was a little tight for sleeping, but we made it work.  Beds were small but comfortable, and the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are happy that you found your rooms clean, comfortable, and convenient for your Disneyland trip. We Apologize that room types were unclear on which ones were renovated. We are happy to say that Building 1 and 2 have been completely renovated and we hope to have the rest of the buildings redone soon. We also apologize for the experience you had with the smell in the building. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience, and have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. Although we do not have breakfast at our hotel, we are glad that you were able to use the mini fridge, coffee maker and microwave in the room. We are happy to hear that you were able to see the fireworks from our property! Since we are located at such close proximity to Disneyland, the fireworks sound like we are right there in the park in front of Sleeping Beauty's Castle. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: Just got back from the Howard Johnson and WOW the hotel was so clean and the staff were so friendly. So glad I booked through their website and I got 15% off! I won‚Äôt be staying anywhere else besides here on my next Disneyland trip. It is basically across the street from the park, maybe a 5 minute walk. I would def recommend!
Manager Response: Thank for this excellent review. We are so pleased that you had a great experience with us and that you were able to take advantage of the 15% discount. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, so we are thrilled to hear we succeeded! We are excited that you will be staying with us for your next Disneyland trip. See you then!

Summary: Hotel staff was  very friendly it‚Äôs also in a great location they upgraded us at no extra charge.   The view was perfect to watch the fireworks.  Had plenty of towels in our room when we arrived.  The rooms were clean and tidy.  We highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are delighted to hear our Front Desk staff were able to make your vacation extra memorable with a complimentary upgrade and firework view. Thank you for sharing that you enjoyed our clean rooms and location to Disneyland. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: I was very impressed with the accommodations. The rooms were quiet and convenient. It was clean and about a 10 minute walk to Disney. I would definitely stay there again. Bring your bathing suits year round. The pool is heated to 82 all year!
Manager Response: We are so happy we could welcome you to Hojo! Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We love hearing that you were impressed with our clean and quiet rooms and quick 10 minute walk to Disney. Get your bathing suit ready for another stay, we hope to see you again soon at the Cast Away Cove water playground!

Summary Heading: Great Location for Families Visiting Disney
Summary: Stayed for two nights as part of our trip to Disneyland. Hotel is located an east 8-10 minute walk to the park - it‚Äôs super close.   Staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. And rooms were well updated. Our room was in one of the back buildings facing the interstate but we couldn‚Äôt hear any road traffic from our room. In fact, my family and remarked at how quiet the noise was.   Would absolutely stay here again if visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience staying with us. We are glad that you were able to appreciate how close our hotel is to Disneyland, as well as the friendly and accommodating staff. We are also pleased to know that you found the rooms to be well updated and noise levels to be quiet. We would love to have you stay with us again when you visit Disneyland!

Summary: Really miss the shuttle service to and from the airport. It was the main reason my family always stayed with you guys. Was very disappointed to find out you no longer have it, it just added another thing that I had to do while planning the trip.
Manager Response: Our Howard Johnson Anaheim has never provided airport transportation, and a number of services that did run shuttles have gone out of business over the past few years.  We recommend Karmel Shuttle, who provides service to all local airports, but does require a reservation. We appreciate your loyalty through the years, and want to thank you for being such a great customer. We hope to be able to provide you with more services that make your next stay even more enjoyable.

Summary: Clean, comfortable beds, reasonably priced. Friendly staff.    Get a park view to watch the fireworks from your room.   They have  fun water play area for kids and it‚Äôs close enough to Disneyland to walk. We liked to walk back in the afternoon to rest and recharge for more Disneyland at night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are so glad you enjoyed the clean and comfortable beds, our friendly staff and the park view to watch the fireworks from your room. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the fun water play area for the kids and found our hotel conveniently close to Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean and close to Disneyland.
Summary: We took our 7 and 11 year old grandsons to Disneyland and selected the suite of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms which worked well for us. Our bed was comfortable but the bottom bunk for the boys had little head clearance and the 11 year old opted to open the sofa couch and sleep there. The room has only paper cups for drinks and no other utensils or dishes. We took cereal, paper dishes and plastic utensils so we could have breakfast in the room. The bathroom lights have a motion detector and switch on full force at night if one uses the bathroom. There is a way to stop it but it only lasts for a very short while. This was a problem when the kids needed the bathroom at night. The pool area was fun for the kids and the hotel is very well maintained. It is about a 10 minute walk to the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are so glad that you and your grandsons enjoyed your time at our hotel and had a comfortable stay. We apologize for the inconvenience of the head clearance on the bottom bunk and the unexpected lights in the bathroom. We will be sure to take your feedback into consideration and try to make any necessary changes to ensure that future guests have a pleasant experience. We are happy to hear that the pool area was a hit and that our hotel is well-maintained. It's great that you were able to take advantage of the 10 minute walk to the gate of Disneyland, too. Thank you again for your review!

Summary: The newly renovated building has clean, spacious rooms, comfy beds, 2 sinks, lots of end tables and places to charge phones and devices (even USB ports). Fridge, microwave, coffee maker and safe. If you need more coffee pods, just ask the front desk! Close enough to walk to the parks and Downtown Disney and there‚Äôs a shop on the grounds where you can buy water, yogurt and other snacks. The grounds are beautiful and felt like a holiday: palm trees and maintained flower beds.
Manager Response: Thank you are this lovely review. We are so glad that the amenities we provide in the room were helpful during your trip and that our location was convenient for you to walk to Disneyland. It is also great to hear that our green grounds and palm trees made it feel like a holiday for you. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We stayed at the Howard Johnson for 5 days, I have to say with all that's going on with stress of family and kids for a trip to Disneyland this hotel was amazing. Staff was very friendly and attentive. We had a small issue and Rick at the front desk went above and beyond to help fix the issue. Pool was great for after the park fun and the restaurant across the street was perfect for dinner after the park. The store on the main floor came in very handy for treats and breakfast items. Very clean and safe feeling hotel which is important for me and my family. We will be staying again and thank you for helping create a great family experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable and stress-free. We are especially delighted that Rick was able to help you with your issue and that you found the staff to be friendly. We are also glad that Mimis Cafe and our MidMod Market was convenient and useful during your stay. We are so glad that we were able to create a great family experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Second stay, will be back for a third!
Summary: We have stayed at the HoJo before, and this stay exceeded our memory of the quality and comfort offered.  We love how convenient the location is to Disneyland.   Jennifer‚Äôs room recommendation made our trip even better than originally planned.  We loved the resort-facing room and enjoyed the fireworks from our balcony.  Her help made the trip!   Already can‚Äôt wait to stay there again.  Thanks for everything!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review! It's great to hear that Jennifer's room recommendation made your trip even better than you had planned. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the resort-facing room and the fireworks from the balcony. We are very grateful for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Thank you for choosing Hojo!

Summary: Overall, this is a great hotel for families to stay in and only 10 minute walk to Disneyland, which was a real perk. We were able to come back in the day for a break.  The chemical levels of the pool water area are way too high. We got rashes on our skin and my daughters privates were stinging. We use pools weekly so our bodies are used to a normal amount. I have been at other hotels that announce the cleaning time and routine of their chemical maintenance (with a clear written notice) and let people know when the pool has been cleaned with chemicals. This helps those who may be sensitive to wait some extra time before getting in. I find the overall experience to be unacceptable for a pool advertising a water park. there are many more eco friendly options these days that can
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay with us. We do hope that your family is doing well and we are incredibly sorry that you and your daughter had a reaction to the water in our swimming areas. We have both of our pool areas santized each and every morning a few hours before the pools open at 10am. We also have a system in place that immediately alerts our maintenance staff of any imbalances due to chemicals. We have brought your comments directly to our Maintenance Manager, and we are working with our management team to reevaluate our procedures when handling similar situations in the future so this never happens again. We completely understand the need for guest privacy at our hotel. Please in the future, let us know that you would not like any staff members to enter your room, and we will be happy to notify our Housekeeping and Maintenance staff that they are not to enter your room, even if a Do Not Disturb sign is not presently on your door. Despite these issues, we are pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Room was available early. We were able to refill coffee and creamers easily. Rooms were very clean. Check out, a breeze. The close proximity to Disneyland made this an excellent choice for our vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our room amenities, clean rooms and location to the Disneyland parks. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo again soon!

Summary Heading: To nice girl running front desk at night
Summary: Enjoyed my visits everyone was very nice and rooms always very clean and I will definitely go back me and my fianc√© enjoyed our stay a lot.the lobby and everything was nice clean and it‚Äôs very affordable hotel to stay I recommend it for travelers on the road need a place to stop and rest or on vacation
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our friendly customer service and clean hotel. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: My mom and I stayed at the HoJo in Jan 2023 for 3 nights. We loved the quick 8ish minute walk to the Harbor BLVD security. We both slept great on the comfy beds, loved the double sink and lighted mirror in the bathroom. We also appreciated all the drawer space so we could unpack and settle in. The gift shop is amazing. So much cute Disney merchandise, food, drinks and they even had a deck of cards so we could play in our room on a rainy afternoon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear you found our Mid Mod Market in Building 1 convenient and cute. We love hearing that you were able to make fun memories even on a rainy day! We hope to welcome your family back to Hojo again soon when it is bright and sunny!

Summary: Everything you need in one very easy to navigate property. Friendly staff, affordable convenience store prices, and a nice little water park to entertain the kids and yourself. Give this place a try, you won‚Äôt regret it.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  We love hearing our friendly staff made you feel welcome and that you enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: My family and I had a wonderful stay at Howard Johnson. Liliana at the front Desk was friendly. She gave my boys sword balloons and crayons. My boys were over the moon with these kind gestures. The boys also loved the little detail of the rubber ducky in the tub for them. Our room has access to the firework show from our balcony. We all watched from our room at night which was perfect. We order take out dinner from Mimi‚Äôs Cafe located across the street from the hotel. We love the 7/8 min walk from the hotel to the front gate entrance to Disneyland. The boys had a blast at the water park. It was perfect for our boys. They also have face painting in the morning on Saturdays. We are so happy with our stay at  Howard Johnson especially for making it a memorable one for our boys!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent stay with us! It sounds like you had a very memorable and exciting vacation. We are delighted to hear Liliana was friendly and fun and that your boys enjoyed the rubber ducky included in all of our Superior 2 Queen Bed rooms facing towards Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back on a weekend again soon so your family can join in on face painting Saturdays. See you at the Cast Away Cove!

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Howard Johnson! From the incredible staff (thank you, Nicole), to the spacious suites and easy access to Disneyland, this hotel is perfect for your next family adventure!
Manager Response: Thank you for the happiest compliment on Earth! We are thrilled our incredible staff made your stay fantastic. Thank you for letting us know that our spacious suites and location to Disneyland were perfect for your family stay. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo again soon!

Summary: We love this hotel! Pros-  Friendly Staff Clean Fun Pool Cozy Bed Firework View (if you book the right room) On-site Store Keurig  No ‚Äúcons‚Äù!!! As I approached my room I could hear a noisy neighbor from the hall. I got worried, but I couldn‚Äôt hear anything from the hall. Good walls!  The walk is about 10 mins if you hit the lights right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We make sure that our staff are always friendly and that our rooms are always clean and comfortable. Plus, what a great view you got from your room! We are so pleased that you noticed our on-site store and Keurig, too. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The front desk staff was absolutely fantastic. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful. The location was great for walking to Disneyland. We stayed in one of the older rooms but it was still very nice - very clean, great housekeeping. I would definitely stay agin.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are thrilled to hear that you had such a great experience with our front desk staff. We appreciate your feedback about the location and the room. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and would stay with us again. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had a nice room and there was not a lot of extra noise. Beds were comfortable  Liked that we had a fridge and safe. Short walk to Disney parks. Didn't have a chance to use the pools but they looked like fun.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We're so glad that you enjoyed your room, the comfortable beds, the fridge and safe, as well as the convenient location near Disney parks. It's great to hear that you had a look at our pools, we hope you'll get the chance to use them next time! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to make your next stay even more enjoyable. Thanks again for your feedback!

Summary: Our stay at Howard Johnson by Wyndham in Anaheim, everyone was so nice and the room looked spectacular! Kirn did an upgrade for us when one became available last minute, and Cathy checked us in and was nice. There was a gentleman at the front desk who had awesome customer service as well, but i do not recall his name, he was wearing a mask. The quality of our stay was so nice and we will definitely be staying there next time we are in Anaheim, thank you for having such awesome hospitality and customer service!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. At Howard Johnson by Wyndham in Anaheim, we strive to make sure all of our guests have a pleasant and comfortable experience. We are delighted to hear that everyone on our staff was friendly and provided great customer service. We look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to Anaheim. Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: Great customer service! Clean rooms! The bunk beds were perfect for the kids! Such a short walk to the Disneyland Parks! You can see the fireworks from the hotel! Many food options all around hotel. Will recommend to others and will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are happy that you were able to see the fireworks from the comfort of your room and your kids enjoyed the bunkbeds. We are pleased that you found plenty of food options around the hotel and that we were a short walk from Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Manager assured me upon checkin that our freeway facing room would be quiet. It was! Did hear big rig rumble a little...but the little glass in between room was a big hit with the grandkids! I told them it was a soundproof chamber (sorry neighbors!) that I booked on purpose in case they get out of control! They had fun playing toys and giving us grandparents a little space without being out of sight or on the balcony unattented. It turned out better than I thought! They wanted to be in the pool or waterpark more than the theme park! We will definetely be booking for next year plus bringing more family and babies! Love our new Home Hotel HoJo! Beyond awesome customer service! And our room was spotless and beds comfy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review and giving us a try. We are thrilled that the soundproof glass was a hit with your grandkids and that it provided you with a little extra space and quietness. We are excited that our customer service exceeded your expectations and look forward to seeing you and your whole family next year!

Summary: Always a great experience. Great rooms and great staff!! This trip we were in building 3, even though we were in one of the older buildings, it was still an amazing stay. We have stayed here many times and have never had a reason to look any where else.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had an incredible experience with us and that you are a loyal guest! We are delighted that you appreciate our economy rooms, and we are excited to announce that these rooms will be renovated next! We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Rented 4 great rooms for our family trip to Disneyland! We were able to walk there.  It was wonderful! A little too chilly for the water park, but the heated pool was good. Would stay there again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland. We're sorry to hear that it was too chilly for the water park, but we're glad that you were able to enjoy our heated pool. We hope to see you again for a future stay!

Summary: My wife and I have been in the Restaurant Business for 39 years.  We own six full service restaurants and know how important it is to provide great Guest Service.   Today, I received the very best service from Nicole at the front desk at this location!! My wife Christie and I are taking our adult children and three Grandchildren to Disneyland for the first time in May.  My wife asked me to change our Hotel reservations to include adjoining rooms so we could all be together at night with the Grandkids.  So I made the call today, worried that I might not be able to get this done for my wife and Grandkids.  I talked to Nicole and she immediately removed all of my concerns.  She was so accommodating and pleasant on the phone with an obvious "Can Do" approach!  She found exactly what
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about Nicole! We are so happy to hear that she was able to provide you with great service and accommodate your needs. We understand that having a comfortable and pleasant stay is so important when traveling with family, especially with Grandchildren, who are always so excited! We look forward to having you stay with us and hope that this will be the start of a wonderful and unforgettable trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Room is spacious and clean.  They provide lots of towels.  Customer service is outs adding.  Reps are very friendly and courteous.  One offered to help with two load of luggage and baby items    Great location.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are thrilled to hear our staff were courteous and extra helpful during your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back to our spacious and clean hotel again soon!

Summary: Elevator didn‚Äôt work properly, lobby smelled like dirty diapers, paid for park view and couldn‚Äôt see park, housekeeping doesn‚Äôt come every night, extra charge for parking, and must move car by 11 on departing day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize for the experience you had with the elevators and smell in the building. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience and have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper and maintenance team to ensure this is taken care of right away.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. If you come back to Anaheim we do hope that you will give us another shot to make sure that we give you the best experience possible.

Summary: We were put in a room right next to in 5 freeway which was so loud we could not get sleep. We did contact the front desk in the early morning and requested a different room for which they complied. The second room was nice and the remainder of our stay was pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We do apologize you experienced traffic noise from the nearby freeway. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. We are happy to hear our Front Desk staff was able to accommodate your family into a second, quieter room for the remainder of your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. Despite this issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Very nice stay. One of the nicer hotels within walking distance to Disneyland. Easy check in and check out and easy to store luggage at desk until time to fly home. Room had microwave. And nice view of the monorail and fireworks from our balcony.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family felt welcomed by our wonderful staff. We are happy to hear that you loved our location and the amenities at our hotel. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. It was a short stay but loved how clean and updated our room was. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. The walk to the Disneyland Resort was my favorite, super convenient and faster than parking at the structure. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our clean rooms and location to Disneyland. We are delighted to hear our staff were friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo soon!

Summary: Very basic hotel stay. There are no blankets on the bed, just sheets. Outlets to charge our phones were hard to find. The waterpark is nice and clean. Close proximity to park. Seemed safe overall. Polite front desk staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We do apologize it was hard to locate outlets to charge your phone in your room. In our renovated rooms in Buildings 1 and 2, we do have extra outlets and USB ports available for use by the beds, as well as by the microwave and desk area. We are happy to hear your family enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground for it's cleanliness and safety. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo again soon!

Summary Heading: Always staying at the Hojo Anaheim!
Summary: I love staying at the Hojo Anaheim! They are the friendliest people and the rooms are so spacious. Nicole and Kris have always been so kind and helpful whenever I reach out to them even if I think it‚Äôs such a silly matter.   The front desk staff are some of the friendliest people I‚Äôve ever met. They were smiling as I came in and even apologized for having me wait (honestly it was like a 5 minute wait!) and got me quickly taken care of and also answered all of my silly questions.   I always book the Hojo because it‚Äôs also a really close walk to the Disney Parks and I always need to take a nap in the middle of the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for this fantastic review and the kind words about Nicole, Kriss, and our Front Desk staff. We are so happy that we are conveniently located close to Disney, so it easy for you to take a nap in the middle of the day and recharge. We hope your friendly service keeps you coming back to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Top Tier Kid-Friendly Hotel Near Attractions!
Summary: Excellent experience! Super close to Disneyland entrance. The staff was amazing at check in. Would be great for kiddos as there is a water park on site that is pirates themed. Rooms were clean, spacious and had so many plugs for various electronic devices. The bathroom had this amazing mirror that lit up all around. 10/10 would recommend for your next Disney trip!
Manager Response: We are pleased your family had a 5-star, excellent stay with us! It is our pleasure to host families like yours. Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground, spacious rooms, and fabulous bathroom lighting. We hope to host you at Hojo again soon!

Summary Heading: Reservations within hotel set the anticipation!
Summary: I am so impressed how Howard Johnson is becoming this upgraded nostalgic hotel. Instead of being pawned off to a national Wyndham Reservation line, Nicole Andrade gave us personal service in their in-house reservations. I thought she was a Concierge. Her guest service and knowledge of hotel and parks was impressive. The hotel had an impressive heated water playground. Unfortunately no time. We were sold on the park view, top floor balcony, remodeled room. Yes, the fireworks, Matterhorn, and monorail was visible from the balcony! The ceiling was an unexpected arch with a Disney art deco designed interior. The furnishings were inviting. Nicole A. sold us an experience not just a room. Reservations sets the tone for your whole stay. Front Desk, Logan, welcomed us at check in
Manager Response: Wow, thank you so much for the kind words and great review! We are so pleased you had such a great experience with our team, especially with Nicole and Logan. We are delighted that you had a complete experience and enjoyed the nostalgic atmosphere of our hotel! We're so glad you chose to stay with us, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Older but clean interior decor. Pool was definitely NOT heated. Breakfast offered would be a plus. Their entrance/exit is somewhat inconvenient, especially if coming in at night. Our shower kept clogging so had to turn on/off during shower so wasn't standing in clogged water. The price and distance to Disneyland was good however. If staying just for a bed, it's good and clean. If wanting to stay to enjoy the property, check if pool is warm beforehand and don't expect the "luxury" look and amenities of newer hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that the pool was not heated and that you experienced a clogged shower. We appreciate your feedback on the convenience of our entrance/exit and the cleanliness of our interior decor. We value your comments and will look into ways to make your stay more comfortable in the future. We are glad that you found the price and location to be acceptable. Thank you again for your review and we hope that you have a pleasant day.

Summary Heading: Renovated rooms, very clean and super friendly staff.
Summary: A wonderful place to stay with friendly staff, spacious clean rooms and beautiful grounds. Newly renovated rooms were lovely with a nice decor. Housekeeping was great kept the room refreshed and ensured we had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found the staff to be friendly, the rooms to be spacious and clean, and the grounds to be beautiful. We are also thrilled that you enjoyed the newly renovated rooms and the nice decor. Our housekeeping team works hard to make sure that all of our guests are comfortable and taken care of, so we are glad to know that they succeeded in providing you with a great experience. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: Probably one of the worst off Disney property hotels I‚Äôve stayed at in Anaheim. Unfriendly customer service at the front desk for check in. Bad room placement, thin wallls  Leaking bathroom ceilings, weird odors. Most off property hotels will also let you park your car for the remainder of your checkout day. They make you remove your car at checkout time.  Plenty of other options on harbor Blvd, this is not one of them.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that your stay at our hotel was not up to your expectations. We value all of our guests and their experiences and take your feedback very seriously. We strive to provide the highest level of customer service and comfortable accommodations, and we are sorry that this was not what you experienced. We understand that there are many hotels located on Harbor Blvd and we hope you will give us the opportunity to provide a more satisfactory stay for you in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary: The staff was super nice and very helpful.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable.  The rooms were very clean.  The hotel is a short walk to the Disneyland park and restaurants.  The lifeguards were always looking out for us.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! It's great to hear that the staff was friendly and helpful, and that the beds and pillows were comfortable. We're delighted that you found the rooms to be clean and that the hotel is conveniently located near the park and restaurants. We're also glad that you felt safe with the lifeguards looking out for you. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Jennifer R and Heather R have been absolutely fantastic with making the booking experience a breeze! The dates I originally tried to book were completely full and Jennifer took it upon herself to keep checking the dates and booked them for me once they opened. Can‚Äôt even express how satisfied I am with the booking experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so happy to hear that Jennifer and Heather were able to make the booking process a breeze for you! We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service and are delighted that you were pleased. We look forward to hosting you soon!

Summary: We love that hojo! We‚Äôve stayed here now 3 times and have been impressed every time. It‚Äôs super close to Disneyland and it makes vacations so much easier. Jennifer is especially helpful everytime we book a stay. She goes above and beyond for me. She answers all my questions with kindness and patience. She makes the experience that much better! Recommend anyone to stay, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so glad that you have had the pleasure of staying with us multiple times and that your experience has been so positive! It is wonderful to hear that Jennifer is providing excellent customer service and going above and beyond to make your stay a great one. We are so glad that you are recommending us to others and that you have never been disappointed. Thank you for choosing Hojo and sharing your experience with us!

Summary: We love the Howard Johnson. We stay here everytime we go to Disney but this last trip was made extra special by Nicole who handled our reservations. She went above and beyond to make sure we had the perfect room for us and this was my first time bringing family with us to the parks. Nicole did an amazing job and I will always be reaching out to her directly in the future for reservations!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to leave this review! We are so pleased to hear that Nicole was able to help you find the perfect room for your stay, and that you had a wonderful experience overall. We really appreciate your loyalty and we look forward to seeing you again soon! Thank you for choosing the Howard Johnson.

Summary: We spent 4 nights for our trip to Disneyland and we really enjoyed the proximity to the parks.  We were able to come back to the hotel for a break in the afternoon before heading back to Disney.  The room has been renovated and was very clean.  We loved having the bunk beds for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our bunk bed room and location to Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The staff all seemed nice. It pretty standard in terms of the stay. The rooms were a little dated, but clean. The biggest complaint would be that the Keurig was dirty with grime where you fill the water.   Water Park was fun, but the water wasn't heated outside of the Spa.   Also, my family was disappointed that the game room was closed permanently. Even though the site said they had one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your stay. We appreciate your feedback regarding the dated rooms and the dirty Keurig. We will make sure to address these issues. We also apologize for the lack of heated water at the Castaway Cove. While it is heated to 82 degrees, with the free-flowing water, it can dip below that ideal temperature. We hope you will choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: smooth and easy booking, and just like a home away from home. Staff go above & beyond to make it the best holiday ever.
Summary: absolutely great place to stay, always been like a home away from home. Staff go above and beyond to assist with all your needs. Booking made easy. Nicole and Kriss made my booking smooth and easy. Rooms have everything needed, and view across to Disney makes it the best place to be. Want stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was so enjoyable, Nicole and Kriss were so happy to assist you with your booking and make it an easy and smooth process. It sounds like you had a wonderful time and were able to enjoy the amazing views of Disney from your room. We strive to make every stay with us feel like home away from home and it sounds like we achieved that! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The HOJO is the perfect hotel for families, couples, or solo travelers.  We stayed in the newly renovated building 2 in a one-queen and bunk bedroom.  The general hotel area and the room were extremely clean.  The bathroom has excellent lighting, especially for people like me who like to do their hair and make-up and spend quite a bit of time in the bathroom.  The beds were very comfortable.  We had a view of the pool from our room and could see the top of Space Mountain and Guardians of the Galaxy.  I loved that the room had a mini fridge and microwave as well as a small seating area to eat.  We ate a lot of our meals in our room, so this was very helpful.    Castaway Cove was a BLAST for the family.  Love that there was a wading pool for kids as well as a hot tub.  My kids
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you and your family had a great time at Castaway Cove and the Mid Mod Market. We are glad that you found the room clean and comfortable, with a great view and all the amenities you needed. It is also great to hear that the front desk staff was so friendly and helpful - they are always happy to make pirate swords for our guests! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay at the HOJO and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I can't say enough good things about HoJo! We love staying here. It's such a close walk to the Parks. I feel comfortable staying here by myself with my daughter for mommy & me Park trips. That's important! The staff is so nice. Nicole was super helpful getting me a room for a specific date I needed. She already made me feel welcome, and we haven't even checked in for that trip yet. We love getting a room with a balcony to check out the park views, fireworks included! I can't recommend HoJo Anaheim enough for your Disneyland Park stay.
Manager Response: Wow, what a wonderful review! We are so thrilled to hear that you and your daughter had such a great experience staying with us here at HoJo Anaheim! We are so happy to hear that you feel comfortable staying here by yourself and that Nicole was so helpful in getting you a room for a specific date. We are also glad that you love getting a room with a balcony and getting to check out the park views - fireworks included! We truly appreciate your kind words and can't thank you enough for recommending HoJo Anaheim for your Disneyland Park stay!

Summary: Me, my husband and our toddler had a lovely 3-night stay here. Logan was at the front desk when we got in from our long drive from northern California super late and checked us in.  He was so professional and friendly. From that moment I knew it was going to be a wonderful stay, he set the tone!   The room was exceptionally clean, and comfortable. The park is really just a short walk to Disneyland. We had a great stay! Thank you Hojo Anaheim! Looking forward to staying again when the weather is warmer so we can make use of the water playground!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us, and that Logan was so friendly and professional. We are so glad that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms, as well as the convenient location to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again when the weather is warmer so you can make use of our Castaway Cove!

Summary: It is always a wonderful experience at the HoJo.  It is such a great proximity to the park.  Always clean and the employees are the nicest.  We came fairly late at night and Logan was super kind checking us in!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us such an amazing review! We are so glad you had such a great experience with Logan and that you found the hotel to be so clean and close to the park. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to HoJo soon!

Summary: We had such a fun time and being able to walk back from Disneyland and nap the kids was worth every penny. Fireworks were right above and a bit loud but I'm sure they can be heard all over the city. Lots of fun at the pirate cove water park too. Overall it was a hit!!
Manager Response: That's so great to hear! We are thrilled to know that you and your family had a fun and memorable stay with us and that the kids were able to take a nap after a long day at Disneyland. It's also great to hear that you enjoyed Castaway Cove and that you were able to experience the beauty of the fireworks from the comfort of your room. We hope you will come back and stay with us soon!

Summary Heading: Nicole from Howard Johnson‚Äôs worked her magic üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Summary: Nicole helped me when I was in a pickle. I made reservations through booking.com and "chose" nonrefundable‚Ä¶I think I was thrilled they had an ADA room for my dates I impetuously clicked. Being a 70 yr old solo female traveler I should know and practice "no green bananas". My health took a turn for the worse after making this commitment. My neurosurgeon has some MORE work to do! Nicole, the amazing Howard Johnson employee sprinkles some magic for me by cancelling my reservation without fees or penalties. If I could dance in gratitude I would. Nicole, thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! We're so glad that Nicole was able to help you out in a pinch. We take pride in providing excellent customer service, and it's wonderful to hear that Nicole was able to make a difficult situation easier for you. We hope that you have a speedy recovery and are able to travel again soon. Thank you again for your kind words!

Summary Heading: Staying at Howard Johnson Anaheim is always a pleasant experience!
Summary: I‚Äôve been staying at Howard Johnson Anaheim for well over 20 years. I keep returning because the staff is great, the rooms are clean, and it‚Äôs always a positive and pleasant experience. My recent stay was no exception. A shout-out to Zach for being so friendly and helpful when I checked in, also to Nicole for kindly notifying me of an important situation in the building where I was staying. Also, housekeeping does a fantastic job! When a company treats me well, I am very loyal, and I will be returning to Howard Johnson Anaheim in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us. We are so glad that you have been returning to our hotel for over 20 years - that's a real testament to how much you love staying here! We really appreciate you giving a shout-out to Zach and Nicole - they are both incredible employees who are always willing to go above and beyond to make sure our guests are taken care of. We are also so happy to hear that you appreciate the work done by our housekeeping staff - they really do an amazing job to ensure that our rooms are always clean and comfortable. Thanks again for your loyalty - we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Had a blast. Close to Disney and saw fireworks. Staff was nice! We asked if we can stay in one of the newly refurbished buildings and we were accommodated and it was amazing. One of the staff gave my son a balloon sword he loved it our entire trip.
Manager Response: Wow, that sounds like an amazing trip! We are so glad that you experienced a blast here at our hotel. It is always a pleasure to be able to accommodate guests in our newly refurbished buildings and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed it. Our staff always strive to make our guests feel welcomed and we are so glad that our staff could make your son's experience even more special with a balloon sword. Thank you for taking the time to leave this review and we hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: Was more than I imagined, clean rooms and property. Short walk to both parks. Staff is polite, check in and out was simple. There is a parking fee per day at property though. Ain‚Äôt no motel 6, worth the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and found the rooms and property to be clean. We appreciate that you found our staff to be polite and that check-in and check-out were simple. We are glad you found the stay to be worth it and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel, clean, close for walking to Disneyland, friendly staff, close to restaurants , overall great.  Water park more for smaller children but still fun.  We could also view the Disney fireworks from our room.  Make sure your room is on the quiet side of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here and that you were able to take advantage of all that our hotel has to offer. We are so glad that you were able to get to Disneyland easily and view the fireworks from your room. We would love to have you back again soon!

Summary: It was amazing. They place was clean. The staff were amazing and super helpful. The staff help get us pre-checked in before we went to Disney. The day we checked out they helped extend our parking at the hotel so that we did not need to worry about moving our vehicle. All-in all I was amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and 5-star review. Our team strives to provide excellent customer service, so it is great to hear they made checking in and parking your car in our lot quick and easy. We hope to see you for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: My family & I had such a great experience while staying at Hojo Anaheim. We stayed in Building 2 where the rooms were also renovated. The rooms were cleaned, sanitized and the staff was friendly. I love that walk was under 10 minutes to Disneyland too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay in our newly renovated, clean room and that you would stay with us again. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: After a recent visit, which was wonderful, my grandson left a treasured ‚Äúblanket‚Äù wrapped up in the hotel bedding. The staff went above and beyond and found the ‚Äúblanket‚Äù and mailed it back to my grandson! What a wonderful team of caring people that work at this location in Anaheim, CA.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear that our staff took care of your needs, even after you checked out. We are so happy that we found your grandson's blanket and could send it back to you. We hope to be your go-to place for accommodation when you plan your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson Anaheim easy to deal with.
Summary: I've been dealing with Howard Johnson Anaheim for years with family Disneyland trips since 1981.  They have always provided a friendly and enjoyable experience.   My booking for a 2023 trip is no different.    Thank you Kriss.
Manager Response: That's amazing to hear! We are so honored to have been a part of your Disney trips since 1981. We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience booking a trip for 2023. We value every customer, and we are so thankful to Kriss in our reservations department for making your experience special. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you in 2023!

Summary: Very nice hotel, awesome staff, clean rooms and close to Disneyland. The ceilings in the upstairs rooms were very cool and when updated will be super beautiful!   Can‚Äôt wait for that, it‚Äôs worth remodeling. Great stay!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed the beautiful skylights in our rooms on the top floor. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: The best choice when it comes to staff, comfort and convenience!
Summary: Great location, walking distance to Disneyland.  The best part about it all was the staff honestly.  We've never encountered nicer, more helpful people.   They really hire the best of the best here.  We are making this our regular hotel when visiting Disneyland for sure.  Couldn't recommend it enough!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! Our Hojo team is dedicated to providing excellent service, and we are so delighted to hear we were successful. We are so excited to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Staff was amazing and so kind. Room is very outdated and I could hear every car, human, door from my room. The room would shake when a truck drove by. Besides the outdated/loud room, my stay was great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your stay with us. We are happy to hear our staff were amazing and kind. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied with your room location. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary: We had one of the family suites and ended up very disappointed. The beds are so uncomfortable to start. The room was also very noisy. The makeshift closet doors that go to a patio would echo the noise from the freeway all day, and it was also next to the elevator so your kids could hear the elevator going all night. The building smelt terrible too for some reason! The list goes on, just don‚Äôt book here. There‚Äôs better spots on Harbor for less.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us. We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize for the experience you had with the smell in the building and room. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience and we have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Booked a room for two and had two vehicles.  Only allowed one even though parking lot was more than half empty.  First room given was not even cleaned yet, second room was cleaned but smelled had to open balcony door to air out.  Will not stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback! We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We strive to provide excellent customer service and a clean, comfortable room for all of our guests. We are sorry that you did not have a pleasant stay and hope that you will consider giving us another chance in the future. Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Pros: Great for families as they have a water playground, the facility is clean, affordable, and conveniently located across the street from Disneyland.  Cons: No fitness center, spotty internet, and no complimentary beverages for rewards members.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we appreciate both positive and negative feedback. We are happy that you liked our water playground and convenient location to Disneyland. We apologize that we were unable to provide all the amenities you were hoping for. There is a gym within a short drive from our hotel and our Front Desk will be happy to get a taxi to take you there. Thank you for your comments regarding our internet and beverages for our reward members. We will share your comments with our management team and make improvements were possible.

Summary: Howard Johnson was conveniently located down the street from Disneyland. The clerk named Zach was very helpful on the phone and in person. The rooms were clean and nice. Staff - including maintenance and housekeeping very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are thrilled that we provided you with a 5- star stay and that you had a great experience with all of our staff members, especially Zach. We strive to provide a clean and convenient stay, so it is wonderful to hear that we achieved that for you. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the HoJo Anaheim for 7 nights Jan 31-Feb 6. It was easy to find, and only a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland. The staff were very friendly ( I remember Nicole and Lucy from checkout) and they were all very helpful. My son lost a few things when we were there and the staff checked each day for us to see if they had been turned in. On the very last day one of our items was found so that was a big relief. For being located by the freeway, the rooms are very quiet!! We were in building 1, which had been renovated. We found it super convenient that there is a small dining table in the room, as well as a safe. Beds were very comfortable and everything was very clean. A/C worked well although we didn't need it much. The pool, hot tub and castaway cove were a big hit with
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that our team provided you with excellent customer service and was able to retrieve your lost items. It is also wonderful that you found our rooms quiet and comfortable, with extra amenities for your convenience. We are thrilled that your kids had a blast at our water park. We hope that you will choose us again for your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great staff, excellent room in all ways, accommodating, close to Disney!! I highly recommend & will be back! Home away from home! The store was helpful to gave close by & the front desk staff were wonderful about pointing out great eating locations nearby. We didn‚Äôt get a chance to use the pool but checked it out & it was amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our great staff and location to Disney. We hope you stay with us again soon so you can experience our relaxing Garden Pool!

Summary: We arrived early and were just going to drop off our bags and Nicole asked if we wanted to upgrade our room and gave us pricing for the upgrade, so we did ‚Ä¶ and she actually had a room open so we could go drop off our luggage and head to the park. When she asked if we were celebrating something and we told her yes and what we we‚Äôre celebrating she got us a treat bag. Nicole was awesome! The room was clean, relatively quiet for sleeping and roomy. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know Nicole went above and beyond to make your stay memorable! We are happy to hear your upgraded room was ready upon arrival and you enjoyed how clean and roomy it was. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I haven't actually gone yet, I just made my reservations, but that was such a completely upbeat experience I had to review!  Nicole answered the phone very professionally and you could hear her smile.  She answered all my questions, even gave me a head's up on renting an electric scooter there!  I was going to have to pick one up here at home and bring it up and return it when I got home..she will order it and it will be delivered to the hotel the night before my stay, fully charged and they will pick it up the morning we leave... sooooo convenient!  That was a great piece of info and help from her, as was when she looked up the exact distance to Disneyland-1/2 mile... She was so enjoyable to chat with and so good at her job, I literally made the decision to book right then
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about Nicole! We are so glad you had a great experience making your reservations. It's wonderful to hear that Nicole was able to provide you with such helpful information and that you felt comfortable booking with us right away. We look forward to welcoming you in April and hope you have a wonderful stay!

Summary: The picture shows beautiful rooms, which is what I was expecting at the price paid.  The front desk staff was very nice.  However... we unloaded our luggage and supplies, got to our building (#6) and found out there was NO ELEVATOR.  When you have a baby and kids, this is a huge problem, as we had to carry the strollers, baby crib, the kids, luggage... etc all up the stairs.  The building also had a strong odor that I can't even explain, but is gross.  Our room was old. The refrigerator didn't work.  The bathtub had a "crunchy" area that felt like you may fall through when you stepped on it.  I don't know how to even properly describe the bathtub situation.  The distance to Disneyland was nice, but this experience was absolutely not worth paying over $200 per night plus parking
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We understand how difficult it can be to carry a baby, kids, and luggage up the stairs. We are sorry that the refrigerator and bathtub did not meet your expectations. We take pride in providing a comfortable and enjoyable stay for our guests, and we regret that we were unable to do so in your case. We will use your feedback to improve our services and ensure that our guests have a positive experience. We hope you will give us another chance to make it up to you in the future.

Summary: Hotel was nice and clean, but bathroom fan wouldn't turn off.  Very loud at night, even with door closed.  We should have had them notify maintenance sooner.  Overall, nice place and easy walk to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are committed to providing our guests with the best possible experience and we apologize that we were unable to do so in your case. We are taking your comments into consideration and will use them to make improvements to our services. We hope you will give us another chance to show you the quality of service we strive to provide.
