Summary: This place is great! Just an 8 minute walk from the parks, the property is really cute, well-maintained with beautiful landscaping. The pool and water park was a huge bonus- a lot of fun for younger kids. Plus they had a lifeguard on duty. Our room was fresh and sparkling and had everything we needed. The mattress was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our property to be well-maintained and beautiful. We strive for five-star service and it's wonderful to hear that you experienced that during your stay. We are delighted that you enjoyed the pool and water park and that the lifeguard was on duty to ensure everyone's safety. We are also glad that you found your room to be fresh and sparkling and that the mattress was comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: I can‚Äôt recommend this hotel enough - This is your sign to book that reservation.
Summary: Not only is this the best hotel I‚Äôve ever stayed at anywhere, their staff is NEXT LEVEL! I genuinely appreciate every single person that works here and Nicole made my reservations process a breeze. I can‚Äôt recommend this hotel enough. Immaculately clean, lots of parking that is cheaper per night than most other area hotels, beautiful park view in building 1, fully stocked snack store with every necessity you‚Äôd need, indoor spacious hallways, so many amenities, quiet even located directly on the freeway, warm heaters and cool AC during the appropriate months, walking distance to Disneyland - and that‚Äôs not even including how awesome the water park is! Parents‚Ä¶.you can see the fireworks from the hot tub located directly next to the water playground! Relax while your kids play!
Manager Response: Wow, thank you so much for your amazing review and kind words! We are absolutely thrilled that our staff made you feel right at home during your stay with us and that we had everything you needed for a perfect visit. Our team is committed to making sure you have a great experience and we are so happy to hear that we have been successful. We hope to be your top hotel choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: The Best Stay for my Family!
Summary: I absolutely love my stay at the Hojo Anaheim! Not only did they have a room to fit my family of 7, the staff was excellent! They attended to my every need, no matter how big or small the request was. Especially want to shout out Jennifer at the front desk, who put up with my many requests and was happy to do it!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Jennifer tackles any request with a smile, and we are excited to hear about Jennifer's dedication to your requests! We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: I have stayed at HoJo many times over the past 5 years, usually with my son and husband. This trip was with a couple friends. HoJo is conveniently located about a 7-10 minute walk from the main entrance to the Disney parks. When you don‚Äôt have kids, this is super convenient, but doable with family too. My only complaint regarding the location would be the occasional unpleasantness during the walk, especially at night. I would not feel comfortable walking that strip at night by myself or alone with my child. HoJo has updated renovations in buildings 1 & 2 ‚Ä¶. You want these! Their beds are amazingly comfortable. In the past I have been impressed with the cleanliness, however, our bathroom was questionable. Since I didn‚Äôt have my child along for this trip, I let it slide, but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being one of our loyal guests. We love knowing that our hotel is convenient for you during a solo and family trip and that you find our beds comfortable. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the shower and toilet. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Parking fees were introduced to ensure that our limited parking lot space is used efficiently. We understand this may be an inconvenience to some of our guests, but we appreciate your understanding. Despite these issues, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel and staff, will return!
Summary: Hotel staff was amazing and made us feel welcome from the moment we walked through the door. Room was nice and super clean and with the pool and market place inside, it was a perfect stay! Can‚Äôt wait to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to hear that our team made you feel right at home during your stay. It's also wonderful to hear that you found your room spotless and that our MidMod market had everything you needed. We can't wait to welcome you back for another stay with us soon!

Summary: Thank you Nicole for your fantastic service today.  I made 2 reservations for later this year and the process was quick and easy,  We love staying at the HoJo Anaheim. The walk to the parks is easy, the staff are fantastic.  It is our home away from home in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Nicole is a fabulous member of our team. We are so glad to hear that she provide you with excellent customer service and that you will be staying with us 2 more times this year. Can't wait to welcome you back to your home away from home.

Summary: The front desk staff was so nice & gave helpful directions for getting to Disney. The room was very nice and spacious. I really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be returning to try out the awesome looking pool!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We strive to provide our guests with an enjoyable experience and are glad to hear that our staff was informative and that you found the room spacious. We look forward to your next stay when you can take advantage of our pool area.

Summary: Excellent customer service highly recommend! My son had to make a trip to ER and the front desk was so nice to call me and check on him and give him a goody basket. Will be coming back for sure and staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear that your son had to go to the ER. We hope that he is feeling better. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, so we are thrilled that our staff followed up with you. We hope to be your first accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Subhajit maity is Honest, humble, talented,good behavior, quick service. This potential employee need to be uplift in hotel. We should come to this hotel to get all the excellent service provided by hotel and its employees
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Great place to stay...we love the convenience and view of the fireworks from building 1.  Lobby area near gift shop has TERRIBLE odor -- noticed it during both our stays.  Staff are friendly and accommodating. Room very clean and nice.  Would be nice to have better brand of coffee pods and REAL creamer offerings in room.  No room service and no daily room cleaning -- at least give us good coffee with some yummy extras!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be friendly and accommodating. We apologize for the unpleasant odor in the lobby area near the gift shop, and we will be sure to look into it and make any necessary improvements. We appreciate your feedback regarding the brand of coffee and our every other day housekeeping services. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. Despite these issues, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Nicole with reservations was absolutely amazing. So kind, so helpful! I am so excited for my stay at Howard Johnson hotel. I felt so special and understood when I was booking my call! Thank you to Nicole!
Manager Response: Our staff are dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we are thrilled to hear Nicole made you feel understood and special. We look forward to hosting you and your family soon!

Summary: Did not recieve room that was reserved , city view.  City view means i can see city from room not side of front office building on property. I was put on second floor  room 215. Housekeeping was great and room very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if there are any issues with their room accommodations, even the view. We are so disheartened that we were not able to assist you better. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation, no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary: We were planning an exciting vacation at HoJo Disneyland and all set to go. A couple of weeks before the vacation I went to make sure our reservation looked ok and.... to my disbelief, I couldn't find an email confirmation.   I was terrified I messed up the vacation. I tried to rebook online and all dates were gone. I called the reservation main line and they said everything was gone, but that I could try speaking to the on-site reservation team.   I was connected to Nicole -- who is a god-send -- and she single-handedly saved the vacation! She tried to find my reservation. When it didn't come up, she said "let me see if we can sprinkle a little magic on the situation..." and she literally created an empty room -- somehow - and saved our vacation!  The fact that someone in this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your SIX star review! :) It warms our hearts to hear Nicole went above and beyond to create some pre-Disneyland vacation magic for you and your family. We understand traveling can be stressful and overwhelming. We are thrilled to hear our In-House Reservations Department was able to solve this issue and ease your mind. Our staff is dedicated to providing excellent service so please feel free to reach out to the Front Desk before, during, or after your stay if you have any questions!  We hope you enjoy our Cast Away Cove water playground and spacious rooms when you come to stay with us soon!

Summary: We were most impressed with the services of Zach at the Front desk.  He was very helpful and explained everything fully.   The only thing that we forgot to ask is if we could get credit for our stay as we have Wyndham Rewards account Tel# 805-524-0510.  Thank you for your excellent service and clean updated hotel room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to award us a 5 star review! We are thrilled to hear that Zach was helpful and made you feel right at home. To redeem any missing points please search "Wyndham Rewards Missing Points" on google. On that website you will be able to report any missing points towards your stay. We hope this was helpful, and that we can welcome you back to Hojo again soon!

Summary: Great experience from check in to check out!  Zach is a great receptionist and ambassador for your hotel.  Cleanest hotel I have stayed in.  Great access to Disney.  Parking was great as well.  Great experience all around
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean hotel, location to Disney, and excellent service. We also think Zach is a top-notch member of our Front Desk Staff! We hope to see you during your next vacation to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: I'm only giving 4 bubbles due to the bed and the noise.  The bed was a bit hard for me and I didn't realize how close we were to the freeway.  Lots of noise from that.  We were in a King room building 2. Would have loved a small balcony. Our son was in a double room with a patio.   Otherwise our stay was great!  Only thing I'm concerned about now is why I feel I may have been over charged.  I'm sure they will rectify that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We are happy that our location was convenient to many places for you. However, we are saddened to hear that your room was not 5-stars. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to find an alternative room option for you. We hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better!

Summary: Absolutely awful time. Will never go back. Room was dirty and management was rude and disrespectful. Took my security deposit for no reason and was nasty and mean when questioned. Will absolutely never return here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We apologize that you did not have a 5-star stay with us. It is our goal always to address Guest‚Äôs negative comments to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary: The entire staff were all very welcoming and professional. My Boyfriend and I kept commenting to ourselves how nice the staff was. They were so informative and helpful.   our room was so clean and modern. It came with a mini fridge and a Keurig! The walls were covered in amazing Mickey Mouse art. It really set the mood for our Disneyland vacation.   We will definitely be reserving our next stay at the Howard Johnson
Manager Response: We are so delighted to hear that our staff made your stay memorable and that you and your boyfriend had such a wonderful time! Your fantastic review is very much appreciated and we are thrilled that our room added to the Disney magic. We look forward to welcoming you both back again soon!

Summary: Lucy and Liliana did a wonderful job during our stay from the 21st-23rd. They were sure to make us feel welcomed & made sure our kids felt welcomed. I am glad to see a caring staff and had a great time there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know Lucy and Liliana made your vacation memorable. We are so happy to hear you felt welcomed and cared for during your stay with us. We hope we can host you and your family again soon!

Summary: Zach at reception was fantastic and made sure we had the best room and also helping up with some special parking accommodations!  Hojo is also walking distance to Disneyland and has several excellent food choices that are walking distance too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so delighted to hear that Zach was extra helpful during your stay with us. He really is fantastic! We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location to Disneyland as well as many delicious restaurants within walking distance. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo soon!

Summary: Room was a little noisey as it was close to the freeway but all in all it was a very comfortable place to stay in.  House keeping was every second day which I had no issue with. Our second stay here and I would come back. Family of 4.
Manager Response: We are delighted we could welcome you back to Hojo! We do apologize you could hear some freeway noise during your stay with us. We always encourage our guests to let us know if there are any issues with their room accommodations. We wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best place super close to theme parks
Summary: I love staying at Hojo Anaheim, the staff is amazing, hotel and grounds very clean. I‚Äôm a wary traveler but I have not a single time in all the times I have stayed here felt unsafe. The rooms are wonderful, perfect for accommodating families and the short walk to and from the park is perfect for families with little ones.
Manager Response: We absolutely love to welcome back our loyal Hojo guests! We are thrilled to hear you continue to choose our hotel because we make you feel welcomed and safe. Thank you for also letting us know you prefer our convenient location to the Disneyland parks and wonderful, clean rooms. Thank you so much for your kind comments, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Traveled to Disneyland with just my two year old. Had a car seat and stroller and a lot of worries that things weren‚Äôt going to go smoothly. From the moment I got there everyone was accommodating! I flew in earlier than check in and they offered to store my bags and car seat, let us play at the pool. Then stored our bags and car seat after check out while we walked downtown Disney. Then! My biggest concern of my whole trip (this car seat) was totally relieved when Zach, retrieved my luggage and offered to wheel it down to the Uber pick up for me while I pushed my son in the stroller. He also waited there with my son while I buckled in the car seat. Everything with a smile and eagerness to assist. I was so taken care of during my trip. It was like being at Disneyland:).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience staying with us! We are thrilled to hear Zach went above and beyond to help you and your son. We are happy that Zach, and our staff, were able to ease your concerns about traveling with a little one. We hope to welcome you both to Hojo again soon!

Summary: Edwin and his manager went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of and had what we needed. All service staff were excellent and the room was very clean and well appointed. I don't know why this review needs to be longer per the tripadvisor site, but here are extra words.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and for adding a few extra words. We are thrilled that Edwin and our team went out of their way to provide you with 5-star service. We are also happy that you found your room clean with everything you needed. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: 5/5 From a friendly staff to clean and spacious rooms and the convenience of having DISNEYLAND just a short 8 minute walk away!  We will definitely be staying here again! Very family friendly as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5/5 review! It is excellent to know that our clean and spacious rooms would bring your back to our hotel. We are happy that we are at the perfect location for your quick walk to Disneyland. We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Howard Johnson across from Disney. Service was good and staff professional and friendly. We had a few issues with the shower it suddenly turn scalding hot intermittently on myself and kids. The toilet also did not flush and had to adjust it in between uses. Besides those few issues it was definitely convenient to access Disney in a short walk.   Thanks HJ.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We are happy that our hotel was convenient with professional service. We apologize that your water temperature changed and the toilet did not flush. We will have our maintenance team fix this immediately. We always encourage our Guests to let us know about any issues with your room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to resolve any issues or find an alternative room option for you. Despite these issues,  we are pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Spotlessly clean room, coffee maker plus condiments, plenty of clean towels, lots of room to navigate around beds & furniture.  The bed was very comfortable. Everything was cleaned & coffee pods replenished daily.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that our hotel was "practically perfect in every way." We are glad we had all the amenities you needed and that our rooms were in tip-top shape. We hope you stay with us for another "supercalifragilistic expialidocious" stay.

Summary: Wonderful experience! Took my daughter here for her  7th birthday and her friend and they had the time of their lives. From the moment we got there, we were greeted with smiles and a surprise bouquet of birthday balloons from Nicole at the front desk. She went above and beyond to make our stay magical, and was very attentive and extremely professional and friendly as were the entire staff! The playground for kids was awesome and the girls didn‚Äôt want to leave! Haa! BIG Thank you to Nicole and the entire team for making her birthday one to remember! See you next year !! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èü•≥ü•≥
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear about your daughter's special birthday trip that Nicole made extra special. She always goes to infinity and beyond to make our guest's stay extra magical. We are thrilled to hear that she was successful. Can't wait to see you, your family, and friends for next year's celebration!

Summary Heading: Doors to room are too narrow to fit stroller through
Summary: Overall a god hotel, convenient location to Disney, and clean rooms. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was that a double stroller did not fit through room doorway. It needed to be folded up which meant the stroller needed to be packed and unpacked every morning and night so could fold stroller and get through door.   We go to Disneyland every year and have never had a problem with other hotels. This is our 4th hotel we have stayed at on the same street. It‚Äôs kind of a funny complaint but honestly was an inconvenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We strive to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we apologize that you encountered an issue with the stroller. We understand how inconvenient this must have been and we will certainly take your feedback into consideration as we continue to strive for five stars. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Last month my family and I visited the Wyndham in Anaheim and just wanted to say that we had an amazing stay . Definitely enjoyed all the amenities and I wanted to say thank you to Nicole in reservations for helping set us up for this trip ! Thank you for all your recommendations and we will be back soon !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience with us! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay with us and that Nicole was able to help make your trip even more special. We strive for five-star service and are delighted to know that we were able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Convenient location, friendly helpful staff, clean.  Perfect stay.   Ariel was amazing and went above and beyond in helping sort out my Universal and Disney tickets!  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are thrilled to hear that Ariel was helpful and that she went above and beyond to assist you with your theme park tickets. We are so happy we could make planning your vacation a little easier. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disney vacation!

Summary: It was a great stay! 10 minute walking distance  to Disneyland park. On-site little market for snacks and Disney trinkets. Small water park for kids to enjoy and hot tub for adults to watch their kiddos.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We are happy to hear our convenient Mid Mod Market and location to Disneyland made your visit a great stay. We hope to host you again soon. See you at the Cast Away Cove!

Summary Heading: Great Value and Super Close to the Parks!
Summary: The staff here is so friendly and the rooms are clean, bright and spacious!  I love that it's just a 7 min walk to the gates of Disneyland.  Also love that there's a table in the room so we can have dinners and snack area.  Cannot recommend it enough!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you felt welcome at Hojo! We love hearing that you enjoyed our clean, bright and spacious rooms and location to Disneyland. You can't beat that 7 to 10 minute walk! Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed the convenience of snacks and dinners in the comfort of your hotel room. It sounds like you had a wonderful vacation with us. We hope to welcome you and your family again soon!

Summary: This hotel is the best one to stay at when you visit Disneyland! I booked our stay with Nicole who works in reservations and she provided a wonderful customer experience for my family and I! The HOJO is wonderful to stay at because of how close it is to Disneyland and other restaurants such as McDonalds, Mimis and Panera Bread. The rooms are exceptional and clean which is a huge priority for my family and I. The front desk staff is also very welcoming and helpful when we have questions. We did not visit the waterpark this time around, but we have in the past and the kids LOVE the Kids Cove! Overall, a great hotel all around! :)
Manager Response: We absolutely love our loyal Hojo guests! We are so delighted to hear that Nicole is always providing wonderful customer service before, and during, your stay. She really is helpful when it comes to booking with our In House Reservations team! Thank you for letting us know that you enjoy our location to nearby restaurants and the Disneyland parks. If you ever need more suggestions for local areas to visit, our Front Desk staff is always happy to help! We hope you come back soon, make sure to book an extra day for Cast Away play!

Summary: Clean, friendly hotel close to Disneyland. It is an easy walk and serves as a great place to stay when going to the park.  We got a room with the fireworks view. Worth it to get the kids to bed a bit earlier but not miss out on the show.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host your during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed the firework view from your room. It really is perfect to have that firework view from your balcony when the little ones are ready for bed after a long Disney day! We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Havent stayed there yet, but I just completed the booking process with Nicole and she was such an awesome rep. We completed the reservation so fast! But at the same time, she was so friendly, I felt like I was talking to a friend. Made me even more excited for our upcoming stay
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review. We love hearing that Nicole's cheery personality made making your reservation quick and easy. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, so thrilled to hear we were successful! We look forward to your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Loved and enjoyed our family stay
Summary: Very welcoming:) Zach thank you! Nice, clean and comfortable. The beds and pillows are the best. Conveniently close to Disney, very short walk. To summarize my kids just feel home we all love and enjoy our stays here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. It is a pleasure to know Zach made you feel welcome in our clean and comfortable hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you feel like Hojo is your perfect home away from home. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed at this resort for two nights to enjoy Disneyland. The staff and the customer service was next level. My husband had somehow left our car door open when we went to the park one day. The staff called and texted us to let us know. They closed the door and made sure it was locked and nothing had been taken. Gave us such peace of mind not having to dart out of the park to check on our truck. We had originally booked through Expedia but checked the website for the hotel as our dates got closer and it was cheaper through the hotel to book. The rooms were a bit small, which was a little hard for my claustrophobic husband but we made due.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our recent stay with us. We happy to hear that our staff provided you with peace of mind and made you feel safe while staying with us. It is also great to hear that you were able to find a lower rate. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff would have been happy to find a bigger room for you. Despite this small issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next Disney trip.

Summary Heading: Loved how close it is to Disneyland!
Summary: We loved staying at the Howard Johnson, it is literally across the street from Disneyland and took us less than 10-minutes to walk to the parks.  I especially loved the Kids Suite with bunk beds. It was so nice that the kids had their own bathroom in their room. Two bathrooms are essential for getting ready quickly in the mornings. The staff was super friendly and helpful. They held our bags the day of checkout so we could go shop at Downtown Disney.  The beds are super comfortable! I am super picky about mattresses and pillows and I loved it here. So important when you are walking 30,000 steps at the parks.  The gift shop has great variety of souvenirs and more! We were grateful to be able to buy water bottles and apple juices for the kids to take into the parks at a fraction
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5-star review. We love hearing that our spacious Kid Suite was perfect for your family and that the 2 bathrooms came in handy for a quick morning start. We are glad that our Gift Shop was convenient for drinks and souvenirs. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope that you get to visit our Castaway Cove during your next trip.

Summary: We had a great stay.  We have stayed here many times and it never disappoints.  The staff was all very friendly and helpful.  Nicole with in house reservations was so friendly and helpful managing our booking.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a 5 star experience during your recent stay. It is our pleasure to welcome our long-time Hojo guests! Thank you for taking the time to let us Nicole went above and beyond to help you manage your reservations. She truly is spectacular at helping our guests with anything they might need before and during their stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: It's a beautiful and well kept property with a relaxing atmosphere that includes a children's play area and beautiful gardens. It's within walking distance to Disney's main entrance and we enjoy siting by the pool at night and watching the fireworks on the weekend.  Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you found our hotel beautiful and relaxing during your recent stay with us. Our Garden Pool is the perfect spot to reset during your vacation, and it is fun being able to view the fireworks from most locations on our property. We highly appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience at Hojo. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed with our family for a week of Disney fun. Beds were comfy and service was very good. On our down time our grandchildren loved the water park and pool.  The hotel was quiet and an easy walk to the parks.
Manager Response: We are thrilled we were able to host you for your week long vacation! It is great to hear you loved our location to Disneyland and our pirate themed Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to welcome you and your grandchildren back to Anaheim soon!

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Howard Johnson hotel and we had a really nice visit.  We were there for Disneyland/California Adventure which was about a 5-10 minute walk depending on crowds and was close enough to go back to the room for periodic breaks throughout the day & evening.  And we picked a room that had a park view which came in real handy when we weren't able to go back into the park to see the fireworks due to the park closing early to remove Christmas decorations so we were able to see the fireworks from our hotel room.  They have a mini-market on site which came in handy every day for us to grab snacks or drinks.  We were there in January so we didn't use the pools or hot tub but they looked fun for kids and an adult pool on the other side.  We enjoyed the
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your first stay with us! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear you loved our location, your park view room, and convenient Mid Mod Market. We hope to welcome you back again soon when it is much warmer so you can enjoy some California sunshine and our pools!

Summary: I love coming here. This was our second stay because of Disneyland. So close to the park! We got greeted by friendly staff. During our park visit, We took a break and enjoyed the water park the hotel has, my son had a blast!
Manager Response: We are so happy we were able to welcome you back to Hojo! We love hearing that you enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to host you and your son again soon!

Summary: Was the perfect spot to say to visit Disneyland/California Adventure. Close walk. Room was very clean. Super comfy beds! Water park was great for the kids. Could see the fireworks right from our balcony.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are glad to know you enjoyed our clean rooms and comfortable beds, and that you were able to view the fireworks from your balcony. What a magical memory! We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I just want to share my experience with the hotel reservations Nicole helped me and she was very pleasant and helpful. I highly recommend. She was very helpful with local restaurants and coupons. Great job.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are delighted to hear Nicole provided exceptional service throughout your stay with us. She truly is a wealth of knowledge in regards to everything Hojo and the local restaurants. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We LOVE staying at HOJO! The perfect walking distance to Disneyland and the best nearby hotel! Our kids love the pool & splashpad‚Ä¶and we have made so many amazing memories staying at this hotel.  Nicole was super helpful in booking & we are even working with her again to book our next Disneyland vacation at HOJO!
Manager Response: It is fantastic to hear that we are your go-to hotel for Disney trips and that you are already planning your next stay with us! We love hearing that our team and splash pad makes your stay memorable. We hope you continue to make many more magical memories with us. See you soon!

Summary: This was our maybe 5th or 6th times in staying at this hotel. My 6yr old and I always stay here.  It‚Äôs always clean and everything is pretty much updated to microwaves and furniture. We love it except this time was a little unexpected.  When we got to our room there was already dirty towels on the sink and floor and trash in the can, thinking maybe somebody was already staying there.  So I called front desk and told them. They asked if I wanted to get a new room.  I told them no since it was me and my 6yr old daughter and was tiring to move around and just wanted to settle in from a long drive.  So housekeeping came and got the dirty towels.
Manager Response: We appreciate our loyal Hojo guests, and are thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations. Thank you for letting us know right away that there was something amiss in your room. We are happy to know that our Housekeeping and Front Desk staff were able to fix the issue quickly. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future. We hope to welcome you and your daughter again soon.

Summary: My husband and I went on an anniversary trip to Disneyland and knotts scary farm this past October. We booked at Hojo of course! With it being an anniversary trip we didn‚Äôt have our two children with us this time, and I‚Äôm pleased to say this hotel can be so versatile being family oriented, couples, or groups! We experienced the grounds in a whole new way, exploring the landscape and watching the monorail go by. We even got a change to experience the garden pool which is heated. We had only ever been to the water park pool option, which by the way is GREAT if you have kids, my husband and I just wanted something a little more low key. With only a short 8 minute walk to Disneyland we had no hassle getting to and from the parks. We ubered to Knotts berry farm and that too was only
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! Thank you for choosing Howard Johnson to celebrate your anniversary. We are happy to hear that you were able to experience such a versatile, child-free trip with visiting both Disneyland and Knotts Scary Farm. We are conveniently located near both theme parks, with Knotts Berry Farm being a short 15-20 minute drive from Howard Johnson. We agree, our beds are an absolute DREAM to sleep on! We suggest requesting extra pillows at the Front Desk for an even dreamier slumber. We are thrilled to hear that Nicole repeatedly helped you over the phone, in person, and via e-mail. She is such a pleasure to work with, especially with her contagious cheerfulness. We can't wait to see you and your family again for your next visit!

Summary: Arielle and Nicole welcomed us with open arms after an absolutely terrible experience with another hotel earlier that morning. They gave us a spacious room that was clean, updated, and perfect for our family. Our kids loved the bunk beds, we loved the fridge, microwave, and dining table area. The splash pad and pool were incredible! The whole experience was 10/10. We would choose HoJo over the Disneyland hotel next time. It was that good!
Manager Response: We are so glad to know you appreciated our exceptional service! It is wonderful to hear that Arielle and Nicole went above and beyond to welcome your family and turn your vacation into a positive and memorable experience. Nicole and Arielle are both friendly, and fabulous, members of our Front Desk staff. We are so happy you enjoyed our clean and spacious bunk bed room and our Cast Away Cove water playground. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Howard Johnson had the absolute best staff I have ever met at a hotel. They were so kind, welcoming and helpful. Our kids were welcomed with pirate hats and balloon pirate swords. The property is extremely nice and well maintained. The kids splash pad was really fun. We loved our room and had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks. I would 100% recommend this hotel and will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you loved your stay at Hojo!  We are thrilled our staff made you and your family feel welcome throughout your stay. It sounds like your children had a blast at our Cast Away Cove water playground and that you all enjoyed the Disneyland firework view from your room. We hope to welcome you all back with balloon pirate swords and big smiles soon!

Summary Heading: Giving the best, even before we get there!
Summary: I have stayed at the Hojo many times, and for a reason- they are absolutely THE BEST!  Each time surpasses the stay before and as per usual, they are making no exception for our upcoming trip.  I called in to change some details about our reservation and NICOLE was just amazing!  She changed what was needed and had me on my way in no time.  I appreciate everyone at Hojo sooo much. They make planning a large family vacation so much easier!  Can wait for our upcoming stay!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are beyond thrilled to know that our team made your interaction special. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so happy to hear that we were successful! We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience. We can't wait to see you soon!

Summary: „Éõ„ÉÜ„É´„ÅÆ„Çπ„Çø„ÉÉ„Éï„Åï„Çì„ÅåÁöÜ„Çì„Å™Ë¶™Âàá„Åß„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ „Ç∑„É£„ÉØ„Éº„ÅÆÂá∫„ÅóÊñπ„Åå„Çè„Åã„Çâ„ÅöÈõªË©±„Åô„Çã„Å®„ÄÅ„Åô„Åê„Å´ÈÉ®Â±ã„Åæ„ÅßÊù•„Å¶Êïô„Åà„Å¶„Åè„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„ÅäÈÉ®Â±ã„ÇÇÁ∂∫È∫ó„Åß„Éá„Ç£„Ç∫„Éã„Éº„ÇÇËøë„ÅÑ„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÂø´ÈÅ©„Å´ÈÅé„Åî„Åõ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ All the hotel staff were kind! When I called because I didn't know how to take out of the shower, she immediately came to my room and told me. The rooms are clean and Disney is close, so you can stay comfortable. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear that a member of our staff was able to assist you and your family. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable stay with us. Hopefully, we will see you and your family soon!

Summary: We were having such a stressful trip and Nicole Andrade, the manager at the front desk, made everything so simple and easy and really made everything better. Also the view of the Disney Fireworks was phenomenal!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear that Nicole made your visit extra special. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful. We love our close proximity to the parks, especially during the fireworks! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: The location is amazing just a few minutes from Disneyland. Restaurants close by which makes a trip with kids easy peasy. Staff is super friendly and the water park fun for the kids. The decor is a bit dated but bedrooms very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your positive stay with us. We are so glad that you appreciated our proximity to numerous restaurants. We can't wait to see you and your family again at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: To be honest the hotel is cool with playground and all. But the room a different story. I spent 244 dollars and the entire room smelt like water damage. It was horrible and not comfortable. Our heater didn‚Äôt work and I complained. Nothing they did at all. I‚Äôm not to happy.
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. It is our goal to always address Guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We have notified our maintenance team of these issues so they can be addressed immediately. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Very close to parks. The rooms are clean and updated. Being able to have access to the water playground and hot tub was wonderful. Lifeguards were at play area and pools. Lots of towels put out on the table for us as we left the hot tub/play area. We truly enjoyed the rooms and amenities. The price was worth it. We felt comfortable and relaxed. The front desk staff was efficient and friendly. We will consider this hotel again if we plan a Disneyland trip. Just know the parking you pay for expires at 12pm the day you leave. It was very convenient having all the restaurants across the street. Good choices and  walk was easy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are happy to know you felt comfortable and relaxed during your stay in our clean and updated rooms. We love hearing that our staff was friendly and that you enjoyed that the pools were fully staffed by lifeguards for extra safety. We appreciate all of your kind comments and feedback. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: This hotel has been fantastic! Check-in was nice and easy, Nicole was so nice! The quick walk to the parks and Downtown Disney is so simple, and you‚Äôre never alone bc of everyone else going back and forth! We had a pretty rainy weekend and this hotel made it SO easy to come back, dry off our clothes, change, and get some rest before easily walking back to the parks! The market the hotel offers was super helpful as well, we got breakfast and waters for the entire trip, just so convenient!! The only thing is that the walls are thin, so noise can be frustrating sometimes, and the fireworks are insanely loud if you stay at the hotel but you can see them from the hotel, so that is cool. Overall, highly suggest for your next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are thrilled to know that Nicole made your check-in easy and memorable. We love hearing about the details of your stay with us and that our location made it easy to travel to and from Disneyland during your rainy visit. If it is ever rainy on your next visit, we have guest laundry and dryers in Building 2 in case you need to dry your clothes. It is great to know you found our Mid Mod Market convenient to purchase waters and breakfast items on your way to the parks. Thank you for informing us of the noise from the fireworks across the street at Disneyland. They make for a gorgeous view from our hotel, but they can be pretty loud since we are located so close to the park. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities for sound. We hope to welcome you and your family back to some sunny California weather next time you stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great location for a Disney stay
Summary: 10 minutes walk down to the security gates for Disneyland, HoJo is super conveniently located for a Disney stay. Beds were quite comfortable although the pillows are a depressing sack that become scrunched up piles as soon as you try to use them. Lovely hot showers and a deep bath was a great way to end long days of walking 20K+ steps at Disney. Generous parking lot, however it comes at a daily charge. The Disney fireworks can be seen from points in the hotel grounds, and from some balconies (not ours). Housekeeping was every second day, and front desk staff seemed to be available 24x7 and were very helpful at all times. Mimis cafe right next door is excellent, a cheap but hearty feed with lots of meat and vegetable options available for anyone sick of the Disney deep fried
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review of your recent stay with us. We are glad we had just what you needed for a convenient, comfortable stay in Anaheim. We are happy that you found the beds comfortable; we would have been more than happy to change your pillows for a more restful sleep. Anytime there is something not quite right during your stay, please let our Front Desk Staff know. We will do the best we can to make it right.  It is lovely to see that you enjoyed the food at Mimi's Cafe. I hope that you were able to use the 20% discount coupon front the Front Desk. We are thrilled that you were able to advantage of the amenities we offer, from our Castaway Cove Playground to the microwave and refrigerator in the room. We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This was my third visit to the Hojo Anaheim Waterpark hotel.  I‚Äôve visited once every decade on a trip to Disneyland and this hotel always delivers.  The room was clean, tidy and spacious for a hotel.  The beds were very comfortable and we had everything we needed for our one week stay.  The grounds are kept immaculate and the staff are friendly and helpful.  We needed to see a doctor when we were there and the front desk had the phone number of a doctor who could do hotel visits which saved us waiting in an urgent care clinic.  The location of this hotel is excellent and while there are closer hotels right across front the entrance this hotel is less money per night AND is much, much nicer.  For me, the walk was negligible and it is close to Mimi‚Äôs (across the street), Panera
Manager Response: We absolutely love to welcome back our loyal HOJO guests! We are thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel for Disneyland vacations because of our location, rooms, friendly staff, immaculate grounds and pools. We are happy that we were able to recommend a doctor during your stay with us. It can be stressful when you need medical advice while on vacation, and we are relieved to hear we made it a little bit easier. Thank you so much for your kind comments, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We found ourselves in Southern CA without a Disneyland Reservation.  It was a business trip, but we always like to turn those into a fun family time.  We had appointments in Huntington Beach and Pasadena and always like hanging around the Disney Resort.  Most of our 5 days it was raining.  I was super impressed with how well the floors and walkways were kept safe and dry with so many people coming in and out of the rain. The frontdesk staff is always very cheerful and helpful - and when we had a non-hotel related issue - ZACH came to our rescue in the pouring rain!!  I love the remodeled decor, the warm cozy beds, the amazing bathroom with space and mirrors and well just everything about this hotel.  The housekeeping staff is great, the grounds are cared for and light-hearted
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! Our Housekeeping Staff do a subperb job at keeping our hotel clean, tidy and safe. It is a pleasure to hear Zach went above and beyond to help your family while it was pouring rain. Zach truly is an outstanding and wonderful member of our Front Desk Staff. We love to hear that you enjoy our cozy beds, spacious bathrooms (with fantastic lighting we might add) and our location to all things fun at the Disneyland Resort. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to HOJO again soon!

Summary: Our trip was beyond perfect! We stayed for two nights for a staycation for our daughters 5th birthday. Jennifer checked us in and my son said we were there for her birthday and she asked what her favorite character was. Lucy messaged us later that day letting us know that something especially was left at the front desk for Maddie. It was the sweetest surprise! All the staff there are extremely friendly! We did two days at the Disney parks and it is only an 8 minute walk to security! Makes it nice if you want to go back and take a nap during the day. They also have an amazing water playground with water slides, water guns, a hot tub, and a shallow kid pool. We stayed in their newly renovated rooms in building 2 and they were beautiful and over looked the large heated pool.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear that Jennifer and Lucy were successful! We are beyond thrilled that you and your family found our location to the parks convenient for your visit, especially with nap time. Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We can't wait to see you and your family again at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: The staff was simply amazing. Super helpful and friendly. The hotel‚Äôs location is great. Very close to Disneyland and California Adventure. The rooms are very comfortable and clean. I will definitely return if and when we visit Disneyland again!
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our location, comfortable rooms and friendly staff. Thank you for your kind comments, we hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Great location. Less than 10 minute walk from Disneyland. Clean property and room. Didn‚Äôt have a chance to use the water park but it looked nice. Accidentally spilled on my sheets and housekeeping came right up to switch out the sheets. Thanks for a nice stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean property and rooms. We are happy to hear that our utterly amazing housekeeping staff was able to switch out your sheets in a timely fashion. We can't wait to see you again, hopefully at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: If you need help booking a room, I cannot recommend enough that you contact the front desk directly for assistance. Nicole was SO helpful and just lovely to speak to. We stayed previously and needed help figuring out which room/type we‚Äôd stayed in so we could book similar again, and she was more than happy to help secure the perfect room for our upcoming trip. We had everything booked within a few minutes, and her local knowledge of the property helped me book the right room for our stay. Thank you to Nicole!
Manager Response: We are so happy Nicole was able to book you quickly and easily and in the exact room type you needed! Nicole is a stellar member of our In House Reservations team and we are so thrilled to hear she made the start of your vacation easy and fun. We hope we are able to book you again soon for your next trip to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary Heading: Enjoyable night after long day at Disneyland
Summary: The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. The on-site snack store was convenient, it had a wide variety of foods and allowed us to avoid having to leave the premises to get a light breakfast. The grounds were attractive and well maintained. The staff at the front desk was friendly and helpful. I will definitely be staying here on my next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you found our Mid-Mod Market convenient to your visit with us! It is definitely a one-stop shop for all of your needs, including food, pool toys, and did someone say Loungefly? We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Can't wait to see you again at Mid-Mod Market!

Summary Heading: Our visit was wonderful and comfortable
Summary: It was amazing! Everything was clean, comfortable and convenient! Our room was ready when we arrived early. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. The pools were heated and provided clean towels. We had a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear you had an amazing stay with us! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our clean and comfortable hotel, heated pools and extra friendly Front Desk Staff. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: A ten-minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure. Nice, clean rooms, with Disney art and a wonderful staff. They were so pleasant and helpful. We took our two-year-old and five-year-old. Great price. I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind comments. We love seeing that your little ones had a magical time at our hotel and that you would stay with us again. We are happy that you liked the artwork in the room and that our staff made your stay pleasant. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel located very close to Disneyland
Summary: Very friendly and helpful reception and staff, double queen bed connecting room that we‚Äôve booked also spacious and clean. Beds are comfy, location is short walk to the Disney entrance about max 8 minutes walk. Close to many restaurants and Mc Donald. Hotel provides water park for kids and heated pool as well. CC payment self laundry and dryer also available. Overall it is a very good hotel to stay for family and group.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are overjoyed to hear you liked our comfy beds, location and convenient guest laundry room. We hope our friendly staff get the chance to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: This was our first time staying here and I can definitely say we will be staying again! Hotel was clean, the store stayed open late and it was convenient to walk to Disney.  Can't wait for our next stay! Thanks for a great experience.
Manager Response: Welcome to HOJO! We are so delighted you enjoyed your first stay with us! Thank you for letting us know you loved our location and convenient Mid Mod Market that is open 7am to 11pm. We hope we become your favorite go-to hotel when visiting the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Nice. The hotel was clean and the best part of our Disney new years trip. The weather was horrible but we were able to leave our car here. It‚Äôs close enough to walk so that is a huge reason we booked here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us even though the weather was not the usual sunny California weather we are used to. It is great to know you appreciated our location to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to welcome you back again soon when it is nice and sunny!

Summary: Our room was spacious and clean. Staff was great. Front desk very helpful.  Short walk to Disney. Due to the poor weather, we were unable to use the pool or water park. However, we do plan to return in the summer.
Manager Response: We look forward to your summer stay with us and are thrilled that you will return for spaciously, clean rooms and short walk to Disneyland. We hope our staff is as great and helpful during your future trip. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. See you soon!

Summary: Absolutely great hotel for the price and value.  The rooms are big, clean, and a chic Tomorrow land theme.  10 minute walk to Disney and laundry available.  The hotel store has everything you need.  The staff was fantastic from our arrival until we left.  Lucy made sure we knew everything about our room, special discounts to use in the area, and the best way to around.  Everyone was extremely happy to work there and incredibly accommodating.  I never thought the Howard Johnson would be a hotel I return to.  I felt very safe and will bring my family back.  They even sell these vintage ‚ÄúHoJo‚Äù shirts and mugs that I purchased.  Very funny and charming.  Rick the man‚Äôs get on duty took extra time to explain different discounts I could take advantage of for my family and my upcoming
Manager Response: Thank you for this super stellar 5 star review! We love hearing that you were blown away by our rooms and fantastic service. Lucy and Rick are always sure to give the best suggestions of fun things to do next to our hotel. We are so delighted you enjoyed our Mid Mod Market merchandise and location to restaurants and the Disneyland Resort. We hope to become your go-to hotel on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Very reasonable for the price. Rooms were clean and spacious. A little of a walk from the parks than usual, but didn‚Äôt mind it. There is a Mimis and a Mcdonald‚Äôs that is close so if you‚Äôre in the mood for a quick bite this is the perfect location. Staff was very helpful as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We love hearing that you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms, and our location to multiple restaurants. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Place is great but be prepared for noisy guests
Summary: Location and surrounding area are great. The staff was very helpful and friendly. One staff member went out of his way to look for a luggage cart for my family. My only complaint is the excess noise in the early morning, we stayed for 3 nights and all nights I was awake by 6am. You could hear other guests' doors slam open and close all morning long, kids shouting in the hallway and parents yelling at the kids. In other words, not very sound proof when you can hear everything in the hallway, don't plan to sleep in on a vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay with us. We apologize for the excessive noise in the morning from your neighbors. We understand this can be frustrating, especially at 6 in the morning. We added soundproof windows to our rooms that face the freeway, but we always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Despite this issue, we are pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay and liked our hotel. We hope to see you again in the furture.

Summary Heading: Family friendly and full of fun!
Summary: Staff was so friendly, the grounds and rooms were immaculate, beds were so comfy and the water park was so fun! This was our first time staying here and we loved it! We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled you had a 5 star stay with us! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our immaculate grounds, comfy beds and fun water playground. We hope we can welcome you and your family back to HOJO again soon for more fun family memories!

Summary: Lucy at the front desk was awesome and such a great help! We were greeted with such warmth and professionalism. The hotel room was very clean and the beds we‚Äôre comfortable and perfect for our family. Lucy was also very accommodating when we needed to park our car for an extra day. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! We are so thrilled to hear Lucy was awesome and that she went above and beyond to make your stay memorable. We think Lucy is a top-notch member of our staff! We appreciate you letting us know that you enjoyed our clean rooms and comfortable beds. We hope to welcome you back to HOJO again soon!

Summary: Great hotel, very close to Disneyland. Excellent pool and water park. Clean and very handy with washer and dryer facilities and microwave and fridge. Easy car-parking . Couldn‚Äôt ask for much more as a family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know your family had a great time staying with us and loved using our water playground. We are happy that you found our location and amenities convenient for your Disney vacation. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Anaheim trip.

Summary Heading: Best Family Hotel within Walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: I love the beds at the Hojo! They are so comfortable! The renovated rooms are gorgeous and definetely make you feel like you are on a Disney vacation with the Mickey artwork! The rooms are very clean and smell good. The bathroom is spacious and clean and i love the huge lighted bathroom mirror - excellent for getting ready.  I also love the quick 8 min walk to the Disneyland entrance! The waterpark is a hit with my kids as well! We LOVE the Howard Johnson Anaheim!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and magical rooms, especially our perfectly lit bathrooms. We hope to see you and your family again soon at the Castaway Cove!

Summary Heading: Near the happiest place on Earth a superb Wonderfully and Clean place and awesome staff.
Summary: Very satisfied with our experience at the Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel! We went mid December of 2022 and were greeted by a fabulous staff "Summer being our #1 staff member‚Äú but everybody was helpful and great. The hotel was close to the park and very clean. We liked our room with a nightly fireworks show in view. The room was updated, spacious, beds were comfortable, bathroom was clean and updated, floors were clean and didn't feel like I needed to be concerned about going over border to sanitize (lol).
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us. Summer is such a ray of sunshine! We are thrilled she is our #1 staff member here at Hojo! We are happy to hear that our location was convenient for your visit to the parks, and it warms our heart knowing that you were able to view the fireworks from the room! What a core memory! We are so delighted you found our rooms spacious and our beds comfortable. We can't wait to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: The staff was super helpful and friendly. We ended up needed a scooter rental and they helped make that easy. They got us so many extra pillows when we needed them. Shout out to Lucy for her great service checking us in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! We are thrilled to hear our staff was friendly and helpful and they were able to assist you with a mobility scooter rental. Also, we understand the need for our extra comfy pillows! We cannot wait to share your kind comments with Lucy. We truly think she is a great member of our staff. We hope to welcome you back to HOJO again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel   In house reservations (Jennifer) makes booking so easy.
Summary: The reservation process is so easy and haste free. We always book with Jennifer in their inhouse reservations.  She is always so helpful and makes sure we have everything we need during our stay. She  ROCKS!  The hotel is a easy walk to Disneyland and the rooms are always clean. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Jennifer is truly such an asset to our In-House Reservations team. We are so glad she has been such a help in ensuring you have everything you need. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Great customer service even before we arrive.
Summary: We haven‚Äôt even arrived yet and Jennifer has responded to all my email requests. Alway friendly, alway eager to help. Truly amazing.  I‚Äôve asked for crib, grocery delivery, Pool questions and more. Always yes, above and beyond.   Can‚Äôt wait to arrive next week.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that we have already provided amazing customer service, even before your stay. Jennifer is a drop of sunshine on this rainy day, and we are glad she is on our team. We will make sure to continue the excellent service during your stay.

Summary Heading: Great stay close to Disneyland Resort
Summary: We have stayed at this location a couple of times over the years and we've always been pleased. Rooms and grounds are clean, staff is friendly, and you can't beat the location! Our kids also love that the pools are heated year round!
Manager Response: We absolutely love to welcome back our loyal guests! We are thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel for Disneyland vacations because of our location, rooms and friendly staff. Thank you so much for your kind comments, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Super helpful & friendly staff and very nice hotel
Summary: I haven't stayed here in years but took advantage of the great sale they had for my overnight stay. All the staff I encountered were friendly and helpful which really added to the pleasant stay. Property was clean and nicely decorated for the holidays. Room was comfortable and nicely redone. It's about a 10 minute walk to the front of the parks. Nice to have several restaurant choices nearby.
Manager Response: We are so delighted we could welcome you back to our property! We really do try to go all out with decorations for the Holiday season. We hope you enjoyed all of the colorful lights and fun photo opportunities around the hotel. It is lovely to hear you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and location to restaurants near by. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Fab Location for Disneyland, Clean & Tidy rooms , great staff. Highly recommend for a Disney/LA trip.
Summary: Great location, 8 minute walk to Disney Parks & Downtown Disney. Plenty of Food options nearby, 2-3 minute walk to Panera Bread & McDonalds which was great for Breakfasts.  Room was large (plenty of room for 3 sharing), and room was clean & tidy. Staff were Fab, they gave us plenty of advice , maps of local services and a list of restaurants locally with opening times over Xmas period. There is a small shop onsite that sells snacks, drinks etc (including wine & beer) which was useful to stock up for the room for post Disney wind down!  Worth noting that all the Hotels on Harbour Blvd are alongside the Interstate , so there is a constant white noise of traffic and very noticeable in the grounds, it did not bother us as room was reasonably soundproofed but may be worth
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms and convenient location. We are so happy to hear you did not experience any highway noise and that our Staff were helpful. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Hotel is perfect, stayed for 4 nights. I emaed in to confirm my reservations and request a first floor room as I had booked through getaway today and Nicole responded. I had asked if it was possible to acknowledge when we arrived my daughter's birthday as we would be there celebrating her. Upon check in we met Lucy, she is awesome! Lucy was so friendly, professional and explained everything. Lucy texted me to stop by on the way back to the hotel for something to surprise my daughter. Upon check in back st the hotel Lucy gave my daughter some balloons to celebrate. We also were moved into tower 2. The room was clean, spacious, beds were so comfy and loved all the pillows.  Housekeeping came on day 2 and cleaned and provided clean towels. The gift shop was well stocked, we needed
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear Nicole and Lucy went above and beyond to make your stay with us extra magical! Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star stay with us. We wish your daughter a very Happy Birthday and we hope to be your new go-to hotel every time you stay in Anaheim!

Summary: Rafael and Zach went above and beyond to make our stay amazing. Really comfortable stay, nice hotel, extremely friendly staff. Our room was very clean and quiet. My kids loved the bunk beds. Short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Rafael & Zach are such vital components that put Hojo above & beyond the competition. We are so glad that you appreciated our clean and quiet rooms and that your kids loved the bunk beds. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a perfect vacation.
Summary: Our family absolutely loved staying here. Upon arrival we were greeted with such joy and friendliness! We had just traveled from across the nation and it had been a looooooong day. Check in was fast and our room was waiting for us.  The room was fantastic! Clean and spacious! Had a view of the pool area and Disneyland. Our first night we were able to watch fireworks from the balcony.  If visiting Disney parks, know it‚Äôs a short 7-10 min walk to main entrance.  Housekeeping came every other day of our stay and we‚Äôre so friendly.  Overall we enjoyed our stay at Howard Johnson Anaheim and WILL stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review! We absolutely love how you were greeted with joy and friendliness after a long day of traveling nationwide. We are so glad to hear that you appreciated our clean and spacious rooms. We are beyond happy to hear that you had such a glorious view of the pool area and Disneyland. We can't wait to see you for your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Such wonderful staff, super comfortable rooms and great housekeeping service! The only thing that was unpleasant is the sewage smell as you enter building 1 by the store. It was so strong! I could also smell it coming from the sink drains in my room. We kept our bathroom door closed and it was fine. Next time, we‚Äôll stay in a different building. Thank you awesome staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review about your stay. We apologize for the experience you had with the smell in the lobby of Building 1. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience. We have since eliminated the source of the odor, but we will still bring your comments to the attention of our Chief Engineer to ensure a similar experience isn't repeated. We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. If you come back to Anaheim we do hope that you will give us another shot to make sure that we give you the best experience possible.

Summary: Loved the location, the staff was incredibly nice, the room was very clean, my only complaint is that the skylights allow too much light into the room so there‚Äôs no way to make it fully dark and so my toddler wouldn‚Äôt nap. Other than that, I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our location! Some of our rooms do have the skylights that let the natural light in; we would have been more than happy to have looked into another room that was not on the top floor during your stay. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, great place to stay!
Summary: This was our second December in a row staying at the HoJo and both times we have really enjoyed it. This time we were in building 1, which was more renovated and modern than the building we were in last year. Both times we had clean rooms and friendly, helpful staff. It‚Äôs a short walk to the parks and we would not hesitate to stay here again!
Manager Response: WOW, back to back stays! Thank you for continuing to stay with us during the most festive time of the year! We're thrilled to know that you enjoyed our clean rooms and friendly staff! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. Hopefully we will see you and your family before December 2023!

Summary: Stayed 4 nights the week leading up to Christmas. Room and location was great. Slight hiccup with one off putting front desk associate, but overall the property is clean and our stay was great.   We frequented the gift shop daily for milk, snacks, beer and souvenirs. Visited both pools and utilized the laundry facility. This hotel has great amenities and location is unbeatable. Letter to Santa for kids was a nice personal touch.  Cons: Housekeeping services every 2nd day. If you have a side by side double stroller it will not fit through the door without force. We had to load and unload our double stroller in the hallway and fold it before coming into/exiting the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent holiday stay with us. We are so disappointed to hear about the experience you had upon your arrival.  The service you received from our Front Desk Staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value and service, we are so sorry to hear we were not successful.  We truly apologize our Staff was not helpful and attentive.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. With that said, we are happy to hear that you found our Mid Mod Market most convenient for your stay, especially some pool side drinks. We are even more thrilled to hear that Santa was able to visit you and your family. While our Housekeeping Services are done after the 2nd night, you have the option to request a full service for any day during your stay. I apologize that the double stroller did not fit in the doorway, but happy to hear you were able to unload and fold it before entering. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: So glad we chose to stay here for a Disney Parks visit. Walking distance was a plus. We were very pleased with everything about this hotel. Great customer service, very clean, updated, and family friendly. We will be staying again!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your recent Disney vacation. We are thrilled to hear you were pleased with everything at our hotel. We strive to have excellent customer service and clean rooms, so it is great to hear we were successful. We can't wait for you to stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson Anaheim hotel and water playground.
Summary: Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel is in a great location with plenty of available amenities. This hotel is especially good as it placed around food and local shopping malls. Staff was friendly especially Nicole J, who was knowledgeable  and pleasant and provided great help.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind comments. We are so happy that our locations and the amenities made for a delightful stay. Nicole is an excellent asset to our team. We love hear that she was helpful during your visit. We hope to see you on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Howard Johnsons Anaheim hotel. We had planned a 4 night Disney vacation to celebrate my twin grand babies turning 1 and this hotel was the perfect fit for my family to all stay together for our trip.  Unfortunately one of the babies turning 1 went to CHOC hospital instead of to Disneyland for her birthday so we ended up cutting our trip short by 2 nights. Everyone at the Howard Johnsons was so helpful and accommodating with this change and we really appreciated this kindness during a sad time for our family.  Zach at the front desk check us in and helped with this early departure for us. The room was very clean and accommodating, they even had a cute, sanitized yellow cubby ducky in the bathroom for the kids enjoyment int he bathtub. I liked the
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear that your vacation was cut short by unplanned events. We truly help your Grandbaby is doing much better. We are happy to hear that Zach was able to assist your family and help you with an early check-out.
