He really is a wonderful member of our Front Desk Team. We hope that we are able to welcome your family back soon when you are ready to return to Anaheim.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, very fast check-in and check-out, the staff is also very friendly, only that I would have liked a room in building #1 at the top, it will be for the next time, but in itself, a very good hotel, thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location to Disneyland and that our friendly staff were quick and helpful. If you are interested in booking a room at the top of Building 1, we recommend booking the Superior 2 Queen Bed room with a Park View. This room is one of our favorite room types! Please be sure to speak with our Front Desk Staff before arriving to notate a request for a top floor. The skylights on the top floors let in lots of natural, beautiful light. We hope you welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary Heading: Bad experience when we were in a pinch ruined this hotel for us
Summary: Check in was great, the room was perfectly fine. I wish they‚Äôd had a continental breakfast, and it was a little farther from the park than I expected, but this would have been a 5 star stay except for our check out.  Our flight was delayed until late in the evening of our check out day. The hotel would not allow us to extend our stay, store our luggage, or continue to use the pool. I had to pay an additional $400 for the cheapest room on site just so we could use the pool and the restrooms between check out (11 AM) and leaving for the airport (4:30 PM). I was honestly flabbergasted by how unhelpful they were, especially since I‚Äôm assuming these things happen all the time. You would think they‚Äôd have a little more compassion and support mechanisms in place. We won‚Äôt be staying
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address Guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. While it is our Hotel's Policy not to allow our guests in the pool past noon, which is an hour after check-out. I do apologize that we did not make a one-time exception for you and your family during this time. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated.  We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: Great room for our family with 2 comfortable queen beds and a fairly quiet AC. Courteous and helpful staff made our stay stress free. Easy, safe walk to Disneyland with a Mimi‚Äôs, Panera and McDonalds on the way. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation! Don't forget your Mimi's coupon at the Front Desk for your next visit!

Summary: This was a great place to stay to be able to walk to the Disneyland gate in around 10 minutes. We had a room that was in a renovated building. It sounds like they also have unrenovated rooms...not sure what those would be like. Our 2 queen bed room was plenty of room for my daughter and I. It would have been a little tight if my husband and son had come on the trip only because there was very little clothes storage space in the room (just one 2-drawer dresser). I would stay here again for sure, depending on the affordability of the room rates.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. Our Pavillions is where our Standard Economy Rooms are located, which will be next to be renovated.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at the Howard Johnson for our recent Disneyland trip. Through no fault of management, we were met with a small maintenance issue - not only was it resolved very quickly but we were compensated appropriately for the trouble. All staff were extremely responsive to our needs throughout the entire trip. The walkability to Disneyland is a huge draw - my ONLY wish would be for breakfast to be available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback. We are happy to hear our Staff were able to resolve the maintenance issue quickly and that you had a wonderful experience staying with us.  We will mention your request for more breakfast options to be available in our Gift Shop. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We do hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Room was nice. Lobby of Building 1 smelled like rotten fish.
Summary: We stayed in a family suite and there was plenty of room for 5 of us. A couple of weird things... 1. there wasn't a dresser in the second bedroom. 2. The lobby of Building 1 legit smells like rotten fish. It was the same every day. I am very turned off by smells and this is a reason I won't be back. 3. After housekeeping cleaned, they didn't leave towels or a bathmat. (Minor inconvenience but annoying when you're back from your hotel late and you just want to sleep/shower). Good thing: it's in walking distance to Disneyland and that was convenient. They don't serve breakfast but there are many breakfast places nearby. Of course you pay like $60+ for breakfast. I will definitely be finding a better smelling hotel that serves breakfast in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We apologize for the smell in your building; this is definitely not something we want our guests to experience. Our Maintenance Manager has since fixed the issue that caused the smell. We are also sorry that we did not replace your towels and bathmat. We have a note in all bathrooms letting our guests know that we are trying to converse water and will only replace towels if the towels are placed on the floor. We always encourage our guests to let us know if there is anything they need, we would have been happy to send up new towels. However, we are glad that our location made it easy for you to walk to Disneyland and many nearby restaurants. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, and updated rooms on very secure hotel property
Summary: The rooms seemed updated and very clean. We also really appreciated the gated parking lot which really made us feel secure. The hotel also felt very secure as well. Last year, we had issues while staying at a different brand hotel down the street and our vehicle was stolen and their weee non-guests walking through the property. It was very nice staying at a hotel where we felt secure again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear that you felt safe in our secured parking lot, and as an extra safety precaution, all of our buildings require a valid key card to enter. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Love this rooms really comfortable and loved how closed it was to Disneyland the stuff was really nice the rooms were cleaned and just had a really good experience! I really recommend this place I would stay here again
Manager Response: We are so happy to see that you gave us a 10 rating and that you would recommend our hotel. We are also glad you loved our comfortable beds and how close we are to Disneyland. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Front desk was good at check in. Called later and needed a luggage cart and I was told that I have to find one in between floors or walk around 6 buildings to find one by myself. Customer service and the amount of luggage carts is very much lacking. If the hotel does not want to invest in more luggage carts that are easily accessible, at least offer someone to bring one to our room. I will be happy to tip heavy for that service. I‚Äôm a single mom and didn‚Äôt like leaving my children in the room by themselves. The room was very clean, spacious, modern and comfortable. The employees for the most part were very kind and friendly.   The carpeted hallways needed to be vacuumed more often. We stayed there for 5 nights and it never looked spotless. I enjoyed my stay for the most part.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We apologize for not having the staff to deliver a luggage cart to your room. We understand that it can be challenging to maneuver luggage around, especially with little kids, and we are more than happy to bring a luggage cart to your room when we have the staff available to do so. We hope to be fully staffed soon. We also apologize for the carpet in the hallway. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Manager. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!

Summary: Nice hotels everywhere was clean and I like the smell it‚Äôs near to Disney I like this it‚Äôs so beautiful and the room service was wonderful thank you for everything I am came back soon thank you so much for the front desk service too nice people and friendly
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear that you had a beautiful Christmas while staying with us and that you would stay with us again! We are happy that your room was clean with a pleasant smell. Our team is dedicated to provide excellent customer service, so it is great to see that we were successful. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: This hotel is always amazing. They have helped us with everything from setting up our Covid testing last year to taking amazing care of my son when he had an asthma attack.  The rooms are always spotless, the pool and splash park are always pristine.  The staff are kind and knowledgeable about everything.  10 out of 10 strongly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations! Thank you so much for your kind comments and excellent feedback. We are happy that we were able to help last year with your COVID testing and this year with your son. We are just so happy to hear that he is ok! We are so pleased that we have always provided you with a delightful experience. Thank you so much for letting us know about your most recent stay with us. We can't wait to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the Disneyland area!
Summary: I love Hojo! This has been my third time staying here at Hojo Anaheim and it was such a wonderful birthday experience. The whole property is decked out in Christmas decorations and you could really feel the magic in the air. Lucy at the front desk was such a great help with questions I had and went above and beyond for me. She is such a sweet beautiful soul! The front desk even had the option to write letters to Santa for the kiddos that will receive a letter back! Hojo always goes above and beyond to really keep their property fun for the whole family and activities for the kids to always be entertained. I stayed at building two and had the most beautiful view of the garden pool. The little shop they have there has everything you could need and more if you forget anything. The
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Lucy is an amazing addition to our growing Front Desk team. Thank you for appreciating our festive holiday decor. We hope you were able to stop by and see Santa during your stay! We truly love going the extra mile for our guests in any way possible, even adding some extra holiday magic for our littlest guests. We are beyond thrilled that you and your family enjoyed our comfortable beds and convenient location to the parks. We can't wait to see you at the Garden Pool again!

Summary: There was no breakfast. They put us in back building and fan was squeaking all the time so couldn't drown out freeway noise. Parking is rough. Great location for going to Disneyland. The staff were beyond amazing and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. While we do not offer breakfast on our property, we are conveniently located across the street from Mimi's Cafe. You also have the option of ordering delivery to the hotel and having it picked up at the Front Desk. I'm sorry to hear that the freeway noise was loud in your room. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: GREAT HOTEL, super close to Disneyland! We booked online and and the room was ready before check in time. That was a huge plus so we could drop off our bags. We were able to go eat, shop and visit down town Disney all in that afternoon. The walk to Disney was 8 minutes. We really enjoyed staying here due to the distance, we did not use the pool because it colder. We also liked that the hotel was right next to the freeway. We had a great time. We recommend this hotel
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! While early check-in is not guaranteed, we are thrilled that we had the availability to get you and your family in before check-in time! We are beyond ecstatic that you found our location to the parks convenient for your visit. Hopefully we will see you soon at the Garden Pool.

Summary: We stayed here for a Disneyland visit 12/19 to 12/24 and had a great time. Facilities are new and very nice. Rooms are extremely clean with comfortable beds/pillows. There is a small, on-site convenience, store and all the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. The walk to Disneyland parks is approximately 5 to 10 minutes. We did not use the pool/small water park but it looked very nice as well. I would recommend anyone going for a Family Disney vacation would like this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our clean, comfortable beds and pillows. Our Mid-Mod Market is out of this world with convenience. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Convenient location and perfect with children
Summary: The front desk went above + beyond to help us out We were lucky enough to have a renovated room which was lovely. Our other group unfortunately had a room that hadn't been updated and was very loud next to the freeway. Very close walk to Disneyland too
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We go to infinity & beyond with our Customer Service here at HOJO! We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We would have been more than happy to check our availability for an upgrade for your other group. We hope to be your first accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: I‚Äôm a Wyndham Rewards platinum member and was thoroughly impressed with everything about the hotel - cleanliness, on-site amenities, location was excellent incredible, staff, especially Liliana at check-in and Nicole during our stay. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We are delighted to hear that Liliana and Nicole were of such service to your stay with us. Thank you for appreciating our cleanliness and amazing amenities. We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Exactly the right place for our family
Summary: The hotel location and convenience to Disneyland was perfect. It was close, clean, great pools and amenities. Our room had a small fridge for storing snacks, a microwave, and a very close ice machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us! We are happy to hear that our location was convenient for your visit to Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Our time at HoJo was excellent. It‚Äôs a short walk to Disneyland. Family suite was an excellent size.  We had issues with a rent-a-car company and reception, particularly Arielle, went above and beyond to help us.  Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear that you and your family loved our Kid's Suite. We are even beyond thrilled to hear that Arielle was available to assist you with your rental car. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We stayed at the House of the Retro Future suite, and the details are incredible! Anyone who loves Disney history and/or retro decor MUST stay here! Nicole gave us a room tour when we checked in, and she gave us such great info about the room!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear that you and your family loved our iconic House of the Retro Future suite, where you can experience yesterday's tomorrow- day! We appreciate your kind words about Nicole, she is such an asset to the team. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Easy check-in, thank you Nicole and Arielle! We were very early but there was no problem getting a room. We were assigned building #2, second floor room with arched windows by the ceiling that made the room bright and sunny during the day, which was a nice touch, but it did mean some ambient light getting into the room after lights out. Room was huge for two people, so it would certainly serve a family of five no problem, very clean, and we had a view of the Disneyland fireworks from our balcony (and through the trees) without paying for it! Very quiet, didn't hear a thing from rooms next door to us, though there was a small bit of noise from the hallway, nothing obnoxious though. In-room Keurig coffee maker, it's silly to mention it but it's the best in-room coffee I've had in
Manager Response: We love to hear that Nicole and Arielle did a stellar job at welcoming your family to our hotel and that you had an easy, early check-in! We are happy you enjoyed the arched windows on the top floor of your building. They really do add beautiful, natural lighting to our second-floor rooms. Thank you for taking the time to share with us that you found our location to Disneyland quick and convenient. We hope to welcome you back to HOJO the next time you visit Anaheim!

Summary: Surprised by $20/night parking fee, water park wrist bands are not replaceable , we were staying 6 nights and were told to keep it on the whole duration lol , what a stupid rule , no bowls , cutlery in room
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your stay with us. We appreciate both negative and positive feedback and apologize that you did not have a 5-star stay with us. While we were one of the last hotels to offer complimentary parking, we had to implement the parking charges due to increased guests traveling with a vehicle. We are happy to let you know that we have recently changed our wristbands to be more comfortable to wear during your stay. While all of our rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, and Keurig coffee maker, our MidMod Market has utensils and plates for purchase. We really hope you give us another try to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: The room was fine, what you would expect from a basic hotel. Nothing exceptional. The room was not cleaned for us in between our 2 night stay, which would have been nice after being at Disneyland all day. Parking was $20 a night, and you could not park past check out on the day you were checking out. This meant we had to move our car first thing in the morning and pay for Disneyland parking since we would be at the theme park all day. Very disappointed that parking was not included in the stay. Our room was next to the water park, which was frustrating when we wanted to go to bed early. The sounds of the water park outside our window were incredibly loud. A roll out bed was provided in the room and it was very uncomfortable. Not sure I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review with us. We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. While it is our hotel policy to automatically do a full-service clean after your second night with us. However, you do have the option of requesting a full-service cleaning in the morning. You can extend your parking permit based on availability on checkout day. Parking extensions are based on our occupancy that day, so we can't honor it before the departure date. I'm sorry you were not aware of this before moving your vehicle. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Great experience close walk to Disneyland resort! Clean rooms and great price on parking! Love the staff friendly and fast was able to go check in quick and got my keys and parking right away. Was also given a 20 percent discount on breakfast love how close it is to McDonald's and Disney resort
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. We love to hear that you were able to use our 20% coupon at Mimi's Cafe! This rainy weather definitely has us craving their French Onion Soup.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Stayed one night, after a visit to Disneyland.  The front desk staff was really nice.  The room was clean.  A  nice feature was that I could check-in early and leave my car parked there while we went to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our exceptional service and cleanliness. We're happy to hear that we had the availability to extend your parking permit while you had another day at Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for a few days at Disneyland
Summary: We stay at the Howard Johnson‚Äôs a couple of times a year. The staff are always very nice and very helpful. And the hotel is very nice and clean. It‚Äôs a nice easy walk to Disneyland it usually take about 10 to 15 minutes to get to the park. There are also a couple of places to eat nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We're happy to hear that you found our location convenient to your visit to the parks. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We haven't stayed at Howard Johnson's in a long time,since my kids were little.  It's been a while, this hotel continues to be the best family place to stay when we are going to Disneyland. We were able to booked two conjoined rooms for my family and parents. Which worked out great! It within walking distance to Disneyland.  Everything is nice and clean, comfortable beds.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! We're happy to hear that you were able to secure our Two Room Bundle with the connecting door. We can't wait to see you again for your next Disneyland visit.

Summary: Wonderful, welcoming staff! Rich, the manager is top notch. Super comvenient location to the parks (8min walk). Loved the newly updated bldg #2 with interior corridors, super comfortable king beds, spacious room, hot shower.  Very clean, quiet & comfortable! Cute retro decor w/some Mickey Mouse art. Great value too! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: From our comfortable beds, and convenient location, to our retro and clean rooms, we are thrilled to hear that you had a perfect stay with us. We are dedicated to provide exceptional service, so we love hearing that our team was successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: It was clean. Staff was friendly. There was a really bad smell in the lobby for our last 2 nights. Issues with a trash compactor maybe? The water park needs a face lift. When we got there the first time the big slide and hot tub were closed off, I wasn‚Äôt surprised judging by the state of things. When another family of three came in they opened the slide. The next day the hot tub was open. Maybe that‚Äôs their policy? To close the hot tub at night? There was almost no hot water, even my 5 year old complained. No fan in the bathroom. The rooms with a balcony are very drafty. I asked for a blanket to be brought up to our room, after 45 minutes I went to the front desk and got it myself.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address guests negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We had our hot tub closed in the past due to short staffing. However, we are pleased to say that we have updated our hot tub policy which significantly reduces closures due to short staffing. I do apologize for the lack of hot water, we will bring your comments to our Maintenance staff to ensure this isn't repeated in the future. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: The room was spacious and inviting.  A great place to return to after a Long day at Disneyland.  Having adjoining rooms with our son and his family worked for us to be able to help with a busy 3 year old.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind comments. We love that we were able to get you adjoining rooms, which made it easy for you to spend quality time with your grandchild. We are thrilled that you found our rooms spacious and inviting, especially after a long day at Disney. We hope to be your top choice when staying in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great stay, comfortable bed and very close to Disneyland.
Summary: Very close to Disneyland, near some good restaurants.  Room was a good size, bed was a comfortable pillowtop.  Recently renovated room.  Double sinks, tiny bathtub.  Quiet room, near elevator and ice machine.  Front desk very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that although your room was near an elevator and ice machines, it was still nice, quiet, and comfortable. We are also delighted that our location made it easy for you to walk to Disney and restaurants. Our staff strives to provide excellent customer service, so it is great to see that we were successful. We hope to see you for your next Disney visit.

Summary: The location of the hotel and its proximity to Disneyland was just what we were looking for! Room and grounds of the hotel were clean and beautiful, I‚Äôd 100% recommend for my family and friends to come stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning you next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Have stayed multiple times. Had a few hiccups but staff was quick to offer help. Wi-Fi had issues called their Wi-Fi company twice with little to no help but that‚Äôs not hotels issue but more the Wi-Fi company. Stayed in building 1 this time. Great view of fireworks. Building 1 does not have automatic wheelchair doors so it made it hard to get in if no one was around to help hold open door.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are beyond happy that you had a fantastic view of Disneyland's fireworks from your room in Building 1. We are so sorry to hear the internet connection was inconsistent during your stay with us. We definitely understand how much of an inconvenience this is, and we truly apologize. We do have two computers for Guest use at our lobby that may be used between 6 AM to midnight while our lobby is open. Nonetheless, we will share your comments with our management. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff and a great place to stay with the family. Microwave in room was a great bonus, no need to eat out for every meal.  Excellent proximity to Disneyland, restaurants and shopping. This was our second stay and we will be back. Thanks HoJo.
Manager Response: We are so pleased we could welcome you back to HOJO! We love to hear our room amenities made mealtimes easy and convenient and that our staff were friendly and helpful during your stay. Thank you so much for your kind comments, we hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Room a bit dated but clean and tidy with coffee machine  Bathroom very dated  Be ware of stairs with heavy bags  Staff very helpful and friendly with on site shop  Easy walk to Disneyland and nearby restaurants
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. While we have both renovated buildings and buildings that will be renovated next. To ensure that you will be in a renovated building, please call our In-House Reservations department by calling our Front Desk at (714) 776-6120 and asking to speak to In-House Reservations. We are available Monday-Friday from 9 AM PST - 3 PM PST. We are thrilled to hear that our staff was helpful and friendly, especially in our Mid Mod Market. We look foward to your next stay with us!

Summary: I paid an additional amount to be in Building 1 with 2 queen beds and a city view.  This was not the room, beds or view that I got. I've stayed many times and never run into this issue. We were otherwise happy with the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize that you received a different room than what you reserved. While we normally, do not move room types. If there is a reason for which we have to change your room, we do our best to place you in a comparable room or better. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here Dec 5 - 11, 2023, 3 adults and a 6 year old.  I cannot say enough good things about this hotel.  A very short walk to Disneyland & California Adventure Park.  Mimi's restaurant (which is maybe about a minute away) is lovely with delicious food.  McDonald's is only a block away.  We upgraded our room to be able to see the fireworks at night, $20USD plus tax per night and it was well worth it.  To upgrade I dealt with Kriss who absolutely went over the top to help me.  It was sold out but she kept an eye on it for me and emailed to let me know a room had opened up for us.  She is wonderful and an asset to Howard Johnsons.  Our room was lovely and the beds are super comfortable.  Every single employee we met were incredibly lovely and helpful.  When we needed more
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you had such an awesome time staying with us! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience with our In House Reservations Supervisor, Kriss. We truly think she is top notch! We are happy she was able to book you into the Superior 2 Queen Bed room with a park view. Those rooms really are magical! We hope to host you, and your family again soon!

Summary: I've used this facility 3 times and had a fantastic time at all of them. The kids loved it as much as Disney and really were excited to go back and rest. The only thing you should be made aware of is parking charges. Each time I have been assured that parking fees were paid up front in my reservation only to be charged again on check-out with the manager saying they were not, even with proof on the reservation. This has happened every time, seems like a way to make a few extra dollars and tends to piss you off when your trying to escape such conflicts. But it is a perfect hotel to stay at for an LA adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience. We are happy to hear you always have a fantastic time at our hotel. We do apologize for the confusion with your parking fees. We do not offer prepaid parking before guests' arrivals, for the reason that we would never want to charge a guest parking fees if they are not going to be having a vehicle on our property. If a guest has a vehicle upon check-in, we will authorize for parking for their entire stay, which will look like a pending charge on their bank statement. The parking amount will be finalized upon checking out. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon.

Summary Heading: Clean room, perfect location, great front desk staff!
Summary: A short walk to Disney! They were so accommodating. We had a flat tire on our rental car. We were spending the day at the park and didn't want to go back and forth, so they let us leave the keys with them and the rental car company did a swap. The room was clean and comfortable and would have been a great view of the fireworks from the hot tub, had they done them!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so delighted to hear our staff was accommodating and they were able to turn an unforeseen situation into a positive exerience. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Great place to stay, close to the park entrance. Nice property and the water park/hot tub was the perfect way to relax after day at the park.  Older room was freshly painted and well maintained. Quiet, other than the 9:30 fireworks every night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. Other than the fireworks at 9:30, it is great that you found our rooms nice and quiet. For your next stay with us, we do have earplugs available at the Front Desk. It is wonderful to hear that you had a relaxing time in our hot tub. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I have not stayed there yet, but I will update the review when I do.  I mostly wanted to recognize Zach at the hotel for the best customer service I've ever had from a hotel employee when I called to make a reservation.  I'm trying to make this a special trip for my wife and 9 year old daughter.  They were supposed to travel with me and my boys in 2020 and both caught Covid, so this is a make up trip for them, and Zach went above and beyond with tips and advice about the best room choices for them, and the area itself.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are absolutely lucky to have Zach on our team with his outstanding customer service skills! We will notify management about his glowing review. We are so happy you are planning a memorable trip for yourself and your family! Feel free to call our In-House Reservations team at (714) 776-6120 when you are ready to book. When you call, please always select the Front Desk option and ask to speak to In-House Reservations. We are available Monday- Friday from 9 AM PST- 3 PM PST.

Summary: My hotel room was very old and dirty. The shower was broken  and unsafe. The road noise was so bad I couldn‚Äôt sleep so I ended up leaving after one night and went to another hotel. Very disappointed and wouldn‚Äôt recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us. We are so sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We understand the frustration; we will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping and Maintenance Managers to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: So close to Disney, 5 to 10 minute walk. Rooms were very clean and felt very safe. Incredible customer service, specifically Samantha and Zack. Their customer service was off the chart high. They made our stay even better. Definitely would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our location and clean hotel. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We also think that Samantha and Zach are top notch staff members! They definitely make our days better as well. Thank you so much for taking the time to mention that they made your stay memorable. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: 3 day staycation with family of 2 young kids
Summary: Stayed here recently with my wife, my 4 year old son And 16 month old daughter. It was our second time staying here and we were just as impressed as the first time. The rooms were clean and newly renovated and Disney themed which really added to the Disney staycation vibe and the kids loved it. We‚Äôve stayed at The Grand Californian a few times and staying at the HOJO  Is honestly just as enjoyable for me and so much more affordable. The walk to the park is easy, less than 10 minutes which is great after a long day. The elevators are fast which I can‚Äôt say is true for all the local hotels. A really great thing was the on-site store, it had all the essentials and was open till 11 pm every night. We ran out of baby wipes and forgot a toothbrush and having the store made it super
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We love to hear that our hotel added to the Disney magic of your vacation. Convenience is key during a vacation, especially with little ones. We are so glad that our location and MidMod Market made things easier for you. We look forward to your next staycation with us.

Summary Heading: Overall, will be using this Hotel again next year..  4 1/2 star rating... would have been 5 stars, but shower door (OR LACK OF)
Summary: stayed in room 1-718 (SUITE) 2 rooms/2bathrooms. one shower was a walk in, only had one door, (most showers have 2 sliding doors) so part of my body was cold while showering!! The balcony was accessible only thru the closet, which you had to duck down when walking thru to get out. 1st time I went out, HIT MY HEAD on shelf in closet. Sharp edge, Large lump... thankfully NO BLOOD!!!!   The BED was my favorite Item.. Best bed I've slept in for years. Only had to call room service one time, and recieved my items within 10 min
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We are happy that you had an amazing slumber on our comfy pillow-top beds. However, we are saddened to hear that you were cold during your shower, this is not something we want our guests to experience. We hope that you were able to use the full shower tub in the adjacent room. We are relieved that you are ok after hitting your head on the closet shelf. We have first aid kits available at the Front Desk for our guests if accidents happen. In order to add soundproof windows, we needed to move the entrance to the balcony in the closet. We added bumpers on the shelves to prevent injuries, but we will make sure that our Maintenance team checks this room, in case the bumper fell off or needs to be replaced. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Despite these issues, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Wife and I stayed in the House of the Retro Future Suite.  Wow, what an awesome take on Disney‚Äôs House of Tomorrow. By far the best room we have ever stayed in. Room was like a piece of art.  Truly impressive!  The hotel staff was very friendly and top notch.  Hotel and grounds were very clean.  Nice that the hotel was within walking distance to Disneyland.  We had a wonderful visit.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay in our House of the Retro Future Suite! We love to hear you thought it was equivalent to a piece of art. A lot of planning and thought went into making our House of the Retro Suite an immersive experience full of clever details inspired by Disney's original House of Tomorrow. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel again soon!

Summary: We stayed in the tower on our Disneyland visit. Our room had been recently renovated and was very, very clean! The beds were new pillowtop mattresses, and bedding was crisp and clean. Each room is fogged between visitors with an industrial fogger, and we felt very safe. The staff was terrific, and best of all, we could see the Matterhorn and nightly fireworks from our patio! Will stay the next time we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! If any guest feels under the weather during their stay, as an extra precaution, we will utilize our Electric Static Spray after the guest has checked out. Aren't Disneyland's fireworks extra magical from your balcony at Hojo?! We can't wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Nice facility, below standard AC and unpredictable shower water temperature
Summary: The facility was very nice in appearance however the AC in the room did not work adequately and the shower water was very unstable from hot to cold without reason with was very challenging for kids to shower (very hot, the suddenly unexpected cold water) while taking a shower.
Manager Response: We are so saddened to hear that your AC and water temperature were inconsistent, next time be sure to alert our Front Desk Staff right away. This gives us the opportunity to fix any problems and ensure you receive a 5-star experience. We will be sure to share your comments with our Chief Engineer to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Despite this issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon during your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: It was clean, tidy, and an overall excellent environment! The staff was nice, the rooms were cozy, and everything that was listed for the room was present in the room! Would definitely book again! Maybe even the same room‚Ä¶
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our cozy, clean rooms and amenities. Please be sure to give us a call after booking to place a request for a similar room as what you stayed in. Our In-House Reservations team is friendly and happy to accommodate your family. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Staff was super friendly and helpful.  We needed a different room when we checked in and they helped us get everything worked out!  Our room was great and an easy walk to Disneyland.  Because of our flights we needed to check in early and leave later.  They were able to store our luggage for us!  Great stay!
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! We are so happy to hear that our Front Desk Staff was able to place you in your preferred room and store your luggage while you waited for your flight. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We can not speak highly enough about this property.   Most impressive was how positive, kind and helpful  the staff was, both in person and on the phone.  They were amazing!  The rooms are large, have a Keurig, small fridge, microwave and table for little ones to sit.   The beds are VERY comfortable.   It seems they have thought of everything to make your stay comfortable, including large trash bags - something I've not seen before.  While it states an 8 minute walk, please note - it is literally 2 stoplights from the Disney entrance.  Closer than Disney parking!  Additionally, while the property is right next to the freeway, there is NO outside noise (except FireWorks) once in your room.   The water parked was staffed with a lifeguard at all times.  We parked our car and had a
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled that our team made your visit special in person and with every interaction before your arrival. We're happy you appreciated our convenient Keurig machine, mini-refrigerator, microwave, and soft pillowy beds. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities suitable for your visit to the park. We are pleased you did not experience any freeway noise during your stay. We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: House keeping didn't come the 1st day The 2nd day they came but did the most subpar job possible. All they did was make the bed and put new towels down. They didn't toss any trash, didn't replace coffee cups, there was stuff left all over the bathroom counter, table, coffee area etc.  Was very disappointed.  The pillows are also awful and very uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address guests‚Äô negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. Our housekeeping services are automatically done after your second night. We greatly apologize that you did not receive a full-service cleaning.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Highly recommend for your next stay !
Summary: We have been staying here more often than ever. With being only 8 min from the park, it makes it so much easier for us! Being pregnant the last few visits, it was such ease to get to the parks! Nicole is who we communicate with frequently when booking our stay and she has been more than helpful each time. Always accommodating and helps us get the greatest rooms! Thank you again Nicole for being the greatest!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you would recommend our hotel! Thank you for leaving this review. Nicole is a pleasure to work with and we are so happy that she was able to make your visit to Disneyland easier. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Our reservation confirmation reminder email came the day before our visit, and it was short a day. I called and spoke with Kriss, the Reservation Supervisor. She reviewed the situation, found the error, and resolved it all while I was on the phone.  Kriss' customer service was superb.  We arrived at the hotel early and were able to check in early.  Everyone was wonderful at this hotel. Oh, the beds and pillows were excellent, like sleeping on clouds.  The room was excellent! Thank you again to the entire staff. Bravo!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We agree that Kriss' customer service skills are beyond superb, and we appreciate her quick problem-solving skills! Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: It was a good experience only complaint is about the fridge. There was no freezer compartment and didn‚Äôt even keep our things cold. A couple nice features was the way balcony was set up never experienced something like that. The tv had Netflix and we were able to watch good things which was a score! Didn‚Äôt have to flip through channels and see what‚Äôs on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you liked having Netflix on your TV and that you liked the balcony of your room. We apologize that the refrigerator did not get cold. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if there is anything that is not quite right with their room: we are happy to fix any issue that may occur. We will have our maintenance staff take a look at the refrigerator to ensure it gets cold for the next guest. Despite this minor issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We had a great stay here for my niece‚Äôs birthday. The staff was so friendly and the room was very nice with a fireworks view! I can‚Äôt say enough good things. The small little store also had a great selection of food and souvenirs. Short walk to the park was a real bonus too
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your niece's birthday. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Best hotel in the Harbor side theme park entrance area, all other hotels are outdated. We stayed in building one with a theme park view and it was totally worth it, first time in April we paid for this location second time we just happened to get it even though we only paid for building one (can‚Äôt wait to see the rest of the building get updated so everyone can enjoy how beautiful these updated rooms are). The updated rooms are worth it, they are huge and provide a microwave as well. In the new rooms I was told they provided a stool in the bathroom for our kiddos to have a little more independence using the restroom! The beds were so comfortable and extremely clean. For the location and how popular the hotel is you can‚Äôt see any trace of the rooms looking worn out or anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and positive feedback. It is great to hear that you stayed in one of our renovated rooms and appreciated our spacious, clean rooms. Buildings 1 and 2 are fully renovated, and we hope to have all buildings renovated in the future. We do provide step stools in our Kid Suites for our littlest guests! We love that of staff was cheerful and courteous during your stay. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, so thrilled to hear we were successful! We can't wait for your next stay with us!

Summary: We were in building 4‚Ä¶not renovated and old and the carpet smells gross. The room was fine despite being old as we really only slept there but for the price they charge our room should have been much much nicer. Front staff was very nice. Room only cleaned once‚Ä¶since when did dragging out Covid cleaning procedures just turn into a regular run of business??? We never made it to the water playground as it was too cool for it during our visit but it did look nice. Next Disney trip we will stay somewhere nicer. Proximity was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Our Housekeeping services are automatic after the second night with us, but you are more than welcome to request a full daily service by simply informing the Front Desk. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We loved our stay with Hojo! The hotel had super stylish room, the beds were comfortable and the convince of the distance from hotel to the parks were amazing! Would suggest hojo to anyone! Looking forward to staying there again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for referring HOJO to your family and friends! We are excited to hear you had such an exceptional stay with us. We love knowing you enjoyed our stylish and comfortable rooms. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Easy check-in and check-out. friendly and helpful staff (Arielle, Gabriella, Heather, Rick, Zack)  who provided extra towels and restaurant recommendations in the area. The rooms were spacious, clean and beds were very comfortable. Excellent location, easy walk to Disney
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear about your stay with us! Thank you for letting us know you had a 5 star experience. We love hearing that you enjoyed our spacious, clean and comfortable beds and location to Disney. Our fabulous staff members hope to welcome you and your family back soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland.
Summary: It is a short walk to Disneyland, I did not time it but it was probably less than 15 minutes.    The lady who checked us in was very helpful and friendly..  The room was clean, everything was great. I would highly recommend it if you are staying at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service.  We are happy to hear that our staff was very helpful and friendly during the check-in process. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed with Hojo in Anaheim multiple times with the first time being in 1989, then again from 2009. Most amazing location, the staff are always willing to help and are always professional, courteous and offer amazing customer service. I will always come back to Hojo Anaheim when I visit Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We love to hear that you stay with us whenever you visit Disneyland and that our location and customer service are reasons why you keep coming back. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great costumer service, clean room, great location
Summary: Each time we‚Äôve stayed here we‚Äôve had nothing but a great experience. This time was no exception. This was our first time  doing bag check at the hotel so we could head to the park before our room was ready. The worked out very well! Customer service was great, Christmas decorations were super cute, walk to the park is short and we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind words. It is wonderful to hear that you continue to have a great experience while staying with us. We are always more than happy to store luggage before our guaranteed check-in time so you can start your Disney day early. We are glad that you were able to take advantage of this. We hope to be your first accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The location is very convenient for visiting Disneyland and my kids really enjoyed the splash park. We ended up being upgraded to building 2, which was very nice and comfortable for our family of 4. It backs to the freeway but the sound proofing was impressive and we couldn‚Äôt hear a thing.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our Castaway Cove. We are so happy to hear you did not experience any highway noise. We are always working on improving our rooms, and we hope to have them all renovated soon. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Rooms were clean and decent sized.  Housekeeping is only done every other day and I‚Äôd prefer every day.   There was not a fitness center or a restaurant at the property which is a downside.   The location is walking distance to Disneyland and was an adequate place to stay
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you were pleased with the cleanliness and size of our rooms. While our Housekeeping services are automatically done on the 3rd day, guests can always request a full service done daily by requesting it at the Front Desk or by calling the Front Desk directly from your room. We greatly apologize that you were not made aware of this option. While we do not have a fitness center or a restaurant directly on the property, we are conveniently located across the street from Mimi's Cafe and have coupons available at the Front Desk. As well as multiple restaurants on Harbor Blvd. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Stayed here on our trip to Disney.
Summary: The room was clean. Very basic which is fine. The best thing about it was definitely the balcony. They don‚Äôt serve breakfast of any kind or even have coffee which was annoying. You also have to pay for parking each day and the spots are TINY. It was hard to park our suv. Overall it was fine.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We're happy that you enjoyed our clean rooms and balconies. While we don't serve breakfast, our Mid Mod Market is located in Building 1 with a variety of tasty grab & go snacks, including many breakfast options. We are also conveniently located right across the street from Mimi's Cafe with coupons available at the Front Desk. You also have the option of ordering online with any of the delivery services available such as Uber Eats, Postmates, Door Dash etc. Every room comes fully equipped with a microwave, mini-refrigerator, and a Keurig coffee machine. We are so sorry that you were not made aware of our amenities beforehand. While we do charge $20 a day plus tax for parking, we take pride in knowing we were one of the last hotels on Harbor Blvd to start charging for parking. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated.  We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for our 3-days in Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was a short 8 minute walk to the entrance gates of the park. We loved being able to go early in the morning and come back in the afternoon for a rest. The pool and hot tub were great! The grounds were so well cared for it felt like we were in a resort! Our room Building 1) was spacious and clean and we were able to see the fireworks from our balcony. The staff was friendly and helpful. Check in/out was easy and efficient. Loved the little store onsite for drinks, snacks, and even gifts.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you found our location to the Disneyland Resort convenient and easy. Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our pools, hot tub and Mid Mod Market in Building 1. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt count on using the hot tub!
Summary: The hotel was not as expected. Only Keurig coffee pods are supplied so I recommend bringing Keurig pods- tea, hot chocolate and apple cider for any non-coffee drinkers. Cutlery was accessible for free by asking at the gift shop; tea bags could be purchased either through the Marriott next door or from Pandura Bread. To access sugar, a whole sealed package of cream and napkins and a stir stick need to be destroyed, so save up your individual sugars packages and bring them with you.   Housekeeping services come into your room every third day. Period. You are responsible for emptying your garbage and refilling amenities and towels yourself.   The biggest disappointment was how CastaWay water park is currently managed. We deliberately chose this hotel because of the family friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give honest feedback on our hotel. We will be sure to mention your suggestions for supplying tea in our hotel to our housekeeping and gift shop managers. We do apologize the hot tub was closed for part of your stay. We have listened to your review, and we are excited to let you know the hot tub will be open for all future stays with us. We understand that having the hot tub open and accessible after a long Disney day is very welcomed. We sincerly hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family the next time you stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Overall really amazing experience. The staff were super friendly and made my 4 year old feel incredibly welcome. So much fun for the whole family. It was a lot of fun to go to the water park the next day after a full day of Disney fun the night before. Highly recommend
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear you had such an amazing experience staying with us! We are happy to know your whole family felt welcomed and that you all had so much fun at our Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Not what it use to be
Summary: The hotel room was great and the staff were wonderful I typically come here several times a year and there is always some kind of issue with the pools which is the highlight of coming to this specific hotel. This last time on our last full day the hot tub was closed- because of staffing. It was so cold that day so the hot tub was a must. This was a huge disappointment for the kids and they were crying at the pool.I don't know why with the new management there is a need to staff the gate rather than use your room key and manage our towels rather than close the hot tub. It seems like a small issue but it over all changes our trip and is a remembrance of annoyance rather than the crazy fun that it usually is. We came before the pandemic and during the pandemic- we understand that
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address guests‚Äô negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We've listened to our guests and are happy to announce that we've fully opened the hot tub at Castaway Cove. We understand that after a full day at Disney, a soak is just what the body and soul needs. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Great stay for 3 adults and 2 kids.  All the staff were super helpful and attentive. Our kids loved the water park and we loved the quiet room and comfortable accommodations. Super convenient for a Disneyland visit too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and attentive service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Location was perfect.  Hotel was extremely clean and staff were friendly and helpful.  Front desk was very helpful in changing my room as I had rented a scooter and needed a 1st floor room.  Front desk was also helpful on accepting and returning the scooter from their property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are delighted to hear our staff were friendly and that they were able to help you change your room to accommodate you and your family. Our Front Desk Staff always try their best to accommodate requests to suit our guest's needs. We hope to be your top choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at the Howard Johnson. You feel like family when checking in and the employees are all very kind when you call the front desk for anything. The property is easy to get around and they made it so fun during the holidays with Christmas decor. We stayed in building two which is newly renovated. The smell alone when you walk in is so refreshing. It was all around very comfortable, very well kept and perfect for walking to and from Disneyland each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments! We are so happy to know you felt welcomed during your stay with us. We love hearing that you enjoyed our Holiday decorations and location to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back to our HOJO family again soon!

Summary Heading: The HO JO is the best!!!
Summary: We had a great experience. Great customer service, comfy and clean room. Had a hard time getting out of bed because of how comfortable it was haha! Overall, very impressed. Can‚Äôt wait to stay there again. Highly recommend :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your love of HOJO in a review! We are delighted to hear about how comfortable our beds are. Good sleep is so important when you have a long day at Disneyland planned! We look forward to hosting you and your family again soon.

Summary: Great hotel. Close to Disney. My kids loved the water playground, even with the weather/temperature being 20-30 degrees lower than what we‚Äôre used to. Friendly staff. The room was great, we had the pool view and even had a view of the fireworks. Will definitely choose this hotel again the next time we plan a trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Love to see that you ‚Äúwill be back!‚Äù and stay with us again. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Our pools are open year-round and heated, so it's great that your kids were able to enjoy them comfortably. It‚Äôs also great that you were able to see the fireworks from your pool view room; while fireworks are not always visible from these rooms, we love that there was a little extra magic for your stay. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We came down to California to visit Disneyland and spend time with family from another part of Canada. They were accommodating with adjoining rooms, location to water park. Staff was always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your stay with us. It is great to see that we were able to accommodate adjoining rooms for you and that our staff was friendly and helpful during your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Just wanted to extend our thanks and appreciation to the staff at HoJo Wyndham in Anaheim. From check-in to check-out the service provided was friendly and professional. We wanted to especially recognize Nicole, front desk and Maria, hotel market, for going the extra mile to ensure our visit exceeded expectations. Prior to our trip we had a phone call with Nicole regarding our room needs and accommodations and what to expect for our stay. We couldn't have been more pleased with our room location and the fact that we had connecting rooms for our daughter and grandson. We understand this is not always a guarantee but feel  Nicole was instrumental in the outcome.   Maria, went above the call of her position.  We were looking for a small token to take back for our grandsons class of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that Nicole was able to get the perfect room for you and that Maria went above and beyond to find a Mickey pencil for you. We are dedicated to provide exceptional service, so it is great to hear that we were successful. We hope you stay with us again during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Nicest Staff! Upgrade rooms are beautiful! Only complaint is that we couldn't stay longer. Room was super clean, beds were very comfortable.  The double sinks in the bathroom double A plus!  Can't wait until our next trip!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. Thank you for the perfect score! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Awesome staff, clean rooms, convenient store and great water park for the kids. Wish the wifi was stronger but excellent experience overall. We stayed in Oct for the first time and just recently in Nov, we plan on returning in April.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so saddened to hear your internet connection was inconsistent, next time be sure to alert our Front Desk Staff right away. This gives us the opportunity to fix any problems and ensure you receive a 5-star experience. Despite this small issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights with 2 rooms with this hotel. I booked one of our rooms directly with the hotel and the other with a discount travel website. We needed those rooms next to each other and after realizing my mistake with only a few days notice I called in and spoke to Jennifer at the front desk. She was so kind and matched my urgency, while they didn't promise me anything they made it happen. When we arrived Arielle at the front desk was so kind and helpful with many questions and so personable she even remembered us upon checkout. The staff here really was exceptionally kind and we appreciated it so much. Our rooms were perfect! The hotel was clean and so close to Disneyland. We had 3 young kids with us and an adult with some disabilities and being that close made the stay for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback!  Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The room was spacious and clean, although the heating unit was loud.  The shower water fluctuated drastically from wanted temperature to extreme hot - hot enough to burn a child - to cold then to set temperature again.  It did this several times during multiple showers.  One morning, very early, there was a continuous knocking sound or as if someone was working in the hall.   Housekeeping staff were excellent and attentive to room. Only visited the water park 1 day during our stay due to weather temperature and the staff at the pool was friendly and helpful. Grandkids enjoyed the water fun until they got cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We apologize that the water temperature in your room would fluctuate during your stay. We will make sure to have this fixed by our Maintenance Team. We always encourage our guests to let us know if there is anything not quite right in their room. We are happy to fix any issues that may pop up. However, we are delighted that you found our staff to be friendly and that your grandkids enjoyed our water playground. We hope to host you again for your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: Wonderful, Amazing experience, clean, comfortable, secure and safe. Friendly staff who assisted with any frequents with ease. We will definitely be back. Thank you so much for an amazing stay. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are beyond thrilled that you felt safe during your highly amazing stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great hotel. Centrally located. The pool and water park looked great but unfortunately the weather didn‚Äôt cooperate. We would definitely recommend this hotel. The coffee station was great for the morning and they didn‚Äôt skimp. Fridge was great for storing some treats.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are thrilled that you would recommend our hotel! We are so glad that the Keurig coffee maker in your room helped to jump-start your morning. We hope that you stay with us again to get to use our pool and water playground.

Summary: Once again this hotel did not disappoint.  Do not be fooled by the name.  This is a top rate hotel.  The pools were both operating even though it was only 55F.  My kids are crazy.  This hotel is literally just 3 literal blocks to Disneyland and California adventure.  The hotel has an amazing grocery store in Buiilding one that we enjoyed too buy snacks, souvineers, etc.  Our room was in building 2 room 224.  We had a very large room that was wheelchair accessible.  We loved the space, wifi, mini refrig, and microwave in the room.
Manager Response: We absolutely love to welcome back our loyal guests! We are thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel for Disneyland vacations because of our location, rooms and pools. Thank you so much for your kind comments, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Leisure trip with a five day stay
Summary: We have stayed at all the Disney owned properties at Disneyland this hotel is less expensive by far several nice places to eat close by and a very short and safe walk to the Disney park. We stayed in building one with a park view highly recommend this hotel. Will never stay anywhere else if this hotel is available.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and views from your park view room! We hope to always be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We would have loved to have stayed longer! Property was in prestine condition (room was uber clean!) and everyone of the staff members were friendly and helpful. A short walk to Disneyland (bring a stroller!) - we have a 3 and 6 year old.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and staff friendly and helpful. We hope to see you for your next Disney trip, and hopefully for a longer stay!

Summary Heading: An Exceptional Hotel in Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed at the Howard Johnsons in Anaheim for four nights in mid-October. I had a great stay. The Disneyland decor and water park made it feel like we were staying on Disney property. The housekeeping staff was exceptional. My room was very clean. I have nothing but great memories of staying at your hotel. I will definitely be staying there again. Thank you very much! It's nice to see the magic of the parks at your hotel. Also, thank you for the 20% off coupon for Mimi's. They have a great staff working there, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and positive feedback. We are so delighted to hear you and your family had great memories at our hotel and that you would stay with us again.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Disneyland home base - great place for some down time!
Summary: Check in was easy and staff were friendly, polite and helpful (...and...I was offered a ballon sword).  Our booked room was not ready but an alternate was immediately provided and we were checked in without delay.  The room was clean, well appointed, bright and great overall.  The waterpark was not exactly what we were expecting between it and the pool it was a relaxing way to spend a pre-Disneyland afternoon.  We loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review. It is great to see that we were able to get you into a room before our guaranteed check in time. While it is not guaranteed, if we have a room ready we are happy to give an early check-in. It is also great to hear that our hotel was perfect for your pre-Disneyland day and that you also enjoyed the balloon swords we hand out at the Front Desk. We hope to see you for your next Disney trip!

Summary: I stayed at the Howard Johnson for a work trip. The room was clean and well kept. The property is currently decorated for the holidays and it was fun to see their different displays.
