I love how close the hotel is to Disneyland and is a quick 8 minute walk. The staff at the front desk were very helpful and knowledgeable. I will definitely be back next time I‚Äôm in Anaheim, CA.
Manager Response: Thank you for trying out hotel out for a work trip. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and liked our holiday decorations. It is also nice to hear that our staff was helpful during your stay. We hope to be your top choice of accommodates in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Kris and Nicole are so wonderful!
Summary: I‚Äôve been working with the Howard Johnson reservation team, Kris and Nicole, with getting several trips planned in advance, and they have been so cheerful, positive, and helpful EVERY time they have assisted me. I love when they pick up the phone and get right down to business in helping me with our vacations! Definitely professional and knowledgeable.  Great job Ladies!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations! We're pleased to know that our In-House Reservations team made your current & future visits special. Our In-House Reservations teams definitely take a lot of stress away when planning vacations, even down to transportation needs! Isn't their positivity so infectious?! Can't wait for the planning to begin for the next vacation!

Summary: The HoJo Anaheim was amazing for us!  This was our first visit to Disneyland and the Anaheim area and we were greeted by a very friendly and helpful staff at the front desk.  We stayed in the newly renovated building two and loved the room!  It was spacious and so clean.  We agreed that the attention to detail, cleanliness, and theming of the room was very similar to resorts on Disney property at Walt Disney World in Florida.  The walk to Disneyland was so quick and easy to navigate.  We also got engaged on this trip, and our parents organized a bottle of champagne, balloons, and chocolate to get delivered to our room from the hotel gift shop.  The ladies in the gift shop did a fantastic job!  We will absolutely be back at the HoJo for our next Anaheim trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms. Here at Hojo, no detail is too small. Thank you for appreciating the theme and artworks of our rooms. We would like to congratulate you on your engagement, and wishing you a lifetime of joy, love, and happiness.

Summary: We really enjoyed the hotel and had a great experience! Check in was quick and easy and they were even able to accommodate an early check in, which was unexpected, but very appreciated! The room was very clean and spacious. All hotel employees were extremely professional and courteous. The walk to Disneyland was quick and easy, with many restaurant options along the way for a quick bite to eat. It was close enough to come back to the hotel for mid-day naps for the kiddos. We will definitely stay here again. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review. It is great to hear that we were able to accommodate an early check-in for you. While it is not guaranteed, we are happy to give you keys if we have a room available early. We love that our staff was professional and courteous during your stay and that our location was close for you to walk to Disney and nearby restaurants. We hope to be your top choice of accommodation in Anaheim.

Summary: Love it! It was amazing property big rooms for our family suite and nice clean property. Will come again soon. It was just mind blowing to say the least. The daughter loved the water slides area It was great fun!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation. See you at Castaway Cove!

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Security was good. Cleanliness of the beds, rooms, bathroom was great! Beds were very comfortable as well as the size of the room. Staff was friendly & very accomodating. However, the internet was almost non existent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We are so saddened to hear your internet connection was inconsistent, next time be sure to alert our Front Desk Staff right away. This gives us the opportunity to fix any problems and ensure you receive a 5-star experience. Despite this small issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: I loved my room, the coffee, and Gretchen at the front desk was a pleasure! The mattress was super comfy and the room was clean, well stocked, and quiet. Free coffee, free breakfast, waffles, and close to everywhere I needed to go.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are very happy to hear that you've received great service from Gretchen and enjoyed your room. However, it appears that you might have left a review for the wrong hotel. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland or California vacation!

Summary: Everything was great! The hotel I‚Äôd a short walk to Disneyland. The area is safe, many restaurants near by. The room is large with comfy bed, nice table is big enough for 4 to sit around. The room was clean and cleaned every other day.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. Don't forget the 20% off coupon for Mimi's Cafe for your next stay. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: We had a great time here. Super close to the parks and lots of food options! We had just arrived early in the morning from an overnight flight and they accommodated us checking in early which we were so so grateful for!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled an early check-in was available during your stay with us! We're happy to know that our team made your visit special and that you enjoyed our location to Disneyland and many restaurants. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay across from Disneyland
Summary: Staff was super friendly and helpful from the moment we arrived. Check-in was a delight! We stayed in two  adjoined rooms to accomate our family. The rooms were very comfortable, clean, and quiet. We really enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Super nice and clean hotel close to the parks!
Summary: We love the HOJO Anaheim! The hotel is always so clean. The rooms are spacious and great for a family of four. The staff is very polite and helpful. Our kids love the pool and pirate ship amenities! We like to end our nights there or our mid day breaks from the parks. I also love the newly designed rooms!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to hear that our room was the perfect size for your family of 4 and that your kids loved our Castaway Cove. It is also nice to know that our staff was helpful during your stay. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We had a great stay! We stayed for a family trip to Disneyland and it was great! The staff were all very friendly and helpful. Check-in was easy and quick. We were in Tower 2 and the rooms are nice and clean and recently renovated. Beds were comfortable. It‚Äôs a great location to the parks with places for a quick breakfast along the way.   They also have a great little gift shop for snacks and other helpful things. Maria in the gift shop was super friendly and helpful! She went above and beyond to help us out, thank you so much!   Splash park looked great but we didn‚Äôt have time to use it. Our friends did and their kids loved it! Next time we come back we will plan a pool day. Definitely will be staying here again!
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a great stay at our hotel! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms and location to the Disneyland Resort. It is always nice to know our friendly staff went above and beyond to make you all feel welcome and taken care of. Maria is a fabulous staff member, and we are so grateful to have her! We hope to welcome you back again soon so you can relax and play at our Cast Away Cove water playground. Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience.

Summary: Located near Disneyland and some family restaurants.  Spacious room, closet and bathroom.  Pool enjoyed by grandchildren. Reception staff helpful for arranging transportation.  Having a small convenience store was very handy.  Would recommend to other travelers to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! It is always great to hear about our guests' experiences. We are delighted that you enjoyed your spacious room, family our friendly pools and convenient Mid Mod Market in Building 1. We hope to welcome your family back to HOJO again soon!

Summary: From the minute we checked in to the day we checked out, the staff were amazing.  The rooms were clean and bright!  The waterpark was great for my kids (ages 1-6) and the property was extremely close to Disneyland.  Overall was a great experience and we will definitely be going back!
Manager Response: It's great to hear our staff made your visit to Anaheim amazing from check-in to check-out! We were happy to host you and your family in our clean rooms, and we are thrilled to know your kids loved our Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Howard Johnson is number one in service cleanliness and comfort. We love everything about this hotel. We enjoy playing in the water playground, The lighting in the bathroom is phenomenal and the air conditioning is superior!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We love hearing that our staff provided 5 star service during your stay. Hopefully you come back soon to enjoy our Cast Away Cove water playground and clean, comfortable rooms!

Summary: Staffing shortages affecting amenities available, so if you expect all the amenities you‚Äôll be highly disappointed. Hot tub was out for majority of our trip due to staff shortages. Housekeeping staff does not meet a high cleanliness rating at all, our bathroom had gobs of body wash that were even requested to be cleaned when they came back to no avail- I ended up cleaning it myself. Overall I‚Äôd suggest booking across the street, the walk to park was nice and short and front staff were great but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend to anyone I know or go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write an honest review about your stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and location to the Disneyland Resort. We do apologize the hot tub was closed for most of your stay. For the safety of our Guests, we require a lifeguard to monitor our hot tub at all times.  Due to staff shortages, we were unable to staff that location at that time. We are excited to say, we have hired more water park facility attendants, and we are training them to be lifeguard certified with the hope that we will not have to shut the hot tub down. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and we did not get the chance to follow through with your request. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address Guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Great location with a retro vibe.  Staff was very friendly and attentive.  Crew at pool and waterpark excellent as well.  Hotel and grounds were very clean and well kept.  Definitely a fun spot to stay if you're not into paying out-of-sight prices at the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us. It sounds like you had a fabulous Birthday visit to our hotel! We are so delighted to hear you enjoyed our retro vibe, clean property and water playground. We also love to hear that all of our Staff was friendly and attentive during your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Stayed here from 11/4-11/8 and right from the start, Logan was such a pleasure to work with. He welcomed us at the front desk, gave us recommendations around the area and checked on us the very next day! We surprised a family member who moved here for college amd they accommodated us for that. Very hospitable. Room was clean. Bathroom was clean (yay for double sinks) and it was quiet. HIGHLY recommend for this traveling with kids and need a place close to Disneyland! Would come back again in a heartbeat! Thanks Logan and HOJO Team!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you and your family and that you enjoyed our clean rooms and location to Disneyland. Thank  you for sharing your experience with our Front Desk Staff, Logan. We also think Logan is a perfect addition to our hospitable, HOJO Team! We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We had a great stay. The hotel is very very clean and nice! The hotel's water park was our kids favorite part of the Disneyland trip - lol. We had a family suite - my one suggestion is to make sure if you book a family suite - that the main door opens to the parents room and not the kids room. This made swapping with the grandparents (who were baby sitting) and not waking the kid a bit tricky when we wanted a night out.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us and that your children loved our Cast Away Cove water playground. Our water playground is the perfect spot to relax and play while taking a break from the Disneyland parks. Thank you for your positive suggestion for our Kid Suites. . We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Close to Disneyland with very average service. They recently started charging for parking and they do NOT do daily housekeeping ‚Äî even if you request it. Hot tub was closed during our stay. That would have been nice after being on our feet all day at the park. Will look elsewhere for our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We do apologize the hot tub was closed for most of your stay. For the safety of our Guests, we require a lifeguard to monitor our hot tub at all times.  Due to staff shortages, we were unable to staff that location at that time. We are excited to say, we have hired more water park facility attendants, and we are training them to be lifeguard certified with the hope that we will not have to shut the hot tub down. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: This hotel was amazing.Staff are so friendly and helpful (special mention to Nicole) she was so helpful in what could have been a very stressful situation.  The hotel is so clean and spacious.  Great pool areas.  Highly recommend so close to Disneyland, and lots of surrounding restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our cleanliness and open layout. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great location for Disney.  Good size room for family of 3 adults and 2 children. They also accommodated holding bags on check out free of charge for park visit. Very welcoming. Would recommend and would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that you and your family enjoyed our spacious rooms. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities, such as our complimentary baggage check, convenient for your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a Disney visit
Summary: Perfect location for visiting the Disney parks, within walking distance. Room was clean and comfortable. Staff were great. Summer ended up checking us in and out and remembered us and was absolutely lovely. We had a fantastic holiday here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying here and in building 1 but it was our first time being on the 7th floor. My daughter loved the high ceilings and the natural sunlight in the room. The staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning you next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Sorry to say but i love the hotel only the front desk that help us checking in is not to welcome. We are tired in our trip due to mostly 8hrs and they not even so welcome to us. They should greet us but never. Frontdesk on evening shift are kinda rude. Hope next time i come it would be better.
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We apologize for the service you received from our Front Desk Staff. W will be addressing this with our staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated.  We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: This is our go to hotel when we come to Disneyland.   Always clean, staff super friendly, lots of parking and easy walk to Disney.  Didn‚Äôt use the pool or water play area this time but our grandkids love them. Also nice having the small store for last minute items.  A few years ago when we lost our home in a wildfire, they gave us the family and friends rate which was so considerate.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary Heading: Best staff in a long time!
Summary: Well, let me tell you about one of the best hotel stays I have had in a while. Not only were the rooms clean and sanitized, the staff amazing. Everyone had a smile and a hello from the front desk to the mantainis workers! That was great to see after covid. I have to say Gabriella at the front desk, and Keven at the pool were top notch. I WIll stay here in the future. Thank you for everything!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience staying with us! We are so delighted to hear your enjoyed our clean rooms and attentive staff. We truly think Gabriella and Kevin are top notch too! We hope to welcome you and your family again soon.

Summary: Stayed there 3 nights total and my room was never cleaned. We ran out of towels and when I called to ask for more they took more than 30 mins to deliver. I needed to shower before check out time, so I had to drag my toddler and 5 yr old down to the pool area to grab pool towels. Was never made aware that there was break fast? The water park makes it look appealing but if you‚Äôre here for Disneyland, don‚Äôt pay extra for this hotel as you will most likely not use the water park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We are so saddened to hear that we did not meet the cleanliness standards that we expect. We truly apologize that our housekeeping failed to service your room and did not deliver towels to you in a timely manner. This is something we will bring up with our Executive Housekeeper to assure this is addressed with our Housekeeping Staff. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you and your family better in the future.

Summary: Such a fun hotel! The water park looked like so much fun, when I come back I will bring my kids to enjoy the cove as well as the pool. Already planning another trip back to the hojo after only being home two days!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know you had such a fun time that you are already planning to come back and stay with us! We LOVE welcoming loyal guests back to our Hotel. We hope next time you visit us, you plan a day to relax and play at both our Cast Away Cove water playground, and our Garden Pool. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice clean room with short walk to park.
Summary: Nice clean room. The building we stayed in was recently remodeled and it was evident by the pristine shape everything was in . We liked the attention to security as you were not able to enter the pool area without a staff member allowing you in and checked against a wrist band issued at check in.  The walk was less than 7 7 mins to Disneyland entrance . Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are so glad that you appreciated our location, recently renovated buildings, and enhanced security measures for both pools and buildings. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: Loved this hotel & pool from the excellent front desk customer service to the nice layout of the rooms and a fun pool area for adults & kids to enjoy. Close walk to Disneyland with many convenient restaurants along the way. Highly recommend here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to see you again at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: I stayed here in April and October this year. Love this hotel! The walk to Disneyland is short which is so nice. The rooms are spacious and CLEAN. I stayed in building 2 both trips and the rooms are recently renovated. Very cute retro decor. Every staff member I encountered was friendly and helpful.  They have a cute gift shop with all the essentials. We were able to check in early which is a HUGE plus in my book.   Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback. We are glad you appreciated our retro decor, spacious and clean rooms. While early check-in isn't guaranteed, we will be more than happy to check you in if we have your room type readily available. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: The BEST Hotel Ever - 5 STARS! Family approved!
Summary: This hotel is AMAZING! 5 stars from us! I stayed with my family. I have two little ones. The staff is so friendly. The hotel is so nice and clean. The beds are the comfiest beds I‚Äôve ever slept in at a hotel. The sheets are SO SOFT! Only a 7 minute walk from Disneyland. I will be staying here everytime we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! It's almost impossible to get out of bed when you're staying at Hojo with our soft feathery pillows and immaculate sheets. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: My family found this hotel an amazing place to stay, friendly helpful staff, nice lay out, clean, nice pool and Disney is a 5 minute walk away. We will be staying again on our next visit to Anaheim and Disney land.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our amenities, location, and friendly staff. We can't wait to see you again at the Garden Pool!

Summary Heading: Great location, really great for young kids
Summary: Great property, 10 minutes walk to Disney entrance.  Great kids water playground!  Really nice people , especially Ariel and Summer.  Our second stay in 4 months. McDonalds and Panera are close by. FYI no restaurant on site, but rooms have small refer, coffee and microwave
Manager Response: Welcome back to HOJO Anaheim! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay, and we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground and our location to many restaurants. We love hearing that Arielle and Summer were friendly during your stay! We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great experience, Logan and the rest of staff are unmatched in their ability to deliver.
Summary: Overall, the hotel was excellent and any complaints I might find would not be due to the hotel should I want to nitpick. The people we came across were all helpful and just genuinely happy which is always nice. I do have to call out Logan, who checked us in. His ability to deliver a positive experience is unmatched. If he were in my state, I would have tried to poach him to work for me, being engaging and informative, and his knowledge, insight, and positive outlook were welcoming. We had an amazing experience and will happily return!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you really enjoyed Logan's five star service. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We will make sure to share your comments with both Logan and upper management. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Three generations travelled together and all of us enjoyed the hotel.  Staff in all areas of the facility were friendly, helpful and welcoming.  The rooms were large and clean and the beds were extremely comfortable.  The grandchildren absolutely loved the water play park.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We hope to host you and your family again in the future!

Summary: We visit SoCal several times through out the year, usually to go to Disneyland.  Over the years we have stayed at quite a few hotels near DL, but our family‚Äôs absolute favorite hotel is the Howard Johnson and Water Park in Anaheim.  We only stay here at this point.   It is extremely clean and bright, and the grounds are always well taken care of. We have stayed in Buildings 1 and 2, and these are Newly remodeled and very spacious. I highly suggest to stay in the Pirates Suite Atleast one time!  I‚Äôm not the kind of person who says ‚Äúwho care about the room, I‚Äôll be in Disneyland the majority of the time‚Äù. No, I like to take breaks, explore the hotels, have a good nice sleep , and the HoJo checks off all of the above.  It‚Äôs walkable to Disneyland Resort (10 min with stroller),
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so excited to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so pleased to hear we were successful! We will be sharing your kind praise with both Nicole and upper management. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We hope to see you at the Castaway Cove soon!

Summary: park proximity is great, about the only good thing clean rooms, a bit outdated carpets in hallway strong cannabis odor in 3rd floor from another room and into hallway and into our room no hot water in hotel to make coffee, we had to cross the street and go to Marriot which provided hot water for our french press jacuzzi was closed off due to no lifeguard availability (2 instead of 3 staff were needed), this was very frustrating and dissappointing hotel did not allow guests into our pool area even if not bathing, this was ridiculous and not a good business practice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location. We greatly apologize for the odor in the hallway. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We are a smoke-free property, meaning there is no smoking in the rooms or balconies. As soon as we are notified of a smoking odor, we have a team sent up to investigate further to locate the source of the smell. We apologize that we were unable to investigate this for you. We are thrilled to hear that you were able to utilize our sister property's amenities for your french press. We have bottled water available for purchase at our Mid Mod Market to use for the Keurig machine that is in every room. We greatly apologize for being short staffed in our aquatics department, which results in some pool restrictions. Our guest's safety is our top priority here at Hojo, and we want to ensure our guests of all ages are safe while they enjoy our family-friendly amenities. We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to provide a similar experience is never repeated. If you come back to Anaheim, we hope you will give us another shot to ensure that we give you the best experience possible.

Summary: This was my experience in building 5 room 208. Firstly, there were two huge dome windows that let in an insane amount of light at night. It was so bright you could read a book. Secondly, the building and room had such a strong pungent odor. Additionally, the noise from the highway was incredibly loud and noticeable. The shower gel and conditioner were all filled with water, the bathroom floor was covered in hair, and the towels and pillows had random eyelashes on them. Overall, the only benefit was the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and that there was a smell in the building and your room. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience and have brought your comments to the attention of our Executive Housekeeper to ensure this a similar experience is not repeated.  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We have loved the HOJO for years! The friendliest staff, comfiest beds and a short walk back and forth to Disneyland. The rooms in building 1 and 2 have been renovated. We love the retro and Disney decor too!
Manager Response: We absolutely love our long-time guests! Thank you so much for taking the time share your love of HOJO in a review. We are thrilled to hear our friendly staff were welcoming and that you always enjoy our comfy beds and location to Disneyland Resort. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This is our third time staying Howard Johnson Anaheim and we are so so happy! It‚Äôs our home away from home hotel. We walked to Disneyland all 8 days of our trip! It was a super short 7-8 minute walk and there was lots of food options along the way. The rooms are beautiful and clean! I have two little kids so the pool/pirates cove is a MUST! Highly recommend! Check out our Instagram to see some videos of the room!   Instagram - Misterandmizz
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We love welcoming repeat guests to our hotel and we are so happy to hear we were the perfect location for your 8 day vacation. We hope to host you and your family the time you visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Excellent service, super clean, very comfortable beds and superb location to walk (10-minute) to Disneyland. Pools are great for families with children The staff are very friendly and customer satisfaction oriented. We recommend the Howard Johnson to all and will have no hesitation returning on our next Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our comfortable beds, family friendly pools and location to Disneyland. We are happy to know that our staff were friendly and that they provided excellent service during your stay. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel soon!

Summary: This was our first stay at the Howard Johnson Anaheim and it did not disappoint!  It almost felt like an extension of Disneyland. Very close to the entrance. The staff were all so pleasant and nice to deal with. The rooms were updated and clean. We had  3 rooms, 5 adults and 3 children. Would not hesitate to stay there again. The water park was a great way to take a break from Disneyland and cool off. The kids loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving our hotel a try and sharing your recent experience with us! We are happy to hear you and your family had a great stay and that you enjoyed our location to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Very happy with our stay at HoJo
Summary: Our family has been to Disneyland many times but this was our first time staying at the Howard Johnson hotel and it did not disappoint. First, the front desk staff were very helpful, checked us in quickly, and made sure we knew the route to walk to Disneyland, as well as restaurants nearby. We were given a map just in case with recommended restaurants that came with some coupons, we ended up using the one for Mimi‚Äôs cafe. The room was adorable my 3 year old son loved the frame pictures of Mickey Mouse that went with the theme of our stay. We really liked the small table and bench for meals that also came with little stools to add for extra seating. The beds were extremely comfortable and overall a great room. I got the city view with the intention to watch Disney fireworks from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Clean,  friendly,  and  peaceful.  Easy  access  to  park.  Quick  and  friendly  check-in.  No  hassle  check-out‚Ä¶.  Pool and  water park  clean and nice. Will stay here again next trip to Disneyland! üòä
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay!  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us, we are delighted you found our property clean, friendly and peaceful. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay outside the Park!
Summary: Early check-in was a plus since we landed on the redeye. 2nd floor room with arching windows let in lots of natural light in the AM (and PM). Clean, simple, retro-cool. Smartest and easiest choice to make for lodging!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the skylight windows on the top floor of your building. We also agree, and we think the skylights make the rooms look brighter and bigger. We hope you come back to enjoy our retro-cool hotel again soon!

Summary Heading: HoJo is the place to go!
Summary: I love staying at HoJo. I can‚Äôt imagine spending my Disney Trips anywhere else. The staff is always amazing and the rooms are clean. The house keeping staff goes above and beyond. I wish there was room service but the location is so close to everything that it‚Äôs SO worth it. We‚Äôve also successfully used door dash üëç. I‚Äôd like to give a special shout out to Rick. He was working during this stay and some of my previous trips and it‚Äôs always a delight to see him. He has a genuine smile and is super helpful. He definitely contributes to HoJo‚Äôs home-away-from-home vibe.
Manager Response: We love welcoming our longtime, loyal HOJO guests! Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and for always choosing our location next to Disneyland. We are delighted to hear our Staff are genuine and helpful. Rick is a wonderful member of our Front Desk Staff! We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary: The overall hotel stay was decent. The room was clean and the distance from the park makes it very easy to access. As far as the amenities they are very few. They do not have a gym and no restaurant options outside of their convenient store. When the water park is working its the main reason you‚Äôd stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground and location to the Disneyland Parks. We are grateful for your feedback and your comments will continue to help us improve. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: We came to Disneyland California for our honeymoon from the UK.   Our stay at Howard Johnson was brilliant from start to finish. We were welcomed with a lovely honeymoon hamper and the staff were so lovely. It is located so close to Disneyland and a quick walk home after a long day in the parks. We also came back during the day for a rest and pool breaks and the location meant we didn't miss out on any time, we could just relax and enjoy our stay.   The beds are so comfortable and the bathrooms are so good with two sinks which makes it so easy to get ready in the morning. There is a fridge, microwave and coffee machine in the room. The fridge in the room was also so handy and there is enough storage in the room to unpack and store clothes. We stayed in the refurbished building
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. Thank you for choosing Howard Johnson to celebrate your Honeymoon. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Fantastic family friendly hotel for your Disneyland vacation
Summary: We loved our stay at the HOJO in Anaheim! It was clean, spacious and had everything my family of 4 needed! The staff was absolutely wonderful and so helpful every step of the way. It really is so close to Disneyland - less than 10 minutes walking!! The grounds are beautiful and the pool is so fun! We will definitely be staying here again the next time we come to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean rooms, short walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: My family stayed in the brand new retro suite. This room is always booked so we got lucky to finally snag the reservation. My mom, The group in the 60s was very impressed with the authentic decor which included a working record player. The room was spacious enough for five of us and the best part was that it was just a six minute walk to Disneyland. Since my mom has a bad hip that was perfect. The staff definitely helped with suggestions and bringing that Disney magic to the entire vacation. We will definitely be back for Christmas time at the Hojo .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We can't wait to see you during the most magical time of the year!

Summary Heading: House of the Retro Future a must stay
Summary: We stayed in the retro future suite which is a newly decorated and designed room. it it was amazing my husband and I have had an extreme fondness for the Monsanto house of the future attraction that was in Disneyland in the early 60s and visited it often and dreamed about our future which pretty much came to be.  so when this room opened my son was really excited that we should stay there and boy was it worth it. It‚Äôs decorated so beautifully and it makes you feel like you are living in that house of the future. I think it would be worth a visit if you remember the attraction and you had a fondness for it because it is decorated and designed so perfectly. Everything detail is ‚Äúspot on‚Äù. Our entire stay in was excellent from every person that we met to every detail when we first
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us in our new House of the Retro Future!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. We are thrilled to hear that no detail was left undiscovered. We will make sure to share your comments regarding Summer with our management team. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Very helpful staff, and nice clean rooms. Brought us a cot late at night when we realized we would need one. Pool was perfect. We have older kids so they weren‚Äôt as interested in Castaway Cove but we went to the Garden Pool as much as possible! We were able to see the fireworks from there too on the weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your family got to enjoy our fun Garden Pool. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Was told at the last minute that they had to downsize our family double room reservation to a non family single room due to a water leak. Was not happy with them. They did give us a discount but our room was crowded.  Also they only had 2 washers working out of 5 for the 6 buildings on the property.  Wished they had breakfast on premises.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. Due to an unexpected pipe burst, we had to shut the water off in your building. We are sorry that the Front Desk agent helping you did not fully explain this. We will ensure to retrain our staff on always informing our guests when there is a water shut-off and providing other alternatives. I'm sorry to hear that you were not happy about the room move but pleased to hear we were able to offer you a discount. We understand this isn't an ideal start to your Disneyland vacation, but we hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: The best beds! We loved everything about our hotel. The staff was friendly and amazing, the renovated rooms are gorgeous. We slept amazing and felt very safe and comfortable. I will book here for my next vacation to Anaheim  moving forward.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: Hotel was great! Hotel staff is very helpful. Service was excellent. I would highly recommend for families. It‚Äôs also a convenient location near Disney and the price was right. The only thing that would make it better is a bigger pool but aside from that, perfect hotel.
Manager Response: It is fantastic that you would recommend our hotel and found our staff helpful with excellent customer service. We are dedicated to providing exceptional service; we are thrilled to hear we were successful! We have 2 water facilities at our hotel. I hope that you were able to use our Castaway Cove Water Playground as well as our regular swimming pool, Garden Pool. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our Disneyland vacation. It is a simple 8 minute walk to the park and is surrounded but restaurants (Mimi's, Panera, and Mcdonalds). The staff was courteous and very helpful. The room was clean and the beds were comfy. The room had a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. There is a water playground and another pool separate on a different part of the property. Our son enjoyed the water playground, heck even we enjoyed the water playground. We will definitely be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and that YOU also had a great time at our water playground. We are glad we had everything you needed, from the amenities in the room to the short walk to Disneyland. We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I thought we had a reservation here, but we actually had it at another Howard Johnson location close by. However, the staff was still so incredible I had to say thanks! We had a NIGHTMARE situation at a Good Nite Inn, I called the front desk about an early check in so we could escape asap. Nicole was not only friendly and helpful, but so empathetic to the situation and offered us some coupons to a nearby cafe to relax and have a better morning. I can‚Äôt express how much this kindness helped our terrible morning. It was truly incredible customer service. She‚Äôs a keeper, don‚Äôt lose this employee!! Thank you Nicole and Kris for making our trip not end on a sour note. We will forever be loyal patrons of this company now all because of Nicole.
Manager Response: Thank you daleenel for your kind comments and amazing feedback. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, so we are thrilled to hear that Nicole was able to make your morning better. We hope that you get stay with us in the future!

Summary: This was the first time I've been to this hotel with my partner and let me tell you it was phenomenal! The hotel is great, cost is affordable, close to Disneyland, and the staff is amazing (shout out to Zach, Go Ducks!)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation. We are so thrilled to hear you and your partner had such a great time and really enjoyed our location. We hope to see you the next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Wish there would have been a freezer in our room. Loved the water park. Pool could have been heated more. Perfect distance from Disneyland. The internet connection was poor and not secure. We would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are delighted you loved our water park and that we are a perfect distance to Disneyland. We apologize for the poor internet connection. We understand how much of an inconvenience this is, and we truly apologize. We have two computers for Guest use at our lobby that may be used between 6am to midnight while our lobby is open. Nonetheless, we will share your comments with our management. We are also sorry that the mini-fridge in your room did not have a freezer. Next time, if you need items to be stored in a freezer like medicine or ice-packs, please let our Front Desk Staff know. We have options for these. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: The beds were comfortable but there was some random blood that wasn‚Äôt mine on the bottom of the comforter of my bed. The staff came and took care of it immediately which I appreciated. The ac worked well, but the door would whistle underneath when the unit was running so we had to put pillows on the floor. The automatic light of the bathroom kept turning on in the middle of the night until we covered the sensor with a post it note. TV check out didn‚Äôt work but that was fine because we had to walk past the front desk to leave. The staff at the front desk refused to let the second person on our room check in despite being told that she was clear to by another staff at the front desk previously so that was kind of a pain but we did understand it was a safety thing. Just make sure
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the comforter and AC unit. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping and Maintenance Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you for your understanding of our security protocols regarding issuing keys to guests whose names are not on the reservation. We take our guest's security and privacy very seriously, so we greatly appreciate your understanding of this security measure. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Can‚Äôt say enough GOOD about this hotel! The staff was all friendly and accommodating!!! Arrived earlier than check-in they kept our luggage so we could go ahead and get to Disneyland. The rooms are very cute and mind blowing clean! Bathrooms, floors sheets were all very clean.  The balcony rooms are the best view for fireworks at Disney if the littles get tired. We had a better firework view than if we were standing in the park honestly. This will be our second year to stay here! We had surprise baskets delivered for kiddo and they had them ready in the room when we were able to check in. This year I spoke with Nicole and she was SO KIND in making the notes for the surprise birthday cake ordered to be delivered the day we arrive and to keep it a surprise for my sister who‚Äôs name
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our location! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so pleased to hear we were successful! We will make sure to share your compliments of Nicole with management as well! We can't wait for your visit and hope to see you again soon for your next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: BEST PLACE TO STAY IF YOU ARE VISITING DISNEYLAND
Summary: BEST PLACE TO STAY IF YOU ARE VISITING DISNEYLAND  - 8min Walk  - some rooms have a park view  - market with Disney stuff (and for cheaper than the park) - friendly staff and tidy rooms - Discount book (which included a discount off of a great breakfast spot across the street!)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We're so glad you appreciated our location, Mid Mod Market as well as our local eatery guide with tons of local restaurant savings! Can't wait to see you at Mimi's Cafe with your coupons readily available!

Summary: Very clean, love having all the personal items available also. Shampoo, conditioner, lotion, soap, hair dryer. Also a microwave, refrig and coffee/tea maker. A great bonus, our room, we were able to see the Disney fireworks!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! Here at Hojo, we have you covered! Never hesitate to call us at the Front Desk if you happen to forget a toothbrush since we have those available for our guests as well. We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Amazing experience and great staff! When you check in the staff is so kind and they definitely go out of their way to make you feel special. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel is very clean and tidy. We were there for 7 nights from Australia. We got moved from our original room with no view of the park and whilst the room was comfortable I was disappointed we didn‚Äôt have a view of the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that our rooms were comfortable and clean. Sorry that you had to move rooms. At our hotel, we have many view options: Disney facing, Garden Pool facing, and rooms facing inwards towards our property. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: The best place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: The staff is always super friendly and helpful. Beautifully spacious rooms which is so nice for longer trips. The rooms are always very clean! The property being walking distance to Disneyland is the cherry on top.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you always have a fabulous experience when staying with us. Thank you for letting us know you enjoy our clean, spacious rooms and friendly staff. We take great pride in welcoming and helping our guests, and we are so happy to know we were successful. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Highly recommended. Will be staying here again.
Summary: Everything was awesome except for the wifi. Wifi was pretty bad but that also wasn‚Äôt a big deal. AMAZING staff. Perfect walking distance from Disneyland! Good price too. My wife and I will be staying here often.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us. We are so sorry to hear the internet connection was inconsistent during your stay. We definitely understand how much of an inconvenience this is and we truly apologize. We will look into this issue to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We do appreciate you letting us know that our staff are doing an amazing job at welcoming our guests! We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: The room was clean and no foul odor. Very close to Disneyland and Disney CA adventure. It‚Äôs a 8 min walk. Staff were very tentative and helpful. Also, respectful. The pool was clean and always has a lifeguard on duty and open till 10pm.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you appreciated our location and that our staff were respectful and attentive. Thank you so much for your kind comments. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Easy location to get to Disneyland, great room, good pricing. 10 minute walk to the park max, easy access, good pricing compared to Disneyland hotels and other nearby hotels. Check in was easy, streamlined checkout, happy with my visit. Already have plans to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you are happy with your visit and that our location was an easy walk for you to Disneyland. We are excited for your next stay with us!

Summary: Upon arrival with another group of friends; we were notified that we "booked third party" so we wouldn't be able to stay in the same area as the friend who booked through their website. In that case they put you in the building next to the water park that is LOUD until 1030 every night we stayed sun-fri. It's not a huge deal IF you're at the park most of the day but the 2 night/days were we not at the park, the noise was just so LOUD and the giant bucket that pours water down could not be missed  If you book third party you will definitely be treated like you booked third party!   The room reeked of smoke or mold or something that was not freshly cleaned hotel room (the non smoking room) I voiced concern and they assured me something would be done and nothing was done.   The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate both negative and positive feedback. Our team is dedicated to providing each guest with a 5-star service, sorry we were unsuccessful. We do not allow smoking in the room or on balconies to keep the room clean and odor free. Although we don‚Äôt allow smoking in all rooms, we do have a designated smoking area on our property. We do apologize that our Front Desk staff failed to show you where our smoking area is on our property map. We have brought your comments to the attention of our Executive Housekeeper to ensure the smell in your room is taken care of right away. While our Garden Pool and Water Playground are open from 10 am to 10 pm, we have quiet time after 10 pm. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you (if we have one available). I am also sorry that the walk to Disney was far for you. There is a shuttle that can take you to Disneyland called the Anaheim Resort Transit bus (ART bus). I apologize that our Front Desk Staff did not inform you of this option. Thank you for letting our Front Desk Staff know about your missing $20. I spoke to our staff and apologize for the misunderstanding in which only $10 was returned to you. I‚Äôm thrilled to hear that our Front Desk Manager was able to refund you the money before the investigation was completed, and you approved of the amount. We do have rollaway beds available for our guests for a nightly fee of $15 a night plus tax, which comes to a grand total of $52.95 including taxes for a three-night stay. We do apologize for the confusion about the nightly fee for our rollaway beds. We take pride in knowing that we were one of the last hotels in the surrounding areas to charge for parking at a low fee of $20 + tax a day. Which is a steal, compared to surrounding areas who offer up to $35 dollars for parking. Our walking distance is typically an 8-10 minute walk, but if you are walking with little ones, their tiny adorable legs might add a few minutes to that. I‚Äôm happy to see that you were able to get your pizza delivery at midnight. For security purposes, all access to our buildings are locked at all times and requires a valid key card to enter. Due to this security measure, all food deliveries will be dropped off and picked up at the Front Desk to avoid any confusion for the delivery drivers and to ensure the safety of our guests. We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. If you come back to Anaheim we do hope that you will give us another shot to make sure that we give you the best experience possible.

Summary Heading: Loved our time at Anaheim HoJo
Summary: We highly recommend the Anaheim Howard Johnson. The beds were very comfortable, the room was super clean, and our kiddo loved the water playground on an afternoon when it was too hot to be at the parks. And, the location cannot be beat. The view of the fireworks at night was an extra perk!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kiddo got to enjoy our fun water playground. Cooling down at the Castaway Cove is our favorite! We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: My husband and I had the opportunity to relive one of our favorite attractions in  at Disneyland, the house of the future. The re-creation of this at the Howard Johnson hotel was unbelievable. Every single detail was accurate, fun and reminiscent of our experiences in the early 60s. If any of you have an attachment to the house of the future, do yourself a favor and include it in your list of to do‚Äòs. Thank you Howard Johnson for the memory. Just as an added thought the entire hotel and staff was excellent five star plus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your husband really enjoyed our exclusive House of the Retro Future Suite, where guests can experience yesterday's tomorrow, today. We are so pleased to hear that no small detail went unnoticed. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Do not stay here - very loud freeway noise 7th floor
Summary: Worst hotel experience ever. I called the hotel directly to confirm getting two  adjoining rooms and a view of the park for our family trip to Disneyland and I was led to believe we we‚Äôre getting two large rooms with a common living space. Come to find it‚Äôs just two rooms that can open the adjoining doors to each other and the work wasn‚Äôt working. The hotel room in building 1 they put our family in was ‚Äúnot sound proofed‚Äù which is what the night front desk told me and the room is directly next to the freeway. The room floor and walls are vibrating from the motion of the cars on the highway. With my daughters loud white noise machine and ear plugs we still couldn‚Äôt drown out the noise.    The high domed ceilings look great at first until you realize there are no shades or covers
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We apologize that your room was not what you were expecting. To accommodate larger families, we have our 2 Room Bundle; while this room does not have a common area, this is the only room type that guarantees a connecting door between 2 rooms. All of our rooms except the top floor have soundproofed windows, and the top floor rooms are the only ones with doomed ceilings. We apologize for the inconvenience this caused you. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room and I am glad to see that we were able to find another room for you. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better

Summary: Great location and clean. Rooms were spacious and very comfortable. Would stay there again but a little pricey. Great for the kids and very easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Staff were very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and taking your time to write a review.  We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our spacious and comfortable rooms. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we are thrilled to hear our staff were helpful and friendly. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt Count On Using The Hot Tub Or Laundry
Summary: The rooms are very clean & close to Disney but it‚Äôs a brisk 15-20 min walk, not 8 as claimed, even longer if you‚Äôre staying in the back of the property. A shuttle that picked up at the end of the park closing would be phenomenal.   They allow babies in the hot tub so count on it being closed because of poop in it. The pirate ship play area was great but it‚Äôs just so weird that the only hot tub is in the children‚Äôs play area and they allow parents to bring their babies in diapers in the hot tub and it made it impossible to relax in an adult area while the kids played even when it wasn‚Äôt closed because of poop. One small hot tub in the kids area is pretty inadequate for the size of the property.  The laundry facility was also inadequate for the size of the property. There are only
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address Guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. While babies are allowed in the hot tub, they must wear swim pants over their swimming diapers if they are not potty trained. We have complimentary swim pants available for our guests at the Front Desk. Swimming diapers are available for purchase in our Mid Mod Market located on the ground floor of Building 1. We greatly apologize that the baby did not have the proper swimming diapers and swim pant on. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: I was there over a long weekend from Vancouver, BC, Canada to celebrate my 50th birthday with my teenage daughter. On previous trips to Disneyland I had stayed on the resort at  Paradise Pier but opted to try the Hojo this trip. Not only was it significantly less expensive, it was fantastic! Firstly, the staff are amazing. They are so kind and helpful. Each person I encountered was lovely and authentic from grounds workers, to lifeguards, to housekeeping, mini market cashiers to front desk. Even prior to the trip, my email inquiries were responded to quickly. My daughter (14) and I, stayed in Building 2 on the 4th floor. We discovered we had a view of the Garden Pool, the monorail, and a great tree line. I was concerned due to the proximity of the freeway, as I'm a light
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation! We are thrilled to hear you had a fantastic 50th Birthday and that you enjoyed everything about your stay from the staff and grounds, to the location, pools and views! Thank you again for taking the time to write such a detailed and fabulous review about your stay, it sounds like you had a great time. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next epic Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service, going over and beyond!
Summary: My family consists of two young adult special needs boys and my wife so planning a trip to Disneyland takes planning and money. Therefore, we don't always get to go being from Oregon and the of traveling can be very stressful with our kids. However, the Howard Johnson's Anaheim Hotel and Waterpark have been a total delight! First I never have gone out of my way to post a review on Yelp, good or bad, but this special hotel deserves special treatment. Even before we got there they were always helpful when I needed to shop formula for my older son! And when we did finally arrived they were always ver friendly and respectful! They may not not a kitchen on their property and their public WiFi was slow but everything else was great! We stayed there for six nights and we always
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful!  We apologize for the WI-FI connection; we've been experiencing some delays but are working with the provider to resolve this matter. At Hojo, we are very lucky to have our housekeepers, some of which have been with us for over 30 years! We also just recently celebrated National Housekeeping Week every day for our fantastic housekeepers. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation! Can't wait to see you at our Mid Mod Market on your next stay!

Summary: Great place. Didn‚Äôt use the pool as spent entire time at Disney. Place was clean, rooms were nice, etc. We didn‚Äôt need amenities as just needed a place where could sleep and walk to the park and this place was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  We are delighted that you found our rooms nice and clean and that your location made it easier for you to go to Disneyland. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel while in Anaheim
Summary: Always amazing service and great rooms to rest in after a busy park day. We have stayed here multiple times over the years and it a great option if you have a family with the waterpark and pools for some downtime.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that we are your ‚Äúgo-to hotel in Anaheim‚Äù and that you have stayed with us multiple times. Our staff is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service, so it is fantastic to hear that we were successful. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The hotel has done a nice job with the water park! The kids love it and is a good way to rest after a Disneyland day. The room was big, although old and the carpet needs a serious wash. I saw them vacuum it, but it needs more than that. Is a very short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the carpet. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson only place to stay in anaheim
Summary: Staff are very friendly nothing is a bother.Presentation of the guess room was excellent.The appearance of the property is  very good.Would recommend to anyone.The only I find is the bed height is quite high for smaller people.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: amazing distance to the parks! clean hotel and nice staff! We stayed for 3 nights and this was not our first trip here and def won't be our last! We had no issues and after a long park day it was nice to have a quick walk back to the hotel!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: Wonderful from time of check in to check out. Clean spacious rooms all the staff I encountered were friendly and went out there way to make me feel welcomed. Unfortunately, no time for pool due to busy schedule. Maybe next time. Yes, I will be back. Also, five minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: It is awesome that you enjoyed your recent Disneyland trip with us. Our staff is dedicated to provide exceptional customer service, so it great to see that we were successful. We look forward to your next stay with us. Hopefully, you get to use Castaway Cove then!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland. Great water play area for kids and a regular pool (different area). Rooms were clean, cleaning staff was excellent and even tucked in my daughter's new stuffed Groot into her bed and she loved that!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. Our beds are so comfortable that Groot can't resist climbing in bed when you guys were away! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Staff is always so friendly and welcoming and makes check in a breeze. I love how close to Disneyland it is and the rooms are incredibly comfortable and inviting. I was helped with my reservation by Nicole and she was amazing and so kind. She went above and beyond to make our stay great. Thank you all!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We love to hear that our staff made your stay great. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This was a staycation for us, our primary reason for staying here was the pool/play area for our Son.  If you‚Äôre traveling with kids this is a must! It‚Äôs more entertaining than hanging in the big pool.  Room size was decent, king bed was comfortable but the pillows were not so great.  Wifi setup can be tricky, you may need to be transferred to 3rd party support. $20 parking fee per night was a bit of a surprise and letdown.  Mini market on site with lots of drink, snacks, toiletries, etc available.  No restaurant or bar on site but many options within walking distance.  Overall a decent stay if you‚Äôre here for the kids‚Äô entertainment but don‚Äôt expect too much for us grown kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are delighted that you and your little one enjoyed our Castaway Cove. We apologize that your pillows were not comfy. We will speak to our Housekeeping Manager to have these replaced. Thank you for being so patient with the WiFi, since the new Apple update, some guests may require additional steps to connect. However, we are looking into a solution. While we were one of the last hotels to offer complimentary parking, we implemented a parking charge to ensure we have enough parking for all our In-House guests. Thank you again for your comments as they will help us to improve. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This property was terribly unfriendly. We had problems at both pools with the staff, we have a five and three year old and had to explain to them why some people weren‚Äôt nice. Good location near Disney but no reason to ever stay here again. Stay away.
Manager Response: We are so disappointed to hear about your experience in both our water playground, and our Garden Pool. The service you received from our water staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service; we are so sorry to hear we were unsuccessful.  We genuinely apologize our Staff was not helpful and attentive.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated.

Summary: We visited this month and left disappointed. The building we were in stank. I bought a bottle of cologne that mysteriously went missing after the cleaner serviced our room. The lifeguard was extremely rude to my children, lying about pool rules. The hairdryer didn‚Äôt work and it took three calls to front desk over 5 days for them to replace it. Overall the service has gone down compared to the other 2 times we stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort. We are so disappointed to hear you were not completely satisfied during your time with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff would have been happy to find an alternative room option for you. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and we wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We genuinely apologize for not fixing your hairdryer sooner, we will communicate this incident with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure this will not happen again. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!
