Summary: This has been my third stay with Hojo Anaheim and I am absolutely in love with staying here! It‚Äôs just a quick walk to the park, next to serval options for food. The front desk is always so helpful with any questions you may have! This is for sure the spot to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Rundown hotel with a water park.
Summary: They focused all their efforts to remodel this hotel into the water park. The rooms are rundown and outdated. I only stayed here because I got a discount. This hotel is within walking distance but there are other closer hotels in better condition. We had problems with the toilet but the staff was not able to upgrade our room supposedly there were no rooms available. The room smelled bad and the carpet was moist when walking barefoot. We will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: We apologize for your experience with the smell in the building and room. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience, and have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and we wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: We stayed in the recently renovated rooms , double queen bed room. Beds were comfortable! Access was easy! and our 11 month old loved the water playground! So many memories were made ‚ò∫Ô∏è. We would absolutely return on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds and family-friendly water playground. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here immensely. On arrival, the reception staff were great and gave us a room early as we had been driving for some time. The room was spacious, and clean and had everything we needed. The pool was nice and we used it for an afternoon dip. The hotel is very close to Disneyland and we did in fact walk there for our 5-day visit. There are also many restaurants and shops within a short distance away.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our newly renovated, spacious rooms and location to the Disneyland Resort. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top accommodation choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We are locals to the area but with the D23 Expo at Anaheim Convention Center it was easier to stay here and not fight the morning traffic, we have done this last time in 2019 and will do this again in two years when D23 comes to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland D23  staycations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us! We can't wait to see you again at D23!

Summary: We were travelling from Australia on a 3 week holiday in America and we stayed here for 3 nights so we could go to Disneyland.  We had 2 rooms (adjoining) which was very handy.  Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are deligthed to hear that you had a comfortable stay and that we were able to accomodate adjoining rooms for you. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Ok, know that this hotel is not right across the street from the main entrance like many bloggers lead you to believe. It is right across from the Matterhorn so you will have a bit of a walk before reaching the cross walk to the main drag. It doesn't seem like much, but let me tell you after 16 hours and 11 miles in the park, it becomes a long way. The hotel itself is fine. I liked the Mickey pictures in the room. The beds were comfortable, but I hate that you have to pay for parking when you're already paying so much for the room. And if you're going to the park on the day of check-out, they will charge you for an extra day of parking... even if you're planning on leaving just a few hours after their time (i.e. we left at 4:00 and they still charged us for a full day because it
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our comfortable beds. Knowing you're only moments away from the comforts of Hojo, makes the 7-8 minute walk back after Disneyland bittersweet. We understand paying for parking might be a hassle, however, we pride ourselves knowing that we were the last hotel in the area to charge for parking. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: Our family had a great time with a staff that treats its guest like family. We are foster parents and have made this our primary destination for the annual Disneyland trips or for anytime to get away from home. We were very comfortable here and feel very safe as its a great atmosphere and we had     told family and friends that they must check out to believe. Can not say enough also about the swimming pools opened late and with the kid playground was the place to be with the scorching August-22 record heat wave. The kids are still talking about our stay and feels good that the memories will always be with them.   THANK YOU HOWARD JOHNSONS OF ANHEIM
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful!  Although we don't have unlimited breadsticks, here at HOJO, you're family. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This hotel exemplifies the Disney experience, even though it is not an official Disney hotel. Compared to the Disneyland Hotel (which is twice as expensive, if not more), this hotel has all the same features -- ambiance, cleanliness, good location, and great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We take pride in being a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Wonderful service and a short walk
Summary: Heard so many good things about the hotel that we decided to give this place a chance instead of our usual hotel and it was completely worth it. The longer walk than what we are used to, took us less than five minutes to get to the entrance of Disneyland, was worth it because the hospitality here was amazing. Everyone was very kind and helpful. We checked in early and they even offered to take our bags. The rooms were also clean and spacious. I also very much appreciate the safety of opening the buildings with the keycards so only guest can come in. Hoping to make this place our new usual stay!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful!  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Great place to stay and relax on your Disney vacation.  The Hotel does not serve Breakfast.  This is not a factor for me though.  Employees are friendly and helpful.  I strongly recommend this Hotel for your next vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. While we do not serve breakfast on our property, we do have coupons for the surrounding restaurants nearby available to all of our guests at the Front Desk. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Awful awful experience - find somewhere else
Summary: Honestly not worth the hassle or cost. Probably wouldn‚Äôt stay again. The walk isn‚Äôt short enough to justify what we paid. The water playground is cute‚Ä¶but Disneyland is right there and where we spent a majority of our time. Here were our major issues:  Housekeeping is not done daily. It‚Äôs done every other day. I would say that ‚Äúhousekeeping‚Äù is a word that‚Äôs really best used lightly. Expect more DIY services. Example: I picked up all trash each day because I noticed they will literally leave trash on the ground (I keep up after our kids well but they left a straw from their apple juice on the ground and several other small items that normally would be picked up on a housekeeping day at a hotel). Even after I picked up all trash and put it in trash bags for them - nothing that I
Manager Response: Thank you, Ana, for your feedback. It is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal always to address guests‚Äô negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We are saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. You have the freedom to call the Front Desk and request a full-service clean upon request. We do apologize for the incident that occurred at the Gift Shop. We are sorry to hear the internet connection was inconsistent during your stay with us. We understand how much of an inconvenience this is, and we truly apologize. We do have two computers for Guest use in our lobby that may be used between 6 am to midnight while our lobby is open. Nonetheless, we will share your comments with our management. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation, no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary Heading: Best Place To Stay When Going To Disneyland!
Summary: Always and forever my favorite place to stay when visiting Anaheim and the parks. Having a hotel of this quality, cleanliness, and water park amenities within an 8-minute walk from the parks is priceless. To top it all off, the prices are great!! Would highly, highly recommend this property for anyone.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: 2 night 3 days trip. Stayed for a quick disney weekend. Here are the pros and cons. They had us stay at building 5, the ‚Äúnewly renovated‚Äù, skyline so i was excited.  Staff/customer service: amazing! In person and phone CS were all great. They were able to let us check in early. No issues there.  Parking: enough space for parking. $20/day with in and out privileges.   Distance to disney: can‚Äôt complain! Hotel chains in front of the park and have some quick restaurants beside to eat at.  Price: you pay for the location and proximity to disney not for the quality  The room: here we go‚Ä¶(see pictures). We were in building 5, supposed to be renovated Pro-i can see the carpet clean so I suppose they replaced that. You can see the building is old. I like that they have a balcony. It has
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your recent stay with us. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. While Buildings 1 & 2 are our most recently renovated Buildings, we hope to have every building on the property renovated, including Building 5. Some of our rooms do have skylights that let the natural light in; we would have been more than happy to have looked into another room that was not on the top floor during your stay. Thank you for letting us know about the bathtub. We will be sure to share your comments with our Maintenance staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: I truly cannot find a bad thing to stay about this hotel. When they said walking distance to Disneyland Park I did not imagine how close the hotel really was. It took my group about six minutes to walk but if you‚Äôre a little more relaxed I‚Äôd say ten minutes top. The room was spacious, clean, modern, comfortable, and clean. The hotel had a ton of fun amenities and the staff was incredibly kind. I truly had a wonderful time here and will be back in the future! 10/10. Extra points for all the fun disney decor!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and for taking time to review your stay with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our location to Disneyland and spacious, clean rooms. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The rooms are clean and tidy. Staff is very friendly. Sounds like I will be negative but when you spend ten hours in the park, it is nice to spend 15-30 minutes in the hot tub. It has been broken most nights and each time staff PROMISES it will be running the next day. And the next day it is still broken. That is why I don‚Äôt be back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write an honest review about your stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and clean rooms. We do apologize the hot tub was closed for most of your stay. For the safety of our Guests, we require a lifeguard to monitor our hot tub at all times.  Due to staff shortages, we were unable to staff that location at that time. We are excited to say, we have hired more water park facility attendants, and we are training them to be lifeguard certified with the hope that we will not have to shut the hot tub down.

Summary: Great place for families wanting to be close to Disneyland. We were lucky enough to be able to get our room early as our flight got us to California much earlier than check in.  Very walkable, and lots of food options around. The water park is like a big spray park and our little one loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that your room was ready early and you were able to check in early! We are so delighted to hear that our location was convenient to your visit to the parks with the countless dining options throughout Harbor Blvd. We can't wait to see you again at our Castaway Cove.

Summary: beds were really comfortable. We stayed in building 1 which we love because its renovated and has the littel market on the first floor. only issue is refrigerator does not keep items as cold as we wish. the hotel is a short distance from the Disneyland entrance and at a great price!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your recent stay with us. We are delighted you enjoyed our comfortable beds. While our mini-refrigerators do not get ice cold, you are more than welcome to bring any item that you need extra cold or frozen to the Front Desk to be stored in our staff fridge. We have staff available 24/4. We hope to see you during your next trip to the happiest place on earth!

Summary: We visited from Canada this past week, the staff were friendly and went out there way to make us feel at home. The two pools castaway and the garden pool were excellent, there is a restaurant across the road called Mimi‚Äôs that was decent and being able to walk to Disney was excellent. We stayed in the renovated rooms in building 2 they were clean and bright perfect for a family getaway Shout out to Zach at the front desk!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to see that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We love Mimi's. Please don't forget to ask about our local eateries guide, which includes a 20% off coupon for Mimi's Cafe. We're happy that you enjoyed our rooms that face the Garden Pool. We're lucky to have Zach and will ensure we share your comments with management. We hope to see you soon, perhaps in Building 1 next time!

Summary Heading: It's not good as they claim
Summary: The cleanliness was an issue.  My daughter found a grey white blob that can be described as a booger on the wall next to her bunk bed.  The shower won't drain and pooled while showering.  The grout around the tiles were gunky.  The bed sheets had stains.  The mini-fridge had a broken leg and was wobbly.  The water park is small and more like a spray park.  It's more expensive than Travelodge for not having much amenities, but Travelodge is at least clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort. We are so disappointed to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are always working on new ways to improve and will share your comments with our Housekeeping and Maintenance Managers to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary Heading: The best travel experience for  Disney lovers
Summary: excellent stay, excellent service from staff, Kudos to Zach who made our stay even more awesome ,extremely accommodating when I showed up earlier than checking in, took care of our bags before and after check out. great room, with great features, restaurants within short walking distance,  1 long block from disneyland main entrance. will be coming back!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Zach's positivity is quite infectious, and we are thankful to hear that he was extremely accommodating at check-in and check-out. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so happy to hear we were successful! We can't wait to see you during your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Good option at walking distance from Disneyland.
Summary: The location is pretty good, the building we stayed on had very nice rooms with Mickey details; clean but understaffed for housecleaning; and internet doesn‚Äôt work at all‚Ä¶ even though it‚Äôs fairly easy to connect, I could never load anything and doesn¬¥t have an option of upgrading to a better connection. The water park was great for small kids, mine had a blast! Great for the hot days we had there. Over all I recommend it and hopefully if we stay there again their small issues will be taken care of.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It is lovely to hear that you would recommend our hotel as a good option when going to Disneyland! We are so sorry to hear the internet connection was inconsistent during your stay with us. Glad that you were able to connect easily, but we are sorry that nothing would load. We have two computers in our lobby that guests are welcome to use and an internet helpline that can help with your phone. While our housekeeping services have changed to every other day, you are always welcome to request daily housekeeping services by notifying the Front Desk. Castaway Cove is always fun for every buccaneer here at Hojo! We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better.

Summary Heading: Always book Building 1 for your best stay at HoJo!
Summary: Our stay at HoJo is always awesome.  Building 1 is definitely the best building to stay in, the rooms are remodeled, always clean, large, comfortable and the grounds are always very well kept and we feel very safe there.  BUT some things have really started bothering us since our last stay of November 2021 and our most recent on 9/5/22.  We have always loved that HoJo offered free parking with extra parking hours on day of check out (I think until 3pm?), no resort fees, free internet and seemed to be reasonably priced but as of our last trip in November they no longer offer free parking, don't allow you to park in lot after check out beyond noon that same day and their rates are rising.  Yes, their prices are pretty comparable to most of the hotels/motels located across from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We love to hear that we are your first choice when staying near Disneyland. While it is great that you stay with us for our clean, renovated rooms, we apologize that parking is no longer complementary. We tried our best to keep this available for our guests and were one of the last hotels in the area to offer free parking. On the day of your arrival, you are still welcome to park your car in our lot even before check-in time. To make space for the guests that are arriving, on the day of check-out, we ask that you move your car by noon. However, if we have extra parking spaces available, we are more than happy to extend your parking. If space is unavailable, we work the Gardenwalk, which has a parking structure and is the same walking distance to the main gates as we are to Disneyland. We are also sorry that we could not accommodate an early check-in for you. While early check-in is subject to availability, our Front Desk Staff always tries their absolute best to accommodate early arrivals. When a room is not available early, we offer luggage storage, parking, and access to our pool areas. We have also implemented a new system that should help prioritize rooms of guests that arrive early. We are always looking for ways to improve and truly appreciate your honest feedback. We hope to see you for your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: This place was so great for our family! The staff were so friendly! As soon as we walked through the lobby doors to check in, we were greeted and cared for so kindly. The kiddos loved the pool and waterpark and it was perfect for us to come back to mid day from Disneyland to cool off. We were close enough to Disneyland that the walk didn‚Äôt bother our young kids, We had a great stay! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family felt welcomed by our friendly and caring staff. We hope you come back to play in the Cast Away Cove water playground again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at the Howard Johnson twice now and we love it! Our kids LOOOOVVVEEEE the water park and swimming pool, and the proximity to Disneyland is just perfect.  Our first stay we overlooked the park and watched the fireworks at night - AMAZING! This time we had the kids suite which is a two bedroom complete with a bunk bed, pull out couch and super king in the adult room.  The staff are lovely and the place is clean and well maintained. We will certainly be back again soon.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are so happy we could welcome your family back to our hotel and that you enjoyed the Kid Suite and fun Cast Away Cove water playground! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Wonderful‚Ä¶great rooms, great staff. We stayed in a newly renovated room that was clean and comfortable. Had some cool tech that was a nice change compared to other hotels we have stayed in. The staff is very pleasant and more than willing to accommodate any needs you may have. We were well cared for at our home away from home for the week.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our rooms clean, and comfortable and also appreciated our cool tech in our rooms. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We recently stayed at Howard Johnson by Wyndham Anaheim Hotel and Water Playground. The weather was excessively hot however, our rooms were cool and additional box fans were provided which help keep the rooms even cooler. Their Amazon delivery service is above and beyond that of other hotels in the area. There is no fee for the service as found by other hotels in the area. We are very grateful for the Garden Pool where we were able to escape the heat and relax to music. Arielle, Nichole and Zach made the trip even better with their smiles and friendly attitudes to not only my Family, other patrons who entered the reception area soon felt welcomed and at home.  What a great experience. Thanks HOJO.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Even though you stayed with us during a heat wave, we are happy to hear that our rooms stayed comfortably cool and the additional box fans made it better. Yes, we are more than happy to safely store a couple of packages that guests may have ordered ahead of time or during their stay. Just make sure that the package is under the same name as the hotel reservation. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We can't wait to see you poolside at the Garden Pool again!

Summary: Hotel room was very clean. Guest representatives are very pleasant. Life guards at the children park were friendly and worked very well with children. Would definitely recommend staying here. Great location.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday! It‚Äôs fantastic to hear you celebrated a birthday while staying with us and that our team made your visit special. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Was an awesome stay! We traveled with our 6 year old grand daughter for a six night stay hoping that our accommodations would be clean and have pools that would be an in between time from Disney. This place is great for young children and has amenities for adults. Walking distance to the main gates of Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your granddaughter got to enjoy our fun water playground. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Staying at the HoJo is always a pleasant experience! I normally go to Disneyland while staying here and it's such a peaceful oasis, less than 10 minutes from the parks. The room felt clean and comfortable and the staff were so kind!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms and our staff was kind. We are happy to hear that our location was convenient to your visit to the parks. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We love the conveniences of the Howard Johnson Anaheim! The proximity to the parks makes walking a breeze and taking an afternoon break if you want to. The cool AC, comfy beds, the gift shop/convenience store are just a few of the other amenities. The pools and ground are beautiful and all of the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Everything is so clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments, we are so pleased we could host you during your stay! We are thrilled to know that our friendly staff were helpful, and that you enjoyed our location and amenities. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This hotel has a beautiful garden with different types of flowers. the hotel is surrounded by beautiful and tall trees and palm trees. This place is suitable for meditation and rest. The staff is excellent.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our peaceful & serene location. Thank you for appreciating our landscape and the beautiful flowers throughout our property.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We LOVE this hotel- great ambiance, family atmosphere, and close to the parks! Especially love the nod to mid-century design and graphics. The lobby is a great example of 1950's beauty! The only thing that would make the hotel even better would be a hot tub near Garden Pool, and on-site hotel breakfast. Overall A+
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our mid-century modern design. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are taking note of that suggestion and will be passing it along to upper management. See you soon at the Garden Pool!

Summary: The staff checking us in were informative and friendly. Our room was ready two hours before check in time.  Our room was beautiful decorated and in a fun Disney theme. We had a great view of the pool and the fireworks at Disneyland.  It‚Äôs such a great location. We love staying here
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are happy to hear our staff gave you a warm welcome and that they were able to grant an early check-in. We are so delighted you loved our beautifully decorated rooms and that you had a great view of the pool and fireworks. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We love staying here and always have an amazing time ! Pirates cove and the garden pool are the perfect break for a hot summer day. We had a fabulous room in building 2 with a view of the garden pool. HoJo feels like a second home and we can‚Äôt wait for our next stay.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to be referred to as your second home! We are so pleased you love our renovated rooms and water facilities. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Absolutely magical! The staff were very sweet, room was spotless, loved the family friendly environment, and  there was Disney magic sprinkled everywhere!  I will definitely stay here again! Check in and check out was very easy.
Manager Response: We are so happy our staff made your family feel welcome! Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we are so happy to know you enjoyed our clean rooms and small touches of Disney magic around our property. We hope to host you again on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Awesome little retro hotel! The spray ground was perfect for my 3 year old. Unfortunately while we were there, the two smaller slides were not working which was disappointing for her, but she still enjoyed the splash pad and wading pool. The room was super clean and spacious. There was a great little market that had snacks and waters we could load up on before our walk to the park. It only took us about 7 minutes. Also, you can enjoy the fireworks from the swimming pool which is super cool. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad you appreciated our location and midcentury modern decor. We are delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids enjoyed our fun water playground. We are thrilled that you found our Main St. Market super convenient for your Disney days! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Safety deposit box  did not work due to a battery problem ., besides this everything was ok  Super location 10 minutes from Disneyland (walking distance ).  They have a partnership with a local restaurant ( Mimi¬¥s ) ver handy , just be sure that the front desk gives you a coupon or something to prove that you are a Howard Johnson guest, you can save some money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share some helpful advice! We are so happy to hear our location was convenient and you were able to enjoy our partner restaurant while staying with us. We will be sure to let our maintenance team know about your safe so we may have that issue fixed for our next guests. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Been here before and would come again! As a family we truly appreciated the location, the staff, etc  I wish I was back there again since it would mean we are at Disneyland! Thanks for taking care of our family!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations! We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us!

Summary: The check in and check out was great--fast and friendly.  The property is clean.  The room is clean.  They offer housekeeping on your second night, so that is nice.  They also provided a large garbage bag for the day in between.  The water playground is really for small kids.  My 10 and 11 were bored and did not want to go back.  The garden pool is small.   The small general store is overpriced--as these things usually are.  The walk to the park is not bad; however, we had an incident one night that made it a little scary to walk back.  We were walking back and there were not any other people going as far as us.  We got to about the McDonalds when an extremely agitated man was blocking the sidewalk.  He was screaming obscenities and slamming a baking sheet on the sidewalk.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are happy to hear that you found our property and rooms clean. I'm sorry to hear that your children did not enjoy the Castaway Cove; I hope they were able to enjoy our deep-end Garden Pool. I'm sorry that you felt unsafe during your walk back to the hotel, but happy to hear that you were able to get back to the hotel safely. While I understand the layout of the balconies on some of our rooms can be an adventure to get out to, they are designed with sound-absorbent sliding glass doors to prevent as much traffic noise from the freeway as possible. We apologize for the wasp nest that was outside your balcony. We will be addressing this with our Maintenance staff so it can be removed as safely as possible. We do not take these sightings lightly and encourage our guests to let the Front Desk know immediately so we can ensure that we are providing you with a safe environment. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary Heading: Very clean & comfortable, walkable to Disney
Summary: We stayed with our small kids in tower building 6 and it was very updated and clean. The kids really enjoyed the bunk bed and the microwave, fridge, in-room safe and lots of power/usb plugs were much appreciated.  Parking was easy and secure. 15 mins walk to Disneyland. We would 100% recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you liked our updated and clean rooms and that your kids had a fun time on the bunk beds. We love to see that you appreciated the amenities that we have in the room.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland! Just a few minutes walk to Disneyland Parks, Disney Downtown and restaurants. The rooms are neat and clean. Beautiful water park is an extended benefit if you are travelling with kids. I would recommend this place for families on Disney adventure!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation! We are thrilled to hear you and your family had a great time and enjoyed our location! We are delighted you found our rooms immaculate and that your children enjoyed our fun water playground. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when visiting Disneyland!

Summary Heading: go to lodging for Disney vacay
Summary: this is our go-to lodging for our Disneyland getaways. property/personnel does not disappoint. what was disappointing was the fact that they now CHARGE for parking which was not previously disclosed - also not stated on website.
Manager Response: It is so great to see that we are your go to hotel near Disneyland. We apologize that our parking charges came as a surprise to you. While it is noted on our website and during the reservation process, we will ensure that these charges are better indicated. We hope this does not discourage you from staying with us again!

Summary Heading: Family Friendly Property with Attentive Staff
Summary: The reception was excellent. Our interaction with Miss Hensley was a truly great start to our stay. We had a minor pair of issues arise during our stay that were addressed and appropriately handled flawlessly by Rick.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: When we arrived our room was not ready. I had to wait 2  hours and they said they would call me when my room was ready and never received a call. We were just tired and wanted to rest but instead we had to drive around and wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are so disappointed that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay with us. Early check-in is subject to the arrival day availability. Our Front Desk Staff always tries their best to accommodate early arrivals, but unfortunately, this isn‚Äôt always available when we are at high occupancy. When a room is not available early, we offer luggage storage, parking, and access to our pool areas. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Our go-to for Disneyland weekend getaways!
Summary: We went to celebrate my birthday at the parks and the HoJo has been our go-to whenever we stay for the weekend.   The staff is always super friendly and willing to address any concerns (not that there are many).  The hotel is super clean and such an awesome mid-mod vibe.  It's a quick and easy walk to the parks.  Can't beat it!
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you celebrated your birthday while staying with us! We are thrilled that we are your go to hotel when visiting Disneyland. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next Disney trip.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel for a Disneyland stay
Summary: We had 4 nights here and would have loved more.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff are very helpful.  It‚Äôs a short walk to DisneyLand and more restaurants about 20 mins away.  Would definitely recommend and stay again.  The kids loved their little water park and pool, and pool towels are provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are so happy that your kids loved our water park and that you would stay with us again. We are also glad that you found our staff helpful and rooms clean and confortable. We look forward to you staying with us again, and hopefully for longer than 4 nights!

Summary: Loved the hotel. Such fun. Adorable water park for the kiddo. Great and attentive staff. Easy and refreshing walk to Disneyland. Will absolutely return. Clean, cute, felt safe. Location is primo. Loved the daily walk.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future! Can't wait to see you on your daily walks to Disneyland.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two nights and we absolutely loved it. We stayed in building 1 with a theme park view.  From the super nice and helpful Staff to the comfy beds to the short walk to Disney. We will definitely stay here again! They also held our bags before our room was ready so we could go to the parks. Wonderful hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel! We got the kids suite and it was so perfect for us and our toddler with the bunk beds and perfect for our Disney trip! It was such a close walk we were able to walk back easily to give my son a nap and not have to leave to rush back. The staff was so kind and the room was very clean! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased that you found our location ideal for your son's nap time.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: First time staying here and loved it. Decor in building one was Disney themed which made it more special. My daughter loved the water park area, it‚Äôs great for toddlers and big kids. Definitely  recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed our decor in Building 1. We can't wait to see you and your family again at Castaway Cove!

Summary: Super clean which was a big plus & beds were very comfy. Just an 8 minute walk to Disneyland which was AMAZING! Employees all were super nice & friendly as well which made us feel comfortable. Check out was really easy, all done from our hotel room. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and that you would stay with us again! We love that you found our hotel to be super clean and that our staff made you feel comfortable. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This hotel is really great! Super comfy beds, very clean, updated rooms, and great walking distance to Disneyland.   The only issue I have is the pool system where you have to sign in.  Also, they don‚Äôt let you stay to swim the day you are leaving.  Even the Disneyland hotels allow you to stay the day you check out and stay parked there as well.  Otherwise we really love this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are delighted that you liked our renovated rooms and comfy beds. We are happy to inform you that as of July 28, 2022, reservations for Castaway Cove and Garden Pool are no longer required. On the day of check-in, you are welcome to use the pool areas at any time and while you are waiting for your room to be clean. You are welcome to use the pool areas until noon on your check-out day. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and hope to see you for your next Disneyland Vacation!

Summary Heading: Hojo is the place to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: Hojo Anaheim is such an amazing hotel! The room was beyond perfection for my needs. The front desk is also very accommodating. The walk to the parks is just about 8 mins. It was so nice to be close to the parks! I recommend anyone visiting Disneyland to stay at this Hojo! The water park is also perfect for the young ones!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your stay with us. We are thrilled that you would recommend our hotel and your room was perfect for your needs. So great to hear that you had an amazing stay with us. We hope to be your top choice when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We decided to stay here for a family vacation and it was awesome! We went to Anaheim for an angels game and a disney day, but the hotel, water park and firework view from our beds were such a huge plus! Our kids would have rather stayed and played at the hotel over the other adventures.   The staff was so friendly and the room was clean. We even got early check in without any special requests! And to top it off this place is so budget friendly!   We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms clean and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. How exciting to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pre-check-in procedure! We hope to see you and your family soon at the Castaway Cove.

Summary: Staff was friendly  Great amenities  Very close walk to restaurants  Perfect Disney Stay Water park is nice for young children  Convenient store on site  Rick at the front desk made our check in and out very smooth
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Isn't Rick the absolute best?! We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. You can find almost everything that you will need for your stay at the Main St. Market! We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Overall the stay at HoJo blew away my expectations - and they were high! The location is phenomenal, the room are huuuge, with great design and amazing amenities. The park view was madness - we watched the fireworks every night we weren‚Äôt at Disney. And the Cove was incredible, all 4 of us had an amazing time there.  The stay at your place was on of the highlights of our trip! Thank you for the memories!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive review of our Hotel! We are so happy you loved the Cast Away Cove water playground, our spacious rooms and view of the fireworks! We are delighted to hear we exceeded your high expectations during your stay. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great stay, we drove 7 hours and arrived before check-in time, front desk was very friendly and helped us check in gave us detailed info about hotel and our options during our stay.the room was clean, and the hotel  was a close walk to Disneyland, fun water park. Will stay again next time.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and friendly service. Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our clean rooms and Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Nice updated rooms . Nice decor. Room came with a fridge , microwave an krureg no need to pay extra to rent these items. Pool is nice 3-5 feet perfect for kids. Pirates cove kids pool an water slides is amazing and the main reason we stayed here. At pirates cove an other sections of the hotel. We seen the fireworks show at Disney. Staff is friendly. We were greeted throughout the property constantly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your room amenities and our Garden Pool. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we are so thrilled to hear you felt welcomed by our friendly staff. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Would definitely recommend, had a great time! We always look forward to staying with you. Room is clean and the distance from the hotel to Disneyland is so convenient. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: We are so happy we could welcome you back to Howard Johnson Anaheim!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us! We hope to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel with excellent, friendly staff
Summary: Great family hotel! Stayed for a week as a family of 4 (kids 4 and 8) while we went to Disneyland across the street. Clean rooms, great service, and close to the park. Castaway Cove splash park was fun for the kids. Rick especially made our stay memorable. Recommend 100% as a safe, fun place to stay for the family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are thrilled to know that Rick made your visit special! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful.  We're also glad to know that you found our clean rooms comfortable and our location to the Disneyland parks convenient. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Literally the worst we have been in
Summary: The pool was closed for sanitation it looked like if it wasn't a priority it was closed most of the day from the time we checked in, opened back at 9:15 and close at 10 In the meantime the connection was very poor Internet connection that is, in our room Due to this it was slow and we could not even watch a movie inside our room We paid for a pool view and we ended up getting a room that had a view of the parking lot And if you really put your face on face on the window you could see the pool from there, this to me is not a pool view and should not be charged like a pool view
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us. We're disappointed to hear that you did not experience the kind of five-star stay that we strive to provide all of our guests. We appreciate your sharing this constructive input so we can address your concerns internally. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Should your travels ever bring you back to Anaheim, we hope to have the chance to improve upon your experience.

Summary: This hotel is an easy walk to Disney and restaurants etc. Our kids also enjoyed the splash park at the end of the day. We did stay in one of the older buildings, which we didn‚Äôt mind. However, it looks much different than the photos provided by management. Also, the highway noise is very loud, so pack a sound machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about you stay. We're sorry to hear that you were able to hear the freeway noise from your room. We do appreciate your feedback though, and will share this with our team. We hope to welcome you in the future. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Perfect for my family of 4. Great location. You can walk to the parks and surrounding restaurants. Very clean with a very nice marketplace on the first floor in building one. The two bedroom is spacious with bunk beds and a mini fridge.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our location to the Disneyland Resort and spacious Kid Suite. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland visit!
Summary: Loved this hotel!  Comfortable beds, very clean, fun water park and pool, building one has a bit of a park view, easy .5 mile walk to Disneyland entrance.  Plenty of room for family of five (youngest on an air mattress we brought along). No breakfast, but mini fridge and coffee maker made it easy to have cereal/oatmeal in the room.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for sharing your experience.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and the convenience of having a mini-fridge, microwave and Keurig coffee machine in your room.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Best Place to be in Anaheim
Summary: The best service I‚Äôve received by far! Thank you, HoJo Anaheim for making our vacation worth it! With everything walking distance, and Disneyland so close, you can‚Äôt go wrong spending time here and enjoying the California sunshine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I was so disappointed that the hotel is dirty. Our room was not even great the bathroom in our room smells the sheets dirty and also the fridge is not working and dirty. The tv we are having a hard time connecting the internet keep shutting it off. Staying for 3 night it was miserable not comfortable. I will not recommend this hotel to anyone. Better to look for other hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort. We are so disappointed to hear you were not completely satisfied during your time with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff would have been happy to find an alternative room option for you. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and we wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt book just for the water park
Summary: It was ridiculously hard to get a reservation to the water play area. I was only able to get one in our last day at the hotel from 10-12. Then, due to an event they wouldn‚Äôt accommodate a request for late check out. We were there for 3 days. The first day they had to close the pool due to a child throwing up in it. Our 2nd day we did Disneyland, then checked out the 3rd day but went to the play area for 2 hours and had to store all of our things in the car and change in the lobby restroom. I would have rather saved the extra expense of a themed hotel and just enjoyed a pool at a regular resort.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with getting to your pool reservations. I apologize that you were not informed of our cancelation policy, which takes effect 30 minutes after the time slot begins. We have listened to all of our reviews similar to yours, and have released the reservation system for our water park on July 28th. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: We had a fantastic time here. It was such a great break from Disneyland to walk back to our Hotel and jump in the pool or take the kids to the water park. I would definitely come here again. The rooms were spacious and clean. Everyone was nice and courteous!
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground, clean rooms and location to Disneyland. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Clean, responsive and on point every step of the way
Summary: We stayed from July 23rd-27th for our Disneyland Trip. Our first night they had us in a room on the top floor of a building with nice tall ceilings but they had these eave windows that let in a ton of light in the night and morning. Not a huge deal for may people but some in our family are very light sensitive. And the big truck noise from the adjacent freeway was too loud...again, some very sensitive sleepers in our crew. The next day we left SUPER early to rope drop Disneyland and I plum forgot to call to ask about changing rooms. Got back for a mid-day pool swim and Arielle set us up with a brand new room that was overlooking the Garden Pool. WAY quieter and more relaxing and larger as well. (we had a room with bunkbeds which was great for our kids). Every interaction with
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are happy our Front Desk Staff member, Arielle, was able to find an alternative room option for you. Though some guests prefer the arch ceilings and additional light, we understand the frustration of being woken up early from the light coming in. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your 1 Queen, 1 Junior bunk bed room, and that your children loved having a bunk bed!  We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: First time staying here and we definitely be back. Pretty close to Disneyland. The water park is amazing definitely a must if you are staying here  with children.    The room was spacious, clean. with excellent view to Disneyland park,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location to the Disneyland Resort. We are so delighted you found our rooms to be spacious and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about you stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Long honest review.   Check in was simple and efficient.  Front desk staff were friendly and welcoming.   There is ample parking and never had to spend time looking for parking.  There is a daily parking fee of $20USD.  If you have booked through a third party this mostly has not been included.    All maid and maintenance staff we encountered were very warm and friendly.    The reason I could not give this a five star.  When we arrived into our room my son who is five and on the autism spectrum was playing with his cars/trucks on the floor.   All of a sudden the said "mommy candy" I quickly looked because we did not give him candy.  I saw him with two pill capsules he was about to put in his mouth.   With him being autistic he does not yet dully understand safety and what he
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We are glad to hear our staff was friendly, welcoming and attentive when it came to the cleanliness of your room. We are saddened to hear that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards that we strive for. Thank you for informing us, so we could fix this issue, we truly apologize we fell short of these cleanliness expectations. We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated.  We appreciate you sharing your comments about our Cast Away Cove water playground and we are happy to hear your children enjoyed their time playing. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary Heading: Vacation nearly went down the drain
Summary: Restrooms need remodeling.  Toilets should be using direct flush hi efficiency toilet. Swirling water inefficient and not sanitary cause by being splashed when flushed. Motion sensor in bathrooms: Several times lights went out on family members while taking a shower. Potential liability of falling while trying to get lights back on. Short members of family panicked when the sensor did not pick up motion when shower curtain was pulled shut.  Toilet paper is poor quality for price point of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We will be sure to share your comments regarding the light sensor in your room with our maintenance team. Thank you for your suggestions about our toilets and toilet paper, your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Excellent hotel with a great location. Rooms were exceptionally clean and very spacious (we had a single king). If I had one request, it would probably be more food and beverage options (both grab and go and grocery supply). Small store on site was decent, but so many items close options to eat. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious Deluxe King Bedroom. We also appreciate you sharing your suggestions for our Gift Shop. We will be sure to communicate these suggestions to our Gift Shop manager. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Very Clean, Tidy and Family Friendly Hotel.
Summary: Amazing Hotel and Facilities. Will definitely be staying here on my return.  The walk to Disneyland was 10-15 mins if that and was just up the road from various restaurants and fast foot places. So central to everything.  We had a large group of 14 people (inc. 7 Kids) and every one of us loved the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family found our location convenient and you loved our hotel. We are thrilled to hear we will be your go-to hotel from now on. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: From check-in to check-out our stay was fantastic! Short walk to Disneyland made for an easy mid-day break at the water playground which the kids loved. Convenient to multiple easteries. Great value as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: 5 star in my books.  Rooms were clean and spacious.  Needed  crib for infant and they provide all we needed.  Staff was very accommodating.  Walking distance to Disneyland park! We were in building 1  6 th floor and had excellent view  from our window to see fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5-star review and nice comments. We are thrilled that you had an excellent stay with us! We are glad that we had everything you needed, from providing a crib to a view of the fireworks. We hope to see you on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: Best Disneyland hotel - AMAZING customer service
Summary: I have stayed at the twice now and I cannot speak highly enough of it. It is a 7 minute walk to the front gate of Disneyland and the rooms in Buildings 1 and 2 are completely renovated and spacious. They made my friend's birthday in January SO special with a welcome gift and put our rooms right next to each other for convenience. They store your bags if you arrive before check in and make the whole process as smooth as possible. When I stayed recently, I realized that I had booked the wrong room type for my upcoming 30th birthday trip in October. Buildings 3-6 are not renovated yet, they are very nice but we need the accessibility of an elevator for our scooters, and I was worried it wasn't going to be able to be changed to Building 1 but Nicole at the reservations desk SAVED MY
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this wonderful review and kind comments. So fun to hear that you celebrated your friend's birthday with us and that you will be coming back to celebrate your birthday with us! We love that Nicole saved your upcoming trip and got you the room that you wanted. We pride ourselves on our customer service and will be sure to share your comments with Nicole and the rest of our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: It's a great hotel, perfect for any Disney bound visitors due to several factors:   1) Location: Walkable distance to the front of Disneyland (10 minutes or so depending on how fast you are walking). The hotel is also nicely located for the fireworks.  2) Amenities: The water park is awesome, specially for the kids. No more reservation required as of July 28 I believe.  3) Room: Clean, enough plugs (power and USB cables) for your electronics. Netflix is installed on the TV so you can log in. No need to go to front desk as there is a self checkout option from the TV as well.  Alas it's one point off from being an excellent rating due to the following:  1) Response time from front desk/housekeeping: Seriously, just go down to the front desk to request towels, etc as housekeeping
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are delighted that our location was perfect for you to walk to Disneyland and see the fireworks from our hotel. Glad to hear that your kids enjoyed our water park and that you noticed all the extra USB and power outlets in the rooms. Thank you for your feedback regarding the responsiveness of our Housekeeping team. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Manager. We are thrilled to see that you would stay with us again! We'll see you then.

Summary: Great experience! Nice room, we got a free upgrade! Our room fits the whole family and we had good sleeps at night. It was great! Close to Disney land. Easy to visit , good location if you want a staying near Disney land.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay with us. We are delighted you had a great experience and a good night's sleep. While not always available, we are thrilled that we are able to upgrade your room. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This hotel is really close (walkable) to Disneyland and California Adventure with only one major street crossing. The water park is great; reservation-only so keep that in mind. You can use the nice second pool if you don't want to do the water park. The staff was all friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We love that you enjoyed our water playground. We have great news! As of July 28, 2022, seating reservations are no longer required to use our Castaway Cove facility. You are free to come and go as you choose to both our water facilities (based on safety capacity). We hope you think of us when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Parking is horrible, have to pay daily which I‚Äôm OK with‚Ä¶ but asked for an additional spot due to my husband arriving later and was willing to pay and kept getting told they had no spots available when clearly their was 20+ spots available every day and night during our stay. Front desk staff has attitudes especially Summer, I can see you rolling your eyes BTW. Horrible!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We apologize that your husband could not park his car in our parking lot. We understand your frustration, especially since you saw parking spaces available. Since we have limited parking, our guests are allowed one parking spot per room; this ensures we have enough parking spaces for incoming guests. We truly apologize for the attitude of our Front Desk Team and the service you received. We will be sure to share your comments with our Front Desk Manager to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Really nice location and hotel. Clean and friendly! House keeping was very helpful and responded immediately to our call for addition items when we dropped a beverage on the bed.  I would recommend the hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Nice family motel, but be prepared to shower in the dark...
Summary: Nice hotel, comfortable and surprisingly quiet considering how many kids and families were on property.  My only complaint was the automatic lights in the bathroom.  The sensor does not recognize movement if you are in the shower, so unless someone stands by the light switch to activate it you are showering in the dark.  It also goes off about every 15-30 seconds it does not detect movement... so pee quickly I guess.  Otherwise the room was extremely clean, the pools were nice and the staff all friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Thank you for letting us know about the light sensor in the bathroom. We will be sure to share your comments with our Maintenance Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: The facility here is really nice and clean. The staff are all excellent! They go above and beyond to make your stay great.   Our room was facing the highway and   I was a little worried about how bad the noise would be.  But they did an excellent job sound proofing  Pool area is nice and clean,   the kids water park s super cool, excellent for younger kids
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our location. We are so happy to hear you did not experience any highway noise and that our Staff were helpful. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: The rooms were filthy, the carpet was dirty and the beds crumbs & hair
Summary: The rooms were filthy, we felt gross walking barefoot on the carpet. The AC was off when we walked into the room, it was a hot week and the room never got cool enough yo be comfortable in it. The smell of mold & must was hard to get rid of. The beds had crumbs and hair as we pulled back the covers. It was a horrible experience night one one. We talked with guest services but they could t do anything for us bc their hotel was completely booked, they offered another room but it would cost us twice as much. They were not willing to be helpful. We ended up having to check out the next day, and spend all day/money looking for a lady minute hotel. Thankfully the Hyatt Regency  was accommodating and also offered a discount after hearing of our horrible experience with Wyndham. Never
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us. We're disappointed to hear that you did not experience the kind of five-star stay that we strive to provide all of our guests. Our goal is to address guests‚Äô concerns and resolve any issues to their satisfaction. While we are more than happy to find a better room for you and your family since the dates of your stay fell over a peak time when we were sold out. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards, especially the smell and bread crumbs,  we expect and we will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We hope you enjoyed your stay at the Hyatt Regency and are happy to hear that you were able to book at a discounted rate. Should your travels ever bring you back to Anaheim, we hope to have the chance to improve upon your experience.

Summary: Great place to stay. Staff very helpful I recommend this place. I really want to thank the Staff  for letting us check in couple hours early because of our early flight and then they let us check out  later then our check out time. Amazing place
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted our Staff was able to accommodate all of your family's needs. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: WORST HOTEL CHECKIN EXPERIENCE! Room reserved had been given to someone else.  No one had an answer as to why this had happened.  Apparently the person that the room was given to had my same last name.  However that didn't make sense, due to the fact that I was asked for me identification and asked many questions.  The room key was provided to me and to my surprise and my family's surprise the room had been already taken by someone else.  I went to the front and told them about the situation and no one had an answer.  Apparently they didn't even know the room was already occupied. Hotel Employees, Rafael and James had awful customer service and they seem to be blaming me for their mistake.  My family and I were sent to another room that had not been cleaned out yet.  We found
Manager Response: We are so disappointed to hear about the experience you had upon your arrival. We truly apologize for our mistake. This was not a normal situation and we fully understand your frustration. This is a situation that we have brought up to our managers and Front Desk Staff. We always strive for improvement and we will use your experience to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Option for Families Coming for Disneyland!
Summary: We had a wonderful experience at the Howard Johnson by Wyndham Anaheim Hotel and Water Playground! The front desk staff was incredibly friendly and professional when checking in and checking out. They also helped us secure a double stroller for the parks last minute and handled the entire booking process. Although we only got to enjoy the water playground once, our kiddos loved it! The rooms were clean, we had a view of the Disney fireworks, and it was within a 10 minute walk of the parks. We would definitely choose this hotel again. Only thing we wish it had was breakfast, but we knew that before booking and came prepared!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service.  We're thrilled to hear that our Front Desk staff was able to offer you and your family peace of mind by securing the double stroller. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation! See you at the Castaway Cove during your next stay!

Summary: We can't wait to return to this hotel! After staying at a few different locations over the years for our family disney trips, I can't imagine staying anywhere else again. The pools were perfect ways to relax and it was so easy to come back and decompress. Plenty of room for our family to unpack and spread out. The reservation system for the water park was great but definitely request your table/chairs as early as possible, especially for weekend stays.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!  See you at the Garden Pool!

Summary Heading: Problems with Howard Johnson Wyndham Anaheim Hotel
