Summary: The main water feature was closed when we got there and nothing was being done to fix it. One of our keycards did not work. There was a large yellow substance at the base of our toilet.  Wonder what that might be. The bathtub was very slow to drain. The pillows were very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the toilet and drain. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: I recommend HOJO Anaheim to anyone planning a family trip to Disneyland.
Summary: My family had a great stay at HOJO Anaheim. Fun water park for the kids. Nice pool. 8 minute walk to Disneyland. Restaurants near by and HOJO has a nice gift shop. Rooms were clean with comfy beds. Loved it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments, we are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  We are glad you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground and Garden Pool! We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Such an incredible hotel. We love staying here on our Disneyland trips. Absolutely love the rooms here. Even though we are traveling, its like coming home the second we step on to Hojo property. The beds are absolutely the best beds in Anaheim, every staff member is helpful and kind, the property is beautiful, the midcentury look is so fun, and the showers are glorious. This last visit was just me so I spent time sitting by the Garden Pool, as well as more time in Downtown Disney. Our next trip we are planning to take our daughter to the water playground for the first time. Cannot wait to be back next month!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We are excited to host you again soon, we can't wait to hear about your daughter's first time to our Cast Away Cove water playground!

Summary: We love staying at this property when visiting the parks. Have stayed the last 3 times! My kids love the water park and it‚Äôs perfect area for their age and a perfect last day thing to do to end our trip.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and perfect for young families!
Summary: We loved our recent stay at the HoJo Anaheim! Our hotel room was clean and comfortable, the staff is exceptional, the pools are top notch, and it‚Äôs just a short walk into the parks which makes it easy to come and go as needed throughout the day. Will definitely be staying again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay and will stay again felt very safe with the way ur business is set up need a key to get in the gate and door , rooms were very nice , swimming pool set up was great, and food access in the area was very convenient
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our Garden Pool and location to many restaraunts and the Disneyland Resort. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The water playground was amazing and 2 hours is enough time for your kiddos to play. The staff at the gate was very nice and helpful, just remember first come first serve at the tables with umbrellas even if you reserved a table you might get stuck with a chair which is great too just not enough shade.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground and that our staff was friendly and helpful. Thank you for your suggestions regarding the umbrellas and extra shade.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: never stay here expecially if you have an autistic child.
Summary: I booked this hotel on my phone by the picture the splash park, knowing my kids will love it.We get to the hotel and find out you have to make a reservation to use the hot tub and splash park,No where on the website on my phone did it say that.I was mad That the only reason I booked that hotel.My autisitc saw the slash park and was so excited then i had to break the news we can't use it till friday at 5pm and iits wednesdayday.he had a 3hr meltdown great way to start a vacation.  each day we had to take him the back way to our room so he wouldn't see the splash park.i complained to the office on thursday and they said they get us in at 3pm just this one time.so we go down there at 330 no reservation took them 30 minutes to figure out what's going on so we played for 1 hr.I was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We are disappointed to hear about your recent experience. We are so sorry that you could not use Castaway Cove as much as you wanted. It tends to get very crowded in this area, and for the safety of our guests, we required reservations. However, we have seen the reviews of our guests regarding the pool reservation system, and as of July 28, reservations are no longer needed. We apologize that our staff was not helpful or understanding of your situation. We have shared your review with our staff and upper management so that we can continue to improve. We also apologize that your room was not cleaned to the standards we expect. We will be addressing this with our Housekeeping Manager to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and staff, with the exception of one teenage girl who needs a severe amount of training.
Summary: I have (almost) nothing but good things to say about this hotel. We visit Disneyland often and have stayed at a ton of local hotels. With the exception of the Disney hotels, this is definitely one of the best. The staff are super friendly and helpful - fantastic customer service. It‚Äôs a close walk to the parks. The rooms are great - modern amenities, spacious, comfortable beds. The water park was great for the kids. The one downside to this is the reservation system they have going on right now (covid restrictions) is a bit of a pain, but not terrible. The only real downside was one extremely rude teenager on a power trip who was working at the Castaway Cove on 7/23/22 at 2:30 who  stood at the edge of the baby pool and literally SCREAMED at my just-turned 3 year old who ran
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We're glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We are so disappointed to hear about the experience you had upon your visit to our pool.  The service you received from our Pool Attendant is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service, we are so sorry to hear we were not successful.  We truly apologize our Staff was not helpful and attentive.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: We loved our stay at the Hojo! The customer service was amazing & the cleanliness of the entire property was pristine. Only an 8 minute walk to the parks and the most comfortable beds in a hotel to sleep after a long day. Definitely consider this for your next stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The Howard Johnson Anaheim is one of our favorite places to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort. We look forward to the clean room, wonderful and accommodating staff, and cozy beds. The proximity to the parks is an 8 minute walk give or take and we have always had a great time at the HOJO!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary Heading: Great for Disney Trip with Toddler
Summary: This was our first Disney trip with our toddler and we are so glad we took the recommendation of friends to stay here for our visit. The water park and pool were great, the rooms were spacious and very clean. No issues at all! Great location for walking to and from the parks - close enough to come back for a nap and swim in the afternoon! Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time at our Hotel! We are thrilled you enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground and our location to Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: It was a great place to stay not super expensive. The location is perfect near restaurants and of course a Disney everything is walking distance to the hotel might be a little dated but it‚Äôs very very clean it feels very safe and the staff was amazing
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our amazing staff and location to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I loved my experience here! The staff were extremely helpful and friendly with whatever I needed and any questions. The grounds are well kept as well! We had a renovated king bed room and it was perfect for my wife and I! The walk to the Disney parks was the best part! So close and effortless when we wanted to take midday breaks! Will be coming back and would recommend to anyone! Especially if you have kids!
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for letting us know you loved the Deluxe King Bedroom and the short walk to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to host you and your wife again soon!

Summary: The Howard Johnson is a wonderful slice of nostalgic pie! The staff was fantastic. The rooms are clean and the perfect size for our family of 6. We booked adjoining rooms which worked perfect for us. Walking distance to the park is great. We will return!
Manager Response: We are thrilled you loved our Retro Family Fun Hotel and exceptional staff. Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed our spacious rooms and location to the Disneyland parks. Thank you for your positive feedback, we hope to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Really helpful staff, great fireworks and awesome water park
Summary: Summer, who works at the front desk, was fantastic! She really went above and beyond. Water park was tons of fun for the 7 year old. Fireworks from Disneyland felt like we had front row seats. Rooms were average.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed the Disneyland fireworks from our hotel. We are happy our Front Desk Staff member, Summer, was fantastic and that she exceeded your hospitality standards! We are always working on new ways to improve our rooms and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: It was great except no one informed us that we had to make a reservation for the water park part of the hotel until we actually arrived to check in. By that time it was too late. We did have fun in the pool though !
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We do apologize for the miscommunication about the water playground. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Garden Pool during your stay. Good news, effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove water playground or our Garden Pool. We hope you decide to give us another try when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Our stay could not have been any better!  The rooms were large and spotlessly clean, the staff was friendly and always asking if they could help in anyway. Upon arrival they upgraded our room and treated us like royalty! Quiet clean and extremely comfortable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our large and spotlessly clean rooms. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We had a wonderful time. The water parks were great, the walk to Disney was short and sweet! Everyone at the front desk and Market were so kind and incredibly helpful, every time. Thanks for everything!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team members were always kind and helpful during your stay with us. We're also glad to know that your family enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground and Garden Pool. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Would not stay there ever again
Summary: Got there in our room was not ready has to be checked in they said I would not be ready till 4:00 finally talked to a young lady in summer she was able to help us get in my room no breakfast no coffee no nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if there are any issues with their room accommodations. Each room comes fully equipped with a mini-refrigerator, microwave, and a Keurig coffee machine and we provide complimentary Keurig Pods. You can always request more coffee by simply calling the Front Desk. I apologize that your room wasn't ready before our guaranteed time of 4 PM, but happy to hear that Summer was able to get you and your family checked in. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary: I loved this hotel. We usually stay next door but this price point was better for just two nights. The walk is literally 10 minutes or less. Perfect location. The hotel room was nice and updated. Perfect spot for watching the fireworks at Disneyland. We stayed in building 1 superior room and it was great. Beds comfy. Housekeeping checked on us as soon as we got into our room which was nice and not many hotels do that usually for us. The only slight annoyance was having to do reservations for the pool area. I did one day a month in advance but forgot to do it for our other days.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our Superior 2 Queen Bed room and our location to the Disneyland Resort. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! Good news, Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove water playground or our Garden Pool. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We stayed at the Howard Johnson for four nights in July 2022.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  The room (Building 1) was very quiet and clean.  Easy parking.  We booked a room with a queen bed and a bunk because I believed it would have more space then a room with two beds, but this wasn't the case.  Our room was tiny (we travelled for a month around the USA and this was by far the smallest room we had).  This was my fault and not a fault of the hotel but I just wanted to mention it in case anyone is looking to book a similar room.  I would stay again, just in a different room type.  We did think that the waterpark and pool rules regarding checking in etc were a bit over the top.  This was the only property we stayed at during the month that we travelled that had strict
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our location! Some of our rooms vary in size; we would have been more than happy to have looked into another room that has two Queens during your stay. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Hotel is small and the Waterpark is a splash pad for kids, don't fall for it. Michael the guy at check in made it a point to make it as difficult as he could to check in. We had a check in time of 1 to 2pm and rudely told us it was 4pm and to show him proof. why so defensive Mike? We went for the Waterpark and he said you have to have a reservation otherwise you can't get in. He made us worry we couldn't go to the reason we went there was for the waterpark. He then goes "oh but its been pretty open all day so you should get in it's been empty all day. If it's empty all day why cause the fake problem for us? We got one of their biggest rooms (2 connecting) and it was tiny. We booked through a third party and made us feel like we didn't matter because of it, he made it a point to
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We only asked for proof if it's a third-party company who states we have an earlier check-in time so we may contact them immediately to provide them with the correct information to prevent this from happening again. We are so disappointed to hear the experience you had upon your arrival.  The service you received from our Front Desk Staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service, we are so sorry to hear we were not successful.  We truly apologize our Staff was not helpful and attentive.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: The hotel was clean and everyone at the hotel was very friendly. It was a bit of a walk to Disneyland but well worth it for the price.  The rooms were large and the bathroom had two sinks which allowed for a couple of people to get ready at the same time. We felt safe here as well.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We're thrilled to hear that the two sinks in the bathroom are such a convenience, especially paired with our lighting. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Location is good less than 10 min walk to Disney entrance but back against highway so if your light sleeper might be a problem, water park is awesome for the kids. The room is semi clean, fridge, blow dryer and ice machine broken basically told desk with it and would not switch us rooms. When the room was cleaned red stained sheets were put on the bed (looked like blood) was very upsetting but did not take it out on staff just asked for new sheets after a horrible experience all around the management was not accommodating whatsoever when they should try and make a guest happy at all costs especially the experience my family and I had, not once have I experienced a stay like this will be returning to desert palms
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and it will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address Guests' negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the fridge, blow dryer and ice machine. We will be sure to share your comments with our maintenance team to ensure these appliances are fixed and a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary: Friendly staff, clean room, awesome water playground for the littles, within walking distance to Disneyland and close to many restaurants. Would definitely stay here again. You can see the Disneyland fireworks from the hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and friendly service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This was the 3rd time we stayed in this hotel. This time we stayed for 3 nights. I couldn't say enough that we love this hotel!  First, the location is perfect to go to Disneyland. It's literally just across the street. It only take about 7 minutes walk to go to Disneyland. It's very convenient if you want to go back to the hotel to relax in the middle of the day and go back to the park at night. Also at night after walking at the park the whole day, it's very nice that we can just walk a little bit to go to the hotel. We don't have to wait for the bus/tram and drive.  Second, the hotel is very clean and the room is spacious. This time we had deluxe 2 queen bed room facing the garden pool. The room is very spacious for the 4 of us with 3 luggages and bags. It has microwave and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean, spacious rooms and comfortable beds. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: rooms are really nice and property beautiful. but i was really upset how the staff treated us regarding the water park. when we arrived a few hours before check in, we were given permission by the front desk to play at the water park but we previously had plans for disney that day. we stayed at the hotel with a 2 day pass to disney for my 4 yr old. on our checkout day, we planned to visit the water park and they refused us entry because it was after our checkout hours (and several hours before our flight home). my 4 yr old was devastated and it was the sole reason we booked a stay at the hotel. EXTREMELY disappointed especially since it was on a wednesday and there was absolutely not even one child playing in the water park. felt very petty and lazy and rude of the water park
Manager Response: We are so disappointed to hear about the experience you had at the water park.  The service you received from our water park staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service; we are sorry to hear we were unsuccessful.  We genuinely apologize our Staff was not communicating properly.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated.

Summary: HoJo Anaheim is an example of how to run a tourist destination hotel.  The hotel is neat, well-kept, the rooms are well-appointed and clean with adequate amenities.  The staff are genuinely friendly and accommodating.  The hotel has actually *thought* about families, so that there are bunk rooms (which we used when the kids were younger) and adjoining rooms (which we use now they are older).
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our different room types and that our staff are always friendly and accommodating. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary: Hotel was clean and modern, and beds were very comfortable. Staff was friendly. The only downside was that we were never able to get a reservation time for the castaway cove pool/spray park it was always booked solid which was disappointing, but we were able to utilize the other pool.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean and modern hotel and comfortable beds. We do apologize you were not able to experience the Cast Away Cove water playground while staying with us recently. Good news, effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove water playground or our Garden Pool. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Advertised water park .Unable to use as restrictions and booked out beforehand. Disney land had not restrictions but your hotel was very disappointing . Even the pool was restricted. Will never recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Coming from Australia this is our go to hotel when visiting Disneyland, we have stayed at this complex four times now, it‚Äôs great for families plus the water park is great to escape the summer heat, only thing currently you need to book a time slot to reserve the water park so get in early. The rooms are clean and tidy and staff friendly and helpful. There is also a shop on site which has most basic items to start you off if not most shops are 5-15 minute walk. The Hotel is close and only a short walk to the parks, at night time if your not at the park you have a great view for the night time fire works from the hotel.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and feedback about our water facilities. Good news, effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove water playground or our Garden Pool. We are happy you enjoy returning to our hotel for our clean rooms and friendly staff members! We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was perfect for our family get away! The water playground plus being across the street from Disneyland made our trip perfect for traveling with little ones. Our family enjoyed it and we definitely will come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and amenities, specifically the Castaway Cove. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. Can't wait to see you and your family during your next stay at Castaway Cove!

Summary: Disappointed that i wasted money on this hotel. I only booked this hotel so my daughter could enjoy the waterpark. Unfortunately, she only used the amenity twice throughout the duration of our 6 nights stay. Front desk is very rude when ask about pool availability. Note that we have booking for the pool but just needed rescheduling as our itinerary changes everyday. but it is impossible to talk to the employees there and u can tell they are not happy when you ask them questions. what a waste of money! Our room looks very old and smells like an old attic. we had to open the door to circulate fresh air. i am not even sure if it was cleaned properly or maybe because it is old that it smells and looks unclean. The coffee machine is filthy. You can hear all sorts of noises, footsteps
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We are so disheartened that we were not able to better assist you with your Cast Away Cove reservations. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove water playground or our Garden Pool.  We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect and we wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future.

Summary: Met expectations as advertised. Good location. Easy walk to Disneyland and surrounding businesses. Close to many restaurants for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Pool facilities are nice and clean. Kids love the water playground. Overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We take pride in our cleanliness, not only in our rooms but our pool amenities as well. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Save your money and stay in a different hotel!
Summary: I don‚Äôt know how to start! Let say disappointed it‚Äôs an understatement. We booked our stay in this TERRIBLE  hotel 9+ months  ago to make sure we had a remodel and spacious room. We got stuck with a remodel tiny bedroom that smell like cigarettes. We asked front desk to please be switch to a non smoker area only to be told we were in that kinda room already. That was only the start of our horrible and disappointing stay at the Howard Johnson.   This trip was a big celebration for us! 15 years anniversary, daughters birthday and our kid graduation trip so we decided a smelly, small room wasn‚Äôt going to stop our fun. Let‚Äôs forget about the room and take advantage of our reservations at the Castaway Cove Pool I told my husband. I think our daughter it‚Äôs going to love it. DEAD!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are sorry that you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay. We truly apologize that our Staff did not take care of your AC and that your room smelled. We will be sharing your comments with our Housekeeping and Maintenance Managers to ensure these issues get fixed. We also apologize that Castaway Cove and the hot tub were closed for part of your stay. While our water facilities are open every day from 10 am to 10 pm, there are times in which we have to close them for unexpected sanitary procedures. We hope that you were able to use our Garden Pool during the closure. We also understand that it is frustrating not to have your room serviced daily;  however, we are happy to provide additional towels or take out the trash any day. Once we get fully staffed, we hope to have daily housekeeping service reinstated. We always strive for improvement and hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Great property if you dont want the water park.
Summary: The hotel is great especially the redone rooms are beautiful. Its close to Disney, its clean, the staff with the exception of the lifeguard power trippers were excellent. We had a great trip here. Just no fun at all allowed in the splash park. Got in trouble for splashing (each other) in the splash park. Lifeguard standing over the 5 foot hot tub in case you drown micromanaging everything made us avoid the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. The service you received from our Water Park Staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service, we are so sorry to hear we were not successful.   We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated.  We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: The rooms where very clean and I loved how close it was to both of the parks. We also enjoyed the swimming pool and the kids water area. Very quiet and the fireworks can be seen from the hotel! I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and clean rooms. We are happy your family enjoyed the Garden Pool and Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great stay, loved our time in Disneyland and at Howard Johnson. Rooms were clean, staff was great. Only negative was that we weren‚Äôt allowed to stay 1 hour later in order to catch our shuffle. With 10 people it was a bit inconvenient to have to wait in the lobby.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. I do apologize that we weren't able to extend your check-out time due to our high occupancy.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: The hotel had great parking, clean, great location for Disneyland and offered a water park and a pool.  Biggest con was the noise.  You could here the room doors slam, the door to the outside slam and since we were downstairs, you could hear kids running around upstairs.  Also the room fridge was tiny.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. I do apologize for the loud noise you experienced during your stay with us. It's very hard for our littlest guests to contain their excitement when they are on their way to Disneyland. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I stay at this property on average 3 + times a year with my Family.  I have always been very happy with the property and staff. I refer all my friends and family when they are going to Disneyland.  The walk to Disney is short. The property is in a very convenient location. The staff hoes out of their way ti make sure you are happy and comfortable!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and honest referrals to friends and family.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience and you find our location to Disneyland convenient.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: We wanted a place that was close to Disneyland to stay that was less than staying at the park owned hotels this time so we thought we would check out this hotel. Was amazed by how close it was to the parks.. literally 3-4 blocks away! Also tons of food nearby.  Hotel was clean and comfortable. Rooms came with a mini fridge and microwave which was nice.   Special shout out to Nicole for the warm hospitality and help during our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so happy Nicole was able to welcome you during your stay with us!  We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: great location for disney with a afternoon water park for the kids to have fun in
Summary: excellent employee interaction, we stayed this time in building one and it was very nice.  we would go to Disneyland in the morning and hit the Waterpark at hojo from 3 to 5 daily and then hit Disneyland again at night. great break for everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our location to Disneyland and you were able to take a daily break in our Cast Away Cove water playground. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Amazing time with incredible amenities and service! We attended as part of our mommy blogger tribe takeover and what a memorable time it was!!! My kids couldn‚Äôt get enough of the water park fun and the garden pool!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! It was fun to have the Mommy Blogger Tribe stay with us. It is great to hear you loved the Cast Away Cove water playground and Garden Pool. We hope you had a relaxing time and you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We picked this hotel based on its location to Disneyland, it was an easy walk to and from the park with the kids. Our room had a view of the pool with a little patio. Our room was really clean, the internet was great. The kids loved playing on the water slides at the splash park, the only inconvenience is scheduling the reservations to use the splash park. You are allowed a 2 hour reservation per day which is nice, however then you need to plan your day around your reservation at the splash park when you‚Äôre really there for Disneyland, it would be nice if you could just show up and let your kids play spontaneously. Overall it was a wonderful place to stay while visiting Disneyland, we will come back. The front desk staff was always friendly and helpful when I had a question,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a try during your recent Disneyland vacation.  We are so thrilled to hear you loved our renovated rooms overlooking the Garden Pool in Building 2. We apologize you found the Cast Away Cove water playground reservations to be an inconvenience. We have chosen to keep the reservation system in place for the Cast Away Cove water playground to prevent overcrowding for the water safety of our youngest guests. We hope our staff provided a fun and welcoming experience and that you come to stay with us again soon.

Summary: This hotel is amazing! Close to Disney and so nice and clean. Staff was friendly and I loved how easy it was to wash clothes and go to the pool. I stayed in building 2 which was newly renovated and it felt just like a Disney hotel which it basically is as it‚Äôs across the street from Disneyland and only an 8 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are thrilled to hear you loved our clean Hotel and renovated rooms in Building 2. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope you consider staying with us again soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful experience with this hotel. We went to Disneyland for 3 days and our stay was perfect. Fantastic customer service from the day I booked until the day we checked out. We used their recommendation for car service for transportation which was Jag and they were wonderful too. Beds were extremely comfortable too. :)
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay!  We are so delighted our Staff made your visit special and you enjoyed our comfortable beds! ! Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us, we hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Best hotel in the Disneyland/Anaheim area! Comfy beds, great location, super clean and amazing staff! Our new go to hote
Summary: My husband and I booked a trip out for beginning of July 2022 and we super impressed with the entire property! We were going to Disneyland and this hotel had it all. Location, Disney touches, most comfy beds in any hotel I‚Äôve stayed at in years. Disney was a short 9 min walk from hotel. The staff were super friendly, and accommodated our every need. Nicole with reservations helped us get a car service for the airport and she was an absolute lifesaver!!!  She was so knowledgeable and helpful from before our stay until the end. Took away a lot of stress. Only hotel in the Disney/Anaheim area I‚Äôll recommend and already booked again with Nicole for the Fall. She‚Äôs a breath of fresh air for a stress ball like me. I never write reviews usually, but this is well deserved. Also, the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear Nicole was so helpful and attentive and that she made your stay a 5 star experience. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know that you had a fabulous vacation and you were able to relax. We will see you again soon in the Fall!

Summary: I did enjoy the stay the hotel was clean but the receptionist he was a male and he was very very rude. He was acting smart and told Me I should know what I‚Äôm paying . He charged me $43 when it was only for parking and he said he charged the deposit fee that would go back to my account but he didn‚Äôt explain before .
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We are so disappointed to hear about the experience you had upon your arrival.  The service you received from our Front Desk Staff is unacceptable.  We are dedicated to providing exceptional quality, value, and service, we are so sorry to hear we were not successful.  We truly apologize our Staff was not helpful and did not fully explain the $20.00 incidental authorization to your card.  We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated.

Summary: By far our favorite family hotel. Like home away from home.  Front desk, Logan was a big help and the staff are all wonderful people.  Reservations for the water playground are super easy to make and the staff are always helpful on making accommodations if it‚Äôs last minute.  The rooms are always clean and it‚Äôs 7 mins driving distance or 14 minutes walking distance to downtown Disney. You can see a really pretty firework show outside from the back building.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your "Home away from home" for family vacations! We absolutely love hosting our repeat guests. Thank you for letting us know Logan and the Hojo Staff made your stay with us special and that you were able to enjoy the Cast Away Cove water playground. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: Our stay was amazing  Everyone was friendly and helpful. The room and facilities were clean and the bed was very comfortable. Our grandson really enjoyed the pool. Another great feature was the short walk to Disneyland. Thanks to everyone responsible!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and positive feedback! It is great to hear your stay with us lived up to your expectations and that you enjoyed our location and clean rooms. We hope to host you again the next time you stay in Anaheim!

Summary: We visited the Anaheim Howard Johnson Hotel this last week and fell in love! We were able to score reservations to the Cove water playground the day of with the help of the wonderful employees in the front lobby, our room was perfect in the newly renovated building 2 and were able to make a few quick visits to Disneyland only 8 minutes away! The hotel staff was so sweet to give my daughter welcome gifts that made a lasting impression on her as well as myself being a mama. The pool & cove water playground were very well maintained, we can‚Äôt wait to be back again! -Brittany Castro
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. We are so happy to hear our Staff was accommodating and provided such a memorable welcome for your family! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we are thrilled to hear we were successful. We hope to see you and your family again during your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Amazing stay with excellent location, amenities and price!!
Summary: For our first trip as a family with kids, the Howard Johnson ended up being an amazing hotel for us and will be coming back again.  We stayed in Building 1 (1-711) on the top floor and the room was excellent in terms of condition and location.  Great view of the fireworks at night time and our oldest lived to look down at the water park.   Only thing to consider is that the top floor in this building and most have elevated ceilings with sky lights that allow light into the room during the day....so with young kids (1 & 3) we were worried about them having challenges with their daytime nap.  Due to their exhaustion from the parks and pools, it ended up being okay but it's something to think about if you plan on having mod day naps for kids.  Service was excellent throughout the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us! We are so happy to hear that you want to return soon to enjoy our location and Cast Away Cove water playground!  Our skylights on our top floors do let beautiful, natural light in during the day that brightens up our rooms and It is good to know your children's naps were not interrupted. We hope we can host you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The hotel staff was very accommodating and we were happy with the location on the hotel. It was close enough to the Disney entrance and we could watch the fireworks at night.   We were very disappointed that we had to make reservations for the water playground and sometimes wait to get a spot at the pool. The AC and internet were lacking as well. Next time we will give the Marriot next door a try.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: A great hotel that was close sand easy walk to Disneyland! The kids enjoyed the pool and water park! Room was clean and quiet even though we were right off the freeway! Front desk and cleaning staff were all great!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We had a wonderful time!  Not only could we walk to Disney and see the fireworks from the hotel at night, but the hotel's Water Playground was tons of fun.  The staff was so kind and helpful.  The newly updated suites are so nice. We can not wait to come back and stay again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities, especially Castaway Cove! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Great stay for our ü•á Disney visit
Summary: Short drive from John Wayne Airport. Walked everywhere we wanted to go from the hotel. Decent amount of restaurants in the area. Great location, clean rooms & courtyard, great staff that even helped to deflate our Disney balloon for our flight home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. For your next stay with us, stop by the Front Desk to receive a coupon for some local restaurants nearby. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I would have to say this hotel is a top-five. The rooms are clean and seem very newly remodeled. The gardens are kept clean.their customer service was wonderful. The best part was being able to swim in the pool when we got a little hot at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our relaxing pool.  Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a five-star stay in every way. See you at the Garden Pool!

Summary Heading: Best pillow and bed I've slept on.
Summary: We had 3 rooms, and they were very clean, the pillows and best were the best I have slept on. Didn't get to use the Waterpark, but the pool was very nice. The grounds are very well kept. Can't wait to plan another trip and use them!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. I agree, our pillows are an absolute dream to sleep on! For your next stay, feel free to request additional pillows at check-in, we will be more than happy to send those up. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Would recommend this to families with children for sure.
Summary: lovely, helpful staff.  Clean, well kept rooms. For families with kids the water playground is awesome and to be able to go to the pool as well is wonderful. We watched the fireworks from our balcony every night.  The kids were thrilled.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. Our Park View Rooms tend to offer a little more magic to families with children who are sensitive to loud noises and cannot be at Disneyland during the fireworks. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Great place for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: We spent 5 nights with our kids and grandkids (ages 5 and 2 1/2). It was lovely being so close to Disneyland. We could see fireworks from our balcony and it was very convenient getting to and from the parks each day. The kids loved the water park and the Disney themed decor. The adults appreciated the in room amenities like the coffee makers and fridges as well as the friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted that your grandkids got to enjoy our fun water playground. Our Park View Rooms tend to offer a little more magic to our younger guests who are unable to stay at Disneyland during the fireworks. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We loved the close walking proximity  to downtown disney! It was very reasonably priced and my kids had a blast in the water playground every day. We would do the Disney parks during the day and then come back to the hotel to relax in the hot tub.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation. See you next time at the hot tub in Castaway Cove!

Summary: I was very disappointed in this "hotel".  This is a motel at best.  There is absolutely no service, no breakfast, no bell service, no valet, no housekeeping.  The water playground is good for 3-5yr olds.  The pool is over crowded.  The towels they provide are a joke.  They are like kitchen towelettes, super small and old.  The rooms are described as newly renovated, but that just means they painted them, and added new fixtures.  The closet was so weird.  It had a door that led to the balcony.  And OMG do not get a City View side.  It's the view of the freeway, and it's LOUD all night long!!  I had requested a Disney park view, and they did not grant it to me.  I did not sleep at all!!  Stay away!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to find an alternative room option for you. For the comfort of our guests, we added soundproof windows to all our city-facing rooms (except the top floor). This soundproofing changed the entrance to the balcony a little bit, but made the rooms much quieter. While we do not have breakfast at our hotel, we hope that you were able to get breakfast items from our Gift Shop or from our partner restaurant Mimi's Cafe, across the street. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean room, fun family pool (reservations needed) and amazing customer service!
Summary: Booked through a 3rd party website as we were vacationing at Disney when a family member was hospitalized. We needed to extend our accommodations and I was looking for a hotel with a pool so my kids could play while I visited family. I wasn't aware of the pool reservation system as it wasn't mentioned on the 3rd party site. The pool was fully booked and no reservations were available online. I went to the front desk in tears as I had promised my kids a pool day. I spoke with the manager Kirn explaining what had happened and without hesitation she got us 3 reservations for our family to go to the 2 pools! The room was also nice and perfect to rest and recuperate after 3 days a disney, 2 at the pool and visits to the hospital. I would stay here again in a heartbeat! Amazing
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I understand the fact that Disney is across the street but for the amenities, or should I say lack of,   definitely not worth what we paid. It seems like they are squeezing every last cent from their guests. Why charge parking if the lot is controlled?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your most recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We take pride in being one of the last hotels in the Anaheim Resort area to charge for parking. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary Heading: A family stay in a hotel... made for families. LOVE IT
Summary: Maybe we've just never stayed in an actually family-tailored hotel before, but we were so pleased with our three nights at hojo anaheim - Room was ready when we arrived at 2 - Got the 2-room suite w. bunk bed (kids LOVED IT) and king bed. It was right next to elevator but NO noise - room had microwave and mini fridge - kids bathroom came with a step stool - Kids went nuts for the water park! It's not too big, and no real deep water anywhere that requires ability to swim (except hot tub). Slides were fun! - It's like a 15 min walk w small kids to Disney security line
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our Kid's Suite. We are thrilled to hear that the children enjoyed our bunk beds & especially the Castaway Cove! We are so happy to hear you did not experience any elevator noise and that you were able to secure an early check-in. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Building 2 only haves the 1 entrance and 1 elevator so that was a pain. The cove was just ok kids didn‚Äôt want to play long but was only able to get 1 reservation at a decent time and the main pool is not heated and only swimming area with reservations so was crowded and a parent had to be in the water couldn‚Äôt sit on the edge with them. So looks promising online for a family but I recommend staying somewhere else nicer for the same cost. Also had a deluxe room with a balcony assumed I could

There is only one small pool for six huge buildings. Not worth the almost
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address guest‚Äôs negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. However, your car has to be out by noon which I had no idea about and I read all the fine prints, I stay in hotels often. So intimately I had to relocate to Disneyland parking for $30. The building wreaked of chlorine/cleaning products enough that I wanted to
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your trip to the Anaheim Resort. We apologize that you did not have a 5 star stay with us. The kids loved the water park and the hotel was close enough to DL that we would come back and enjoy it mid day ! Summary Heading: Best hotel if you are doing disney

Summary: The hotel was cute, I enjoyed the Disney decorations and high ceilings.  It was however very frustrating that after booking the hotel they let you know that you have to make reservations for the water park area.  I checked right away and it was completely booked for the three days we were going to be staying.  The water park was the only reason I booked the hotel, there were cheaper hotels near by.  Pictures of the water park are what is shown online so it‚Äôs incredibly disappointing that you can‚Äôt use it.  Don‚Äôt stay here if you have intimations of your kids playing in the water, just save the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed our high ceilings that let in beautiful natural light. You will now be issued wristbands at check-in, that provides access to both Castaway Cove & the Garden Pool. We hope you give us another try and allow us to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Always love staying at the HoJo! It‚Äôs my favorite Good Neighbor hotel with a quick walk to Disneyland, clean and nice rooms, and amazing staff who do everything to make your stay as magical as possible!

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland. And easy and safe walk with a number of fast food restaurants along the way. We loved the convenience of it. The grounds are very nice and very clean. It felt very safe. A couple of things to keep in mind. We stayed in tower 5 and it was a little outdated, but still very clean, lots of room/storage, and very clean.  It is right by a highway and it was very noisy early in the morning (like starting around 4:30 am). If you are a light sleeper, you might consider a fan or noise machine. My only complaint was the hallway had a very bad odor the entire time. Very minor, but some air fresheners out there would be nice. For the price and convenience, we would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. This is not something we want our guests to experience, and we have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: My experience was amazing. From check in to check out the staff was very nice and greeted you whenever you saw them. We will be back.

Summary: We stayed at the HoJo during a recent road trip with a stop for 5 nights at the hotel and 4 days at Disney.  It was our first time in the area so I tried to do as much research as I could to find the best hotel. I am very happy with my choice!   I was able to get a very good price by booking early (3-4 months ahead) on the Wyndham site; cancellable.  That's one great thing I noticed about Wyndham hotels, is that their prices fluctuate and you can keep your eyes out for a great deal.    When we checked in they had blow up balloon swords and pirate hats for the kids. One thing I thought I was going to have to complain about is that when I booked in January (this was May) I booked for 6 nights, but then later thought our plans might change to 5 nights.  I called in February when
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. It is wonderful to hear that you got a good deal and that our Front Desk Team was able to keep your rate the same when you checked out early. It is great that you did not experience any highway noise. We are happy to say that all rooms that face the highway have the Ace Venture soundproof windows! We love hearing that our Pool Attendant made you feel safe; that is their top priority. We are excited to let you know we are working on renovating our game room and laundry room in Building 1. But it worth the money!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that our location made your walk to Disney a breeze! Summary: First time staying here, It was a great place to stay with family. My kids really enjoyed the water playground. It was small but fun. Clean room and comfortable bed. The room has everything you‚Äôre looking for ex. microwave, refrigerator, etc.

Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. Our goal is always to address guests‚Äô negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. Summary: We love staying at the HoJo! The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly. The room are well lit and the beds are comfortable! The CastAway Cove is so much fun! It is so close to Disneyland and is an easy 8 minute walk.

Summary: This is hands down my favorite Disneyland Resort area hotel to stay in. The refurbished rooms in building 2 are so bright and cheerful, and you would never know they back up to the 5! They come with Alexa in the room, so you can always use white noise from that if you need to.  I love the bright makeup mirror in the bathroom and the fact that they also provide shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Helps minimize luggage space when you don't have to bring that! Both of the pools are super nice and it's easy to make reservations for them. I always end up stopping at the little store to grab drinks for the end of the day. There is a microwave and mini-fridge, a little table, ample lighting and super comfy beds.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacation! Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback. We are so pleased to know that we have always provided you with a delightful experience. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary: Our stay was great! Staff was nice and attentive. Our hotel room was very clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend staying here. Disneyland park is only a short walk across the street as well! That was a bonus.

Summary: What a fabulous experience, to be greeted by such helpful & extremely friendly reception staff. Our room was immaculately clean and only an 8 minute walk to Disneyland. It was nice to come back after a long day and enjoy the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made you feel welcome during your stay with us. We're also glad to know that you found our hotel clean and conveniently located to Disneyland park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: We loved this hotel. Room was spacious and super comfy. We had a regular Room, 2 Queen Beds, Non Smoking, City View (Building 1). There was a mini fridge and a microwave and a little table with a bench seat. A nice closet, desk, shelves. Plenty of storage. Very friendly. Let us check in early. Water park perfect for little kids. Short walk to Disney. Lots of close quick restaurants. A little convenience store in building 1. Guest laundry in building 2 which I used several times (it was not free but very affordable). Will definitely stay at this location again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location,  exceptional service, and spacious rooms. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I book this hotel because Disneyland Hotels were full. Last visit to the park my grandson saw the water park from the monorail, so I booked our room with him in mind. The hotel is Disney quality, clean secure and way less than what you would pay at a Disneyland Hotel. The walk to the park is slightly longer and we did see a few homeless men sleeping on the street. Other than that, it is Great family hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us! We love hearing that you decided to book with us after seeing the Cast Away Cove water playground from the Disneyland Monorail! We take pride in being a family friendly hotel that is neighboring the Disneyland Resort. We are happy you and your grandson enjoyed staying with us, we hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: We would never dream of staying anywhere else.  The location is amazing and the staff can not be beat.  My family has been staying here for our Disney trips since my son was four (he‚Äôs now nine) and it honestly feels like a second home.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us, we hope to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and well located from Disneyland!
Summary: Very new and clean hotel. Rooms are new. The waterpark and the pool are very nice BUT be advise that you need to reserve in advance your spot for the waterpark (we didn't know before arriving). The hotel is so well located to walk to Disneyland. It is much more a better idea to park there and walk instead of the Disney Parking that is fare and a shuffle is needed.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We loved the place! There was a spare bed in the closet! The room was nice with a fridge and microwave. It was super easy to get to and from Disneyland. Excellent service all around from check in to check out! The water park was perfect, we had an amazing time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our in-room amenities. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: it was good for the most part
Summary: Pros: Location location location.  Can't beat the location.  SOoo close to disneyland, we made multiple trips on both days that we were there.   Staff was very friendly.  I forgot my toothbrush and called them at 5am ish and got a new toothbrush asap. Waterpark!!! enough said.  My kids had a lot of fun and the hotel staff put us very close to the water park area so it was pretty convenient As other reviews have said-their alexa feature in the room was a huge hit for my teen and pre-teen.  Could have been a dance party in my room.  Cons: Bathroom was small and could be updated.  (looked a little motel ish.)
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We aim to please, no matter what time! We are so happy to hear that we were able to accommodate your request for some common forgotten items. I'm sorry to hear that our bathrooms were not up to par to your satisfaction. Our two-story buildings are next to be renovated. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel but parking was a mess
Summary: The hotel was clean and location was convenient for our trip to Disneyland but they would not honor the free parking offered by the third party site I used to book our room. They then gave us a voucher to park the following day (after check out) at the theme park since they did not have enough spots but Disneyland did not honor it so we had to pay for parking again.
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We apologize that the 3rd party site did not have the most accurate information regarding our parking and amenities at our property. We are working closely with third-party companies to ensure that they have the most accurate & up to date information about our property. We offer parking vouchers for Anaheim Gardenwalk to match our parking fees if we are sold out & are unable to extend parking on the day of check-out. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Anyone with a walking baby/toddler, this is your spot in terms of the waterpark! The waterpark was perfect for my 3.5 year old daughter, and my sister's 18 month old and 4 year old. The location to Disneyland can't be beat. Lots of restaurants nearby, including McDonalds for a quick Happy Meal. And the staff was excellent. Very friendly and helpful. I have to admit the reservations prior to arriving and customer services was okay. But once you're there, it's fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and Cast Away Cove water playground. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Clean comfortable room, super comfy beds w/pillows that weren‚Äôt too huge (hate that), pool and water play area were great. Wifi was terrible. Easy walk to DL, helpful and professional customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that you to enjoyed our fun water playground. We are so saddened to hear your internet connection was inconsistent, next time be sure to alert our Front Desk Staff right away. This gives us the opportunity to fix any problems and ensure you receive a 5-star experience. Despite this small issue, we are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Really great hotel, perfect location and would highly recommend. We will return for sure. Mimis restaurant nearby was brilliant and walk to disney parks was quick and easy. Didn‚Äôt use the water park but it looked excellent.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our location to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Rooms were not ready by 4:00 pm and we arrived at 12:30 pm.  They offered us 10% discount which turned out to be $16.00.  Also, they charged us for a rollaway and said there were signs all over the room...we didn't need them kids just wanted to sleep on them. Said they would refund us and still have not as of yet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We apologize that your room was not ready at 4pm for check-in. This is a rare occurrence and does not happen unless there is an overwhelming demand for housekeeping services. We have tags on the rollaway bed and a sign on the door that let our guests know there is a charge for using the rollaway bed. We are currently looking into your reservation regarding the refund. We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. If you come back to Anaheim we do hope that you will give us another opportunity to make sure that we give you the best experience possible.

Summary: I REALLY wanted to love this hotel based off so many reviews and good words from multiple bloggers. But unfortunately, there was just a few things that put in a damper in it for us. To start, the whole pool reservation thing is a real pain the neck and trying to plan your Disney Day around a time slot when you really only wanted to enjoy it for 20mins was annoying. The whole driveway/parking lot is a mess, you can only go in/out one way and if you have a big vehicle, be prepared for 3 point turns, they need to utilize all their entrances /exits.  But the things that really put us over as parents of littles; one, there were no luggage carts to be found. two, there was no automatic doors to get into the building, if you are traveling with a stroller, you already know why that is a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. Reservations are no longer required at our Garden Pool, but still required at Castaway Cove. Castaway Cove reservations are for safety reasons to make sure our lifeguards can watch all guests, and to prevent overcrowding, which can be a major safety concern. We are in the process of adding a second gated security entrance, which will alleviate some of the traffic. I do apologize that you were not able to locate any luggage carts, guests will typically store them in hallways & even the parking lot when done especially during check-in and check-out time. We always recommend calling the Front Desk if you have any concerns or questions, and we are always happy to assist with any situation.
