We are thrilled that Mike was able to brighten your stay by finding an alternative room option for you and your family. Thank you for letting us know about the shower and water temperature. We will be sure to share your comments with our Maintenance Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Love this hotel. To Perfect for Disneyland stay and beyond! It was an excellent place to stay for the family. The water park was a hit. A short walk to Disneyland. This is the best place for anyone to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our water playground and location. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Location was nice, everything else was ok
Summary: I read the reviews and was nervous to book but decided to go ahead and try it since the location was walking distance to disney, overall it was ok. Really you are paying for location here. Didn't get a chance to use the Waterpark since the reservation system was inconvenient for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are glad to hear you appreciated our location to Disneyland.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We have removed pool reservations for our Garden Pool on May 13th. Hopefully you were able to enjoy the pool during your stay. We have chosen to keep the reservation system in place for the Cast Away Cove water playground to prevent overcrowding for the water safety of our youngest guests. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Extremely reasonable on pricing for the rooms. We stood in the family suite with the bunk beds and the kids loved it and we got our privacy after a long day at the park. Very clean, staff was super pleasant and water slide was a huge plus! 10/10 can‚Äôt wait to come back
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! We are so glad to hear you loved our Kid Suite, water playground and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Hotel was clean, wish we didn‚Äôt have to make reservations for the pool/splash pad because it wasn‚Äôt mentioned on the website and by the time we realized it, they were all booked for our stay.  Also wish the mini fridge had a freezer section in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you found our hotel clean. I apologize that you were not aware Castaway Cove reservations were required. We have it posted on our website and try to send all our guests an email letting them know how to make reservations. While our Castaway Cove Playground still requires reservations to prevent overcrowding, as of May 13, 2022, reservations for our regular pool are no longer required. All of our rooms have a mini refrigerator in the room, but if you need to place something in the freezer for medical purposes, we are happy to find a way to accommodate this request. We always encourage our guests to come to us with any issues they have during their stay. If you come back to Anaheim, we do hope that you think of staying with us again.

Summary: Our room was ready a couple hours before check in! Staff was very friendly and the room was very clean! Wonderful stay. A few minute walk to the Parks! Mimi‚Äôs Cafe and Panera was right across the street! . Will 100% stay there again for our next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special and that you enjoyed our location to many restaurants in the area. We look forward to hosting your family again soon!

Summary: Our kids had a blast! The splash pad is so convenient and was a perfect break away from the park on a hot afternoon. The view from our room was an added perk. Our family looks forward to more ‚Äústaycations‚Äù in the future,
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay!  We are happy you enjoyed the Cast Away Cove water playground and the view from your room. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Everyone was friendly and helpful. Such a great location, Mimi‚Äôs is just across the street.  Short walk to Disney and water park and pool to cool off after we returned. Would gladly stay again, specially with kids !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to providing excellent service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful!  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation! See you at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: We stay at the Howard Johnson all the time! The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean and well maintained. Would highly recommend anyone needing a room in the area to check them out! They have the best beds and pillows!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds and feathery soft pillows. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Family fun time at the Happiest place on earth!
Summary: First time staying with you all and loved it! I give you 5 stars for the friendly staff, clean and nice rooms, and very attentive house maids whenever we needed towels and things for our room. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean & gorgeous rooms! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Overall good experience and room was nice and clean. Slightly disappointed with our booking though. It said it sleeps 5 people and from the pictures it showed it had a couch which we thought our son was able to sleep on. Our room didn‚Äôt have a couch and when we asked for a cot it was an additional $15 a day. We rented this room specifically for 5 people but only got 2 double beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. I'm so sorry that some photos were misleading to your specific room type. Our Suites are the only room types on our property with a couch.  We recommend that once a guest books a stay with us, to call us directly at the Front Desk to confirm the specific room type that was booked and to answer any in-depth questions about our room types & amenities. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity better to serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Very clean and comfortable kids loved the castaway cove they love the room so comfortable and fresh. Will definitely be staying here again loved the new Disney updated rooms. Great location from McDonald‚Äôs before Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! I'm glad you enjoyed our close proximity to delicious fast food on the way to Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Hotel was very nice and clean. Makes you feel at home and the buildings are secured. However, there was no breakfast included though it was mentioned on our booking. Overall, we had a pleasant stay with the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are thrilled & honored to hear that you feel at home and safe while staying with us. I'm sorry to hear that your booking mentioned that breakfast is included in your reservation. We are closely working with third parties to get the most updated & accurate information regarding our property. We have food items in our Main St. Market, and we are conveniently located right across the street from Mimi's Cafe. Our sister property, Courtyard Marriot, has a scrumptious bistro that our guests are most welcome to enjoy. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: The hotel is a really fantastic place to stay, it is situated right next door to The Disneyland Resort! The hotels pools& amenities are really great and the whole place is spotlessly clean! The staff at the hotel are very professional & polite and go out of their way to help you & to make you feel right at home. I was there for 16 nights and they could not have made me more welcome.  My room was really nice and looked out onto a garden area with a fountain, my room was very comfortable & clean. I really enjoyed staying at this hotel & would recommend it to anyone, and would stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so delighted to hear we were successful! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the peaceful courtyard views. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: First time staying at the HoJo by Disneyland! We stayed in building 1, which they said has been recently renovated! The room was beautiful, clean, beds were comfortable, and every person working we interacted with was so kind and considerate! It was a walk to Disneyland (under 10 min) and it felt safe walking back to our hotel at midnight. We loved cooling off at the pool midday and getting a quick nap before heading back to the park at night! The whole stay was such a treat for our family, we will definitely be visiting again soon! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your recent stay with us. We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park and especially how safe you felt! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: The House Keeping Staff Makes You Feel At Home
Summary: The rooms are the main highlight and the House Keeping staff mainly Ananda and Subhajit took care of us. They ensured we had a clean room and a fresh start to everyday. Amazing experience and would recommend to anyone looking for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us! We ar glad to hear that our Housekeeping Team took good care of you. We hope to be your top choice of hotels when visiting the Disneyland area.

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights with my family and it was such an easy and stress free experience.  We had amazing experiences with all the staff members we encountered. We arrived early and even though there wasn't a room ready, Samantha was really helpful and allowed us to store some bags while we headed off to the parks for the day. When we returned Logan helped to give us our keys as well as show us how to get to our room. On the day of checkout, Arial from the front desk was really helpful and let us get a late checkout because our youngest wasn't feeling very well that morning and our pick up wasn't due to pick us up until mid afternoon. They recommended calling early on the day of checkout to see if we would be able to get a late checkout. Thankfully they allowed it! It was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family had such a great time and really enjoyed our location! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: 5 minute walk to Disneyland!! Beds were like clouds super comfortable! We stayed in building 1 and it was very nice and updated! Little shop on the first floor. Check in was easy. Had family in building 3 and not as nice as building 1. The halls and room had a weird smell to me. Did not have that in building 1. The kids water park area is nice just sucks if you book your hotel last minute most of the reservations were taken and you only get 2 hours a day at each area. Pool vs water park. I understand the need for reservations it would just be nice to not have a time restraint. Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. We apologize for the experience you had with the smell in Building 3. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience, and have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. We no longer require reservations for our Garden Pool, reservations are still required for our children's water playground, The Castaway Cove. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Stayed here over ten years ago in one of the old buildings and honestly staying in the old buildings again feels like nothing had changed. Room was musty, carpets badly stained, bathroom needs a reno. Went to the building 2 to do laundry and it looked and SMELLED so nice. We used the garden pool which was nice. The stairs to get in were slippery so I slipped in. Booking pool time was s bit of a hassle but it was nice to get a chair/table easily. Location and the water play area are the selling points for this hotel. Easy walk to Disneyland and great to stop by McDonald's to grab breakfast on the walk in. It is noisy at night between the highway and harbor blvd traffic and the fireworks. My friend had free hotels.com nights to use so that was the main reason we stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your recent stay with us. We apologize for the experience you had with the smell in the building. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience, and have brought your comments to the attention of our Executive Housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. I'm sorry to hear that you slipped in our Garden Pool, we will be addressing this with our Maintenance Manager, to prevent this from happening again. We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: AMAZING staff. They were so kind and helpful. The room was comfortable & clean! The water park was a lot of fun. The shop in the hotel was a great addition. We will stay here every time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience of our Main Street Market. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Pleasant as usual, but room wasn‚Äôt as clean as it should be
Summary: We‚Äôve always loved staying at the Hojo, but the room didn‚Äôt seem as clean as it usually does. I noticed a lot of marks and smudges on the bathroom walls and stains on curtains and lampshade. When I wiped off the light switch it left noticeable dirt and dust on my antibacterial wipe so I know that hadn‚Äôt been done in at least a few stays. I‚Äôm sure they are short staffed, but hopefully they can invest more in housekeeping to provide cleaner, more comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We apologize that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. Thank you for letting us know about the smudges on the walls, curtains and lampshade. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is my second time here with my family and would do it again. The only thing I didn't like is there is a reservation required to visit thr pool area and I was not aware of this. I still enjoyed the time here. See you soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! Our Garden Pool no longer requires reservation, only our Castaway Cove. Reservations for the Castaway Cove become available 30 days in advance of your stay with us. You are more than welcomed to call us directly at the Front Desk for assistance with reservations. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We stayed in an ADA room in a newly renovated building and it was GREAT! It was very spacious, had multiple bars on the bathtub, a removable shower head and a transfer board in the hall closet. (We do not have a wheelchair, it was just something I observed). I loved the Disney art throughly the room and property! Other people in our party stayed in a non-renovated room and it was spacious, clean and very retro(adorably retro) and even had a large balcony! The reservations for the pool and water park are a little cumbersome and annoying to use BUT the low capacity made for a fun and safe time for my daughter, with only 6-10 families allowed every two hours.   The walk to Disneyland is 5-10 min (depending on how tired the kids are!) and using the crosswalk in front of the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our handicap-accessible amenities in our ADA rooms! Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback, especially with our retro decor. Starting May 13th, we will be releasing reservations for our Garden Pool & only requiring reservations for our Castaway Cove. We are looking forward to hosting you again!

Summary Heading: Do not accept a bunkbed room in Building 1
Summary: This was our first trip to Disney with my sister and her family. We were so excited but that quickly dissipated when we arrived. I suppose our first mistake was asking for a bunkbed, when we asked if our rooms could be joined the response was no because you want a bunkbed. Then when we asked if our rooms had a view, no because you booked a bunkbed. We arrived at our rooms, they were SO small, no drawers for clothes, bathroom could not even hold a bag of toiletries... and access to fresh air was through the closet and then another set of doors over the freeway. It was terrible. Thankfully we worked up the nerve to approach the staff again during the weekday and what a different experience. Ariel at the front desk saved the day, she moved us to building two, we gave up the
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We always strive for improvement. I do apologize that the original bunk bed room did not meet your expectations. We have bunk bed rooms in Building 1 & Building 2 with either a city view or a pool view. I'm beyond thrilled that Arielle was able to move you and your family into a more suitable & spacious room. We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We take pride in our Customer Service, so thank you for allowing us to make this right. For your next booking, please feel free to call us directly and ask to speak to In-House Reservation; we will be able to answer all of your questions to ensure your room is ideal for your needs. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Great location only 5 -10 min walk from the park. Beds are super comfy and loved the bathroom!!! So, big and spacious. Loved that you can hear the fireworks and see them depending on what room you are in. Great for kids and for people with out kids. Great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We always stay here every time we come down from Canada. It feels like home to our family and we will always return!! So close to the parks, we watch fireworks from our room. Love the big garden pool and the gardens are always beautiful!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback. It warms our heart knowing that we are your home away from home.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stays with us!

Summary Heading: Disgusting and smells bad. Nothing like the pictures.
Summary: Old furniture. Bad management. Weird people. Old rooms dont even have an elevator. Dont take your kids here, its the same price as any other well-known and modern hotel, use your money with something better. The room smells bad
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review. We apologize for the experience you had with the smell in the building and room. This is definitely not something we want our guests to experience, and have brought your comments to the attention of our executive housekeeper to ensure this is taken care of right away. We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you.  It is our goal to always address guests‚Äô negative comments. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Had an amazing experience. Perfect for families. Clean and felt inviting. My only issue was the spa is located in the water park are with the children instead of by the pool. We couldn‚Äôt relax in the spa because of the children in and out but it is perfect for families.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so delighted that you appreciate our family-friendly hotel since we are an eight-time national winner for "Best for Families in the U.S." by Trip Advisor. We hope you have a more relaxing time at our hot tub for your next visit.

Summary: Fun hotel. SUPER close to Disneyland. Clean hotel and comfy beds. The water park area is great. I wish the pool and water park areas didn‚Äôt have reservation requirements. Other than that, the property was a lot of fun.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our comfortable beds and location to the Disneyland Resort. Starting May 13th we will no longer require reservations for our Garden Pool. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Nice rooms and close to Disney.  We stayed there after Star Wars night at Disneyland.  The pool was nice and having a small little water park for the kids is a plus.  In addition, the staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are so glad to hear you appreciated our exceptional service.  We hope you had a great time at Star Wars Night and that you enjoyed how close we are to Disneyland after a long night of fun. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Loved the water park and proximity to Disney. Room was fine, no continental breakfast which similar priced places offered, I‚Äôve heard they left cute stuff for people birthdays but when I asked for my son they didn‚Äôt do anything. Not a deal breaker, just nothing exceptional. Go for the location and the fun water park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you loved our location and the amenities at our hotel. Although we do not offer continental breakfast at our property, our sister property across the street, Courtyard Marriot, has a Bistro with scrumptious breakfast options available for our guests. We have menus available at the Front Desk for your next stay. For birthdays, if our Reservation team is fully staffed, it is a possibility we might provide some balloons & a cute card for the birthday guest. The only way to guarantee a birthday package is to call us at the Front Desk and ask to speak to our Main St Market, which is our gift shop, and purchase the package. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great stay. Easy to book room, easy to check in. Room was clean and had plenty of space for my family.  In the room we were in - the shower was interesting - 2 different shower heads so depending on how you turned the handles - turned on the specific shower head The interactions we had with the staff were all great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and you loved your clean and spacious room. Not all of our rooms have two showerheads. It sounds like you might have stayed in one of our speciality rooms. Next time you stay with us, you are welcome to contact the Hotel directly to confirm the specific room type you are in. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels we‚Äôve been to
Summary: This was by far one of the best hotels my family and I visited. We were able to check in right away the room was very clean there is a market and many restaurants around the area for your needs. The water park was the best
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you appreciated our location, exceptional service, and Castaway Cove. Our Mainstreet Market has recently extended it's operating hours, and is now open until 11 PM. We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: Place was clean! Rooms were renovated! The kids had lots of fun in the pools. Service was awesome at check in. But it‚Äôs so close to Disney and the access to everything else is so close. Definitely staying again in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We're happy to hear that your children had a blast at both our Castaway Cove & Garden Pool! We take tremendous pride at our customer service and I'm pleased to hear that you had a fabulous experience during check-in. We can't wait to host you again in the near future.

Summary: Love how close the HoJo is to Disneyland. My kiddos are 4, 2 and 1 and they LOVE the splash pad. We usually book the family suite and we love having two bathrooms, the king bed and the bunk beds! Plenty of room for everyone and we love the cute decor in the newly renovated rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are thrilled that you enjoy the Kid's Suite. We love it as well, especially since the bunk beds are in a separate area, and this offers some much-needed rest after a day at Disneyland. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We loved this hotel! The location was perfect for our Disneyland trip and was located to so many convenient restaurants and stores the only reason I‚Äôm not giving 5 stars is because we didn‚Äôt like having to have pool reservations.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you loved our location and the amenities at our hotel. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with getting to your pool reservations and wish that we would have had the opportunity to address the situation while you were here. As of May 13th, we will be releasing reservations for our Garden Pool, but still be requiring reservations for our Castaway Cove. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Excellent accomodation, clean large rooms we were a group of four adults in the one room lots of space.Staff very friendly and helpful. A very short 7 minute walk to Disneyland, very easy to come back to during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The section  (building 2) we stayed in was newly renovated so it was quite nice with updated fixtures and security. The staff were friendly and helpful. I didn‚Äôt mind paying the premium price however the city tax should have been included because it gives a false sense that you are paying less than you actually are. Though it is the city that is imposing this gouging tax it just makes you feel like being robbed of your hard earned money to a city that is already rich off of Disney ( don‚Äôt get me started on them )  The night person forgot his name but will remember his polite and gracious demeanor. There is a subtle but noticeable vibration in building 2 certainly coming from the adjacent freeway! Hello ! If you‚Äôre not sensitive you can ignore it and sleep well. Note: Our room
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay. Thank you for being understanding regarding the Anaheim tax, especially since it is out of our control. If you call us at the Hotel, we are happy to provide the full price of the stay, including taxes & other fees that might apply before your stay.   We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Even if it is regarding the noise of the freeway, we will be happy to see what we can accommodate for you. We hope to see you during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay for our Disney Vacation
Summary: I have very fond memories of staying at HoJos in CT when I would visit family. When I found a Howard Johnson Hotel walking distance from Disney, I knew i had to give it a try. And I was NOT disappointed! Or stay was phenomenal from the moment we arrived! We were able to check in early (which I know is not always the case but were assured we would be able to store bags, use the pool, etc if we couldn't get a room right away). The front desk staff were so friendly and helpful at every encounter. The room was comfortable and very clean! The pool was so relaxing and the reservation system was a nice perk, we liked the pool so much we didn't even end up using the water park. The hotel grounds were very well kept and easy to manage. Being a 7 minute walk from Disney (and shorter to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient for your visit to the park. We are so delighted you found our rooms comfortable and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to see you during your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: My family had a great stay! My mom and I shared a room while my sister and her family of 5 shared another room. The rooms were clean and neat, a little dated but overall nice. The kids enjoyed the pools (the pool reservation was a bit annoying, but once made it wasn't bad) and the proximity to Disneyland was perfect! Check in and check out was super easy too! The staff were very nice and helpful! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your most recent stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. All of our rooms in Building 1 and Building 2 have been recently renovated. We are currently planning renovations on Buildings 3-6 and hope to have the entire property fully renovated within the next few years. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Our room was nothing like what was pictured online - they clearly haven‚Äôt renovated all rooms but don‚Äôt advertise that. We were also super disappointed that pool and water park reservations were required to use those amenities. It was very close walking distance to food options and the Disneyland gate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your recent stay with us. . We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback. All of our rooms in Building 1 and Building 2 have been recently renovated. We are currently planning renovations on Buildings 3-6 and hope to have the entire property fully renovated within the next few years. You can always give us a call directly and any of our staff member will be happy to assist you to make sure we get the room that is perfect for you. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: The whole staff is so nice and welcoming. My 5 year old enjoyed the water park! Everything is so neat and clean. We will definitely stay there again in the future and recommend it to family and friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a glowing review! We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us! Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our Castaway Cove. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: The happiest good neighbor hotel on earth
Summary: Friendly staff and the newly renovated rooms have such a fun and bright vibe. I stayed in room 1711 and had a perfect view of Matterhorn and the fireworks at night. I loved that you can walk to the parks and come back mid day for a nap to refresh. Definitely coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your 5 out of 5 review! It is great to hear you enjoyed our bright and cheery, newly renovated rooms. We are happy you found our location convenient and that you had a lovely view of the Matterhorn and fireworks. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Too much freeway noise and ridiculous pool reservation system still in place
Summary: CONS: Be very aware of the level of freeway noise if you book this property. I booked Building 2 as I was told it would be quiet there. I called and was told all rooms were quiet in that building. I had requested a quiet room when I checked in as well and was assured it would be. Our room was still close to the freeway which led to a night of no sleep. When I complained, the manager did move me to a much quieter room, but it should have been done from the start. It led to tired day in Disney. It is the closest hotel to the freeway and you hear noise throughout the property. Only book it if noise doesn't affect your party.  Pool reservation system was ridiculous. My family is very COVID conscious but the reservation system makes people book up the time slots to have one and no
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We apologize that you could hear the freeway noise from your room. Building 2 tends to be our quieter building, but I am glad we were able to find a room that was more to your liking. We have added soundproof windows to our freeway-facing rooms.  While pool reservations started due to Covid, we have chosen to keep the reservation system in place for the Castaway Cove Water Playground to prevent overcrowding and our guests' water safety. Our Garden Pool no longer requires reservations. We are happy that you liked the size of our rooms and that we were a short walk to Disney.  We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity better to serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean. Summer at the front desk was very sweet and helpful. The only complaint I have is the pool situation. We paid 2 grand for the hotel and my kids never got to use the pool even once
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your stay with us. We are delighted that Summer was helpful and that you found our hotel to be clean.We are sorry to hear that you were not able to use the pools during your stay. While reservations for our Castaway Cove are required in advance. If you were unable to make a reservation, we highly recommend calling our Front Desk 30 minutes after each start time to see if we have had any cancelations, when you are at our hotel. While it is not guaranteed, we tend to get cancellations and can let other guests into the area. We hope you stay with us again and are able to enjoy our aquatic facilities.

Summary: Wonderful staff, spacious modern rooms, great for far family and kids .  Water area was great too ideal for the smaller kids 10 & under, big pool great for the older ones ! A short walk from Disney, its was an ideal place for us to stay on our family vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our renovated rooms modern and spacious and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground and pool. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Our stay at the Howard Johnson Anaheim was the best! We were a large group, 22 of Us traveling together to Disneyland. #ohanameansfamily  The rooms were clean and updated, the mini market on site had all the necessities, restaurants within walking distance was a huge plus and the water park for our family was just what the grandchildren needed after their long days.  The staff at the water park was just as attentive as the staff at the front desk.  Adult scooters are available to rent for those needing assistance, saving yourself money renting in Disneyland. Heck they even took the time to deliver us one when we were midway and realized a family member would enjoy the days better riding the scooter. The distance to the main gates of Disneyland was a short walk, maybe 10 minutes
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host your family during your stay! It is great to hear you loved our location to Disneyland and many surrounding restaurants, as well as our Cast Away Cove water playground. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us, we hope to welcome your family again on your next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Great hotel with short walk to Disney and many restaurants within walking distance
Summary: We booked this hotel because of proximity to Disneyland, good reviews, and the on site water park for our 5 and 7 year old. Reservations were made ahead of time.   Pros:  - short walk to Disney - Good for young families - Pirate themed Water park and hot tub area - Free internet  - Store with Disney gear, snacks, toiletries - Mimi‚Äôs Cafe right across the street - Short walk to McDonald‚Äôs, Panera bread - Friendly staff  Cons:  - Room not cleaned daily during COVID but they were upfront about this and service is available upon request - No elevator in building 3 where we stayed   The young gentleman with blonde hair at the front desk was very friendly at check-in; could tell he enjoyed his job and genuinely took an interest in knowing the guests and assisting them. He was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you would stay with us again. All of our rooms in building 1 and 2 have been recently renovated. We hope to have the entire property fully renovated within the next few years.We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Other than being close to Disneyland  the service was awful! You have to request room service and they only empty garbage cans and give you clean towels. Room will stay messy unless you clean. The purpose of paying for a hotel is that you don‚Äôt have to clean, especially if you have have children !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We a sorry that you did not have a 5-star experience while staying with us. Due to staffing issues, we were offering limited service. This included replacing towels, taking out the garbage, and replenishing toiletries. We have recently changed to providing a full service after your 2nd and 4th day. We hope to have daily full service available soon. We hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better.

Summary: We love this Howard Johnson Hotel. The water park pool area is so much fun. The staff was awesome. So helpful and friendly! And I have to say, this was the cleanest hotel I‚Äôve ever been in. It was all around a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you had an amazing time at our hotel and that we are one of the cleanest hotels you stayed at! It is great to hear that you loved our staff. We take pride in having a great team. We hope you stay with us the next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary: If you are looking for a hotel close to Disneyland, this is the perfect place to be! It‚Äôs 8 minute walk from Disneyland! They offer huge newly renovated rooms too!  I asked twice before getting there if they can give me the newly renovated bedroom I saw from tiktok but was told they aren‚Äôt available.I was surprised when we got there that they did a complimentary upgrade on our bedroom. It was newly renovated and super spacious! This hotel made our family vacation extra special! Thank you Hojo Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special and you enjoyed your newly renovated, spacious room. We hope to see you during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The staff was very helpful. We wanted an early check in and it was no problem. Room was clean and just what we needed. It was a sort walk to Disneyland - 15 minutes at most. Didn‚Äôt get to enjoy the water park but it looked awesome and was always busy
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We are so pleased to hear our staff was helpful and they were able to accommodate your family with an early check-in. Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your clean room and short walk to Disneyland from our Hotel. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary: Very clean and comfortable. A perfect staycation with just the right amount fun!! Our family wanted to get away but not too far because of gas prices. HoJo Anaheim was perfection in our own backyard! The water park was just the right size for our Littles and the weather couldn‚Äôt have been better! And we stimulated the local economy!
Manager Response: Thank you for chosing our Hotel for your fun family vacation! We are so happy you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground along with the beautiful California weather. We hope to be your top choice the next time you want a local getaway Staycation!

Summary Heading: I will be back when pool is fully open and parking can be accommodated.
Summary: Rooms in one building are updated, but not in another. Updated rooms are pleasant. Staff were pleasant. Could not remain parked in their lot on day of checkout. The pool reservation system is very limiting, and no longer necessary.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy our renovated rooms in Building 1. We try our best to accommodate extended parking on your check out date. If extended parking is not avaiable, we work with the Garden Walk that is about the same walking distance to Disneyland as we are. We have recently changed our pool reservation system. While Castaway Cove Water Playground still requires reservation, for the safety of our guests and to prevent overcrowding, but our Garden Pool no longer requires reservations. We hope you still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: We had such a great time here!! Clean, accommodating, and so much fun!! The pirates cove was perfect for our kids with little worries on their safety.  Summer, the front desk clerk was the first and last face we saw on three night stay, and she was an absolute gem!! She was so kind and helpful, more employees should take after her. I hope she sees this and know how great she is!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our Castaway Cove safe for your kids. We are thrilled to hear that Summer made your stay memorable. We also think that she is a gem to work with. We hope that you stay with us the next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary: In our first room, we had a low water pressure situation. Mike promptly set us up with another room and went above and beyond to address the issue. The entire staff seems very customer oriented and I appreciate that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. It is great to hear that Mike was able to find the perfect room for your stay and that the rest of our staff was helpful as well. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Pool reservation system ruins the fun, but good location
Summary: Like many guests, we were here for the pool. Unfortunately, the reservation system made it practically impossible to use the pool. We didn't know about the reservations until we checked in, and by then all the reasonable slots (ie afternoon) were taken. It was a disappointment. The cleanliness was a bit of a miss too. There were hairs all over the tub and sink. I will say the front desk staff and the location were great.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. Our goal is always to address guests‚Äô negative comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We recently released reservations for the Garden Pool but still require reservations for the Castaway Cove. Reservations are for safety reasons to ensure our lifeguards can watch all guests and prevent overcrowding. We are so saddened to hear your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect, and we wish we would have had the opportunity to fix these issues to your satisfaction during your stay. We are constantly working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again!

Summary: Great stay!! Fun time for the kids at the water park. Short walk to Disneyland. Restaurants close by. Scooter rental available at the hotel. No complaints!! Can't wait to go back, we'll be staying there again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning you next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Amazing, accommodating, friendly staff. About an 8 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland. There's a little store in Building 1 that has snacks and drinks which was great when I needed milk and apple juice for the kiddos! They also have icecream, cereal and other snacks in there. Lifeguards are on duty but of course you need to watch your little ones. My son is 3 and daughter is 7 and the water play area was great for both ages.
Manager Response: We appreciate you writing a review of your stay with us. We are happy that our hotel had everything you needed for your family trip. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: Incredibly small and cramped room. No counter space in bathroom, no drawers to unpack. Had to keep everything in suitcases for entire stay and there was barley any space to put those out of the way of a family of four. No walking space and everyone had to stay on a bed while someone else was up and moving around. One of the most uncomfortable stays we‚Äôve ever had. Splash area was fun for kids and staff was nice, but accommodations for 4 nights was not ideal at all! Our room also had the balcony enclosed with a glass wall that looked like it was added after the hotel was built which allowed us no fresh air. Truly felt like a sardine can of a room.
Manager Response: We appreciate both negative and positive feedback. We are sorry that you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We apologize that your room was too small for your family. We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. In order to soundproof our freeway-facing rooms, we had to add a glass door between the sliding door and balcony. We are glad that you enjoyed our waterpark. We hope you decide to give us another try in a different room and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better.

Summary: Stayed here for our Disneyland trip. Cute hotel, love the new renovated rooms. Stay was helpful. Close to everything. Super clean rooms. Didn‚Äôt get a chance to use the pool but will definitely try next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. Hope to see you poolside at your next stay with us!

Summary: This use to be one of my favorite hotels but sadly that has changed. The pool reservation is the most disappointing, its so unfortunate that your unable to go when ever you feel like it. It‚Äôs difficult to reserve things when you have little ones. I honestly don‚Äôt plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello Karen:¬† I'm so sorry that you found the reservations system to be too restrictive during your recent visit. We found the demand for our water facilities was so high that the only way to safely and fairly limit occupancy was to institute a reservation system for seating.¬† In years past, we didn‚Äôt do a great job limiting the attendance at our facilities which created a poor experience for our guests.¬†¬†You may also have noticed we have built up an incredible facility staff, fully trained in water life-safety.¬† We are delighted to announce that effective May 13th¬†we will no longer be requiring reservations at our Garden Pool facility, but will be limiting attendance to the number of seats at the pool to ensure the safety and enjoyment of our guests.¬†¬†Reservations will continue to be required for our Castaway Cove Water Playground.¬†¬†I hope your stay was otherwise enjoyable, and that you will again consider Howard Johnson for your future Anaheim adventures.

Summary Heading: Clean room. Quick service. Housekeeper wanted us out before checkout time.
Summary: Room clean. Quick service. Housekeeper was eager to clean our room on our check out day. Woke up my whole family first time at 835am(after long day and night at Disneyland). Came back at 1035am. Check out is at 11am.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an honest review of your most recent stay with us. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We apologize that Housekeeping interrupted your family's slumber after a long day at Disney. We will be sure to share your comments with our Housekeeping Manager.  We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to serve you in the future better!

Summary Heading: Disney trip stay - loved the location!
Summary: HoJo was even better than we anticipated. The walk to Disney was very reasonable and not too long at the end of the day. Our kids were 5 and 2 and the bunkbeds were a fun treat for our stay. The room was clean, had a table, fridge, and the shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in the shower were a great bonus. We loved the water playground - it was PERFECT for kids our ages. Having to make reservations still for the pool areas was kind of a pain and not super convenient, but we got into a flow where 3-5pm was great for a mid day Disney break. Will be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We are so delighted you found our Bunk Bed Room a fun treat and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground. We recently released reservations at our Garden Pool but still require reservations at the Castaway Cove. Castaway Cove reservations are for safety reasons to ensure our lifeguards can watch all guests and prevent overcrowding. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: This was a great hotel for our family!  We had two rooms for our family of 6.  We requested two rooms on the same floor and were granted those requests.  Our rooms were sufficient and on the first floor, which was very convenient. The staff was exceptionally pleasant and helpful in all aspects.  We were extremely impressed by every staff member we encountered.  The hotel was a 10 minute easy walk to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  The pools were very clean and well staffed.  The pool reservation system worked, but was a little work intensive on the internet multiple times a day.  Even if reservations were ‚Äúfull‚Äù, we were able to get into the pools daily when we wanted to.  I would definitely recommend this hotel for your trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to providing excellent service, value, and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful!  We are so delighted you found our pools clean and that your kids got to enjoy our fun water playground.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Overall it was a very nice stay. Welcomed with balloons and kind staff. Room was adequate with refrigerator. Only 2 issues - 1 the coffee machine wasn't working and basically the guy was like 'user error usually' well someone came up and watched us do it and was like oh yep, machine. Get it, but you know a pain already and to be doubted...any way the second bigger issue is that we paid for the park view and we did this to see fireworks but guess what, only fireworks on weekends and we were there mid week  - also there were trees in front of our balcony so not sure if could see it.  I never would have paid so much more for this room without fireworks  - they never say 'firework room' just park view and now I know why.  Wish it was noted somewhere that fireworks not happening
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay with us. We are happy to see that your kids loved our waterpark and that you had a nice stay with us. We apologize that our staff was not more helpful. We will be addressing this with our staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our Disney-facing rooms face towards Disney, so you get a lovely view of the Matterhorn and can see the monorail go by. If they have fireworks, you can see them from your balcony and we do regular tree trimming, so our guests have an unobstructed view. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Hotel is in easy walking reach of Disney. There are no dining facilities but there are many restaurants very close. I would have though having a deal with one of the nearby restaurants for breakfast would be a great addition. The only outside areas for relaxation is the pool but this needs to be booked which means you only have the room to relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to know that you found our location convenient for your visit to the parks. While we are conveniently located right across the street from Mimi's Cafe, we do have 20% coupons available at the Front Desk for our guests. We no longer require reservations for both the Garden Pool and Castaway Cove. You will now be issued wristbands at check-in, which provides access to our amenities. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Room is very clean and nice. Quiet too like you can‚Äôt hear the sound from outside. Easy check in and check out. We will choose to stay here again next time. We had a great time staying in this hotel. Thanks.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our quiet and peaceful rooms.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: I love it very nice atmosphere. Room was cleaned and loved the pools and the walk to Disney was a bonus. To get to knott‚Äôs berry farm wasn‚Äôt long either 20 mins. The pool was booked and I called the front desk they had cancellations and we got to take advantage of the pool. The slides were so much fun. We will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and pool areas. We also love that Knott's Berry Farm is a quick 15 to 20 minute drive away! Knott's has so many fun events year round. Great news, we no longer require pool reservations for our Cast Away Cove water playground, or our Garden Pool! Next time you stay with us, you will be welcome to relax and play at our water facilities year round from 10am to 10pm. Hopefully we get the chance to host you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good family hotel just needs to update description of room
Summary: I would have given it five star but couple things I wasn‚Äôt fully happy with. I paid higher price for building one as really wanted to make this special. So the room was lovely and clean First arrive lamp was broken and was quite dangerous but to be honest was dealt with by the friendly staff good and on the same day It said we had 2 balconies we didn‚Äôt! you had to go through the closet to get to the balconies when clothes were put in closet you couldn‚Äôt really get there and it was really tight so could hit head on closet unit and the balconies was split by another patio window so you couldn‚Äôt sit there or do anything. You walk through closet then you are face with another patio window door but this one actually opens so don‚Äôt know why first patio window can‚Äôt be changed to open
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us, and thank you for immediately bringing the broken lamp to our attention. I am glad that we were able to fix it right away. For the comfort of our guests, we added soundproof windows to all rooms facing the highway. While, this changed the room's layout a little bit, it helps drown out the noise from the freeway. We are glad that our staff was friendly and helpful during your stay. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Hotel still has Covid restrictions. Even though the parks are jampacked with people that are mask free. Housekeeping is by request. You have to be out of your room from 8 AM to 4 PM if you want housekeeping. Prices are a little on the expensive side considering all amenities are not accessible daily unless requested. Everything can be accessible if requested through the front desk though. Eg. like more towels or your trash taken out. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us. We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always strive for improvement and we have listened to our guests comments. Great news, Covid restrictions have been lifted and we now offer every other day fully service from our housekeeping staff and we no longer require pool reservations for our Cast Away Cove or Garden Pool. We are happy to hear that our friendly staff were helpful during your stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: I had a good experience at hojo hotel. Loved the distance to disneyland it was about a 6-7 min walk. We stayed in building 1 which us renovated. Super cute small and clean hotel. Our was nice and cozy.?Love that it has a cool waterpark for kids. The staff was nice and helpful. Id stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our cozy hotel and location to Disneyland! We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: You get what you pay for. It a decent hotel that was cheaper than others in the area around Disneyland. Wi-Fi wasn‚Äôt good, weird smell in hallways and room, further walk than I anticipated to/from park.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay with us. We apologize that the Wi-Fi was not good during your visit and that there was a weird smell in the hallways and your room. We encourage our guests to let us know if there is anything "not quite right" with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We will share your message with our IT department so that they can take a look at the Wi-Fi and our Housekeeping Manager regarding the smell. We hope you consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Let‚Äôs just say that we knew that the previous occupant in our room was a person with long gray hair as evidenced by the hairs we found all over the bed, shower, and bathroom.  We were disappointed that they required pool reservations for castaway cove and the regular pool yet did not have any mention of needing a  booking in the confirmation e-nails we received. If you go on the website it mentions it but if you go through a third party reservation system it didn‚Äôt show up as something we needed to do.  It would have been nice to pre-arrange a reservation during my trip so we could access the pool during a normal time.  A few things in the room were broken, but minor really the major issue was the fact that it wasn‚Äôt cleaned appropriately before we arrived.  Staff was friendly,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are saddened to hear your room did not meet our expected cleanliness standards. We will share your review with our Housekeeping Manager to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We also apologize that you were not aware of the pool reservation system. We try to send emails to all our guests prior to arrival and alert our third-party partners regarding our pool reservation system so they can inform guests that book through them. We hope this one experience does not discourage you from staying with us again in the future!

Summary: Perfect hotel for our visit to Disneyland. It was only about a 10 minute walk to the gates. Rooms were clean, comfortable, and quiet. Kids loved the Castaway Cove water park. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that your kids loved our Castway Cove and that you have a comfortable stay. We can wait for you to stay with us again!

Summary: The pool required reservations when all other pools near Disneyland are not. I‚Äôm unclear why you are still requiring this.  The main pool was freezing cold. My children were literally shaking and teeth chattering.  Lifeguard in kids area was very over the top, there was only 4-5 families in the kids area when we went it was not necessary.   There is no hot tub in the main pool area only one in the kids area which seems odd.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write an honest review about your stay. We are excited to say, we no longer require reservations for our pool areas. Because our Cast Away Cove water playground is a splash pad with running water, it can occasionally feel a little chilly in colder weather. Please know that both of our pool areas are heated to 82 degrees year-round. We do still require lifegaurds to be present at all times for our guests safety. Hopefully this brings a little peace of mind to our guests! Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you decide to give us another try and give us the opportunity to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Was there going to Disney land very close
Summary: Didn‚Äôt care to much for the place had a great view of the highway very noisy at night definitely will not be staying there again place was clean staff was friendly couldn‚Äôt use the pool without a pool reservation
Manager Response: Thank you for giving our hotel a try. We are delighted that you found your room clean and our staff friendly. We apologize that you could hear the freeway from your room. We are excited to say that we have added soundproof windows to all our rooms that face the highway (except the top floor). We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to find an alternative room option for you. We are also thrilled to let you know that as of July 2022, pool reservations are no longer required! We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Only issue we had was the pool reservation system.  May have been overbooked because of the severe heat wave 102 and 99 the two days we were there.  30 degrees above normal. Kids loved the water slides, splash bucket and sprays. Staff was pleasant.  Room was nice size  and very clean(Bldg. 1) Fireworks could be seen from the balcony.  Plenty of hot water. Large flat screen tv and very comfortable beds  $20 per night to park. No gym or lounge.  Hotel across the street had a bistro/bar with decent food. Not Fine Dining in area as far as we could tell.  Close to Disney entrance. Ten minute walk.  A number of restaurants nearby. IHOP, McDonalds, Panera.  This is not a luxury property but a nice convenient place to stay while visiting Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. Effective July 28th, 2022, we no longer require reservations to enter both our Garden Pool & our Castaway Cove. We are happy to hear that you and your family were able to watch the fireworks from your balcony. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: Great room and great walk to Disney. Front desk was very kind and helpful. Unfortunately our water park reservation was canceled because we didn‚Äôt show up within 30 min of the time frame beginning. They kept our bags for us the day we checked in and the day we checked out so we could go to the parks all day. Parking lot is extremely tight and you have to check out by 12:00, so we parked off site down the road. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that our Front Desk staff was kind and helpful. Effective July 28th 2022, we no longer require reservations to enter our Garden Pool & Castaway Cove. You will now be issued wristbands that grants you access to both areas. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Satisfied and plan on coming back really soonGreat time with my daughter and my grandson my grandson love the waterpark
Summary: Me and my daughter and my grandson had a great time one of the best hotels I‚Äôve ever stayed at would highly recommend it for children Everybody was so nice at the hotel and the hotel is so clean very Satisfied and plan on coming back really soon
Manager Response: Hi Michael, thank you for taking the time to share your recent hotel experience with us. We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Couldn't have picked a better place to stay!
Summary: My significant other and I decided to have a trip to Disneyland for a few days and found HOJO was a small walk away and did not hesitate to book here while we could, considering it was rated so high. We came to check in around 10pm after our first day at the park and was checked in with professionalism and speed. Getting into the parking lot was a tad confusing due to a closing of one of the entrances, but once we got in, the explanation of where to park was great. Everything was explained and any questions we had (about UberEats, where to park, etc) were answered with due diligence.   That night we ordered UberEats and picked up our food at the front desk at the night window, which was  accompanied by very nice men. Luckily, the whole road was full of great eats and there were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience staying with us! We are happy to hear your check-in was quick, easy and helpful. Our staff really do know the best local tips and tricks around Disneyland. We are grateful Arielle went above and beyond to make your check out memorable. She is such a wonderful member of our Front Desk Staff! We are excited to let you know we no longer require reservations for our water areas. Our Cast Away Cove water playground and Garden Pool are open from 10am to 10pm and they are heated to a lovely 82 degrees. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: First time we‚Äôve stayed at the Hojo and won‚Äôt be our last! Our room was ready upon checkin at 1:00pm and was upgraded to a kids suite with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This was unexpected and amazing! Customer service was top notch. Clean rooms and plenty of room for our family of 4. Can‚Äôt beat the location to Disneyland. Can‚Äôt wait to come again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you had an awesome stay at our hotel! While early check-ins are not always possible, we are happy that we had the availability to accommodate this for you. We are dedicated to provide exceptional quality, value and service, so it's great to hear that you thought our customer service was "top-notch." We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great receptionist, clean and pillows were sooo comfortable. Water park was amazing!  Adults had just as much fun as the kids. Definitely staying there again! Location right across the street from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are thrilled to hear that the "big kids" had as much fun as the little kids at our Castaway Cove. We are also delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the HoJo Anaheim. The rooms had a fun vibe and were very clean. The kids loved the water amenities. Friendly, helpful service too. We were impressed with how quiet the room was even with the proximity to the freeway. Easy walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear that your kids loved our water amenities and that you appreciated our clean, fun vibe. We are so happy to hear you did not experience any highway noise and that our staff were helpful. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: They charge a outlandish price for the service and amenities they provide. Check-in took over 30 minutes. Not waiting in line. We didn't have to wait at all. Their check-in process took over 30 minutes. The person helping us was very nice and professional, so no complaints there but over 30 minutes for a room that was reserved and paid in advance of our arrival is absurd. We smiled through the process anyways and were told our parking fees would be waived. They weren't. We were charged to park. When we mentioned to the front desk staff later that we were told we wouldn't have to pay, they didn't care. They call themselves a "Hotel and Water Playground" but beware, you have to prearrange when you want to use the water playground and pool. Apparently months in advance since no
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your stay with us. We are sorry to hear that you did not have a 5-star stay with us and that the check-in took longer than normal. We truly apologize that our staff was not helpful when you voiced your concerns. We will be sure to share your comments with our team to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. We are excited to let you know that as of July 2022, reservations for our aquatic facilities are no longer required! While we would love another opportunity to serve you, we hope you have a magical time during your next Disneyland vacation no matter where you decide to stay!

Summary Heading: Very unprofessional front desk service..including manager!!
Summary: Worst experience ever .. rude service at front desk‚Ä¶ including manager‚Ä¶pool reservation area is horrible..the beds in rooms are so uncomfortable feels like your sleeping on rocks‚Ä¶ we would definitely not be staying here ever again..
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We truly apologize if our Staff did not take care of the issue the first time and that you continued to experience issues throughout your stay. We understand the frustration; we will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: I don't want to be honest with my review because I want to keep this gem to myself... but, I promised the front desk I would be honest so here it goes. We had a great stay. The hotel staff is friendly and more than helpful.  I had called a week before my trip to inquire about pool reservations, immediately I was given the info (and confirmation #) I needed to make the reservations online. When we got to the hotel I was told if I was running behind I could text before my reservation time and get checked in. Guess what, you text a real person! Rick responded to all of my texts and was so so so kind. We stayed in tower one (newly remodeled). It was nice! The room was great and clean. The balcony has a slider door on the outside to help drown out freeway noise. There are a lot of
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience with us!
