We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay and that our staff was friendly and helpful. We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed the newly remodeled rooms and the pools. We apologize for the inconvenience of the luggage carts and we will make sure to have more available for our guests. We look forward to seeing you again on your next three trips this year!

Summary: Rude. Unflexible. No towels. Avoid. They are unwilling to be flexible with pool reservations, despite there being zero other guests using the pool. And when our flight was delayed for several hours, unwilling to allow us to rebook a pool reservation - despite the pool being empty. Do yourself a favor and stay elsewhere. When we sat in hot tub, we were the only guests in entire pool area. The lifeguard hovered over us the whole time making it very uncomfortable. 3 nights and no fresh towels.
Manager Response: We really appreciate both negative and positive feedback.  We always strive for improvement and will use your comments to ensure a similar experience is never repeated. Effective July 28, 2022, seating reservations will not be required for use of our Castaway Cove facility. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience, seating will be issued on a space-available basis by our facility attendant. We only allow entry for the number of seats at the Castaway Cove. Guests will be asked to queue outside the facility until seating becomes available. You will now be issued wristbands at check-in which grants you access to our Garden Pool & Castaway Cove. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary: If you are planning on eating your meals at the hotel, or  order room service this is not the hotel for you. Maid service had to be requested daily. Due to its closeness to Disneyland the fireworks sounded like we were in a war zone for 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are sadden to hear that you did not have a 5-star stay with us. While we do not have our own restaurant, our partner restaurant, Mimi's Cafe, is within a short walk from our hotel. You are also welcome to have food delivered to enjoy in your room. We have changed our housekeeping services from a request basis to automatically every other day. While our guests get a fantastic view of fireworks from our hotel, we have complementary earplugs available at the Front Desk if they are a little too loud. We really hope you still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Disney trip with several other families.
Summary: The hotel is probably ok but I was appalled to find that when we entered our room for the first time, there was PEE in the toilet, with toilet paper.  Unflushed (obviously).   When I mentioned this to someone at the front desk she just said, ‚Äúoh sorry‚Äù.  She didn‚Äôt seem to know what to do.  Not that she could do anything much after the fact.  But a more sincere embarrassed response might have been more appreciated.  So weird.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear you did not have a 5-star experience during your stay with us. We truly apologize if our Staff did not offer you alternatives or solutions to the issue you encountered. We will be sure to share your comments with our Staff to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We really hope you change your mind and still consider us for accommodations during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Rooms are small, if you are thinking of using the pool or Castaway Cove water playground do reserve or you will not be able to go in, make a reservation online. The internet does not work in the rooms. They will say to use their Wifi but it won‚Äôt work. If you need water you will have to buy some from the market downstairs. We were told check out was at 11:30, we had someone knocking our door at 9am and then at 10am, she seemed irritated and kept looking at her watch, I had to tell her, I will not leave until 11:30.     The only nice thing about this hotel is that‚Äôs it is only about 8 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We strive for five-star service and are sorry to hear that your stay was not up to your expectations. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the small rooms, the internet not working in the rooms, and the early check-out reminder. We are glad to hear that you were able to enjoy the proximity of the hotel to Disneyland. We hope that you will give us another chance to provide you with a five-star experience.

Summary: Nice Hotel!! Worth the $ for convenience and if you're on a budget this is a good one compared to the ones at the park. But, it's NOT a rundown hotel. It is pretty equipped and has friendly staff. It is literally an 8-10 min walk to the entrance. Small convenient store if you forget something. Walking distance from McDonalds and Mimis Cafe. The pool and waterpark are open by reservation only and they give you 2 hrs to use each one a day. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 10 out of 10 review! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location to the Disneyland parks and numerous restaurants within walking distance. Great news, we no longer require reservations for our Cast Away Cove water playground, or our Garden Pool. Both water facilities are open from 10am to 10pm year-round! We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Family room with king bed and twin bunks was very very small.  Bunks were not very comfortable.  Pros:  Clean, kids water park was a big hit, and staff was friendly.  We would stay here again just for the water park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our Cast Away Cove water playground. We do apologize the 1 Queen bed and Junior bunk room was a bit smaller than you expected. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. We hope you decide to give us another try. We hope to see you at our water playground soon!

Summary Heading: Absolute best for families at Disneyland
Summary: I can‚Äôt give enough praise!! Sword balloons for kids. Perfect, clean pool & cove. Perfect room! Great price! Amazing beds. Quiet A/C, not blowing in my face. Silent room. Family/Kid suite is THE BEST!  We stayed 5 nights at HOJO for Disneyland in a Kid Suite. It had two rooms, two full bathrooms, king, twin bunk and double sofa. Plenty of towels and toiletries. Even had a stool in the kids bathroom! The Alexa devices were super easy to use (we don‚Äôt have Alexa at home). Our family of 5 fit and were perfectly comfortable. Only one brief time each did we faintly hear neighbors and hall/elevator traffic. Front desk was always helpful. Room was in Tower 1 and was spotless. All appliances worked. Great little convenience store right downstairs, open late. Super easy to walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so thrilled to hear you had such a stellar vacation staying with us at Hojo. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon. See you at the Cast Away Cove!

Summary: This is a great hotel close to Disney.  It's about an 8 minute walk to the entrance of the parks.  We loved the family suite for our family of 5 (3 teenagers).  Two separate rooms and 2 bathrooms.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you loved your stay at Hojo!  We are thrilled you enjoyed the 2 room Family Suite during your stay. Our Family Suites have ample room for getting ready when traveling with 3 teenagers! We hope to welcome your family back again soon!

Summary Heading: All day fun. Staff were friendly and very helpful
Summary: Staff were friendly and very helpful, rooms are clean. You can watch the fireworks at the garden pool area. Kids enjoyed the water park at castaway cove. Just 7minutes walk to Disney's entrance. Close to fast food and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are so glad to hear that our staff were friendly and helpful, and that you enjoyed the fireworks at our garden pool area and the Castaway Cove water park. It's great to know that we are only a 7-minute walk away from Disney's entrance, and close to all of the fast food and restaurants nearby. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great family friendly hotel walking distance to the park
Summary: We stayed here for 9 nights recently and it was great for families.  About 10 minute walk to the main gates and the bunk beds for the kids were perfect.   My only negative feedback and I realize it‚Äôs covid so I respect the limited housekeeping rules but for 9 nights I would‚Äôve liked a full clean at least once. I did ask for housekeeping about halfway through our stay and they still only offered limited services to restock supplies.   Other than that the hotel was clean, the pools were good. I liked that there was a splash park and a quieter pool
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! We really appreciate your feedback. We are so glad to hear that you and your family had a great stay with us and that the bunk beds and pools were perfect! We apologize that you were not able to receive a full clean during your stay. Due to Covid-19, we have had to make some changes to our housekeeping services. We are glad that you were able to restock some supplies. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great place to stay, close to Disneyland! Staff were able to get us 2 rooms next to each other. Our granddaughters loved the pool and water park. Due to Covid, no coffee in hotel lobby. Went across the street to Starbucks.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We're also happy that we were able to get two rooms side-by-side for your granddaughters, and that they had a great time at our pool and water park. While every room is stocked with a Keurig Coffee machine, we're glad you were able to find a Starbucks across the street. Thanks for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel is absolutely wonderful. It is clean, well lit at night, fun, and comfortable. Check in was great and check out was a breeze. They even gave us a coupon for parking near Disneyland that would be cheaper than the park. It was a really great experience that we already have our next vacation booked.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to make our guests comfortable and we are glad you found the hotel clean and well lit. We are also glad you enjoyed the coupon for parking at the Anaheim Garden Walk. We look forward to having you back soon for your next vacation!

Summary: It was a valentines day trip, we walked from Disneyland to enjoy sweet heart nites. The hotel is so nice and clean, the bed was super comfortable and it feels safe since you need to get a card to get into the buildings.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We're so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your Valentine's Day trip and that you felt safe and comfortable in our hotel. We're committed to providing a safe and clean environment for our guests, and we're thrilled that we could help make your Valentine's Day extra special. Thanks again for your kind words!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at HOJO Anaheim. It was nice and close to Disneyland. It was close to several restaurants and a small store. The pools were great. The room was clean, fresh, and comfortable. Even the bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay at our hotel and enjoyed the close proximity to Disneyland, restaurants and a small store. We take pride in ensuring our guests have a clean and comfortable stay, so we are delighted to hear that the room and bed were up to your standards. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel for going to Disneyland. Its super close for walking. Its clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay again. They just need to warm up the pool more. Staff was awesome and very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel's proximity to Disneyland and found it to be clean and comfortable. It is also great to hear that our staff was friendly and welcoming. While the water is heated to approximately 82 degrees, there is a lot of free-flowing water, sometimes it doesn't stay exactly at that temperature. Thank you for choosing us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: A wonderful stay in a fun retro hotel.   Updated, clean, bright and comfortable room, with perfect space for a family.  Our 2-room family suite had a king, bunkbeds, and a pull-out couch.  There was also a mini fridge, microwave, and table. This hotel is an easy walk to the gate for both Disneyland parks.  It is also close to several restaurants.  Only negative is no pool.  They have a small water park (slides, sprinklers, water-dumping bucket, baby pool) and hot tub.  This is perfect for little ones, but not great for teens+.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are glad that the two-room family suite was perfect for your family and that you found it to be updated, clean, bright and comfortable. We are also pleased to hear that the small water park and hot tub were perfect for your little ones. We apologize that you were not made aware of our Garden Pool, which is located in the back of the property. Thank you again for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great family hotel for your vacation
Summary: Great family hotel! Great location, close to the park if you don‚Äôt mind a 5 min walk to the park. Easy Uber ride  to the airport that is fair priced as well! Great restaurant in Mimi‚Äôs right next door with good food! Pools are nice as well in nice days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so glad that you and your family had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of the convenience of our location, close to the park and the restaurant next door. We are also happy to hear that you found our Uber ride to the airport to be reasonably priced. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the pools on the nice days too! We hope to welcome you and your family back to our hotel soon.

Summary Heading: Couldn't have asked for anything better!
Summary: We are a family of four (two adults + 9 yr. old + 12 yr. old) and honestly we couldn't have asked for anything more from this hotel! Location was so great for walking to Disney, easy freeway access (keep in mind it's RIGHT next to freeway, if this bothers you, but wasn't an issue for us). We stayed in queen deluxe in Bldg 2, and it really was so spacious, very clean and had all we needed! Pool and water slides were great! Staff truly were helpful, friendly, and they even held our luggage after checkout, so we could go have lunch before we needed to leave for the airport. Would definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a 5 out of 5 review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our location to Disneyland as well as our spacious and clean rooms. We are so happy to hear you did not experience any highway noise and that our Staff were helpful. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The staff was fantastic but this property is a poor value. The room size is mediocre. Being charged extra for parking is absurd. The upstairs rooms with the arched skylights let too much light in. The hallway smelled very badly. A bedside switch was shorting out and probably a fire risk. The noise from the highway would get old after more than a couple days. The extra HDMI port on the TV was nonfunctional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us! We are sorry to hear you did not have a 5 star experience during your stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. Thank you for letting us know about the bedside switch in your room, we will be sure to mention this to our maintenance staff right away. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Staff was great, easy walking distance to Disney and rooms were very clean and comfortable, parking was convenient ..staff made it possible to place our two rooms next to each other when it was not originally planned.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are glad you enjoyed our location to the Disneyland Resort as well as our clean rooms. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Love the newly renovated rooms. Clean and comfortable beds. Lots of space and storage options. Love the in room fridge and microwave. It‚Äôs a great location. Quick walk to disneyland. It is a beautiful property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed our property, clean and comfortable beds and location to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Best hotel my family and I have stayed at!
Summary: This hotel was great! My kids absolutely loved the water park. Making a reservation online for the pool and water park was easy. The room was clean and the front desk employees were nice. We will definitely be staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The rooms was clean and roomy. It was also nicely quiet despite facing the highway, thanks to the double doors to the balcony. We loved how close it was to the main Disney entrance and the sister hotel across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The hotel was close to Disneyland and was easy to get to.  The hotel had great customer service!  Everyone was very friendly and courteous.   The room fit 5 of us and the room was so clean.  It was quiet and had no issues. Great parking as well.  I really enjoyed my stay here.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our location to the Disneyland Resort and our spacious, clean rooms. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim!

Summary: Overall great experience! Our rooms were clean, spacious and updated with everything we needed. The hotel is in close walking distance to the park and easily accessed. We arrived hours prior to check in, the front desk was able to get us pre checked and our luggage stored while we hit up the park for the day. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team was able to precheck you in so you could start your vacation right away. We are also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Rooms small, staff nice , and really not far from the park. It has a nice pool, a good little gift store and is close but set apart from the craziness of the park. Also close to freeway, loved the Alexa in the room. Would stay here again in a bigger room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our amenities and our location to the Disneyland Resort. We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The hotel was terrific for easy walking access to Disneyland. We also enjoyed having a fantastic store within the hotel. They had great Disney apparel with family friendly prices.  Our only complaint was the limited room cleaning services.  My only hope for future guests is that CoVid restrictions are lifted and daily room cleaning services are restored.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our hotel was an easy walk for you to Disneyland and that you were able to find Disney apparel at our Gift Shop. Due to limited staffing, we are currently offering limited housekeeping services. We hope to have complete cleaning services available soon. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Fun water park for kids of all ages
Summary: Great water park, the kids LOVED it and the staff is friendly. Plenty of seating for adults to allow for social distancing while keeping an eye on the kids. Park also allows for Uber Eats delivery and there are tables for dining.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to know you and your family had a great time at our Cast Away Cove water playground! Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback. We hope to host you again the next time you visit Anaheim!

Summary: I only had 2 problems, 1 was that check in is way to late for the amount you pay. You can't even spend half the first day there then you have to check out by 11 the last day. 2nd was nowhere on the website did I see you had to pay for parking per day once you get there. And it's expensive and there's nowhere else to park if you choose not to.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Our guaranteed check-in time is 4 pm, but if guests arrive early, we are happy to store luggage, issue a parking permit, and they are welcome to make a pool reservation to use our pools at any time on their day of check-in. We have our parking fee noted in the FAQ section of our website and on our confirmation email. We apologize that you were not aware of our parking fee. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to continue to improve. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Clean and comfortable. Perfect for our family and within walking distance of Disneyland. Will definitely stay again. Our room was on the first floor as we requested. We loved having two bathrooms in our suite. It made all the difference in getting ready in the mornings. We didn't take advantage of the waterpark. That was the one thing that was inconvenient since you need a reservation and have to plan ahead to do that. We like to play our trips more by ear. Other than that the only things missing were free breakfast and free parking. If we could get a good deal and more free amenities, we would stay here every visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. It is great to see that you would stay with us again! We are glad that we were able to stay in one of our suites with 2 bathrooms and that we were able to accommodate your request for a ground floor. We are sorry that the pool reservation system was an inconvenience. Our pools can get very crowded, so we have the pool reservation system to monitor the number of guests that will be around the pool area. While we do not have breakfast at our hotel, I hope that you were able to get breakfast from our Gift Shop or from one of the restaurants close by. Thank you again for your review. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Best Experience and right by Disneyland!
Summary: Just visited and stayed here with my husband and daughter and had a great experience, check in was smooth, secure parking, we have a handicap placard so we were able to park close to our room..Rooms were clean and bright with a Disney modern theme..Beds were comfortable and space was big...Walking to the park was less than 12 minutes  away and so convenient..Thank you Howard Johnson team!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are delighted to hear you and your family found our rooms bright and spacious. It is also great that our location was convenient for you to walk to Disneyland. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Great, clean hotel with the most comfy beds
Summary: I really do love this hotel and how close it is to the parks.  They have the most comfortable beds and the rooms in building 1 and 2 are new!  They have two pools areas onsite, with one being a mini waterpark.  They are kept clean and the kids love it.  The only thing that is an issue is the reservation system with pools.  Even Disneyland hotels are not doing this.  We really have stayed at this hotel for just the pool but being we can't stay and swim some on the day we check out and the other days you can only have two reservations can be kind of a pain.  I do hope that system changes soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that you love our beds and renovated rooms in Buildings 1 and 2. Our aquatic areas can get very crowded. For the safety of our guests, we have pool reservations so we can monitor the number of guests in the area. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: If you are looking for a hotel with a water play area for kids this is NOT the place. Unfortunately, it is extremely difficult to get a reservation for the water park area. The only available appointment for the water park was 12:30pm the day of our check out (we stayed 3 days, 2 nights). You can only park your car at the hotel until 12pm the day of your check out so we couldn't even use the only available reservation. Walking distance to Disneyland is nice but my daughter was extremely sad she couldn't go to the "pirate ship" water play area.  The rooms were small and not very nice. I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel didn't meet your expectations. We understand the disappointment of not being able to use the water park area due to the time constraints of check-out. We appreciate your feedback and will take your comments into account as we strive to improve our services. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you had a pleasant stay in the area.

Summary: Rooms were clean and upgraded. Quiet at night. Pool and cove playground were nice and clean. Reserved time slots so not to crowded. Minutes to Disneyland and downtown disney. Restaurants and stores close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a five-star review. We are delighted you enjoyed the clean and upgraded room and found it to be quiet at night. We are happy to announce that we no longer require reservations for both our Garden Pool and our Castaway Cove. We are so happy to be located so close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney and that you were able to take advantage of the restaurants and stores close by. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Outdated Covid Policies, Loud Freeway, Too Expensive
Summary: We stayed in a suite for four nights in March, 2022. Our room was in Building 1. The room was very nice, but it literally is sitting on top of the freeway which made it very noisy. I called to try and move our room to the opposite side of the building, but the staff member told me all of the suites face the freeway. I would have rather just had a single room facing the park, had I known this. You also have to book the splash pad and pool a month in advance‚Ä¶so you‚Äôll have to predict what two hour period your kids will want to swim and what the weather will be is about 30 days in advance. The swim areas also close down every two hours to be ‚Äòsanitized‚Äô. I watched several times and did not see a single staff person wipe anything down during this time. Not that it matters, as we
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and detailed review. We apologize for the inconvenience you faced due to the location of your room, and for the confusing pool regulations. We understand that it can be unpredictable and difficult to plan ahead for activities with children. We are happy to announce that we no longer require reservations for both our Castaway Cove and our Garden Pool. We are sorry that the housekeeping services were not satisfactory during your stay. We will take your feedback into consideration and make changes where possible to improve our services. We hope you can give us another chance in the future to prove our commitment to providing a pleasant stay for all our guests.

Summary: Very clean property, location is great and the staff were amazing. Genuinely friendly and eager to help. Well worth the amount you pay and more!! Will def stay here again! Highly recommended if you‚Äôre ever visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are so delighted to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about you stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Pleasant, affordable hotel near the park.
Summary: Very good experience here. Pool area was clean and nice, staff was all great and very helpful. Because there was extra rooms, we were offered an upgrade for a very reasonable price and the upgraded room was large and comfortable.   Two things- my friend was staying in one of the older ("standard" rooms) and it was quite small.  Had we not been upgraded, I probably wouldn't have been as happy.   Not the HoJos fault, but definitely would make sure we had one of the larger rooms again because the smaller rooms with double beds were pretty cramped.  The four stars are due to the minimized housekeeping services almost all hotels are doing now.  Initially, I understood.  People didn't want housekeeping coming in their rooms due to Covid and it was legitimately seen as a safety issue-
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your upgraded room, friendly staff and water facilities. We do apologize we fell short of your expectations with the Housekeeping schedules and policies at this time. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Room was nice and hotel was close to Disney. However beds were super uncomfortable. Location was close to most food places and to the freeway. No other complaints from me other than the beds being uncomfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are glad that you liked your room and the proximity of our hotel to Disneyland and restaurants.  So sorry to hear that your bed was uncomfortable. We encourage our guests to let us know if there is anything that is not quite right with their room, our Front Desk Staff would be happy to find an alternative room for you. Other than this, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Bldg 1 nicely renovated and super clean
Summary: We had a great view of Disneyland and the fireworks from our balcony! The bldg 1 room was new,y renovated and is super clean.  A huge full closet plus lots of drawers. Nice little banquette and table for eating meals. Fridge and microwave were very convenient. Beds were comfy and towels super soft. Staff very nice and accommodating. Pool and water park were great to have for breaks from Disneyland. Wished it was a little closer to the park entrances as legs and feet were very tired at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you loved your newly renovated room and the amenities at our hotel. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed in building 2. It was remodeled and very nice and cozy. Comfortable bed, clean room and the staff was very nice and an easy check in. My only downside is the fact that there is no making up of the rooms every morning. I understand to an extent because of Covid but we were there for 5 nights and didn‚Äôt get the room made up once and weren‚Äôt even supplied with enough toilet paper or tissue paper or last us our whole trip. One of the best things about being out of town is having a clean room every morning, we don‚Äôt sleep as well on a dirty bed. Lol Next time we will just have to see if we can get it made up at least every other day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds and cozy rooms in our newly renovated Building 2. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied with our Housekeeping services during your recent stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if there are any issues with their room accommodations. We do offer a limited service cleaning that can be requested each day, and we would have been happy to bring any needed items to your room during your stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Customer service was horrible. Especially with micheal the manager. Rooms were dirty with hair and dirt. Stains on sheets. Flooring and carpet were gross. Staff are very rude except one woman at the front desk checking us in. You need a reservation for pool. However when you call they tell you they have a reservation but when you arrive they actually don‚Äôt have ir and won‚Äôt accommodate you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are dedicated to provide exceptional quality, value, and service. We are so sorry to hear we were not successful.  We truly apologize our staff was not friendly or helpful during your stay. We have shared your review with our Front Desk Manager to ensure a similar experience is not repeated. We are also sorry that your room did not meet the cleanliness standards we expect. We have alerted our Housekeeping Manager regarding these issues.  We have the pool reservation system in place for the safety of our guests. Once pool reservations are full, we have same-day options available to try to accommodate more guests. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Howard Johnson is the perfect hotel if you have children and are visiting Disney... The pool is great, and the splashpad is a huge hit.  I strongly reccomend you extend your stay to give your kids a full day to swim and play after your time at Disneyland... it'll give you a little break too! Oh, and the staff are super friendly and very professional... trust me, you'll LOVE it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5-star review. It is great to hear outr the water playground was a huge hit for you and your family. We love that our staff was professional and friendly while you were staying with us. We hope you think of us the next time you stay in Anaheim.

Summary: This was our second stay here and we This was our second stay here and we loved it again!  Great staff, awesome pool, beautiful grounds, and lovely renovated rooms. And just a 5 min walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you loved your second stay with us, just as much as your first time. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Everything about my stay was wonderful!  Make reservations for the pool or water park with your reservation.  It‚Äôs so close to the Disneyland entrance and restaurants with reasonable prices. Being close made it easy to have one of the younger children brought over from Disneyland for babysitting.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and water facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning you next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: Pros: Close proximity to Disneyland park.  The rooms are spacious. Cons:  The room smelled, it was very outdated, and it was noisy from both the pool and freeway. I would recommend looking at other properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try during your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort. We are so disappointed to hear you were not completely satisfied during your time with us. We always encourage our guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in any way. Our Front Desk Staff would have been happy to find an alternative room for you. While Building 1 and 2 are our most recently renovated buildings, we hope to have all buildings renovated soon. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Hotel is great, clean, and short walk to Disneyland. HOWEVER the only reason most people stay here is the pools and waterpark. They are limiting access to the waterpark and pools to a very small amount of people at a time and you can only access the pool and waterpark with a pre-booked reservation. The reservations are completely booked out 1 month in advance so it‚Äôs very difficult to use the pool of waterpark during your stay. Your kids will have to watch all the people in the pool and waterpark and you‚Äôll have to explain to them that they can‚Äôt have a turn at all your entire stay. I wouldn‚Äôt stay here or recommend it unless they open up the pool and waterpark so ALL paying guests at the hotel have the opportunity to use them. Reservations should NOT be required.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are sorry to hear that you had difficulties accessing our pool and waterpark during your stay. We understand that this was a disappointment for you and your family. We would like to inform you that we no longer require reservations for both the Garden Pool and the Castaway Cove. We hope that you will chose to stay with us again, so you and your family can enjoy the pool and waterpark without the need for a reservation. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: It was almost the end of covid and things were opening up. The hotel still had limited housekeeping services though. With kids and a reservation over 3 days, you get rooms dirty and you would need housekeeping. So I called the reception and explained the situation and they were very nice to make an exception.  They were very gracious!! I feel bad I didn't write down the names of the employees but thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are happy we were able to accommodate your needs and make you feel taken care of during your stay. We hope you keep us in mind when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Nice, clean room and close to the parks - about a 10 minute walk. Super comfortable beds as well! The pool in the back looked nice but small and the kiddie pool with water park looked awesome (if you have kids).  I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: We are pleased we could host you during your stay! Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our comfortable beds and location to the Disneyland Resort. We hope to see you during your next trip to the Anaheim!

Summary: Overall really nice stay. Unfortunately, as with most hotels in the area they are responding to a waning COVID pandemic with over reaction and inconsistent policies. The Game room was closed because they needed to staff someone to wipe it down despite knowing for the last year that COVID is airborne and transmission via surfaces is very rare. The inconsistency with this as a rational coupled with the fact that I did not a single time see them "sanitize" any outdoor pool chair surfaces was curious. They seem to make mask wear optional for staff and do not require guests to mask which is fine but inconsistent with the previous policy. They seem to be fine with staff wearing surgical masks outside despite knowing for over a year that the effectiveness of this kind of mask is minor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We apologize that you received misinformation about our Game Room. At this time it is closed for renovation, not in response to sanitization methods. However, we hope to see it reopen soon! We currently have 30 minute breaks between our pool reservations to get our pool areas cleaned up and ready for our next group of guests, as well as use that time period to break our Water Attendant Staff. While masks mandates are lifted throughout California at this time, we provide the option of mask wearing for our Staff dependent on their comfort levels. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. It is our goal to always address Guest‚Äôs comments and resolve any issues to your satisfaction. We are so sorry we fell short of your expectations. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: We love HOJO Anaheim.  All of the employees are always so courteous and kind, not matter the time of day. We really appreciate the great service, the very clean rooms, and the welcoming smiles.  Thank you for always being our go to when we visit disneyland.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations!  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback.  We are so pleased we have always provided you with a delightful experience.  We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: 8 minutes from Disneyland. Loved the renovated room. Bed was comfy and loved the pools/water park. I wish the pillows were a little comfier and I wish they had dressers in the room to unpack our clothes.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds and water facilities.  We are always working on new ways to improve and are continuously refreshing our bedrooms and facilities. We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great room at a great price.  Rooms are clean, spacious.  The hotel is quiet.  Our grandchildren loved the water park and had a great time. The staff was helpful and had answers to our questions.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a delightful time with us!  Thank you so much for your very valuable feedback.  We are so glad you enjoyed our location and facilities.  We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning you next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: location is the only good thing!
Summary: Rooms are very out dated and you have to reserve a time to the kids water park! WTF so stupid! We my family checked in and my kids were so excited to play at the water park we found out all time slots had been reserved.....(kids not very happy) The ONLY good thing about this hotel is that it's walking distance from the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize if you experienced any frustration while trying to reserve the Garden Pool and Castaway Cove. We no longer require reservations for the Garden Pool and Castaway Cove, and those wishing to enjoy them can do so without needing to book in advance. We hope this helps make your future visits more enjoyable. We are glad that you found the location of the hotel convenient for your visit to the parks, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Our family went to Disneyland. This hotel was an 8 minute walk to the resort and it was very handy to be that close. The hotel staff was very friendly during our stay. Didn‚Äôt have a chance to enjoy the pool but it looked fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. Hopefully you will be able to experience the pool and water playground on your next stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Great hotel. Walking distance to Disneyland. Walking distance to everything. Couldn't have been a better experience. Beautiful, clean rooms. Comfortable beds. Store on site if you forgot something or want a snack.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about you stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Howard Johnson Anaheim.  We were able to walk to Disneyland in less than 10 minutes which was a huge bonus.  Our kids also loved the waterpark and us parents enjoyed the hot tub while they played.  Our room felt slightly larger than a standard hotel room and the refrigerator and microwave were a bonus.  The bathroom with 2 sinks was perfect for getting ready early each morning before heading to the parks!  And from our balcony we had a view of Space Mountain and Guardians of the Galaxy!  It was a perfect stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Howard Johnson Anaheim! We are so glad to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy all the amenities we have to offer, especially the convenient location to Disneyland and the waterpark. We also appreciate your kind words about our room, refrigerator, microwave, and two-sink bathroom. It sounds like you had an amazing view of Space Mountain and Guardians of the Galaxy from your balcony, and we are so glad that you were able to make the most of your stay with us. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I love this property! The rooms are amazing (and Disney themed), the beds and pillows are super comfy. I stayed in Building 2 this time and loved it, the rooms are new and very clean. I‚Äôve stayed in one of the older buildings before and like it too. The property is immaculate, beautiful, well tended grounds. The waterpark is so fun and the pool staff is so friendly. The staff there are great, I had to rearrange my trip a couple times and the reservations manager Kriss went above and beyond and I had a wonderful trip because of her. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again! Short walking distance to Disneyland and laundry on site make it so convenient. Also I love the tropical smell
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you love our property and appreciate the kind words about our Disney themed rooms, beds, and pillows. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay in Building 2 and were pleased with the cleanliness and upkeep of our property. We are also delighted to hear that you had such a positive experience with Kriss in the Reservations Department and that your trip went so well. We are so pleased that we can provide such convenience with our short walking distance to Disneyland and on-site laundry. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, wonderful place to stay.
Summary: Really great location. Took us about ten minutes to walk to the park. Didn‚Äôt hear any noise in our room from outside or the hallway. Beds were comfortable. Staff was helpful, friendly, and polite. They answered my questions and helped me locate a good place to order pizza one night. I‚Äôd stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are delighted that you were pleased with the location and the beds. It is also great that our staff was able to assist you in finding a good place to order pizza. We strive to provide a comfortable and welcoming experience for all of our guests, and we are glad we could do that for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We LOVE the Hojo. It is our go to hotel to stay at anytime we want a little break away from home or where we refer our family coming into town. The room and hotel grounds are very clean and the staff is so friendly. We can‚Äôt wait to be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are so glad to hear that you and your family have made the Hojo your go-to hotel for any break away from home. We strive to keep our rooms and hotel grounds impeccably clean and our staff is always glad to help in any way possible. We look forward to your next visit and hope you have a wonderful time. Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: Always a great experience at HJ. We like to stay in the tower where the kids have bunk beds. Friendly staff and accommodating. Both the pool areas are great and love that their is a lifeguard on site.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are so happy to hear that you had a great experience at HJ and that the kids enjoyed the bunk beds. We are proud to have friendly staff who are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure our guests have a pleasant stay. We are also glad that you enjoyed the pool areas and appreciate that we have a lifeguard on site for extra safety. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Summary: The first time didn‚Äôt go as great as it was caused by other people who decided to smoke in their room or hallway, however Ariel and manager Kern were amazing as they made things right for us! We are magic key holders and will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about Ariel and Kern! We are so glad that they were able to make your experience better and that you are a Magic Key Holder. We do offer an exclusive 20% off discount for Magic Key Holders when you book directly with our In-House Reservations team. We apologize for the inconvenience of the other guests' smoking as we take this very seriously. We hope that you will return and have a much better experience. Thank you for your understanding.

Summary: Facility was very nice and clean and so close to Disneyland! Certain rooms had a great view of the fireworks. Pools were nice but making reservations for the pool made it limited. Staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We are pleased to hear you had a nice stay with us. Great news! We no longer require reservations for the Cast Away Cove water playground, or the Garden Pool. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: The room was very nice. The kids loved the pools. Very close walk to Disneyland. The staff was helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay there again. Nice selection of shirts at the gift shop cheaper than the park.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are pleased to hear your kids loved our pool areas. Great news, we no longer require reservations for the Cast Away Cove water playground, or the Garden Pool! We have also renamed and enhanced our gift shop. It is now our Mid Mod Market, and we have new Hojo merchandise and new vendors such as Loungefly. We hope you come to visit us again soon!

Summary: Great location, comfortable well appointed rooms, quite room too considering the amount of children (it‚Äôs family destination after all). Friendly hospitable staff and easy parking. Always a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and friendly staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: So clean, very accommodating. Love the pool and the water park! And can‚Äôt beat the location for Disneyland! Definitely my go to hotel for now on when we go to Disneyland! I wish they offered breakfast but other than that it‚Äôs so clean and amazing!
Manager Response: We are glad to know that you loved our Cast Away Cove water playground and that you found our location convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: The best hotel for Disneyland Vacation
Summary: The location is less than 10 minutes from Disneyland and the rooms were nice and spacious.   Staff members like Summer helped out a lot and made our stay stress free and excellent.  This is our go-to Disneyland spot!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear we are your go-to hotel during your Disneyland vacations. Thank you for taking the time to let us know our staff, and Summer, helped make your stay stress free and fun! We hope to welcome you and your family back to Hojo again soon!

Summary: Extremally Noisy Rooms  and Poor Customer Service.  They Double Billed my Credit card  and refused to resolve the issue  ( I had to dispute the charge with CC company)  They continued to say it was only a pre-auth   -but the charge Posted Twice
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We apologize for the noise levels in the room and for the difficulties you experienced with customer service. We take such matters very seriously and are looking into the double billing issue. We take pride in offering excellent customer service and we want to ensure that all of our guests' experiences meet their expectations. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to show you how we can provide a more satisfactory stay.

Summary Heading: If you are going to Disneyland, just stay here
Summary: It is less than 10 min walk to Disney, Panera, Mimi's and McDonalds. Literally everything you need is here. It is less than 2 miles from several grocery stores so if you are staying a while, you can stock up. The pool area is nice but the kids splash park is better. I am old (40), so the bed was a tad uncomfortable but I heard no complaints from the rest of my party so you should be good. Definitely worth it for the experience.   We able to stop by Panera for breakfast, fill water bottles, spend 4 hours at Disney, leave for the hotel for lunch and play at splash pad and then go back to Disney another 4 hours. Two words: Worth It
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you had an enjoyable experience staying at our hotel! We understand that the bed may have been a bit uncomfortable for you, but we are happy to hear that the rest of your party had no complaints. We are also glad to hear that you were able to make the most of your time by being able to visit all the nearby attractions. Thanks for your review, we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Very nice hotel. We stayed in the newly remodeled building. Everything was exceptional in the room. It was very walkable to Disney. I did not like having to make a reservation for the pool areas. Also if breakfast was included I was not given any information about when and where it was. The survey the hotel sent me seems to imply there was a breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our exceptional rooms and location to Disneyland. Great news! We no longer require reservations for our pool areas. Both our of water facilities are open year round 10am to 10pm. While we do not offer complimentary breakfast at our location, we do have a market onsite in Building 1 that has small breakfast items for purchase. We are also located walking distance to many grab and go breakfast restaurants such as McDonald's, Mimi's Cafe and Panera Bread. We hope to host you and your family again soon!

Summary: Our room had a great view of the water playground. The fire works from DeLand. M-I-C-K-E-Y! Walking distance was also awesome. We had many restaurants near us and it was very convenient. Late nights & sleep in.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you had such a great experience with us! We are glad that you were able to take advantage of all that our hotel has to offer, such as the great view of the water playground, the fireworks, and the convenience of the many restaurants near us. We hope you were able to get some rest after all your late nights! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: If you are picking this hotel for this pool/water slides PLEASE know that you are limited to ONLY 2 hours.... what a JOKE. the only reason you pick this place if for the water fun and then its limited. Also they don't tell you this until after you pay...you get an email AFTER explaining the list of 400 rules and time limits and reservations Im pretty upset given its the only reason we picked this place. OPEN the POOLS FULL TIME!!
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that your experience wasn't what you expected. We understand your frustration and we apologize for not informing you of the time limit beforehand. We appreciate your feedback and we have taken it into consideration. In light of this, we have eliminated the time limit and pool reservations so that guests can enjoy the pools and water slides for however long they'd like. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and we hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is only 5 minutes from the Disney entry gates. The water park made for a nice, laid back afternoon. The room was very clean and spacious. Easy access to the internet. The staff was very helpful. Our room was ready before the official check-in time and they happily let us in. The front desk was very helpful in booking our transportation to the airport, offering multiple options and ultimately securing a ride for the family. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful and detailed review! We are so happy to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable stay and that you found the location to be convenient. We are also glad that you found the room to be clean, spacious and that you were able to access the internet with ease. It is also great to hear that our helpful staff were able to book your transportation to the airport and provide you with multiple options. We are grateful for your kind words and recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This hotel is wonderful, clean, beautiful and the service is wonderful. When I checked in the front desk employees were greeting with a smile and were extremely helpful. Which make the check in process extremely painless.I will be referring all my family and friends. Close the Disneyland and there are a lot of restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable experience while staying with us. It is always our aim to make the check-in process as painless as possible, and we are glad that we could do that for you. We are also glad to hear that you will be referring your family and friends to us. We are proud to be so close to Disneyland and all the local restaurants, and it's wonderful to know that you were able to take advantage of that. Thanks again for your review!

Summary: Our room wasn‚Äôt ready early but the hotel had free bag storage which allowed us to enjoy the day at Disneyland bag free. Our room was clean and comfortable. The walk to the park was very close. The front desk staff was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are delighted to hear that your stay with us was a pleasant one. We are so pleased that you were able to make use of our complimentary bag storage and that the walk to the park was close. We strive to make our guests feel comfortable and welcome and we are grateful for your feedback. We look forward to having you visit us again soon!

Summary: Our family made a one day stop at Disneyland on a condensed trip to Southern CA.  Due to time constraints, we traveled overnight and arrived at the Howard Johnson, Anaheim, very early in the morning, around 4am.  Our reservation was for that night, so we knew we were unable to check in until the afternoon (several hours from then).  Lucky for us, Joel was on duty at the hotel for the night shift and took great care of us.  He helped us access the restrooms so we could change and freshen up, and also checked our bags so we could get a worry free early start into the park.  Joel made us feel welcome, safe and comfortable, which was a fantastic way to start our trip.  During the short time we were at the hotel, we had many  wonderful experiences with other members of the staff such
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at Howard Johnson Anaheim! We are so glad to hear that Joel, Summer, Ariel, and the team at the pool were able to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We strive to make sure all of our guests have a worry-free stay and it sounds like our team did just that! We hope you and your family had a great trip and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Howard Johnson Anaheim has clean rooms.  It's a convenient 7 minute walk to Disneyland. Friendly staff.  Easy check in and check out.  My son loves the pirate hat and balloon sword.  He looks forward to that every time we check in.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are thrilled to hear that your son loves our pirate hat and balloon sword, and we are glad you find our location convenient and our staff friendly. We strive to make sure that our guests have the best experience and we are glad that we were able to do that for you. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Howard Johnson is within walking distance to Dinseyland with kids. The rooms were clean and quiet! The water playground and pool were an added bonus for the days we didn't have Disneyland tickets! Great value for the quality and amenities!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about Howard Johnson! We are so glad to hear that you and your kids enjoyed your stay and had the chance to take advantage of our water playground and pool. It's wonderful that you were able to find such great value for the quality and amenities that we provide. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: HoJo Anaheim is hands down our #1 choice when visiting Disneyland. The rooms are big, clean, and very nice. The best part of the hotel is how close it is to the parks. It is a little under 7 minutes for us to get to and from the hotel, making park days with kids of napping age an absolute breeze!! The splash park and pool are also amazing ways to beat the heat on those hot summer resort days! I can‚Äôt rave enough about this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your glowing review! We are so pleased you found HoJo Anaheim to be your #1 choice when visiting Disneyland. It means a lot to us that you appreciate how close the hotel is to the parks, and that it makes park days with your kids so easy! We are also so glad you enjoyed the splash park and pool on those hot summer days - it's great to know that you were able to beat the heat! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: From the minute I walked into the building I could smell how clean it was and I appreciate that. Howard Johnson is super convenient and close to Disneyland. The beds are always comfortable and I know I‚Äôm gonna get a good nights rest after a day in the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're so glad to hear that you appreciate the cleanliness of our hotel and that you have enjoyed your stays with us. We strive to ensure our guests have a comfortable and restful night's sleep in preparation for the next day's adventures. We are delighted to be located so close to Disneyland, and we look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: If you book the king suite don‚Äôt tell your kids there will be an Xbox as advertised because as of 3/5 it was not working nor did staff care that it was not. Our kids don‚Äôt have an Xbox at home so when it was listed as a selling point of the room we thought it would be something fun for a couple days during down time. Also put a chair in front of the broken cabinet so your littles don‚Äôt pinch their finger as it does not shut and can  sometimes fall open.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We apologize for the disappointment your family experienced with the Xbox not working. We understand that it was a selling point for the room and we should have made sure it was in working order. We will make sure this is rectified and the cabinetry is taken care of to avoid any further issues. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and we are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Summary: We went with Kids Suite and loved it. Bunk beds for kids, separate room for us. Spray park was awesome for our 7 and 5 year old kids, rooms were spacious and updated. 10/10 stay would recommend to anyone. The walk home from Disneyland after a long day is certainly something you feel, however it's the furthest of the 'close' hotels so from gate to hotel it's around 12-13 minutes. Not bad. Great to have McDonalds and Panera for breakfast on the way to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are so pleased that your family had a great time staying with us at Kids Suite. We are delighted that the Castaway Cove was a hit with your kids and that the rooms were spacious and up to date. We are also glad that the walk to the park wasn't too bad and that you could take advantage of the McDonalds and Panera on the way. We hope to see you all again soon!

Summary Heading: BEST place to stay in ANAHEIM
Summary: This property is clean and happy.  A comfortable place to relax after the park day and on the non park days.  We love the decor and the comfy beds.  Our family of 5 enjoys the space and the way it is organized so we can keep our stuff organized on our trip.  The pool is great and welove the reservation system.  Be sure to book Building 1 or 2 as they are renovated and worth the extra few dollars.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that your family of five enjoyed their stay with us. We take great pride in making sure that our guests have the most comfortable and relaxing stay possible, and it's wonderful to hear that you felt that way. We are glad that you found the pool, decor, and beds comfortable, and that our reservation system was up to par. We are especially pleased that you chose to book building 1 or 2 as they have been renovated and offer a higher level of comfort and convenience. We thank you for your recommendation and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Perfect if you have small children or are coming to Disney
Summary: The location is arguably the best feature of the Howard Johnson Hotel. It is an 8-minute walk to Downtown Disney, & both Disneyland Parks. You can literally see the Matterhorn from the parking lot! The hotel is also only 4 blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center! There are a ton of restaurants within walking distance, including Mimi‚Äôs Cafe, Panera Bread, Denny‚Äôs, and McDonald‚Äôs.   Buildings 1 and 2 of the hotel have been recently renovated, and you can request these rooms when booking. Everyone from our group stayed in Building 2 and absolutely loved our guest rooms! The girls absolutely loved the Mickey Mouse Portraits.  Castaway Cove is the pirate-themed water playground at Hojo Anaheim.Features include a toddler pool, two small kids waterslides, and a splash pad with Speedy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Howard Johnson Hotel. We are thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Downtown Disney, Disneyland Parks, Anaheim Convention Center, and all the great restaurants. We are also glad that you appreciated our recently renovated buildings 1 and 2 and the special Mickey Mouse portraits. Castaway Cove is a great way for the kids to have a fun time and we are delighted that you made use of it. We are glad that you found our Main Street Market to be well stocked with Disney souvenirs and that you found our Disneyland Resort Express Bus service helpful. We are also glad that you were able to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from our upgraded rooms. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed there 4 nights and were happy with the room and service. The location to Disney is great, and there were plenty of restaurants to eat at in the area.  The only negative was that I5 was so close that you could feel the trucks going by all night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your room and that the location of our hotel was convenient to Disney and had plenty of restaurants in the area. We apologize that the interstate was so close that it disturbed your stay. We hope that despite this you will stay with us again and enjoy a peaceful sleep.

Summary Heading: Where to stay in Anaheim, California
Summary: The Howard Johnson by Wyndham Anaheim and Water Playground Hotel is a fantastic place to stay. Located right next to Disneyland the hotel is lovely, neat and clean with excellent staff, lovely rooms and beautiful grounds.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strives to provide the best possible experience and it sounds like we achieved that! We are so glad you liked our rooms, grounds and location. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great location and customer service - super close to Disney parks!
Summary: I have stayed with Howard Johnson several times and recently went back for my first trip since the pandemic started. I love how close the hotel is to the parks - only a block away from Disney parks entrance, about a ten minute walk. The hotel rooms are clean and spacious.   I want to give a special shoutout to a staff member who went above and beyond to ensure my friend and I had a good stay - Cameron who works in the gift store. We both appreciated how Cameron went out of her way to connect with us while we were buying snacks and could connect with us over our shared interests. She had some great ideas on even how to make the store more fun, like brining in new kinds of merch or music. It was nice connecting with a staff member while we were the only customers in the store and
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about Cameron and your stay at Howard Johnson! We are so glad to hear that you had a great time and that Cameron made your experience even better. We appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share it with our team. Cameron's suggestions for the gift store are great, and we are always looking for ways to make our guests experience more enjoyable. Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I take a couple of trips to DISNEYLAND a year. I am very picky with hotels and look for safety, cleanliness and good customer service as well as easy access to the parks. I can only comment on building 2, the recently renovated rooms. I was so pleased with how beautifully these rooms were renovated. The beds are super comfortable, the sheets are new and crisp white, they have an excellent assortment of pillows and fluffy towels. The staff is friendly, always smiling and happy to help. You can forgo cleaning service or request it. The walk to the parks is literally 5 minutes and the bag storage is fast and efficient. There is no breakfast option but I believe you can purchase items in their store. The room does have k cups but if there was one thing I would request it would be
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your feedback. We strive to make sure every guest feels safe and comfortable while they are here and are delighted that you experienced that during your stay. We are also happy to hear that you appreciated our renovations, comfortable beds, and friendly staff. We are always working to make our services better and your suggestion for free flow filtered water and coffee will be taken into consideration. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Our favorite hotel, and we stay at least once every other month!
Summary: We LOVE this hotel for our disney trips. We are magic key holders and come at least every other month, if not once a month. We would love to have breakfast back! We haven‚Äôt gotten to try breakfast yet and that would make our stay even BETTER.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you love our hotel for your Disney trips and that you are magic key holders. We value your loyalty and appreciate your feedback. Thank you again for your feedback and your continued patronage!

Summary: You wont be disappointed staying at this hotel.  Its great for families and a quick walk to Disney entrance.  The staff are so helpful and friendly.  The rooms are lovely.  The amenities are also wonderful and allowed us to take a break during our longer disney days.  10/10 would recommend to a friend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review! We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay here. We love that you found our staff helpful and friendly and that the amenities allowed you to take a break during your longer Disney days. We are so glad you would recommend us to a friend, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Perfect value for a family Disneyland getaway
Summary: We love this hotel - the room was soundproofed well, the staff was so helpful and it's just a 5 minute walk to the entrance to disneyland. It was amazing to watch fireworks from our balcony when we were too tired to go into the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at our hotel and that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location! Our staff is always happy to help make your stay enjoyable and we are glad that you could experience the fireworks from the comfort of your balcony. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Building 6 - expect a nightmare.  Especially if you have young kids.  No elevator, so have fun with a stroller.  Neighboring unit smoking weed.  Walls/ventilation so poor that your family can enjoy.  Not remodeled - tile job from the 70s. Skylight on both sides of the room? Measuring around 6 ft by 2-3 ft, with no way to close.  This gives enough light to your entire room that you can see everything at 2am.  Beds were awful.  Constant rumble (not freeway) occurs every 10 seconds.  The floor was more cimfortable to sleep on and provided a little more darkness to the room.  Rename building to Tower of Terror.  Worst night I have ever experienced in a hotel.  Come to think of it, I didnt see anyone smile walking out of this building.   Have a magical stay.  Switch to building 1!
Manager Response: Hello There, Thank you for your honest review. Buildings 3 - 6(Two Double Beds) are the buildings that we are going to renovate next so this is great feedback that we will definitely be taking into consideration(especially adding a elevator)! Building 1 and building 2 have both been recently renovated and they are some of the best rooms. If you book any room with two QUEEN beds then you will be guaranteed a renovated room, you can always call the front desk and ask what building the room you booked will be in and we can always change it to your preferred building. We have had to implement only one parking spot per room  to ensure that we have parking for guests at check-in. With the loss of international travel, our parking lot has become very full. We have teamed up with the Garden Walk Parking to get you discounted parking and they hope to bring a shuttle soon that will bring you directly to the hotel. Again, we appreciate the review and will definitely take all of this into consideration for our renovation.

Summary Heading: Pay for a hotel yet get the experience/quality of a motel
Summary: Pay for a hotel and get the experience and room equivalence of a motel.  Have you ever paid for a vacation only to feel like/wish you could go home the whole time? Well that's how 2 stays, in a row, at this hotel have made us feel.  So we decided to give this place another try simply because it was our daughter's birthday and she begged us for the water park, but it was, once again, so bad I wish we hadn't. First off they put us in a building that it actively under construction. When we walked into the building/to our room we had to tell the kids to hold their breath because there was a huge cloud of whatever dust/smoke/chemicals they were using filling the hallways. Construction was a few feet from our room doorway, so we got to listen to it all day. The hallways were literally
Manager Response: Hello Peter, We are so saddened to hear that you had a bad stay with us for a second time. I know in building 3 we did have a emergency water issue which we did end up having to do some construction which did include jack hammering so I sincerely apologize for that.. We always want our guests to feel comfortable enough to contact the front desk and give us the opportunity to fix anything that might not be just right for their stay. In regards to the fees, we do charge a total of $20 for a incidental fee that is then returned upon check out as long as nothing is missing or damaged in the room, we do have one of the least amount of incidental fees in Anaheim with other hotels charging over $100 per night. We also have a parking charge, this is paid separately so that guests who do not bring a car do not need to pay for parking. We also do this to make sure we limit the number of cars so we can make sure that all of our guests have a parking spot available at check in. Again I sincerely apologize for the experience you had and that I was out of town when you were trying to  contact me for a discount on your next stay, I should have been more specific as to how early in advance I recommend contacting me.
