I cannot apologize enough for the experience you had but I do hope that you have a good stay on your next visit to Anaheim no matter where you stay.

Summary: While we were in the park, our room was accessed twice without authorization.  Clothing, sourvenirs and apple airpods were stolen.  The front desk did an investigation and the on site manager only comped one night of stay.  Never stay here- it isn't safe.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, perfect weekend!
Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at the HoJos Anaheim this weekend for a surprise birthday trip to Disneyland for our son. Upon arrival at the hotel we were greeted by friendly and accommodating staff. Despite their masked faces we could see their smiles and any onlooker could tell that these employees truly enjoyed their jobs.   The hotel felt warm and inviting and was decorated tastefully - just enough Disney and Mickey to know where you are but not so much that it was gaudy. We didn‚Äôt visit the gift shop, but in passing it appeared to have lots of souvenirs and snacks.   Our room was clean, spacious, and very comfortable. Lots of outlets for charging devices and an added bonus of an Alexa in the room making it easy to listen to music and set an alarm. The Keurig and coffee in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and wonderful review! We are so glad to hear that our friendly and accommodating staff made your stay pleasant and enjoyable. We also appreciate you taking the time to mention James, Paula, and Summer. It really means a lot to us and we will make sure to share your kind words with them. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that the proximity to the park was a great help! We appreciate you recommending us to your friends and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland, clean, but old and noisy
Summary: 5 stars for housekeeping, 5 stars for short walk to Diney and 2 stars for bedrooms. The first one had a strong smell of mold. We changed for a second one too close to the freeway. You can hear traffic all night long. Coffee machine wouldn't work. We didn't have the time to use the waterpark, so no comments on that.
Manager Response: Hello Karena,  We are so sorry to hear that you did not have a 5 star stay. It sounds like you were in our standard double bed rooms that are next to be renovated. We definitely suggest a room with two queen beds or a room with bunk beds on your next stay with us, if you chose to come back. Those rooms have been completely renovated and look fantastic! We even have double pane windows in the rooms in building 1 that overlook the freeway to make sure its as silent as we can make it. I will also let my Maintence team know about the coffee maker to make sure we get it changed in the room that you were in. Again we apologize for your stay and hope you have a good stay on your next visit.

Summary Heading: I would stay again, wish they had breakfast on site
Summary: We had a great stay except for the hiccup with one staff member, (JOEL) but we didnt let one bad apple spoil the whole bunch, everyone else was a pleasure and very accommodating. Rooms were nice and the atmosphere was great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and that you loved the rooms and atmosphere. We regret to hear that there was a hiccup with one of our staff members. We take customer satisfaction very seriously and we will be sure to address this with all Front Desk staff. We are glad that it didn't ruin your stay and that the rest of our staff was accommodating and friendly. We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary: Dont stay here!!! People lined up to talked to manager!!! So many complaints!!!  I‚Äôve never seen so many upset people in a hotel lobby. One guy cursed out the manager Michael.  He is awful. Or maybe it is the entire upline. They refused to okay my cancellation through a third party.  Reason for cancellation: the hotel is old and disgusting. Smells terrible!!!! No elevator!!! Old old old!!!! Stairs have old disgusting carpet on them! There is the creepiest closet in the hotel Room! Customer Service terrible!!!  Needs to be torn down and a new hotel needs to build here. So sad this is near disneyland. Thanks for an awful start to a wonderful vaca!!!!!!!!!!  I would NEVERRRR recommend this place! So many other amazing places to stay nearby! Never stay here and NEVER USE A HOTEL 3rd
Manager Response: Hello There, I sincerely apologize for the experience that you had. We always always recommend booking directly with us so we have full control over the reservation which will allow us to make exceptions on refund and charges. I have reviewed the video footage from the front desk and I see that Michael contacted the third party company for you to try to get the refund approved, the third party company was the one who charged you and they refused. He told them that we would refund the company in full with no charges even though you had already checked in and they still declined. He did escalate the situation to myself, and I am currently working with the company to try to get you your money back for your stay. With the room, we do recommend booking in one of our renovated buildings, the building that you were in was the least expensive and we even cap the cost of those rooms because we want to make sure that we do not charge too much for them until they are fully renovated. I am excited to say they are next to be renovated. I am happy to hear that you were able to use the pool and water playground during your stay, and Michael did go the extra mile to do everything in his power to get this reservation refunded for you. Again, I sincerely apologize for the experience that you had when staying with us. We do hope that you come back to Anaheim and have a good stay no matter where you stay.

Summary Heading: RE: Great Location, Great Price, and Excellent Staff
Summary: I read reviews about this property.  I did read that there were certain rooms that were not renovated.  Yes, they do need to be renovated and the room is a bit outdated.  However, the rooms were cheaper, and they were CLEAN.  For the price, distance to Disneyland, and the professionalism of the staff, it was worth it.   I plan on staying again this upcoming May. My family totally fell asleep in the beds.  The beds were clean, and comfortable.  I recommend staying here.  However, if you can't get over outdated furniture, then I would spend the extra money to get the renovated rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you felt your stay was enjoyable and that you plan on returning to us this upcoming May. We appreciate your honest feedback and understand your concerns about the outdated rooms. We are currently in the process of renovating our rooms and we are confident that you will be able to experience the full comfort and convenience of our newly renovated accommodations when you come back. Thank you again for your positive review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney but not great,
Summary: I picked this hotel for its distance to Disneyland and it‚Äôs fun kiddie pool but I was pretty disappointed in my stay.  There is only one entrance into the parking lot that isn‚Äôt blocked off and it requires a key card so that was confusing also despite the COVID mask restrictions being lifted by the state of California they are obsessed with masks at this location and the front desk wasn‚Äôt overly friendly.  They don‚Äôt offer house keeping, if you request they will bring you towels and take your garbage but nothing else.  The room was dated but decent however the second floor rooms have skylights so it‚Äôs really bright in the morning and the hotel is close to the freeway so you do hear the traffic at night. By far the worst part was the bathroom, the toilet was the kind that  you
Manager Response: Hello There, I am so sorry to hear that we did not deliver in your experience. We have closed the second entrance until we can get a gate put there only because the protection of our guests cars is a high priority for us so by making sure its only guests and employees entering the parking lot it helps a lot. As of March 2 masks are no longer required for our guests, regardless of their vaccination status. Due to limited staffing we are currently only offering a limited service by request, we hope to bring back our full service soon however. Again, we apologize for the experience that you had and we hope you have a good stay in Anaheim no matter where you stay.

Summary: Great location. It's closer than the Disney parking structure. The staff was very friendly and room was clean with good amenities. Mini-fridge & micro... Wish they included a continental breakfast like a few of the other local hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We're so glad you enjoyed our location and the friendly service of our staff. We are sorry to hear that our hotel doesn't include a continental breakfast, however we are happy to hear that you still had a great stay with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel!

Summary: From when we walked into the lobby I knew this was a great place seen a ton of people wiping down doorhandles indoors very sanitary. Everyone was so nice, this was also walking distance to Disneyland and also adventure Park and they were ton of restaurants around for us to walk to since we didn‚Äôt have a car. We will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad you felt safe and welcomed during your stay. We are happy you enjoyed the convenience of being walking distance to Disneyland and Adventure Park, and all of the restaurants around. We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Staff was pretty cool.. slight walk to the park..the room was clean and the beds are super comfortable. There was plenty of parking, although I think it stinks you have to pay to park at a Hotel you already pay to stay there..
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write about your stay. We are overjoyed to hear you found our clean beds super comfortable. We do apologize you found our parking fee inconvenient. We are always working on improving and we appreciate your feedback. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights in bldg 2, 5th floor with a view of the park.  It was spectacular.  Comfortable, quiet, spacious.  Everything we need for a good stay.  Staff was friendly and accommodating.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a positive review! We are so thrilled you enjoyed our newly renovated and spacious rooms facing Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo again soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. Reservations for the pool were easy and not hard to get. Rooms were clean and the staff is super friendly! Disneyland is less than 10 minutes walking which was perfect for us. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us! Great news, we no longer require reservations for the Cast Away Cove water playground or Garden Pool. Both of our water facilities are open year-round from 10am to 10pm. We hope to welcome you back to Hojo again soon, see you at the Cast Away Cove!

Summary: This is a nice place to stay, the room's are clean the grounds are kept up. We stayed three nights and went to Disneyland The  location was perfect. The employees are very friendly and very helpful. We will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you had a delightful time with us! Thank you so much for your kind comments. We are glad you enjoyed our clean grounds, location to Disneyland and extra friendly staff. We hope to host you at Hojo again soon!

Summary: This hotel was so nice and clean. We stayed three nights for a girls weekend at Disneyland and it was so nice to be right across the street. We swam our first night and both pools were great. I loved that our room was clean and newly updated. Beds were so comfy and water pressure in shower was great! Stay Here!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear your girls weekend at Disneyland was a blast! Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us, your night in our heated pool sounds like fun. We hope to host you at Hojo again soon!

Summary: The staff is so friendly!  I mean ALL the staff.  We had groceries delivered, no problem.  Change of towels, no problem.  Last minute hot tub reservation, no problem. Wherever we were we were always greeted by helpful and pleasant staff.  Our trip was great because of the staff.  The rooms were comfortable and spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments about our staff! Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to welcome you and your family back to Hojo again soon!

Summary: The room was nice & spacious, & even though we were right next to the pool, we couldn‚Äôt hear anything as long as we had the balcony door closed. Great location relative to Disneyland & a great price considering the location!
Manager Response: We are so happy we could welcome you to our hotel. We are thrilled to hear you found your room to be spacious and quiet. You can't beat those wonderful pool views! We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Steps from Disney you say? Yes please!
Summary: My sister and I are disney creators who change multiple times throughout the day. It was amazing to have a hotel steps from Disney for the convenience alone. Our favorite person to see in the morning was Stephanie in the gift shop. She was always accommodating and sweet. We stayed in the newly renovated rooms (1305) and it‚Äôs definitely worth it. Our balcony was overlooking Disney Park which really added to our magical experience. Thank you so much to the hotel and stuff for keeping a clean safe and fun environment for us. Will definitely be back in June to celebrate my nieces 10th ü•≥
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you had a magical experience at our hotel! Stephanie sounds like a true gem and we're so happy that she was able to help make your stay extra special. We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed the newly renovated rooms - we can't wait to welcome you back in June for your niece's 10th birthday celebration! Thank you so much for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had the best experience staying at this hotel! My boyfriend and his family have been staying at this hotel for years and I finally got to join him. From the moment we walked in Summer was an absolute delight! She kept focused, calm, and cheery when the lobby got crowded and overwhelming which we so appreciated! If you stay at this hotel make sure to talk with Summer, she‚Äôll make your whole stay so enjoyable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience and that you got to join your boyfriend and his family at our hotel. We are proud to have a team member like Summer on our staff, providing such excellent service and care. We hope that you will come back and visit us soon and that you get the chance to chat with Summer again!

Summary: There is no complaints about our stay this weekend! Super kid friendly! Even is adults had the best time! Can‚Äôt wait to come back! Everything was spotless and the hotel staff are the best! My kids are already asking for our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you and your family had such a great time with us and that your kids are already asking to come back! We strive to make sure our guests have the best experience possible and we are so happy that everything was spotless and our staff was so friendly. We can't wait to welcome you back for your next trip!

Summary: We loved our stay! The staff is courteous and extremely helpful. Our room was comfortable and had all the amenities needed for our family's stay. The location is also great. It was about a 10-min walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! It's wonderful to hear that you and your family had a great stay with us. Our staff is dedicated to providing the best service to our guests, and we're delighted to know that you felt looked after. We're also glad you enjoyed the comfort of your room and the convenience of our location. We hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: coffee maker had molding liquid staff would even bring me a cup of coffee. We requested maid service and only got 1 towel, no bedding or trash emptied. awful service for supposed high quality and high price
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback from your stay with us. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your visit. We are sorry for any disappointment caused. We strive to provide our guests with the best experience possible and we regret that this was not your experience. We have shared your feedback with our team and we will ensure that these issues are addressed. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us a more enjoyable one, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Summary: The hotel itself was very clean and newly renovated. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The water park was a bonus and our kids loved it there. The walk to Disney is about 8 minutes. I would highly recommend staying here for your next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are so thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the new renovations, friendly staff, and water park. We are glad your kids had a blast! 8 minutes to Disney is a great walking distance, so it's no surprise you recommend us for your next Disney trip. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times and it is CONSISTENTLY clean, friendly and convenient!  I cannot recommend this hotel enough, especially the renovated rooms in buildings 1 and 2 and the incredible water park!  You also can't beat the 7-8 min walk to the parks!  We cannot wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so glad to hear that you have had consistently great experiences when staying with us. We are especially thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed the newly renovated rooms and the water park! We are so pleased to hear that you are looking forward to coming back, and we can't wait to have you back with us soon!

Summary: Being in walking distance to Disneyland was so great! No waiting for the shuttle to take you back and forth. Our room was nice.. beds comfortable. The little convenience shop in our building was great for drinks and snacks, baby wipes, etc. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so happy that you enjoyed our convenient location, comfortable rooms, and our Mid Mod Market. We are delighted to know that you would stay with us again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Hojos saved our trip (and my sanity)
Summary: We recently visited Disneyland for my daughter's 11th birthday  We were formerly SoCal residents who visited often with our young daughter.  For the last two years all she wanted was to go back to Disneyland, but I wanted to wait until things felt "more normal".  Well, The last time we went was for her 9th birthday and here we were two years later, & I wasn't sure things were ever going to feel "normal" again, so we went.  It was heartbreaking. Disneyland has lost all of it's warmth, magic, humanity; everything is done on the phone which is constantly glitching, so everyone is looking at their phones the entire time, and understaffing means tremendously long waits for everything from popcorn to the carousel.  There are no fast passes, instead you have to pay an exorbitant amount
Manager Response: Wow, we are so glad to hear that you and your family had such a great experience with us here at Howard Johnson's! We are so grateful to have been able to provide you with the kind of service that restored your faith in customer service and humanity. We know how important it is to make memories with our loved ones and we're so glad that we were a part of making your daughter's 11th birthday special. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon!

Summary: I booked this hotel due to it's proximity to Disneyland. I was not disappointed. It was an easy walk to and from the hotel to the parks. Our room was clean and comfortable. We did not use the pool or waterpark. From check-in to check-out, our stay was great! We shopped at the gift shop every day for water before hitting the parks for the day and picked up dinner at Mimi's or Panera every night. Very convenient for my sister and I. I am thinking of going back in a few months and would happily stay here again. Thank you to all the staff for such an enjoyable stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be so convenient for getting to and from the parks. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your comfortable room, and that you took advantage of the nearby shops and eateries. We look forward to welcoming you back in a few months and hope that you enjoy your next stay with us just as much!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, short walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Clean rooms. Nice decor. Layout of the room was nice.  Separate table and bench seat was nice.  Bathroom was large and well appointed.  Beds were the most comfortable hotel beds I've slept on in a long time.  Property was well maintained.  Due to the time of year, we didn't take advantage of the pools, but they looked to be well kept. Disneyland was a very short walk from the hotel.  There are a number of small shops and restaurants along the way, and all the shopping you could ask for a few minutes Uber away.  There is a small store selling a wide variety of sundries, souvenirs and drinks/food.      Two things that weren't as expected:  The city view was in fact a view of the adjacent building, and no breakfast was provided.  Though to be fair about the view, the actual city
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We take great pride in our clean and comfortable rooms, as well as our well-maintained property. While we do not serve breakfast on our property, we are conveniently located right across the street from MImi's Cafe, and we always have a 20% off coupon available at the Front Desk for our staff. We are so pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful and that you would not hesitate to stay with us again. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The room was clean, updated, and very comfortable beds. I did find it frustrating that you have to request cleaning and sometimes even that won‚Äôt get your room cleaned. There also wasn‚Äôt a fan in the bathroom which was horrible!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad you enjoyed the clean, updated and comfortable beds in your room. We apologize for any inconvenience you encountered when requesting housekeeping services. We understand your frustration and appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We will certainly review our housekeeping procedures and make sure that our guests are attended to promptly. We apologize for the lack of a fan in the bathroom, we will take the necessary steps to ensure this amenity is available for our guests. Thank you for choosing us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I love the Howard Johnson. Everyone is so awesome. Check in is at 4pm but I stopped by before going to Disneyland and they let me do a early check-in at 9am. The Pirate Cave is my 7years spot. She love it...
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to see you again in the future at the Castaway Cove!

Summary: I hadn't stayed at HoJo in 9 years so while I was familiar with the property, the remodeled room was gorgeous! Decently quiet considering it overlooked the garden pool. The mini fridge, microwave and Keurig all came in handy. King bed was very comfortable. The colors of the remodeled room were vibrant and retro. Good shower pressure and the tub was nice enough to sit and soak after a long day on my feet at Disneyland! The gift shop/market was very handy considering I had forgotten a couple things and also wanted to pick up a few beverages to put in the fridge.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and found your room to be clean and comfortable. We are so pleased that you took advantage of our onsite amenities like the convenience store and the microwave and mini fridge. We strive to provide the best service and are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to be your home away from home on your next visit. Thank you for choosing HoJo!

Summary: Stayed in tower 1, it was beautiful, clean and comfortable! Great location, easy walk to and from park. Nice little convenience store. The front desk staff were so friendly :) 10/10 would stay again! Also, they had thee softest towels I‚Äôve ever used in a hotel, so soft!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you felt so welcomed by our front desk staff. We take pride in providing comfortable and clean accommodations and it's great to hear that you had a pleasant experience. The towels are definitely one of our amenities that guests love and we are so glad you liked them too! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We loved our stay at HoJoAnaheim!  It was very clean and we loved the retro style of the newly renovated rooms in buildings 1 & 2.  The staff was helpful and friendly and were able to accommodate our requests of being on the top floor facing Disneyland.  We loved our balcony and the skylights!  It made for a very bright and magical experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are thrilled to hear how much you loved the skylights in the room! They provide a lot of gorgeous natural light!  We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Loved the pool, close to Disneyland
Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. The room we stayed in was in building 2. It was updated and the bathroom looked brand new. The room has a table where up to 4 can sit and eat. Beds were comfortable although the sheets were a little scratchy and noisy when you moved around. We loved the Alexa to play music and Disney stories during our morning getting ready. The Castaway Cove pool was perfect for our kids. The reservations system made it so that it wasn‚Äôt over crowded and we took advantage of the pool as much as possible. The kids liked it almost as much as Disneyland. We had a great stay and would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for the amazing review! We are so happy to hear that you were able to use our amenities, we didn't even think about having Alexa tell us Disney stories. That is such a great idea!! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: They were fantastic friendly staff and clean rooms, a comfy bed at a hotel! They also could watch our bags before check in if needed so we could take the 8-10 minute walk to disney! Loved the pool and splash area would be perfect for summer! Included amenities like Internet, fridge, microwave cable etc was awesome too!
Manager Response: We love this 5 star review! You mentioned some of our favorite features of the hotel. We do our very best to make sure that we can make you feel at home. We cannot wait for you to return.

Summary: It was our first time staying here. We come to Disneyland once a year and never stay in the same hotel but we will definitely be back here! Our kids loved the water park and booked multiple visits even after a long day at Disney. Another thing we loved was the convenience of being walking distance from the parks. Our room was great, our kids loved having bunk beds to sleep in. Thank you for helping us creating lasting memories as a family.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for such a amazing compliment!! We are so happy that you would like to stay with us again. The Water park bookings are very easy to get and make it a guarantee that you will get a seat or a table for your desired times. Thank you again for your kind words and cannot wait to have you back again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and walking distance from Disneyland
Summary: Front desk gave us great customer service and rooms were clean and great scent. Would definitely book again. The walk to Disneyland was about 8-10 min walk. When we needed anything for our room they were very prompt with the service.
Manager Response: Hello Ramiro, I am so happy to hear that you loved the customer service. Our staff have been with us for years and we are very happy to be training some new staff members in our legendary customer service. We will see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Make sure you read up on it.
Summary: First since it doesn‚Äôt state anywhere there is a $20 fee a day your there to park your car. Only one building has an elevator and queen size beds. All others are full full beds. Also be aware. In their new updated room there is an Alexa. I did not feel comfortable with one in our room that someone could easily hack and watch. It was close to Disneyland though
Manager Response: Hello Jillian, We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a amazing stay. We do have two buildings that are fully renovated with queen beds and a elevator(a total of 2/3 of the property, building 1 and 2). The standard double rooms are next to be renovated. If we do have the pleasure of welcoming you back again, please feel free to let the front desk know about your comfortability with the Alexa, we would be happy to remove it from the room. Or you can unplug it as well. Again we apologize for the experience that you have and hope you have a good stay no matter where you stay on your next Anaheim visit.

Summary: Great interactions with staff and front desk. Rooms were a little outdated but very well maintained and  comfortable (love the added Disney memorabilia). Great location for walking to the parks. Always felt safety standards were being adhered to.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience interacting with our staff and front desk. We understand that our rooms may be a little outdated, but we are glad to hear that you found them to be well maintained and comfortable. It's also great to hear that you enjoyed the Disney memorabilia! We are glad to hear that you found our location to be ideal for walking to the parks, and that you felt safe and secure during your stay. Thank you again for your kind words!

Summary: Hotel was very clean, nice and close to the parks.  Staff was friendly and helpful. They have two pool areas,  which was great.  The only thing is they can use a restaurant in the hotel but not a big deal.  I will book here again on my next Disney visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and found the hotel to be clean, close to the parks, and with friendly and helpful staff. We're glad that you also liked that we have two pool areas. We apologize for not having a restaurant in the hotel, but please know that there are plenty of places to eat nearby. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next Disney visit!

Summary: Always a great experience here! Room exceeded expectation, awesome view, great location, right across Disneyland, just a walk away. There‚Äôs a lot of restaurants on the strip. The hotel is family friendly, they have a water park that my kids absolutely love. The staff is awesome, Joel took great care of me and my family. He was very friendly and polite. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: We were only there for one night but the front desk was helpful and gave us some tips about parking fir Disneyland. Our room was clean as was the rest of the hotel complex that we visited. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that your stay was comfortable and that our staff was helpful. We strive to provide the best experience for our guests and it is great to hear that we succeeded. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: HOJO Anaheim was the perfect stay. It is so close to the parks and was very clean and safe. Such a fun experience. I will definitely be back with my entire family and would definitely do another solo stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: No hot water during the days
Summary: Splurged and stayed right by Disneyland because we have small kids, 1 being a baby. The 2 days we were there we had no hot water!! Couldn‚Äôt bath the kids. You need hot water with a baby! So disappointed!
Manager Response: Hello Jesslinence, We are so sorry that we had issues with the Hot Water when you stayed with us. The hot water was out of our control and our Maintence staff worked tirelessly to get the hot water back up and running. When there is a situation like this at the hotel, our front desk staff will make rooms in other buildings that might not be effected, available for guests to either move or just use them to shower if we cannot get the water back up and running in a timely manner. Regardless this is no excuse, I am so sorry that this happened to you.

Summary: Wonderful accommodations, rooms were clean. Staff was helpful and friendly. Easy to make pool reservations. Limited housekeeping, but upon request additional services were granted. Only 15 min walk to Disneyland. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5 star review! We are so happy that you loved the staff and the distance to Disneyland. Our location is truly A plus. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights, very clean and bed was comfortable. Microwave, mini fridge, balcony in room. 1 block away from Disneyland entrance! Staff where great, do not like the additional parking fee per day but based off its location its understanding. Would stay here again when I bring the kids, very kid friendly since there is a little water park, it is by reservation spots so plan ahead.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is great to hear that you enjoyed our in-room amenities like the microwave and mini fridge. When we put these in the room we really did it with the intention to make a vacation a little easier. We have so many guests who send groceries to the hotel and just make breakfast in the room and bring lots of snacks to make their trip a little easier. We hope that we see you again soon!

Summary: We LOVED our stay here and would love to book again. We loved the heated pool and splash pad areas and hottub. It's only about 6-7 min from Disneyland entrance, which was perfect for us. All of us slept so well in the rooms. The small balcony was great for the early-risers to hang out on. It had a lot of space. The staff was super friendly. They allowed for some flexibility in Check-in/checkout. And they had a box fan we could use while we were there which was so helpful. We loved it here.
Manager Response: Hello Jessica! Thank you for the awesome review! It is great that you were able to use the pool and water playground. The weather has been PERFECT hot tub weather. We try to help as much as possible. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying with this fabulous property for 4 nights.  It is centrally located to so many fun activities!  We did 2 days at Disney and 1 day at the beach and a day just as a stay cation!  The staff is friendly, the rooms are warm and clean.  We highly recommend
Manager Response: Yay! We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay! We hope to welcome you back again soon :)

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located by being close but I did not feel safe with it being my daughter and I as they are located by a bus stop that frequently had people staring at us as we walked by and wasn't well lit. The price would make the property worth it if you plan to use the water park. We stayed in one of the none refurbished rooms and the bed was highly uncomfortable, there was also no thermostat in the room and it was often very cold. Overall the hotel staff was friendly and knowledgeable but the price to us was not worth staying agin until all rooms are renovated.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff. We definitely agree that our staff is one of the kindest and most knowledgeable. We also appreciate the feedback on our rooms that are next to be renovated. We have over 2/3 of the property renovated and the Double Bed rooms are going to be the next part of our multi-year renovation. We are definitely going to take your feedback into great consideration when we are planning the final portion of our renovation. We are also working closely with the local authorities to make sure that the walk is definitely as safe as possible for all of our guests. We recommend walking on the same side of the street as the hotels which offer the most light. Again we sincerely appreciate your feedback and hope to improve on it in the future.

Summary: As a pre-pandemic Disney regular, I've stayed at MANY places around Disneyland. Airbnbs, VRBOs, various hotels/motels around the parks...and when I say that I have NEVER been as happy as I was at the Hojo, I'm not kidding!!! This hotel has everyone else COMPLETELY beat when it comes to customer service, comfort, and proximity. It is worth every penny. I can't attest to the pool area because our group didn't use it, but we all absolutely LOVED how comfortable the beds were, how attentive the staff were, and the fact that it was less than a 10 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland was the cream of the crop!!! I'm never staying anywhere else when I go to Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words!! We are so happy you had such a great time and cannot wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: While the staff were amazing, and the rooms clean, beds were comfy and the coffee was awesome ... we did have a few problems with the property, though none were major, or deal breakers.  1) The pillows here S U C K. Unless you want to use 8 pillows to get a 'regular pillow' feel, bring your own pillows.  2) Like MOST hotels, while the rooms themselves are fairly soundproof, the DOORS are not, so it gets VERY loud in the morning when all the excited kids going to Disneyland are running/shouting down the halls.   3) There was a 'hidden fee' (I may have just missed it in the agreement) of our pre-paid hotel room; Parking was 20-some dollars a day. While not "horrible", it was a bit of a surprise at checkout.  4) I think it's a California thing as a whole, but the water pressure in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate all of your feedback. We actually have two different types of pillows on each bed, and we have some feather free and foam options as well. In the future please feel free to let the front desk staff know and we will be happy to get you some different style pillows that might work better. We apologize for the parking charge not being more available, we will definitely make sure the front desk staff is aware and makes it known at check in for you. Its great to hear that you loved the View. We truly feel like we have one of the best views in town. Thank you again for you feedback! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I can‚Äôt say enough about this hotel. The customer service was exceptional, very clean, close to the park. Our family enjoyed the pool during our afternoon break. We will definitely stay at Howard Johnson again and not check into any other place. You are a wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your amazing review. Taking a afternoon break is the best part about being so close to the hotel. Its like a lovely little oasis just for you. We cannot wait to see you again really soon!

Summary Heading: Rad place to stay for Disney trips!
Summary: We absolutely adore this hotel!! The renovation is perfect‚Äîwe love all the vintage themed Disney decorations & colors!  It‚Äôs a perfect walk to the parks & close enough to take a break during the day. We ALWAYS stay at HOJO when visiting Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! Since we opened in 1965 we are so happy to be bringing back those Mid-Century Vibes to Anaheim. We will see you soon for your next Disney trip.

Summary Heading: HORRIBLE.. NO English, rude staff and management
Summary: The staff treat you like rubbish they are rude & hang up on you. Being a Wyndham hotel the staff are meant to be trained and bilingual....NOT ONE PERSON AT THIS WHOLE HOTEL.. Spoke any english, so when you make a booking you cant even enquire about anything. This company is breaking all company policy not having english speaking staff.... somehow they are getting away with it.... SO IF you are from a western county... dont stay here.. go somewhere else. Disgusting service, first wyndham that has ZERO Standards.. they need to fire all reception staff and employ people who can actually communicate with people how they were meant to in there job.. wont be back ever.
Manager Response: Dear Lee: I'm certain that you did not stay at my Howard Johnson Hotel in Anaheim, California based on your other recent reviews from Mexico.  I have worked at this property for over 30 years, and as an Orange County, California native, I can assure you that all of our Front Office associates speak clear and courteous English with a smile.

Summary Heading: Great view, fun water park, close to Disneyland!
Summary: We loved our stay so much! It was an easy walk to Disneyland, we loved our Disneyland + water park view in Building 1, the complimentary crib was a game changer, and the kids loved playing at the water park when we weren‚Äôt at Disneyland. Overall great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review! We are so happy you were able to utilize our Complimentary crib service, we know traveling with children can be hard so we love to be able to take one thing off of your plate when you stay with us.

Summary: Friendly staff, nice clean rooms, beautiful pool, play area and hot tub‚Ä¶.all at an affordable price and very short walk to the entrance of Disneyland! What more could you ask for? We had a wonderful time!
Manager Response: We couldn't ask for anything more either! Thanks for staying with us!

Summary: We stayed in building 1 which was remodeled in 2018. It looks like it was remodeled in 2021! Everything still looks wonderful and very maintained. The beds are absolutely cloud like! I highly recommend HOJO Anaheim! Can‚Äôt wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much!! We do our best to keep everything up to date and in perfect condition since we renovated. We have a amazing team who is always checking our rooms to make sure that we are always putting our best foot forward. We cannot wait to have you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean family hotel close to Disney Land
Summary: The hotel was clean and comfortable. Nicely decorated rooms and lobbies. The employees are very friendly. They are very close to Disneyland. And the pool water was really warm! We enjoyed our stay. Our only complaint is that the Chlorine in the jacuzzi was a bit too much for our eyes.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kinds words and feedback. We sincerely appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Travel in the time of COVID
Summary: We have stayed at the Howard Johnson in Anaheim on countless occasions. It‚Äôs a close- ish walk to Disneyland & Mimi‚Äôs Cafe opposite is a real draw card. This time we stayed in building 3 because it‚Äôs not situated on the noisy highway. Rooms are never available before check in time but they store your bags. Our room was not renovated & therefore not as inviting as the noisier rooms. It really wasn‚Äôt all that quiet either as we were located near the pool & heard clanging all the time. Hotel recommended getting pizza delivery from Carolina‚Äôs. DO NOT order from Carolina‚Äôs as we ordered pizza at 8.30pm & it didn‚Äôt arrive until after 10.30pm. When it arrived the pizza was stone cold. There was a microwave in the room which came in handy although it was barely operational. I‚Äôm sure the
Manager Response: Hello Tina, I would like to start by saying how excited we are to have welcomed back our Aussie Guests. The hotel has welcomed so many new guests since reopening but we truly miss our Aussie and Kiwi guests. We are happy that you decided to come back to visit. We are also glad that we were able to help store your luggage when you arrived early. If we have rooms available early we can definitely get you keys to the room at no additional cost, but we are happy to be able to store you luggage at no cost until the room is ready. We know that guests always have lots of plans on their Disneyland trip. Thank you for your feedback on Carolina's, this is feedback I will make sure to share with the Front Desk staff because this is NOT the experience that we want our guests to have. We have a long list of restaurants that can deliver to guests rooms since we do not have a kitchen or restaurant on property that can deliver. The rooms that you were in are actually next to be renovated and we will be bringing all new microwaves, mini fridges and so much more in there. We sincerely appreciate the feedback so we can make sure that we take it into consideration when we plan the next portion of the renovation.

Summary: This hotel is very close to the park. It is clean and the staff is friendly. We stayed in building one. The room was nice. It was the perfect size for our family of four. The table in the room was perfect for a quick breakfast. My only complaint is that our double Bob stroller didn‚Äôt fit through the door. But this is not a deal breaker. It just took us a little longer to get back in the room at night and out the door in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! When we renovated building 1 and 2 the main priority was efficiency for families. We wanted to make sure there were lots of space for the whole family to eat, lots of places to store food if you decide to bring your own groceries and even tons of plugs in the rooms.

Summary Heading: Best hotel I have ever been to so far
Summary: This was an amazing experience. Room cleaning service was great. Rooms were super clean. Staff at the front desk and the water park were super friendly. The water park was amazing. Excellent location near Disneyland. I loved it and it felt home.
Manager Response: Yay!! That is our main goal. We want you to feel at home and welcome when you stay with us. We will be looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: If you have small children, this is the perfect place to stay! We love the Family Suite, so we can ACTUALLY all get good rest each night! Sometimes our kids are also more excited for the water park than they are for Disneyland!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you love the Kids Suite! When we created it we knew that this would be something that makes larger families comfortable with the two rooms and two bathrooms. The Water playground is definitely a huge draw, especially if you are going to be doing a staycation. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Best Experience Ever, Perfect for Disneyland!
Summary: We took a family vacation to Disneyland and stayed at the Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel and Water Playground.  The staff were very welcoming and helpful, and it was easy to reserve pool time for our son (nearly 4) at their Pirates Cove.  The room was very clean and comfortable and under a 10-minute walk to Disneyland's entrance.  Very close to restaurants and fast-food, too.  We highly recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us Dale! I am so happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and helped make some amazing memories for you and your family. We cannot wait to welcome you back and hopefully be a staple in your Disneyland trips.

Summary: Very nice hotel with lovely grounds.  Very short walk to Disneyland and rooms were clean and beds comfortable.  We did not use the pools as the weather was very cold right after Christmas which also affected our time at Disneyland.  When we go back we would stay her again and would like to use the pools.  Also had a nice store for snacks and toys.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us Dani! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed the location and our grounds. The next trip you definitely need to visit the pool and water playground, they both are actually heated as well. When it was chilly a few weeks ago we could see a little steam coming from the Garden Pool and it looked AMAZING.

Summary: We loved the retro vibe of this hotel! Trip with the grandchildren, we had two adjoining rooms overlooking the Castaway Cove pirate area.  The grandchildren felt like they were at Disney from the moment we checked in. We could see the monorail on its tracks across the street, the Matterhorn was visible from the parking lot. Front desk check in was great;  I wish I had the name of the girl who helped us because she was outstanding.    The rooms were clean and comfortable, there‚Äôs a nice little balcony patio area. Would‚Äôve been nice to have chairs out there but I understand it is a small area. Nice large area to put your suitcases.  Keurig coffee maker in the room. Fortunately we knew that ahead of time and we brought our own coffee pods which was great. They provide a few and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words!! We are so happy to hear that you and your Family had such a amazing time. We strive to give those memories that will last a lifetime. The hotel has so much to offer and its great to hear that you loved it all. The rooms in those two story building, we make sure to ask when you check in to see if you or anyone in your party might need help with bringing luggage up the stairs or if it would be better to keep you on the first floor. Again, thank you so much for the kind words and we cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We were promised daily breakfast online, and were told that we wouldn't be getting any after we checked in. The bathroom handles were terrible, they came off after we used a towel on it. The wifi stopped working after 3 days of stay. When we called for help with it, we were told to call their wifi company support instead. To make things worse, they "accidentally" charged an extra 60$, which really pissed me off. Only book here if you want to be close to Disney land.
Manager Response: We are so saddened to hear about your experience with us. We guarantee this is not the experience that we want to offer our guests. For a period of about 2 days there were a few reservations that were made in error that offered free breakfast, while we don't have any kitchen or restaurant facilities on property we are happy to have waived all parking fees for those reservations that were made in mistake through a third party. If we do get the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future, please feel free to give our front desk a call so we can make sure to get any maintence issues fixed immediately so it doesn't happen again. The internet is handled by a company off property to make sure that we have 24/7 support for our guests if there are any issues. We sincerely apologize for the experience that you had and we hope you have a good stay next time in Anaheim regardless of where you stay.

Summary: Just a short easy walk to the park. The room was super clean. Decor is cute. Staff is friendly and efficient. Check in/out was seamless and quick. No restaurant on premises but does have a nice little market right next to lobby for snacks, drinks, misc. necessities.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you had a good stay! Thank you so much for your kind words. We are happy you loved the Cleanliness and the d√©cor at the hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Same nice hotel , but they now are charging you for parking !   Could hear people bouncing around on the above floor while sleeping . Lovely , attentive front desk staff .  Ice make was broken on our floor entire 6 day stay .  They don‚Äôt do a normal hotel service daily light touch up service if requested . Otherwise nothing provided .  Nice place , clean rooms
Manager Response: Hello Chris, Thank you for your kind words about our staff. We were one of the last hotels to offer free parking, unfortunately when we reopened we lost a lot of our international guests who did not bring cars so our parking started filling up very fast with everyone who was lucky enough to drive to the hotel. With that, we had to start parking our staff off-site and to offset the cost of the infrastructure we had to charge for parking. We also do this to ensure that all of our guests have parking spots available when they arrive. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Our room was really clean,  friendly staff and 10 min walk to Disneyland. Would definitely stay here again. Really the only downside is that the parking lot is kind of tight and there is a $20 parking fee each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so happy that you loved the distance to Disneyland, it really makes it so easy when avoiding the bus and walk to the Disney parking structure. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Brought my family to Disney and stayed at Howard Johnson. Our main concern was cleanliness, and our room exceeded our expectations. Staff is very professional, and we had a quick check in/out process. We will be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. Our Housekeeping staff is amazing and work so hard. We are very happy to electrostatic spray our rooms after every guest as the first part of the cleaning process. We cannot wait for you to come back and visit.

Summary: Great place for family. Clean and safe. Only a few blocks walk from Disneyland, Disney Adventure Park and  Downtown Disney.  Close to many food options. Nice Waterpark for the kids. Mimis Cafe across the street for dine in our takeout to your room for breakfast, lunch or dinner
Manager Response: Hello Nicole, Thank you for your kind words! I am so happy we were able to be a part of your Christmas vacation. We cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in the area!
Summary: Don‚Äôt be fooled by its dated exterior. Inside is an updated and very clean hotel that‚Äôs next to Disneyland. I just wished they served breakfast and had a lower fee for parking. But aside from that we had an excellent and restful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We definitely love our architecture that was done by William Pereira, who was the same architect that Designed the Disneyland hotel and Transamerica Pyramid in San Francisco. We have completed two parts of our three part interior renovation of the hotel. We cannot wait for you to visit us soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to park, not great staff.
Summary: We chose this location to be close to the park and to be more child focused. We loved our room that had bunk beds and a view of the fireworks. The check in host and staff at the hotel were not very helpful during our stay.
Manager Response: Hello Ashley, Thank you for your feedback. We love that you noticed how family friendly our property is. The bunk beds are such a hit with kids. We cannot wait to see you soon!

Summary: Good proximity.  Stayed in building 4 with a lot to be desired. When I booked this hotel I booked since there was a recent remodel.  The room I was given is a older building.  No remodel or elevator.  I was not happy.  I requested to be moved but was told no availability.  We visit this area twice a year and this has been he most expensive hotel but the oldest and most run down.  No housekeeping and when I asked for more towels they acted like I was asking for too much. With no housekeeping it was a must.  I will not be back.
Manager Response: Hello Amanda, we sincerely apologize for the experience that you had. The Double Beds, which are the two-story buildings, are the next building that we plan on renovating, and we are definitely planning on adding an elevator to those buildings as well. Also, when booking through a Third Party they normally will only have two options, the standard rooms that are next to be renovated and our Deluxe rooms that are completely renovated with two queen beds. Normally over holidays like New Year we do tend to be sold out, so we do not have the option of moving you to another building, but when we have rooms available, we are always happy to move you to feel more comfortable. We also are happy to offer limited service by request so delivering towels are no issue, we are happy to replenish those at any time. You can use the Alexa in the room to call for towels as well. Again, we sincerely apologize for the experience that you had, and we hope you have a good stay on your next trip to Anaheim no matter where you stay.

Summary: Beautiful hotel!  Great location!  8 minute walk to Disneyland.  Super clean and Disney themed hotel.  We would definitely stay here again!  Many restaurants located close to the hotel.  We had a rental car, but never had to use it while we stayed here.  Great service!
Manager Response: Hello Jeff, Thank you so much for your great review!! We love that our location made your trip convenient. Being able to walk to everything is something that we love as well. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great rooms, close to the parks
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Howard Johnson.  It is about an 8 minute walk from Disneyland.  Our rooms were perfectly situated, clean, and exactly the right price. The gift shop in the lobby was ideal. Please note they are not yet cleaning the rooms while you're there so you do have to call if you need towels, etc. Great time.
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca, we appreciate your kind words. We have a wonderful gift shop, and we actually hope to start adding more great items in there in the future. Maybe you will see some local small businesses as well. Thank you again for your review and we cannot wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary: After confusion with our 3rd party booking site the Howard Johnson front desk staff (Michael) help correct the confusion and made sure my family was taken care of. We highly recommend this property because of the Staff, cleanliness of the property and close proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello James, Thank you for the amazing review! Unfortunately those third party booking sites can definitely be tricky but it is our staffs main priority to handle as much as we can for you. We want to make your trip regardless if its your first trip or your 40th trip as easy as possible. We cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The location is excellent. I reserved three rooms for the family and was surprised to see how large the rooms are. Given the location, the room prices are really good. Customer service on check-in/out was excellent as well.
Manager Response: Hello There, Thank you for the 5 star review! We love when families come to visit so we can help be apart of those lifelong memories. Normally if we notice the same name or last name we do our best to try to keep the rooms all together. Again, we appreciate you review and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed at this hotel a couple times and every time it‚Äôs been amazing! The rooms are clean and spacious. The staff is pleasant and quick to help. We love that they have both a fridge and microwave! We like to bring some of our own groceries and the fridge is a great size to fit it all!
Manager Response: Hello Again! We are so happy that you choose us as your home away from home in Anaheim and we cannot wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Our Disneyland home away from home!
Summary: I have been staying here for over 40 years, and there is a good reason for that, it‚Äôs a wonderful hotel!! ! I love the retro theming, the rooms are large and comfy, most have balconies, which is so nice, the staff is friendly, and they make you feel so welcome. Pricing is really good for the area, and it‚Äôs an easy 8 minute or so walk to the parks. We just spent our fourth Christmas here, and it‚Äôs become a great tradition for us. My home away from home!!
Manager Response: Hello There, Thank you for the glowing review. It really warms our heart to know that we get to be apart of your yearly trip to Disneyland, and to spend Christmas with us! Your comfort and happiness is our main priority when staying with us. We have some really great aspects of the hotel that you mentioned but our staff is really world class in our opinions. We hope to see you again next Christmas as well.

Summary: Overall a great stay! Staff is helpful, gift shop is fairly priced, rooms were clean and comfy.  It is a quick walk to Disney and plenty of restaurants within walking distance too.  The noise level is not masked at all, unfortunately. We could hear neighbors and outdoor noise throughout the night.  Wish they offered breakfast and that would make the price a little more valuable  & worth it.  The website does say there is a shuttle to Disney...but it's actually the city bus and it costs $.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We do indeed have a City run shuttle that is called the ART bus. It picks up at the hotel and takes you straight to Disneyland, however on the way back we definitely recommend walking since we are the last stop on the way back to the hotel. The walk is such a easy 7-10 minute walk. (Some of our staff even runs over to Downtown Disney for lunch sometimes). We noticed that you mentioned some sound from the next room, please always feel free to contact our front desk so we can make sure that you have the most restful stay possible. We do have quiet times in the hotel to make sure that it is peaceful for all sleeping. Again, thank you for the review and we hope to see you again really soon.

Summary: Staff at the front desk were friendly and very accommodating. We were early for check in and they stored our luggage for us and texted us that our room was ready early. The room was renovated and extremely comfortable, I need to know what brand mattress they use lol. The room was a city view, off the balcony it was a freeway view, but the soundproofing of the room was great! Didn‚Äôt hear the freeway at all unless the balcony was opened. We will upgrade next time to the pool or park view. Still giving the room 5 stars since the balcony was never used during our stay but do keep in mind if you plan on the using the balcony for your visit.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer, Thank you for such a amazing review! We are so happy to hear that you were comfortable with your room. Our mattresses are AMAZING and we totally agree. When we completed the last renovation in that building we took all of our trip advisor reviews and made sure to address everything, for example the rooms on the freeway side of the building. We added the double pane window in there to make sure that your room is silent from all freeway noise and I think we nailed it! The rooms with other views do have a easy access balcony as you mentioned. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again really soon!

Summary: Booked last minute for Christmas Day and the price was fair for what it is. We didn‚Äôt use the pools. They upgraded our room for free which was nice because we got to see the Disney fireworks from our room.  Friendly staff. Nice parking. Close to Disneyland park. Only negative thing was we were under the impression that parking was free with booking but we were charged $20 for parking.
Manager Response: Hello Michelle, I am so happy to hear that you spent Christmas Day with us! The Disney view rooms are really amazing aren't they? I hope you were able to catch the special Christmas fireworks from your balcony. We hope that we get to see you again really soon!

Summary: We stayed in a family suite and the freeway noise was terrible, we had to use earplugs. Staff was nice and tried to help but all family suites are on that side.  Also no housekeeping.  We stayed 7 days and I couldn't wait to leave.  I look forward to coming back to a clean room after disneyland.  We have stayed in other hotels in the area in the last few months and they all had housekeeping.  Proximity to the park was good.  We were hoping to make this our new go to when visiting Disney but we will not stay here again.
Manager Response: We are very saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We do offer a limited service for the time being by request. Unfortunately right now we are experiencing some staffing difficulties but we are hoping to get many more staff members back on staff so we can offer the daily full service again soon. We sincerely apologize for the experience that you had and we hope you have a good stay in Anaheim regardless  of where you stay.

Summary: The hotel rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly and helpful. Most importantly to us the location to Disneyland was within walking distance. Great stay overall, definitely will be doing it again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location to Disneyland and exceptional service. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay to visit Disneyland
Summary: Second time staying here for family trips to Disneyland.  The hotel accommodations are great and it is a short walk to the gates at Disneyland/California Adventure.  The staff are very pleasant and eager to help if you need it.  In summer, the pool and water playground are wonderful for the kids and older kids.  Beds were comfortable and the hotel had taken Covid appropriate measures for safe stays.  We will choose this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service.  We are happy you felt our staff were taking the appropriate Covid precautions to keep our guests safe. We hope to be your first choice when planning your next vacation!

Summary: So convenient to get ti DL the remodeled rooms were great and the pools were warm enough to swim in the winter. We had a great stay and will book again. We thought the week rates were awesome. The weekend was a bit more pricy
Manager Response: Hello There, Thank you for the review! We are so happy you were able to experience our pool and water playground during your stay. That great part about California is our weather, and combined with the heated pool its always a good time for a swim at the Howard Johnson Anaheim. We hope you welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The beds were comfy after a long day at Disneyland. The walk to Disneyland wasn't bad. The room was okay and clean, the bathroom a little small but over all it was a good stay. The tree in the courtyard was beautiful and festive.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed our comfortable beds and location to Disneyland. We are always working on improving our rooms and we hope to have them all renovated soon. We hope you will book another stay with us to see our other festive decor throughout the seasons!

Summary Heading: Amazing Disney Themed Hotel 8 minutes walking from Park
Summary: We are Magic Key holders and we have stayed in this hotel twice now. It has quickly became our favorite hotel because it is 8 minutes walking to Disney or 6 minutes driving to Mickey & Friends parking lot. The rooms are always extremely clean and it is Disney theme so you feel like you are staying at a Disney resort. The beds are comfortable and the staff is friendly. I don't think there is one bad thing to say about this hotel- we love it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We thrilled that we are becoming your favorite hotel near Disneyland. We love that you found our staff to be friendly and hotel clean and comfortable. We hope you stay with us again for your next Disney visit!

Summary: Stayed here for a few days to go to Disneyland and was great location with only being a 10 minute walk away from park and rides and also few blocks away from good food. Was great price and great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are happy our location was a short walk for you to Disneyland and near by restaurants. We are also glad to hear we provided you with great customer service. We hope you think of staying with us for your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: We love Howard Johnson Anaheim Hotel , the room was beautiful, clean and the beds were super comfortable, we have everything we need in our room, it takes us like 5 min walk to Disneyland, they have a beautiful pool area for kids , we love it !!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are delighted that you found your room to be clean and comfortable with everything that you needed for your stay.  We love that your kids enjoyed our pool area that our location made it easy to walk to Disney. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: The Hojo was pleasantly upgraded since the last time we stayed there. The staff was great and the room was very clean. The location was great for Disneyland and we had a very nice view of the fireworks from our hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you stayed in one of our renovated buildings, we hope to have all buildings renovated in the future. It is also great that you found our staff to be friendly and that you were able to see the fireworks from your room. We hope to be your top choice when booking accommodations in Anaheim.

Summary: If you are looking for an affordable yet still very high quality hotel to stay at on your Disneyland trip, Howard Johnson is the place for you! It is walking distance to the entrances of both parks which allows you to avoid having to pay for parking and taking all the shuttles, and there are multiple places to stop for breakfast along the way. The room was exactly what we needed and very tidy and pleasant to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review! We are so please that our hotel was exactly what you needed for your Disneyland trip. We are delighted that our location made it easy for you to walk to Disneyland and near by restaurants for  breakfast. We hope to be your first choice when staying in the Anaheim area.

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful, the rooms were clean and modern, the bed was comfortable, from the hotel it is just a short walk to Disneyland, we love staying at Hojo Anaheim! Great hotel for families with kids as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. It's also great to hear that you had a comfortable stay while staying with us. We hope to host you again the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: We had an absolute blast staying at the HOJO! Only 12 minute walk to Disneyland gate and beautiful rooms! Pool was so clean and relaxing! Definitely recommend for staycation when visiting Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It's great to see that you had a relaxing time at our pool and would recommend our hotel. We hope to be your top choice of accommodations while visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Such a wonderful home away from home!
Summary: Hands down my favorite place to stay! This hotel is so close to the park, you can walk to Disneyland in just 5 mins. So convenient! The staff members are so nice and help you with anything you need!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special. We're also glad to know that you found our location convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Stayed in 2 queen bed room in Building 1. Everything was clean and comfortable!! Lots of places to eat close buy. There was even a little store on the way to and from Disneyland. Will definitely stay here again on next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so delighted to hear you really enjoyed our clean and comfortable beds. We're also glad to know that you found our location and amenities convenient to your visit to the park. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Staff was friendly, rooms were nice, comfortable beds, loved having a Keriug in the room. Super close to Disneyland.  Only downside was the hassle of booking pool time online, asked for all personal & cc information everytime you would try to reserve a time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you loved our location and the amenities at our hotel. Since we have a limited amount of pool reservations though out the day, we ask for your credit card information to guarantee your arrival. Nothing is charged onto the card unless you do not show up to the reservation. There is also no charge to cancel or change the reservation. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope you stay with us again.

Summary: I am quite picky when it comes to deciding on a hotel and the Howard Johnson Inn lived up to my expectations. It was very clean and well maintained which is my top priority in a hotel. The front desk staff were friendly and welcoming at both check-in and check-out. The rooms were more spacious than I was expecting and the beds were very comfortable. I enjoyed the amenity of a microwave - something that is not always in hotel rooms!   I am five months pregnant so I was looking for a hotel with comfortable beds and within a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. This hotel checked both of those boxes. I also loved the convenience of Panera and McDonald's on the way to the parks - made it easy to grab breakfast in the morning!   My one piece of feedback for the hotel would be to work on
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and positive feedback! We are so delighted to hear you and your family really enjoyed our comfortable beds and spacious rooms. Our team is dedicated to provide exceptional service, value and quality. We are so thrilled to hear we were successful! We hope to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at HoJo Anaheim for our anniversary trip to Disneyland. The room is super cute, and updated in a colorful Disney-themed motif. Honestly felt like I was still at a Disney-owned hotel! The staff was ultra friendly from the time we checked in to the moment where we realized we left items in the room, checked out and got on the freeway. After a call to the front desk, they got housekeeping to check and they retrieved the items and had them ready and bagged for us at the front desk by the time we got back! The bed was comfortable and it was such an easy walk to and from the parks. So glad I stayed here, we‚Äôll definitely come back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you very much! We're thrilled to know that our team made your visit special and that you enjoyed your Anniversary. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our exceptional service and that our staff were able to return your lost items to you quickly.  We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: I was extremely disappointed in the room we were assigned to. Prior to booking I did my research on your website, the instagram page and other avenues. I was led to believe that all room were renovated. No where did I see that there was a room or a building where it falling apart. To start off, the toilet was a toilet you find at an elementary school, the door had a chain link lock not your typical bar lock, the furniture smelled like old furniture,  the ironing board was dirty and falling apart, the chairs provided were dirty snd unsteady,  the light fixtures were old and dusty, the shower was tiny the shower head was to eye level with me and the carpet felt dirty. The only "updated" part of the room was the alexa. Overall my family and I felt so uncomfortable staying in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us. We are sorry to hear that your room did not meet your expectations. On our website, try to make sure there are accurate pictures and descriptions of each of our rooms, and that our third party websites have accurate descriptions as well. While all of our rooms in Building 1 and 2 have been renovated, we hope to have all of our other buildings renovated in the near future. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if they are unhappy with their room in anyway. Our Front Desk Staff is happy to fix any issues to your satisfaction or find an alternative room option for you. I also apologize that the chlorine, bleached your bathing suit.
